53b2(phal chen): mi 'ong bzlog cing phan pa skyed pa zhes bya'o// chu klung gi lha srog chags kyi rgyud mtha' yas pa skyob pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad la 'tshe ba med pa'i byams pa 'byung ba zhes
53b3(phal chen): bya'o// chu klung gi lha gdung ba med pa rgya mtsho gdung ba med pa'i 'od dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gdung bar mi nus pa'i sgro kun nas ston pa zhes bya'o// 
53b4(phal chen): chu klung gi lha dga' bde kun nas 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa da ni/ sems can thams cad kyi 'jungs pa sel da cing gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa yongs su sbyong ba zhes
53b5(phal chen): bya'o// chu klung gi lha yon tan gyi shugs yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ thams cad tshim par byed/ pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o// chu klung gi
53b6(phal chen): lha 'jig rten thams cad kyi dpal rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnam par byang bar byed cing 'khon du 'dzin pa dam po dang / khro ba'i shugs dang bar
53b7(phal chen): byed pa zhes bya'o// chu klung gi lha tshegs chen po rgya mtsho'i dpal gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad bde ba phun sum tshogs pa myong bar byed cing thar pa rgya mtsho la 'dzud pa zhes bya'o// de nas
53b8(phal chen): chu klung gi lha chu bo kun dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ chu klung gi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 
54a1(phal chen): chos rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas spyod pa dag/ sngan chad rgyal bas sems can don du sbyangs// 'jig rten bkang zhing nyon mongs gdungs pa'i rnams// sprin chen char
54a2(phal chen): bzhin rab tu zhi bar mdzad// bskal pa brjod du med par rgyal bas sngon// smon lam 'od kyis sems can dbyings sbyangs shing // 'gro ba yongs smin dbang po chos kyang mkhyen// 'khyil pa zhes bya chu
54a3(phal chen): klung lha dga' bo// 'gro dang mnyam pa'i snying rje'i tshul bsgoms shing // mgon po sems can nyon mongs dri ma sbyong // yongs smin sems can rgyal ba mngon du blta// de la dri med mig gi lha yang mos// 
54a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs snyan rgya chen ni// kun tu dbasgrags pas 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ni// sangs rgyas dbyangs snyan thos nas dga' mgu'i yid// rnam thar 'di ni sgra
54a5(phal chen): dbyangs sgrog pas thos// bskal pa rgya mtsho 'gro la phan don tu// sngan chad byang chub spyod pa spyad pa mthong // de phyir de ni phyogs bkang 'jig rten mdzes// lam rgyud skyob pa rjes
54a6(phal chen): su dran zhing dga'// rgyal ba sngan chad spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// sna tshogs sgo nas sems can smin par mdzad// de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho sdug bsngal 'jil// zhi byed chu klung lha ni des dga'o// 
54a7(phal chen): sbyin pa'i sgo mo tshad med mi zad mang // 'gro ba 'dod pa kun la yongs btang zhing // rgyal bas 'gro ba'i 'jungs pa yongasu bsal// kun nas dga' dpal rnam thar de mthong ngo // thabs tshul rgya mtsho
54a8(phal chen): thams cad bsgoms pas na// yon tan mang po brgya phrag mang pos byung // rgyal bas 'gro ba thams cad tshim mdzad de// rgya chen sgra dbyangs shugs ldan lha yang dga'// sgrib pa'i gleng dang 'gro
54b1(phal chen): ba'i nyon mongs dri// 'gro ba rnams la byams pa bskyed sbyangs pas// mkha' mnyam 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnam par mdzes// rnam par mdzes pa'i chu klung lnga dga'o// sangs rgyas rang byung yon tan
54b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho ste// bsod nams zhing ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal 'dor// byang chub lam la rim gyis yongs smin mdzad// rgya mtsho'i tshogs dpal rnam thar 'di yin no// de la lo tog gi lha dang 'jam pa'i
54b3(phal chen): dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ ro dang mdangs thams cad skyed cing // sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi sku rab tu 'thob pa ston pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha dus kyi me tog rnam par
54b4(phal chen): mdzes pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tshe bas dga' ba chen po'i shugs kyi tshim paskyed pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha rtsal dam pa'i stobs kyi
54b5(phal chen): rnam par thar pa ni/ chos thams cad kyi dbyings yongs su rgyas pas shin tu dag pa'i spyod yul zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha mdangs kyi dang mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i rnam
54b6(phal chen): par thar pa ni/ snying rje mtha' yas pa'i sgo nas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'bul ba rab tu 'gyed cing rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lhas kun gyi rtsa ba 'bras bu'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 
54b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du lta zhing / sangs rgyas rnams la yon tan yang dag par skyed pa ston pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha gtsug pud kha dog sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba
54b8(phal chen): thams cad kyi mos pa'i me tog yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha yal ga dri ma med par grub pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can la phan pa'i byams pa dang / bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen
55a1(phal chen): po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha spos sna tshogs shin tu grub pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ chos thams cad la spyod pa kun tu gnon pas
55a2(phal chen): rtsom pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha bzang zhing yid du 'ong bar snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi zhum pa dang / yid du mi 'ong ba rnam par zlog cing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad
55a3(phal chen): yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya'o// lo tog gi lha kha dog rnam par dag cing 'od dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rnam par lta zhing chos kyis 'khor gyi dbang
55a4(phal chen): po tshim par byed pa zhes bya'o// de nas lo tog gi lha dang 'jam pa'i dpal gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ lo tog gi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam
55a5(phal chen): par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras / rang byung ye shes sgron ma skyes pa ni/ 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs dang mgon gyur te// ma lus 'gro ba'i bde ba yang
55a6(phal chen): dag skyed// bsod nams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas bla na med// sangs rgyas mnyan na don yod yon tan sprin// 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad// chos rgya chen po mi zad rab tu skyed// 
55a7(phal chen): dus kyi dkyil 'khor lha ni 'di la 'jug/ bder gshegs stobs ni ma lus yongs su rgyas// 'gro ba dag na chos kyi legs pas mdzes// 'gro ba kun 'dul kun tu rnam par snang // stobs
55a8(phal chen): dang gzugs kyi mthu yis de mthong ngo // sems kyi skad cig kun la 'gro mnyam pa'i// thugs rje rgya mtsho sngan chad rnam sbyangs pas// de phyir rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul mtha' yas so// de ni mdangs/ 
55b1(phal chen): mthong lha yis rab tu mthong // thabs rnams kun gyi sgo nas don yod par// sangs rgyas 'jig rten kun tu khyab gyur cing // 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs dag par mdzad// 'di ni thams cad sgo mo'i
55b2(phal chen): rnam thar to// 'gro ba 'di na mos yangs gang yod pa// de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i mthus byung ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho'o// nags 'tshal rgyan gyi gtsug pud de la 'jug/ 
55b3(phal chen): 'jig rten rnams la byams pa che bskyed de// sems can rnams la phan phyir rang byung skyes// lam rab dge ba zhi ba rab tu ston// zhi ba sna tshogs dpal gyi rnam thar to// phyogs su sems can
55b4(phal chen): yongs smin byed pa'i tshe// bder gshegs spyod pa ji ltar rnam dag pa// byang chub shing las de dag sgra yang 'byung // spos zhim dpal gyi lha yis de thos so// rgyal ba 'jig
55b5(phal chen): rten yid du myong ba spong // dga' ba ma lus rnams kyang rab tu skyed// 'gro ba kun gyi dbang po rnam par sbyong // dge bar snang ba'i lha yis de mthong ngo // 'gro ba kun na sangs rgyas
55b6(phal chen): shin tu 'phags// skye bo kun gyi bsam pa des mkhyen te// sna tshogs sgo nas 'gro ba yongs smin mdzad// rnam dag kha dog 'od kyi rnam thar to// de la sman gyi lha phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam par
55b7(phal chen): thar pa ni/ bsam pa kun nas rnam par lta ba'i gnon pas 'gro ba rab tu gnon pa zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha tsan dan gyi nags tshal gyi shugs 'chang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni blta ba don yod pas
55b8(phal chen): sems can 'dren pa'i 'od ces bya'o// sman gyi lha 'od rdul med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bas rdul dang bral ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha ming
56a1(phal chen): kun tu grags pa glang po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ ming bsgrags pas dge ba'i rtsa brgya mtsho yang dag par 'brel ba zhes bya'o// sman gyi lnga spu'i grong kun
56a2(phal chen): nas 'od 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ nad thams cad la snying rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi shugs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha mun pa rnam par sel cing rnam par byo 'i mams ni 'gro ba mdongs
56a3(phal chen): ba lta bu thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mig rnam par dag par byed pa zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha sgra dbyangs kun tu 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu bsgrags pas don gyi dbyings
56a4(phal chen): 'byung ba zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha nyi ma'i 'od 'gro ba'i mchog gi/ rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams/ cad la dge ba'i bshes su ston cing dge ba'i rtsabs lang
56a5(phal chen): dag par skul ba zhes bya'o// sman gyi lha phyogs bcur rmob med par lta ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ mos pa'i tshul gyis rnam par dag pa'i snying rje'i snying po zhes bya'o// sman gyi
56a6(phal chen): lha mdangs bzang po kun tu 'gyed pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nad rab tu zhi bar byed cing / sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyong ba zhes bya'o// de nas sman gyi lha
56a7(phal chen): phun sum tshogs pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ sman gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas
56a8(phal chen): ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab ltos// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rab tu mkhyen// thabs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs sgo dag nas// sdug bsngal kun las sems can rab tu 'grel// sangs rgyas
56b1(phal chen): chos nyid de ltar bsam mi khyab// de'i mthu ni thams cad don kyang yod// skye dgu rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad// tsan dan shugs dang ldan pa'i rnam thar to// sngan chad rgyal ba'i chos
56b2(phal chen): nyid dag la ltos// bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' med spyod pa na'ang // srid pa kun la chags pa gang yang med// de la rdul med 'od kyi lha 'jug go/ rgyal ba bskal pa stong phrag brgya dag tu// mthong zhing
56b3(phal chen): mtshan thos de bzhin shin tu dkon// tshul rnams kun tu rang byung don yod de// de la rgyal mtshan mchog ni de ltar 'jug/ rgyal ba'i spu yi sgo rnams kun nas kyang // nad las rab tu 'grel ba'i
56b4(phal chen): 'od bkyabs// 'jig rten nyon mongs ma lus zhi bar mdzad/ spu mdangs rgyun gyi rnam thar 'di yin no// sdug bsngal las dang nyon mongs sna tshogs pas// 'gro ba rtag tu mdongs
56b5(phal chen): shing rmongs gyur rnams// sangs rgyas ye shes 'od kyis rnam par sbyong // da ni mun dang bral ba'i lhas mthong ngo // rgyal ba'i gsungs dbyangs gcig las mtha' yas pa'i// chos
56b6(phal chen): kyi sgo mo thams cad kun kyang 'byung // de ni sems can ma lus kun kyang shes// 'di ni sgra dang ldan pa'i rnam thar to// rgyal ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab ltos// srid par sems can yongs su
56b7(phal chen): smin byas pa// de la 'gro kun mi mgon mngon du snang // nyi 'od zhi ba'i lha yis de mthong ngo // sangs rgyas thugs rje'i tshul ni rgya mtsho ste// 'gro ba kun phan don tu de skyes so// 'gro ba kun la
56b8(phal chen): lam rnams shin tu ston// de ni phyogs su snang ba'i lhas shes so// sangs rgyas 'gro dbang rnams kyi 'od yangs pa// phyogs rnams thams cad ma lus kun tu gang // sangs rgyas rjes
57a1(phal chen): dran pa'i gzi brjid skyed// mdangs dang 'od du ldan pa'i rnam thar to// de la nags tshal gyi lha yal ga sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ ye shes kyi rgya mtsho yangs/ 
57a2(phal chen): shings mtha' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya'o// nags tshal gyi lha 'od kyi phung po sna tshogs kyi mig yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ dge ba rgya chen po kun nas spangs pa'i shugs shes bya'o// 
57a3(phal chen): nags tshal gyi lha myu gu yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ mos pa sna tshogs kyi myu gu rnam par 'phel ba dang yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya'o// nags tshal gyi lha lo ma dri ma med pa'i
57a4(phal chen): 'brang ba'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyan yongasu sbyong zhing rnam par bsgom pa zhes bya'o// nags tshal gyi lha yan lag rab tu
57a5(phal chen): 'phyang ba'i gzi brjid kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ shes rab dri ma med pa'i sgo kun nas chos kyi dbyings la dmigs shing kun nas rnam par dmigs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes
57a6(phal chen): bya'o// nags tshal gyi lha dge ba'i 'od sna tshogs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la yang dag par 'jug pa'i chos kyi sprin mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya'o// nags
57a7(phal chen): tshal gyi lha sgra skad yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra la bzod pa rab tu thob pas chos kyi snang ba dri ma med pa zhes bya'o// nags tshal
57a8(phal chen): gyi lha kun nas spos mang po dang ldang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ spyod pa rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor spyod pas yongs su dag par byed cing phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya'o// nags tshal
57b1(phal chen): gyi lnga kun nas dpal gyi 'od rab tu 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba la phan pa'i don chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyis rgyas pa yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya'o// nags tshal
57b2(phal chen): gyi lha me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / ro'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad la dga' bar lta zhing rjes su dran pa'i yon tan gyi brgyan gyi snying po zhes bya'o// de nas nags tshal
57b3(phal chen): gyi lha yal ga sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ nags tshal gyi lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bsod
57b4(phal chen): nams stobs dang ye shes stobs rnams dang // sngon tshe byang/ chub spyod pas sangs rgyas byung // stobs rnams kun gyis rang byung pha rol phyin// 'gro ba kun na 'phags shing rnam
57b5(phal chen): par mdzes// 'gro ba thams cad snyed kyi thugs rje'i sgo/ de bzhin gshegs pas sngon tshe rab tu sbyangs// rang byung de bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// sna tshogs spungs 'od rnam thar
57b6(phal chen): 'di la 'jug/ sems can kun gyi bde gshegs mthong ma thag/ mos pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag par 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyi lam yang yang dag ston// myi gu yid 'ong 'od kyi rnam thar yin// / 
57b7(phal chen): rgyal ba kun gyi ba spu'i yon tan 'khor// bskal pa rgya mtshor zad par mi nus te// 'gro ba kun gyis sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// rnam thar 'di ni phreng ba'i dpal gyis mthong // sngan chad rgyal
57b8(phal chen): bas sangs rgyas gang gi rnams// zhing mang rdul snyed mchod pa de dag dran// kun tu shes rab dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyangs// yal ga 'od kyi brjid kyis 'di mthong ngo // 'gro ba kun gyi spyod
58a1(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho dag/ skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas thugs su chud// rgyal ba'i ye shes chags med shin tu yangs// sna tshogs rgyun gyi 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo // 
58a2(phal chen): bder gshegs gsung ni zhi ba rab zhir gsung // dga' ba yangs pa chen po rnam par skyed// sems can mos pa ji bzhin de dag shes// 'di ni sgra rnams sgrog pa'i dbyangs kyis thos// phyogs
58a3(phal chen): bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnams rgyas byas shing // sangs rgyas byin rlabs rgya chen rab tu 'byung // rgyal ba'i sngon gyi spyod pa dag kyang ston// kun tu dri zhim 'od dpal 'di la 'jug/ ma rungs sems
58a4(phal chen): can yon tan med pa'i rnams// myos shing 'khor ba kun tu 'khor ba dag/ de dag la ni thams cad mkhyen lam ston// / 'phags pa'i 'od kyi 'khor gyis 'di mthong ngo // sems can
58a5(phal chen): ma rungs sbyor ba'i spyod pa rnams// bskal pa bye bas sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan ni bder gshegs skad cig gcig gis lta// ro yi 'od kyi lha yis 'di mthong
58a6(phal chen): ngo // de la ri'i lha rin po che'i rtse mo me tog shin tu rgyas par gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ bsam gtan zhi zhing yangs la dben pa'i snang ba la rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya'o// ri'i lha nags
58a7(phal chen): tshal sna tshogs ma tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gtsug pud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa'i byams pa sgom pa'i rgyan ces bya'o// 
58a8(phal chen): ri'i lha kun nas shin tu 'phags pas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rnam par lta ba'i dbang po la 'jug pas// mngon par snang ba/ 
58b1(phal chen): zhes bya'o// ri'i lha rdul thams cad dang mi gnas pas dri ma med pa'i gtsug pud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas par mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus kyis rab tu sbyor ba zhes
58b2(phal chen): bya'o// ri'i lha snang bas phyogs su gsal ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rnam par bstan pa ston pa zhes bya'o// ri'i lha stobs la thub pa med
58b3(phal chen): pa'i snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir// gti mug yongs su sel ba'i 'od ces bya'o// ri'i lha kun nas gzi brjid dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi
58b4(phal chen): rnam par thar pa ni/ chags pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i rgyan gyis/ sdug bsngal yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya'o// ri'i lha snang ba'i rdul chu bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi
58b5(phal chen): rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa'i yon tan snang ba yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o// ri'i lha kun tu mngon par lta ba'i mig gis rnam par
58b6(phal chen): thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi rmi lam gyi mthar yang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o// ri'i lha kun nas sra ba rdo rje'i 'tshams kyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ don
58b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho rgya chen po mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa zhes bya'o// de nas ri'i lha rin po che rtse mo me tog shin tu rgyas par gnas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ ri'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
58b8(phal chen): yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul mi zad tshad med ltos// sngon tshe spyod rab mtha' yas rgyal bas spyod/ 
59a1(phal chen): rnam thar zhing gi rdul snyed bsgom mdzad pas// 'gro ba ma lus dga' ba'i shugs kyang skyed// sangs rgyas spu nas dri med dpal bkye ba// yan lag mtshan
59a2(phal chen): rgyan 'gro ba kun bkang zhing // byams tshul mtha' yas 'jig rten kun la ston// nags 'tshal rgyas pa'i gtsug gi rnamathar to// sangs rgyas sku ni mtha' yas 'gro bar mngon/ 
59a3(phal chen): 'jig rten kun tu phyogs bcu bkang zhing 'phags// dbang po dang ba'i sems can rangs shing dga'// rnam thar 'di la 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan 'jug/ rang byung mkha' mnyam 'jig
59a4(phal chen): rten chos ma chags// bskal pa kun spyod brtson 'grus stobs mi skyo// sna tshogs khams 'gro sbyor bas/ ma lus 'dul// dga' ba dri med gtsug pud rnam thar/ 
59a5(phal chen): to// 'jig rten kun ni mdongs gyur mun stug zhugs/ thugs rje der bskyed sangs rgyas 'od bkye zhing // 'gro kham sa yun rings nyal ba sad par mdzad// rig nas dga' 'od
59a6(phal chen): lha'i rnam thar to// srid pa'i rgya mtshor spyad pa sngon spyod tshe// zhing rdul mnyam pa'i sems can gtso mchod pas// de dag dgyes bzhin sems can byang chub bkod// zhi ba'i sa 'di stobs 'chang lha
59a7(phal chen): 'jug pa'o// las kyi sprin sgrib g.yogs shing bsgribs pa'i rnams// srid par sems can sdug bsngal 'khor gzigs nas/ de dag mun pa ye shes 'od kyis gsal// gzi brjid dpal
59a8(phal chen): 'od rnam thar 'di sems so// rgyal ba'i spu las sangs rgyas yon tan kun// phyogs dbyings sems can bsam pa bzhin du grag/ rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bskal pa kun tu gnas// 'od mang rdul
59b1(phal chen): gyi chu bo'i lha 'jug go// sems can kun spyod dge ba rgya mtsho kun// de la phyogs bkang sangs rgyas mngon par snang // sna tshogs thabs kyis 'jig rten chos kyang ston// tshul mngon mig gi lha
59b2(phal chen): yis de thos so// chos sgo rgya mtsho mi zad tshad med pa// sangs rgyas gsung gcig sems can kun la gsung // bskal pa kun brjod 'jig rten mang la ston// rdo rje tshul mig 'di'i gnas la
59b3(phal chen): 'jug/ de la sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ skad cig skad cig cing sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje'i dkyil 'khor gyis
59b4(phal chen): rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o// sa'i lha bsod nams brtan pa shin tu bsags pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi stobs dang shugs kyi rgyan
59b5(phal chen): ces bya'o// sa'i lha sems rin po ches rgyas pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs bsgoms pas rnam par dpyod pa dri ma med pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha dus dus su dge
59b6(phal chen): ba'i mig rab tu ston pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad dga' zhing bde ba dang rtse ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o// sa'i lha gser gyi mig gi dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ lus thams cad yongs su
59b7(phal chen): dag par byed pa'i tshul ston pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha spu las spos kyi 'od rnam par 'gyed pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par sgom pa brjod pa zhes
59b8(phal chen): bya'o// sa'i lha sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba sgrog pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad smra ba'i sgra rgya mtsho'i byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha me tog gi glong sna tshogs kyi gtsug pud kyi rnam
60a1(phal chen): par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med pa zhes bya'o// sa'i lha'i kun nas rdo rje'i rdul gyi rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas
60a2(phal chen): kyi chos thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i byin gyis brlabs kun nas rgyu zhing 'byung ba zhes bya'o// sa'i lha khyim dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi tshul la yang
60a3(phal chen): dag par 'jug pa'i chos kyi rgyun bsgom pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o// de nas sa'i lha dpal gyi me tog kun nas shin tu rgyas pa dri ma med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ sa'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil
60a4(phal chen): 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshetshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sngan chad skad cig skad cig bder gshegs kyis// brjod du med pa'i
60a5(phal chen): snying rje'i sgo rnams dang // byams pa'i sgo yang mi zad bsgoms pas nas// de phyir sangs rgyas sku ni mi shigs sra// dus gsum gtogs pa'i sems can bsod nams
60a6(phal chen): dang // ji snyed byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dag/ rgyal ba'i spu gcig de snyed bsod nams 'od// bsod nams de mthong rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'byung ba med cing byon pa gang yang med/ 
60a7(phal chen): ting 'dzin zhi ba rgya mtshor rab tu zhugs// sems can rgyan gyi sa 'di rab tu ston// 'di ni sna tshogs shing gi ze ba'i sa yin no// sngan chad thub pas spyod pa spyad pa dang // 'gro ba'i sgrib
60a8(phal chen): pa rnam par bzlog pa ni// rin chen bkram pa'i 'od kyis yin te// rnam thar de la dga' bar lha lta'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa ni mtha' yas te// 'jig rten kun tu skad cig skad cig
60b1(phal chen): ston// dus tshod yang dag ston pa'i sa'i lha// dga' bar sangs rgyas yul la rnam par lta// sangs rgyas gsung ni mtha' yas bsam mi khyab// sems can kun bsgrags nyon mongs ni/ 
60b2(phal chen): bar mdzad// gser 'od mig gi dpal ni rab dga' bar// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mngal lta// sangs rgyas sprul pas rnam pa kun gzugs su// phyogs kun chos kyi dbyings
60b3(phal chen): su rgyas par mdzad// spu las dri zhim 'od kyi sa'i lha// sangs rgyas sems can 'dul ba de la lta// phyogs rnams yid 'ong dbyangs kyis gang byas shing // 'gro ba 'di ni phyi mtha'i bskal bar
60b4(phal chen): brjod// yid 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs sa'i lha// rab tu dga' da bar sangs rgyas dbyangs la nyan// rgyal ba'i spu las sems can mnyam pa yi// spos kyi 'od bkye 'jig rten kun
60b5(phal chen): bkang zhing // sems can ma lus yongs su smin mdzad pa/ me tog gtsug pud 'phyang bas yang dag mthong // de bzhin gshegs sku rdo rje lta bu ste// mtshams su mi phyed sra
60b6(phal chen): ba'i ri bo 'dra// 'gro ba kun gyis sangs rgyas bskyod mi nus// rdo rje rdul gyi lha ni des dga'o// de la grong khyer gyi lha rin chen rtse mo'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can la phan pa
60b7(phal chen): yang dag sbyar ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba'i dbang po yongs su smin par byed pa'i 'dul ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o// grong khyer
60b8(phal chen): gyi lha rin chen dri med shin tu dga' ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad bsod nams dang / dga' ba myong bar byed pa zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha smos pa'i mya ngan thams cad spong
61a1(phal chen): bas rnam par thar pa ni/ skyob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / snying rje snying po zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha sgron ma shin tu rgyas pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa
61a2(phal chen): ni/ shes rab kyis kun tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha 'od 'phro ba'i dpal mngon par 'bar ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ thabs kyi sgo kun nas ston pa'i mthu zhes bya'o// 
61a3(phal chen): grong khyer gyi lha bsod nams kyi shugs snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams 'byung bas snang ba zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha lus dri ma med pas mnyam pa'i
61a4(phal chen): 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can rmongs pa thams cad la rmi lam rnam par ston pa'i 'od ces bya'o// grong de khyer gyi lha spos kyi rgyal mtshan gtsug pud kyi rgyan gyi
61a5(phal chen): rnam par thar pa ni/ nyon mongs pa dang / mi dge ba'i dri rnam par sel cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dri yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya'o// grong khyer gyi lha rin chen
61a6(phal chen): dpal gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i 'od ces bya'o// de nas grong khyer gyi lha rin po che'i rtse mo'i 'od kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 
61a7(phal chen): grong khyer gyi lha'i dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// mgon po'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste// snang ba bsnyes
61a8(phal chen): shing phyogs su rnam par mdzes// sems can mtha' yas yongs su smin mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas 'gro ba kun la mngon du snang // sems can thams cad dbang po sna tshogs te// 
61b1(phal chen): de dag ma lus rgyal bas 'gro bar mkhyen// rnam thar 'di ni rab tu thob pa'i phyir// sna tshogs 'od 'byung lha yang rab tu dga'// rgyal bas bskal pa mtha' yas yang dag spyad// sngan chad
61b2(phal chen): rgyal bas chos kyang yang dag gzung // dga' ba'i yid kyis rtag tu de dag blangs// rnam thar 'di ni dga' ba'i 'od kyis thob// 'gro ba 'dir ni thugs rje byams bskyed cing // de bzhin gshegs
61b3(phal chen): pas sngan chad sems can rnams// kun gyi mya ngan mtha' yas rnam par bzlog/ nyon mongs yongs su sbyong ba 'di la dga'// rgyal ba'i shes rab rgya che mtha' yas te// tshad med na mkha'
61b4(phal chen): 'dra zhing mtshungs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab rnam spyod pas// mar me me tog 'od kyi lnga dga'o// / de bzhin gshegs pas 'gro mnyam sku gzugs
61b5(phal chen): rnams// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rnams la bstan/ de 'dra'i tshul la rab tu sgom pa yis// mngon du 'ong 'phro'i lha de rab tu dga'// bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen
61b6(phal chen): mtha' yas pa// sngan chad de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su sbyangs// de 'dra'i rnam par thar la rnam lta bas// bsod nams dpal gyi 'od de rab tu dga'// srid par rab tu
61b7(phal chen): rmongs pa'i sems can rnams// 'khor gyur rab rib mdongs pa gzigs pas na// de dag phan phyir sangs rgyas mngon du byung // dri med 'od kyis rnamathar 'di thob bo// de bzhin gshegs
61b8(phal chen): ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs la ltos// 'gro la sprin 'dra mtha' dang dpung yang med// de dag bstan cing 'gro ba rnam par 'dul// spos kyi rgyal mtshan 'od kyis 'di mthong ngo // sems can rmongs
62a1(phal chen): pa mun pas mdongs gyur cing // rnam pa sna tshogs sgrib pas bsgribs gyur pa// sangs rgyas 'od kyis rnam par kun shes 'gyur// rtse mo'i 'od kyi lha ni
62a2(phal chen): 'di la 'jug/ de la snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba dri ma med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas mang po mchod pa yang dag par 'byung zhing sngon gyi smon
62a3(phal chen): lam gyi rgyan ston pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi ri rab spro'i rin po che'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad dang mngon sum du byang chub kyi spyod pa yang dag par sgrub cing
62a4(phal chen): 'byung ba zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa da ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la sangs rgyas
62a5(phal chen): ston cing / rmi lam gyi mthar sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab pa'i mig gi rnam par thar
62a6(phal chen): pa ni/ dka' ba thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i rgyan ces bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha 'od 'phro mang po shin tu dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'dul ba'i
62a7(phal chen): sems can yongs su smin par byed cing / snying po byang chub phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya'o// snyang pa byang chub phun sum chags pa rnam pa sna tshogs snyan pa zhes bya'o// 
62a8(phal chen): snying po byang chub kyi lha me tog gi phreng ba 'od kyi gtsug pud kyi rnam par thar pa ni// sems can thams cad kyi dbang po bzhin du chos tshul zab mo dran pa ston pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub
62b1(phal chen): kyi lha rin po che'i rgyan gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dga' ba yang dag par myong ba mtha' yas pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha mthu dam pa smos
62b2(phal chen): kyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha rdo rje sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ snying po
62b3(phal chen): byang chub rnam pa mtha' yas pa/ yang dag par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha pad mo'i shing snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub kyi shing yongs su zhi bas phyogs
62b4(phal chen): rgyas par byed pa zhes bya'o// snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs rnam par ston pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa/ da ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs sna tshogs yang dag par/ 
62b5(phal chen): rgyu ba zhes bya'o// de nas snying po byang chub kyi lha dge ba dri ma med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ snying po byang chub kyi lha'i 'khor gyi
62b6(phal chen): dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bskal pa mang po mtha' dang dpung med par// de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar sngon
62b7(phal chen): spyad dran// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsgrubs pas na/ de phyir de'i bsod nams na mkha'i tshad// zhing rnams mtha' yas tshad med 'dra med par// mi zad gtong ba'i sgo nas sngon btang
62b8(phal chen): bas// ri bo spo'i 'od kyi lha de ni// bder gshegs dran zhing rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// bder gshegs sprul pa rnam pa mtha' yas pa// de dag zhing rnams kun tu rab tu rgyu// 'gro bar
63a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas rmi lam bzhin ston cing // sprin gyi sgra dbyangs lnga de rab tu dga'// mtha' yas bskal par dka' ba rab spyad de// dang ba'i spyan gyis 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/ 
63a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i spyan yang yongs su sngon btang ste// de la me tog mig gi lha dga'o// yon tan rin chen 'od 'phro mtha' yas sprin// 'gro ba kun tu snying po byang chub nas// rab tu bkye ba'i sangs rgyas
63a3(phal chen): rdzu 'phrul gyis// 'od 'phro 'gyed pa'i lus kyi lha yang dga'// sems can rnams kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ste// de la rgyal ba chos kyi char yang 'babs// ji ltar mos par nem nur rnam par
63a4(phal chen): sel/ de yis gtsug pud 'phyang ba dga' ba thob// rgyan gyi char 'bebs mig bzang lha de ni// sems kyi skad da cig gcig gis tshad med pa'o// chos don dbyings kyi bye
63a5(phal chen): brag mtha' yas pa// rgya mtshor tha dad yang dag shes pas 'jug/ zhing rnams brjod du med pa thams cadadu// 'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas legs brjod pas// de phyir
63a6(phal chen): yon tan sangs rgyas zhing kun grags// de ni rjes su spos mig lha yang dran// mtha' yas shing gi rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// byang chub shing la kun kyang ma lus bstan// rdo rje sna
63a7(phal chen): tshogs sprin gyi lha de ni// byang chub shing la dga' bar rnam par lta// sangs rgyas ye shes snying po byang chub la// phyogs rnams kun tu mtha' dang mu med de// pad+mo snang zhing gsal ba'i lha
63a8(phal chen): de ni// rnam thar rnam yangs 'di la rab dga'o// sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongs dag bsam mi khyab// snying po byang chub 'dir ni kun kyang grag/ yang dag bsgrubs pas byung ba de dag ni
63b1(phal chen): thams cad sna tshogs snang ba'i 'od nyan to// de la rkang gi 'gro rin chen dpal gyis phyag rgya'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dga' ba yangs pa rin po che'i char gyis// kun tu khyab pa zhes bya'o// 
63b2(phal chen): rkang gis 'gro pad+mo snang ba'i 'od zer gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sku 'od zer gyi kha dog pad mo'i dra ba thams cad du ston pas dga' bar byed pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro ma
63b3(phal chen): tog gtsug pud kyi dpal dri ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems kyi skad cig thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs dang / rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya'o// 
63b4(phal chen): rkang gis 'gro shin tu mdzes par gnon pa'i rnam par thar da pa ni/ gom pa 'dor ba thams cad du sems can mtha' yas pa 'dul ba'i rgyan ces bya'o// rkang gis 'gro
63b5(phal chen): rin chen dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ skad cig gcig gis pad+mo'i dra ba sna tshogs sprul pa byed cing rin po che'i char pa dang / dbyangs dang snang ba kun tu
63b6(phal chen): 'gyed pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro dga' ba'i dbyangs snyan pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ dga' ba'i shugs dang nyams bde ba rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro shing
63b7(phal chen): tsan dan gyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du spos kyi ngad sprin du ldang ba zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro pad mo yid du 'ong ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ pad+mo'i gseb
63b8(phal chen): thams cad nas yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dbyangs 'byung bas snang ba skyed pa zhes bya'o// rkang gis 'gro rdul gyi shugs kyi 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ lus kyi 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs
64a1(phal chen): thams cad kyi dra bas snang ba 'byed pa zhes bya'o// rkang gi 'gro me tog mang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa brgya
64a2(phal chen): mchos yang dag par skul ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o// de nas rkang gis 'gro rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgyas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ rkang gis 'gro'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams
64a3(phal chen): cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dga' ba rgya mtsho'i tshul gyi shugs bskyed cing // bskal pa mtha' yas sngan chad spyod pa mdzad// zhing rnams kun
64a4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra mnyam pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyang dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mchod// skad cig sems la pad+mo brjod yas pa// dri zhim sna tshogs mngon par sprul mdzad
64a5(phal chen): nas// zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba gshegs mdzad pa// snang ba'i 'od zer lha des rab tu mthong // 'dren pa rnams kyi chos nyid bsam mi khyab// 'khor rnams kun tu
64a6(phal chen): 'byam klas mtha' yas pa'i// rnam par 'phrul pa mi zad rab tu ston// me tog gtsug pud lha des de mthong ngo // phyogs bcu'i zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus pa// thams cad kun tu
64a7(phal chen): gshegs shing bzhud pa yis// sems can mtha' yas yongs su smin par mdzad// shin tu mdzes pas dga' bar de mthong ngo // sems can snyed kyi sprul pa kun 'phros pa// re re'i sku yis// 
64a8(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyang 'gengs// rin chen dri med 'od kyang rab tu gtong // rkang 'gro dpal gyi mtshan gyis 'di mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mtha' yas te// 'khor du rgyal ba
64b1(phal chen): chos kyi char yang 'bebs// bder gshegs de'i 'khor na dgar gnas shing // dga' sgra dbyangs kyis rnam thar de mthong ngo // sangs rgyas dbyangs ni mkha' dang mnyam pa ste// dbyangs kyi
64b2(phal chen): yan lag yon tan kun dang ldan// 'jig rten kun bkang sems can rnam par 'dul// tsan dan shing gi 'od ni de la nyan// spu rtse kun nas rgyal ba rnam 'phrul dang // dus gsum gshegs
64b3(phal chen): pa'i rgyal ba'i mtshan gyi rnams// sgra bsgrags thos shing dga' ba skyer 'gyur te// de ni rdo rje 'od kyi lhas mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs sku bsam gyis mi khyab ste// gom pa gom par yon tan
64b4(phal chen): rgya mtsho ston// de dag sems can ji ltar mos pas mthong / rdul gyi 'od kyi lhas ni de mthong ngo // 'jig rten mgo/ ngan po rnam 'phrul rnam mang gis// phyogs bcur sems can
64b5(phal chen): yang dag skul bar mdzad// me tog 'khor mang rkang pas 'gro ba'i lha// mthong zhing dga' ba yangs pa rab tu thob// de la lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dge
64b6(phal chen): bas rgyas pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pas rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha 'od zer phyogs su
64b7(phal chen): snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams mu med par sangs rgyas kyi 'od rnam par ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sgras 'dul ba rgya mtsho'i dpal gyi rnam par
64b8(phal chen): thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad la brjod cing yang dag par skul bas dga' ba 'byung ba zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha rgyan bzang po'i me tog gtsug/ 
65a1(phal chen): bud kyis rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skun mkha'i mtshan nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kun nas rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtog
65a2(phal chen): pa'i lha spyod yul mtha' yas dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul 'gro ba rnams la yang dag par ston pa'i mthu zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha snang ba'i
65a3(phal chen): phreng ba 'dzin pa'i dpal gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad gso ba dang 'dres pa'i mdangs kyis dga' ba zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha spos dri ma med pa'i sprin las
65a4(phal chen): char 'bab pa'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma mngon par sel ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha srung
65a5(phal chen): 'dzin yongs su sdud pa'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bdud kyi las dang rmongs pa rnam parazlog pa zhes bya'o// lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha sgo kun
65a6(phal chen): nas yongs su gnon pa la mngon du gyur pa'i mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi gnas su rgyal ba rnam par dmigs par mngon du ston pa'i rgyan ces bya'o// 
65a7(phal chen): lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dpal mi g.yo ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing
65a8(phal chen): yang dag par sbyong ba zhes bya'o// de nas lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha khrel dang dge bas rgyas pa'i 'od kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i 'khor gyi dkyil
65b1(phal chen): 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ri rab rdul phran shin tu phra snyed kyi// bskal pa de dag pa snga'i bskal pa ni// rdul ces bya
65b2(phal chen): bar 'od mdzes 'od zer rgyal// mchod de smon lam btab pa bdag gis dran// sangs rgyas sku las 'od 'phro rab bkye ba// de'i 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyu// rgyal ba'i 'od zer dra ba
65b3(phal chen): sems can 'dul// 'od 'phro 'od zer lha yis de mthong ngo // dbyangs kyi yan lag yon tan kun rgyas pa'o// sangs rgyas gsung ni zhing rnams kun tu sgrog/ 'gro ba ma lus thams cad yang
65b4(phal chen): dag srul// dbyangs kyis 'dul ba de la dga' bar nyan// / rgyal ba'i sku ni rab tu zhi la ltos// sku gzugs du dma'ang mtshan nyid mi mnga' ste// 'gro ba kun na'ang bzhugs
65b5(phal chen): par rab tu snang // me tog gtsug gis ji bzhin nyid du mthong // 'dren pa'i chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste// sems can de dag dad pa ji bzhin du// la la bzhugs dang
65b6(phal chen): bzhengs dang gshegs par mthong // de yang spyod lam 'byung ba'i lhas mthong ngo // rgyal ba'i tshems kyi mtshams rnams thams cad nas// dri zhim 'od 'phro sgron ma'i sprin bkye bas// 'gro ba
65b7(phal chen): kun gyi nyon mongs zhi bar 'gyur// dri med spos kyi sprin gyis de mthong ngo // sangs rgyas mgon po 'gro ba'i skyabasu byung // nyon mongs rmongs shing sdug bsngal gzir ba'i rnams// mgu bar mdzad
65b8(phal chen): cing nyon mongs thams cad bcil// snang ba'i phreng ba 'chang bas 'di mthong ngo // 'dren pa bskal pa brgyar yang shin tu dkon// rang byung 'jig rten don mdzod skyes pa ni// 'jig rten kun gyi dbul ba
66a1(phal chen): rnam par sel// khrel yod dpal gyi 'od snang de skad smra// sems can nyon mongs sgrib pas nyon mongs shing // bdud kyi lam gyis dkrugs te 'phyan pa'i rnams/ 
66a2(phal chen): de dag rgyal ba'i rnam thar lam ston te// srung zhing skyong ba'i dpal gyis de mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa ltos// sangs rgyas sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings mnan cing // 'jig
66a3(phal chen): rten dbang po gnas su sems can 'dul// kun sgo'i mig gi dpal gyi spyod yul lo// de la lag na rdo rje mthu chen kha dog bzang po'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ yon tan mtha' yas pa dang gzugs
66a4(phal chen): kyi sku rnam par dpyod pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o// lag don rdo rje nyi ma'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar/ pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ba spu las nyi ma'i
66a5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor gyi sprin sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje ri rab me tog 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po bstan pas yon tan mtha'
66a6(phal chen): yas pa'i lus su 'phrul ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje rnam dag sprin gyi dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs mtha' yas tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya'o// 
66a7(phal chen): lag na rdo rje dbang po shin tu mang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni// 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya'o// lag
66a8(phal chen): na rdo rje rdo rje'i 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings rab tu phye ba thams cad ma lus pa la yang dag par spyod pa zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje shing gi sgra dbyangs kyi rnam
66b1(phal chen): par thar pa ni/ shing gi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rgyan yid du 'ong bas brgyan pa zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje seng ge'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi
66b2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor yangs pa'i tshogs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'od ces bya'o// lag na rdo rje 'od 'phro stug po dpal gyi mig gi rnam par thar pa ni/ sems can ma rungs pa'i rgyud la lus 'jigs 'jigs
66b3(phal chen): ltar rab tu ston cing kun tu rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje rin chen gtsug pud pad me 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i
66b4(phal chen): gtsug gi nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi char mngon par 'bebs pa zhes bya'o// de nas lag na rdo rje mthu chen kha dog bzang po'i 'od kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ lag na
66b5(phal chen): rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chos rgyal chos kyis mdzes pa yi// chos
66b6(phal chen): nyid de la rnam par ltos// yon tan mtha' yas sku gzugs kyis// 'jig rten kun tu rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas ba spu thams cad nas// 'od zer dra ba bsam mi khyab// nyi ma'i
66b7(phal chen): dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ste// phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul de dag gis// chos kyi dbyings su khyab byas shing // 'gro ba kun gyi mngon sum du// mi zad sku ni
66b8(phal chen): shin tu ston// sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni// zhing rnams kun tu rab tu sgrog/ gsung gis sems can thams cad kyi// bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'gengs// 'jig rten
67a1(phal chen): dbang po kun gnas na// thub pa rab tu bzhugs par snang // de dag thams cad 'khor rnams la/ 'dren pa dag ni chos ston mdzad// rgya mtsho chos kyi sgo bstsal
67a2(phal chen): bas// gzhan dang gzhan gyi tshul dag gis// thams cad chos kyi bye brag don// rgyal bzang med rab tu ston// rgya chen mtha' med tshul dag la// rgya mtsho 'khor rnams rab tu 'jug
67a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'od zer rab 'dres pas// kun gyis 'dren pa mthong bar gyur// zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul snyed du// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun mchod pas// bsod nams rgya chen na mkha
67a4(phal chen): bzhin// kun gyis 'dren pa rab tu mthong // sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul ma 'dres pa// thams cad zhing du ston pa mdzad// 'gro la sangs rgyas mngon sum du// byang chub snying
67a5(phal chen): bor rnam par mdzes// 'od zer sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi// 'od 'phro sprin ni kun tu snang // chos dbyings kun tu khyab byas shing // sangs rgyas spyod yul
67a6(phal chen): rab tu ston// / bam po lnga pa// de la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par thar pa ni/ tshul gyi rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
67a7(phal chen): yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yong su dag par bya ba dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba la mthar thug par mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / de bzhin
67a8(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pas yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis nas sar/ smon lam
67b1(phal chen): rgya mtshos rab tu gnas pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / sgo thams cad nas chos kyi dbyings su bdag gi lus kyi sprin rdul snyed mtha' yas pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i
67b2(phal chen): rnam par thar pa dang / zhing thams cad du rang gi ming bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'khor lo sgrog pa'i byin gyi rlabs shes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi sbubs su
67b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dpung med pa yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / dus gsum gyi bskal pa skad cig gcig tu ston pas
67b4(phal chen): 'byung ba dang 'jig pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho'i yul phan tshun du 'jug pa yang dag par ston pa zhes
67b5(phal chen): bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang / gang 'di chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med pa rang gi lus kyi sprul pas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs shes bya ba'i rnam par
67b6(phal chen): thar pa dang / gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad kyi tshul phan tshun du ston pa rgya chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par
67b7(phal chen): thar pa dag go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug cing
67b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// zhing rnams rgyal bas dri med rnam par sbyangs// mkha' yangs
68a1(phal chen): rdul bzhin yon tan tshad kyang med// sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras po dri med pa// de la bsam yas chos sprin char yang phab// ji ltar rgyal ba gdan la bzhugs snang ba/ 
68a2(phal chen): de bzhin rdul sbubs ma lus kun na'ang ste// 'on kyang bder gshegs gshegs dang 'pho ba med// zhing rnams kun tu yul mang rab tu ston// sa'i tshul la 'jug pa tshad med de// spyod pa thub
68a3(phal chen): pas byang chub sems dpa' bstan// bsam gyis mi khyab tshul ni kun gsungs pas// rgyal sras rnams ni chos kyi dbyings la 'jug/ chos dbyings 'jug tshul rnam pa rgya che ste// mtha'
68a4(phal chen): yas phyogs su mtha' dang dpung med sgo// rdul phran sbubs dasu rgyal ba 'phrul pa spos// 'gro ba'i bsam pa kun kyang rab tu mkhyen// phyogs rnams thams cad zhing rnams
68a5(phal chen): kun tu yang // 'jig rten gtso mtshan 'gro dang mnyam par byung // thams cad tshul sgor sangs rgyas don yod de// 'dul bas sems can thams cad rnam par sbyong // rdul
68a6(phal chen): sbubs kun tu mtha' dang dpung med pa'i// rnam 'phrul yangs pa rang byung shin tu ston// sngan chad thub pa'i byang chub spyod pa rnams// ji bzhin kun kyang snying po byang chub brjod// yangs dus
68a7(phal chen): bskal pa ji snyed yod pa'i rnams// skad cig skad cig sangs rgyas ma lus ston// der ni sems can 'byung zhing 'jig pa'ang bstan// 'jig rten gtso bo'i ye shes bsam yas ltos// 'byam
68a8(phal chen): klas mi zad mtha' yas lo 'grangs pas// rgyal sras thams cad sangs rgyas sa lta ste// thams cad sgor yang sangs rgyas mtha' dpung med// rgyal sras kun gyis shes par sla ba
68b1(phal chen): min// sangs rgyas mkha' 'dra rnam par mi rtog ste// chos nyid mi gnas chos kyi sprin dag gis// sprul pas spyod che kun tu rgyas mdzad cing // shing mchog kun drung byang chub 'tshang rgya bstan// 
68b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas gsung dri rab tu brjod pas na// chos gnas thams cad ma lus brjod pa yin// 'gro ba thams cad re ra'i sgo dag nas// sangs rgyas chos rnams kun la rab tu 'jug/ de la byang
68b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' dge ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ phyogs kyi dbyings thams cad du mngon par byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i
68b4(phal chen): rgyan byed pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'od mchog kun tu sgron ma'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sems skad cig gis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgo zad
68b5(phal chen): mi shes pa ston cing // chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pas yongs su smin pa dang / rnam par 'dul bar byed pa'i 'od ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'bar
68b6(phal chen): ba seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / zhing yang dag par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems
68b7(phal chen): dpa' dpal gyi 'od zer kun tu 'od 'phro ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyis rnam par spyod pa don yod pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho kun tu sgra dbyangs rgyal
68b8(phal chen): mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ye shes
69a1(phal chen): kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su kun nas song zhing chos kyi dbyings la rnam par spyod pa'i sprin chen po'i snying po zhes bya'o// byang chub
69a2(phal chen): sems dpa' gtsug na rin chen kun tu rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyod pa la rab tu zhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa shin tu 'byung ba
69a3(phal chen): zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i gsung kun tu 'jam dbyangs kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur zhing mchod par nye bar 'gro ba'i snying po zhes bya'o// byang chub
69a4(phal chen): sems dpa' bsod nams mi zad dri med kun tu gzi brjid kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs rgya chen po 'byung ba zhes bya'o// 
69a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyi 'od zer kun tu snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa sku med pa las/ sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya'o// de nas
69a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od yid du 'ong bas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho'i phyogs thams cad la
69a7(phal chen): rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ji snyed gang dag phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing // rgyal bas de kun skad cig dgongs pas sbyangs// 'gro bar kun tu zhi ba
69a8(phal chen): med pa'i gsung // sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen skor// skad cig dgongs pas chos dbyings kun bkang ste// mtha' yas spyod yul dbyings rnams rgyal ba ston// 'gro ba kun lam snying po
69b1(phal chen): byang chub tu// byang chub 'tshang rgya rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// bskal pa brgya phrag stong rnams tshad med du// de bzhin gshegs pas sngan chad spyod spyad de// nam mkha' 'dra bar byas nas rab bkye
69b2(phal chen): zhing // sangs rgyas zhing 'di sngon tshe rab tu sbyangs// mtha' dang dpung med bskal par la la yis// skyo ba med par rgyal ba'i yul bsams kyang // sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs la mtha' dpung
69b3(phal chen): med// phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa kun tu 'gengs// rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul yul la rnam par ltos// phyogs bcu'i zhing rgyan de dag rnam dag pa// rgyal bas 'dir ni kun kyang rab tu bstan// skad cig/ 
69b4(phal chen): skad cig sna tshogs gzugs kyang snang // bskal pa brgya stong tshad med pa dag du// rgyal ba'i ba spu gcig mtha' shes par dka'// tshul rnams kun sgor sangs rgyas
69b5(phal chen): chags pa med// 'gro ba 'di na rgya chen bsam yasamadzes// sngon tshe'i bskal par rgyal bas 'gro kun tu// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rgya chen bsnyen bkur bas// de bas
69b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gtso la phyogs dbyings rnams// kun nas mchod pa mang po rgya chen 'byung // phyogs rnams bkang ste sangs rgyas byung ba dag/ rdul gyi sbubs su tshad med zhing yang ston// de dag
69b7(phal chen): yul du mi zad mtha' yas pa'i// bskal pa rgya mtshor byin gyis rlob pa mdzad// sngon tshe'i skal par rgyal bas 'gro don spyad// thugs rje'i rgya mtsho tshad med rab skyed cing // 'gro ba rgya mtsho kun
69b8(phal chen): nas 'khor ba yi// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun kyang sbyangs// sangs rgyas mtshan med sku med rdul dang bral// de bzhin nyid gnas chos dbyings snying po ste// 'gro ba kun na mtha'
70a1(phal chen): yas gzugs su snang // 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal kun zhi mdzad// de la byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer rgya mtsho 'od chen dpal gyi zla ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ pha rol
70a2(phal chen): tu phyin pa dang sa'i shugs kyis sems can gyi khams kyi tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi nga ro rgya mtsho dri med 'od kyi snying
70a3(phal chen): de'i rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems skad cig la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis khyim sna tshogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan
70a4(phal chen): rin chen 'byung ba ye shes dpal gyi gtsug pud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gro ba rnams la mngon sum du yon tan dri ma med pas yongs su dag
70a5(phal chen): bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen 'od 'bar blo gros dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po byang chub tu theg ma/ 
70a6(phal chen): 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi phyogs yang dag par 'byung ba'i rgyan ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo rnam par gnon pa 'od zer gtsug pud kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
70a7(phal chen): cad dang tha mi dad par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po dang / mos pa rgya mtsho'i 'od ces bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu ye shes sprin gyi nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan snang ba'i rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs
70a8(phal chen): rgyas kyi ye shes bsgrub par bskal pa mtha' yas pa dag tu byin gyis rlob cing rnam par spyod pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' mthu stobs brtson 'grus rdo rje yangs pa'i snying po'i rnam par thar pa ni
70b1(phal chen): chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya mtha' dang dpung med pa la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi 'od 'phro shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni
70b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi thog ma'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shes pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par sgrub pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad yon tan yangs
70b3(phal chen): pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa ni/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbyings la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams yangs pa shin tu
70b4(phal chen): 'phags pa'i 'od mchog yon tan 'byung ba'i blo gros kyi rnam par thar pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul zab mo chos dkyi dbyings thams cad la kun nas rab tu gnas par rnam par
70b5(phal chen): spyod pa zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer rgya mtsho 'od chen dpal gyi zla bas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho
70b6(phal chen): mtha' yas pa la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho bas ma yas dang // sa'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen kun kyang yongs su rgyas// tshad med
70b7(phal chen): sems can rnam par 'dul ba'i tshe// sangs rgyas zhing yangs rnams kyang rnam par sbyangs// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing kun rgyas byas te// sangs rgyas sems can khams sbyin 'dul mdzad
70b8(phal chen): pa// skad cig dgongs pas chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ mtha' yas 'gro mnyam bsam pa tshim par gsungs// bskal pa rgya che mi zad mu med par// rgyal ba 'gro la mngon sum kun nas
71a1(phal chen): bzhugs// mgon pos sngan chad ji ltar spangs tshul du// rgyal bas spyod yul rnam dag rab tu bstan// chos rgyal de dag ji ltar rnam 'phrul ba// phyogs rnams
71a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho ma lus kun na snang // snying po byang chub kun na'ang rgyal ba dag/ 'khor gyis bskor cing chos rnams gsung ba snang // 'gro ba'i bsam pa thams cad tshi ma mdzad cing // 'jig rten
71a3(phal chen): ngag na sangs rgyas tshul kun mdzes// dbang po ji bzhin chos kyi char pa 'bebs// sangs rgyas chos sku yangs pa rnam par mdzes// de bzhin nyid ltar mtshan nyid lus med de// rgyal ba dri med 'od
71a4(phal chen): gsal chos kyi sku// ye shes zhi ba'i sku ni tshad med de/ phyogs dbyings kun bkang chos kyi char yang 'bebs/ chos rjes thams cad stobs kyis rnam par dag/ bder
71a5(phal chen): gshegs ye shes mkha' 'dra mtha' yas te// rgya chen 'gro ba mtha' dpung med bkang zhing // rgyal ba stobs la 'jug pa rab tu ston// sangs rgyas 'od kyis chos dbyings
71a6(phal chen): kun bkang zhing // sangs rgyas spyod pa thams cad rdzogs par bstan// rgyal bas sngon tshe ji ltar rnam sbyangs pa// de bzhin ye shes sa rnams rgyal bas bstan// phyogs rnams kun tu rang byung
71a7(phal chen): rnam par mdzes// smon lam rnam par 'phrul pa ma lus ston// ji ltar sngon tshe rgyal bas yongs sbyangs pa// rgyal ba'i 'od zer dra ba kun nas sgrog/ sangs rgyas yul ni phyogs su zad pa med// dpung
71a8(phal chen): dang mtha' med gzhal med mtha' yas dbyings// phyogs dbyings kun tu chags med brnyes pas na// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun shin tu mdzes// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri dang
71b1(phal chen): pad+mo'i ze ba'i dri thams cad dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi ngos dang / 'khor lo'i lte ba thams cad dang / me tog gi ze ba'i dri thams cad dang / stegs bu'i ngos thams cad dang / 
71b2(phal chen): babs kyi sgo thams cad dang / nor bu'i gzugs kyi ngos thams cad dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgo thams cad dang / 'od zer sgron ma'i sgo thams cad dang / seng ge'i khri'i rgyan gyi sgo thams cad nas
71b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi// byang chub sems dpa' mang po 'thon par gyur te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i blo gros rnam par rol pa'i ye shes mngon par shes
71b4(phal chen): pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gtsug pud dang / byang
71b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyi mas rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ ye shes rgya mtsho'i dpal dang / 
71b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' mig brgya pad mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug pud dang / byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i tshul pad mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug pud dang / byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od 'phro gzi
71b7(phal chen): brjid dkyil 'khor gyi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu sgra chos kyi dbyangs kyi dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub
71b8(phal chen): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu 'gyed cing 'di ltar nor bu rin po che'i me tog gi sprin thams cad ni rab tu 'byin/ spos kyi sprin
72a1(phal chen): thams cad ni shin tu 'gyed/ rin po che'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin thams cad ni mngon par 'byin/ yul mtha' yas pa'i spos kun tu 'phro ba'i bdug pa'i sprin ni
72a2(phal chen): rnam par 'gyed cing / nor bu nyi ma'i snying po'i 'khor lo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin ni rab tu gtong / sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba'i sprin ni rab tu sgrog/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba kha dog
72a3(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i sgron ma'i sprin gyis ni rab tu snang bar byed/ nor bu sna tshogs kyi shing gi yal ga las me tog gi dog pa ni rnam par spyod/ rin po che'i 'od dri ma med pa zad mi shes pa'i nor bu'i rgyal
72a4(phal chen): de'i char ni rab tu 'bebs/ rgyun mdzes pa thams cad yang dag bar ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi char ni rab tu 'bebs shing / de lta bu dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
72a5(phal chen): zhing yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs par byed cing / lhags par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du/ 
72a6(phal chen): mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ 'khor gyi dkyis 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad du mchod pa'i sprin rgyun mi 'chad pa'i char mngon par phab nas/ gang nas 'ongs
72a7(phal chen): pa'i phyogs su brten te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon du bltas nas/ seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs du mi'i pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo dkrung bcas
72a8(phal chen): nas 'khod par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang spyod yul rgya mtsho rgya chen po yongs su dag pa rnams so// sgo kun nas chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa
72b1(phal chen): rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul chags pa med pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa thams cad kyis chos rgya mtsho la zhugs pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa
72b2(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa rnams so// sgo kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i dbyings rab tu thob pa rnamaso// gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad kyis chos rgya mtsho rab tu 'dzin
72b3(phal chen): pa rnams so// dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sa la rab tu gnas pa rnams so// dga' ba'i shugs rgya chen po rab tu thob pa rnams so// bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor mu med pa yongasu dag
72b4(phal chen): pa rnams te/ chos kyi dbyings dang na mkha' la rnam par rgyu zhing dasangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa mngon par bsgrub pa da la rab tu brtson pa sha stag go// de nas byang chub sems
72b5(phal chen): dpa' rgya mtsho'i blo gros rnam par rol pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa'i rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 'khor/ gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par bltas nas
72b6(phal chen): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rnam par sangs rgyas mnyam nyid mkhyen// chags med brnyes pas na mkha' lta bu ste/ phyogs rnams zhing kun rab tu snang byas nas// 
72b7(phal chen): 'byam klas 'khor na bzhugs pa rnam par mdzes// bder gshegs rang byung mtha' dang dpung med de// thams cad phyogs kyi chos dbyings kun rgyas par// dbang phyug chen po kun gyis mchod
72b8(phal chen): bskor cing // shing gi rgyal po kun gyi drung na bzhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis// skad cig sems la mi zad yon tan gzugs// rnam thar gzhan dang
73a1(phal chen): dang gzhan dag thob pas mthong // de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni mtha' yaso// bskal pa rgya mtshor sngan chad spyod pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pas srid pa rgya
73a2(phal chen): mtsho 'dir// sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can smin byas pa// de dag rgyal ba de'i chos 'dzin to// yongs dag dri med 'khor rnams 'khod pa dag/ thams cad sangs rgyas lta zhing rnam par gnas// 
73a3(phal chen): pad mo'i snying po pad mo'i gdan bzhugs pa// tshegs kyi nang na rgyal ba mngon par mdzes// sangs rgyas gang la bzhugs pa'i seng ge'i khri// rin chen nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro zhing // spos bro
73a4(phal chen): sprin rnams mtha' yas rab tu byung // snying po du ma'i me tog phreng spungs pa'o// rin chen 'od 'phro'i sprin ni rtag tu 'gyed/ 'od zer sgron ma rgya chen rab tu 'bar// rta babs rnam pa sna
73a5(phal chen): tshegs rnams kyis brgyan// thub pa de bzhugs mngon par rab tu mdzes// sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab tu 'gyed// rin chen tshon du sna tshogs pad mo 'phyang // nor
73a6(phal chen): du'i rgyal pos skar khung kun nas brgyan// sangs rgyas de bzhugs rnam par rab tu mdzes// zla gam rin chen mang pos yongs su gzung // rdo rje 'od 'phro snang ba'i snying pos brgyan// gtsug na nor
73a7(phal chen): bu'i byang chub sems dpas bzung // sangs rgyas de bzhugs rnam par shin tu mdzes// phyogs bcur sprul pa'i dra ba rab bkye zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam sgra yang sgrog/ gzugs
73a8(phal chen): brnyan bzhin du zhing rnams kun na snang // thub pade 'dra'i seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrog pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus// 'khor gyi dkyil
73b1(phal chen): 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'di ni bder gshegs sangs rgyas byin rlabs te// byang chub spyod pa sngan chad spyad pa dang / sangs
73b2(phal chen): rgyas mchod pa'i mchod pa du ma dag rgyal ba'i gdan las de dag thams cad snang // spos 'od snang ba nor bu'i rgyal po can// me tog snying po seng ge'i gdan gyi 'khor// rgyan rnams thams cad gzugs
73b3(phal chen): brnyan gyur pa dang // 'khor rnams de dag thams cad kun kyang snang // skad cig skad cig rgyan gyi kha dog kun// rnam pa du mar sangs rgyas gdan las snang // sems can ji ltar mos pa de
73b4(phal chen): dag kyang // 'khod cing sangs rgyas tshad med gdan la lha// / rin chen lnga ldi pad mo mang btags pa// phye zhing byang chub sems dpa' mang po rnams// sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab
73b5(phal chen): 'byin cing // sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs la stod pa byed// sangs rgyas bsod nams tshad med na mkha' bzhin/ 'di dag rgyan kun de las rab tu phyung // sa rnams re re'i
73b6(phal chen): rgyan rnams gang yod pa// 'gro ba kun gyis de dag bsam mi nus// mi phyed mtshams kyi rdo rje sna tshogs pa// 'khor yangs rnam dag shin tu mnyam pa ste// nor bu'i dra ba sna tshogs kun tu
73b7(phal chen): bkram/ byang chub shing gi sa'i 'khor kun to// sa phyogs gang na rgyal ba'i gdan yod pa// kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen sna tshogs te// me tog mngon gtor rin chen rnam par bkram/ 
73b8(phal chen): gser tshon mdzes pas de ni rab tu brgyan/ sa'i lha mo de dag rab dga' zhing // skad cig sems kyis mi zad sa yang ston// kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du mngon lta zhing // kha dog thams cad
74a1(phal chen): rgyan gyi sprin gtong ngo // rin chen sgron ma mang po gsal bar 'bar// spos mang dri zhim mang po rtag tu 'byung // dus dang tshod kyi rnam pa mang ston cing // lha rnams kun
74a2(phal chen): kyang sangs rgyas mchod pa byed// phyogs rnams bcu na zhing rnams ji snyed pa// de dag sa rgyan phun sum tshogs yod pa// de dag kun kyang sa dkyil 'di na snang // sangs rgyas byin rlabs mnyam pa
74a3(phal chen): med pas byung // de nas byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gtsug pud kyis// sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par
74a4(phal chen): bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// da/ sngan chad spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe dag tu// zhing kun phun sum tshogs pa mthong ba'i rnams// snying po byang chub 'khor gyi
74a5(phal chen): sa 'di la// mi zad sa dang de dag rab tu snang // rnam thar yangs pa gang na snang ba yi// sa la rin chen mdzes kun rnam par bkram// rin chen mang pos dkyil 'khor kun tu
74a6(phal chen): gtor// sangs rgyas 'od kyis sprin kyang rab tu snang // sa rnams kun brgyan shing gi dam pa'i drung // kun nas nor bu'i rgyal pos rgyan byas las// bsod nams 'od kyi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra
74a7(phal chen): 'byung // sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul tshul yang rab tu brjod// rin chen mang po sgron ma'i char phab cing // rin chen mdzes par bkod pa rnam par mdzes// sgra dbyangs kun gyi 'brug sgra shin tu sgrog/ sa'i lnga
74a8(phal chen): rnams sa yang yang dag ston// rin chen 'od 'phro sgron ma rnam par snang // 'od zer sprin ni sa las rab tu byung // nor bu dra bsil ma kun nas bkram// rin chen sna tshogs rigs kyis yan lag
74b1(phal chen): brgyan// sa rnams kun nas mdzes pa 'di dag ltos// rin chen mang po chen bzang brgyan du bkye// 'gro ba dag la chos kyi rgya mtsho sgrog/ de dag chos nyid rnam par dag pa mthong // ma lus
74b2(phal chen): phyogs na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub shing gi phun sum tshogs pa dag/ sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di na kun snang ste// de dag chos nyid rnam par dag pa brjod// sangs rgyas gdan las
74b3(phal chen): chos rnams rgya mtsho'i// chos sgo bde bar gshegs pas gang gsungs pa// sems can kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin du// sa 'khor rnams kyang kun nas rab tu 'byung // dri zhim 'od
74b4(phal chen): rnams rtag tu 'byung bas na// de dag ji bzhin snod kyi 'gro da la 'gengs// srog chags rnams kyi nyon mongs zhi bar byed// das 'khor de nas de 'dra rab tu sgrog/ sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul phun
74b5(phal chen): sum gang dag dang // dri med sa ni gang gis mdzes gyur/ pa'i// phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams re re zhing / bskal pa bye ba dag tu'ang brjod mi nus// de nas byang chub
74b6(phal chen): sems dpa' ye shes chen po'i nyi mas rab tu gnon pa'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
74b7(phal chen): 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten kun gyi bsam pa tshi ma mdzad cing // sangs rgyas chos kyi gzhal med khang na mdzes// 'byam klas phyogs rnams kun tu mngon sum du// sangs rgyas
74b8(phal chen): 'gro gtso gzhal med khang na snang // rin chen kun gyis snying po rab tu brgyan// rgyan rnams kun gyis de bzhin mdzes shing 'bar// sangs rgyas pho brang 'od ni bsam mi khyab// 
75a1(phal chen): de na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas rab tu mdzes// ka ba'i rgyan ni nor bu sna tshogs te// phyogs rnams kun skor rta babs sprin kyang bres// stegs bu'i phreng ba kun nas
75a2(phal chen): rgyan du bkod// gser gyi dril bu'i sprin kyang rnam par brgyus// me tog bla re rnam pa sna tshogs ltos// rin chen shing sdong dar gyi bla re bres// nor bu thams cad sgo nas phreng ba 'bul// de na
75a3(phal chen): ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu mdzes// spos dri rgyal mtshan rin chen dra ba ste// 'od zer sgron ma'i sprin gyis kun tu yog/ rgyan rnams sna tshogs kun nas shin tu bres// de na sangs rgyas rab
75a4(phal chen): tu 'phags pa bzhugs// phyogs rnams kun sgo sprul pa'i sprin gyi rnams// dbyangs kyis 'jig rten khyab par grags byed cing // 'byam klas phyogs kyi sems can
75a5(phal chen): rnams 'dul ba// sangs rgyas pho brang 'di na de dag/ grag/ me tog shing dang rin chen spungs spel ba// 'phags par phyogs rnams kun tu mngon par mdzes// de la
75a6(phal chen): dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyang // gzugs brnyan gyur par de dag rab tu snang // phyogs rnams kun tu rin chen mang ba kye ba// de dag sna tshogs mdzes par rnam par 'bar// phyogs
75a7(phal chen): rnams kun tu skar khung mdzes par brgyan// rta babs mda' yab sna tshogs mang pos brgyan// de la dri med 'od zer kun nas snang ba yi// sangs rgyas po brang rnam pa bsam yas te/ 
75a8(phal chen): gzhal med khang mang thams cad de la snang // de dag kun na'ang rgyal ba bzhugs shing mdzes// phyogs rnams kun na 'khor rnams ji snyed pa// rgyal ba'i pho brang 'dir ni kun zhugs kyang / 
75b1(phal chen): mtha' dang dpung med mu'ang de bzhin med// rang byung sangs rgyas pho brang de na bzhugs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa ye shes rgya mtsho'i dpal gyis/ 
75b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi mthus// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa de dag thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas zhing rdul shin tu
75b3(phal chen): phra snyed kyi// bsod nams rgya mtsho rnam par rab sbyangs te// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul smon lam yang dag byung // snying po byang chub dri med rnam par mdzes// spos zhim thams cad rtsa nas yang dag
75b4(phal chen): rgyu// yid bzhin nor mchog rgyal pos kun nas brgyan// / rdo rje phye ma'i nor bu rgyal pos bris// shing sdong rtsa ba rin chen kun las byas// rdo rje phye ma'i nor bu 'khor
75b5(phal chen): lo 'byung // lhun rnams thams cad rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan// yal ga stug po sprin ltar kun nas 'khyil// snying po byang chub de na rgyal ba mdzes// yal
75b6(phal chen): gdog pa kun nas mngon pa ste// 'khor rnams snum 'jam phyogs rnams kun tu 'phags// me tog 'bras bu rgyun rnams kun kyang 'gyed// snying po byang chub rgya che bsam mi khyab// 'od
75b7(phal chen): rnams bkye ba phyogs su rnam par mdzes// dri ma med pa'i 'od 'bar zad mi shes// yal ga'i sgo nas sprin kun char yang 'bebs// snying po byang chub smon lam yangs pas byung // me tog
75b8(phal chen): nor dang rin chen mi zad ner// mu tig nor dag phyogs dang phyogs rnams kun nas brgyus// phye ma nor gyi gnas kyi sprin 'gyed de// snying po byang chub phyogs rnams kun tu 'byin// 
76a1(phal chen): bde gshegs snying po byang chub 'di la ltos// pad+mo'i dra ba nor bu dri med mang // rin chen 'od zer dkyil 'khor kun nas 'gro// dril bu'i dra ba'i sprin gyi sgra dbyangs 'byim/ 
76a2(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i shing bzang gzugs rnams gang yod pa// 'byam klas zhing gi ma lus thams cad dag/ byang chub shing la de dag kun nas snang // de drung sangs rgyas dri med rnam par mdzes// yal
76a3(phal chen): gakun nas rin chen mi zad nor// byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang stag 'byung zhing // bsod nams rgya chen dkyil 'khor char phab ste// phyogs bcur rgyal ba mchod phyir de dag 'dong / 
76a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa sngan chad cir gyur dang // byang chub// spyod las byung ba 'di dag ltos// yal ga kun las/ rin chen nor mi zad// sangs rgyas yul kun bsam gyis
76a5(phal chen): mi khyab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig brgya pa pad+mo sna tshogs kyi gtsug bud kyis// sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ 
76a6(phal chen): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul pa// de dag rin chen sgo nas kun kyang grag/ de ni mtha' dang dpung yang med pa ste// snying po
76a7(phal chen): byang chub 'di la kun snang ngo // me tog mang po'i phreng ba spangs bkye zhing // 'od zer sprin gyis phyogs rnams kun bkang ste// byang chub shing la gnas pa'i lha tshegs rnams// sangs rgyas
76a8(phal chen): lta zhing rtag tu mched pa byed// spos kyi rgyal mtshan nor bu sna tshogs 'bar// spos kyi 'od 'phro bdug spos rtag tu 'byung // 'khor gyi rgya mtsho kun la khyab par zhim// shing gi rgyal po de phyir
76b1(phal chen): phyogs su mdzes// pad+mo 'phrul ba sdug cing gser mdog 'dra// rgyal ba'i sprin sgra rtag par rab tu 'gyed// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams ma lus khyab byas shing // sems can rnams kyi
76b2(phal chen): nyon mongs gdung ba sel// rgyal ba'i 'khor ni tshad med rgya che ste// phyogs rnams kun nas snying po byang chub la// gzugs brnyan snang zhing dri med 'od mchog 'gyed// byang chub shing gi rnam 'phrul 'di
76b3(phal chen): dag ltos// smon lam sgra dang dbyangs kyi mar me rnams// rin chen sna tshogs yal ga kun las 'bar// srid pa rgya mtsho kun na sngan cad du// rgyal ba'i spyod pa ji ltar byung ba ston// 
76b4(phal chen): byang chub lha rnams zhing gi rdul snyed de// de dag thams cang snying po byang chub gnas// thub pa'i byang chub shing la skad cig cing // rnam thar gzhan dang gzhan mang
76b5(phal chen): de dag ston// rang byung spyad pa thams cad spyod pa'i tshe// sngan chad de bzhin gshegs pa gang mchod pa// de dgamatshan bcas sngon gyi sbyor bcas pa// thams cad rin
76b6(phal chen): che na sgo nas rab tu snang // phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed snod gyur pa// de dag thams cad 'di las sgra 'byung ste// de dag cis 'dul rnam dag ci 'dra ba'ang // snying po byang chub 'di las
76b7(phal chen): kun brjed do// byang chub shing rnams mtha' yas phyogs kun na// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyan gyi sprin can dag/ mtha' yas sna tshogs rgyan can thams cad kyang // sngan chad de bzhin gshegs/ 
76b8(phal chen): pas yongs sbyangs pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od 'phrog gzi brjid dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod pa thams cad la rnam
77a1(phal chen): par bltas nas// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// srid pa'i rgya mtshor byang chub spyod mdzad che// mos pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su smon dag cing // gnas
77a2(phal chen): dang gnas min stobs rnams thugs chud pa'i// bder gshegs sa stobs rnam par dag pa mthong // bskal pa kun tu rgya mtsho las sbyangs te// mnyam nyid chos bsgoms ji ltar bsgrubs/ 
77a3(phal chen): pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas 'ad las de bzhin phyogs bkang zhing // las rnams rgya mtsho de bzhin rab tu brjod// sna tshogs thabs kyis 'byam klas stobs sbyong tshe// bskal pa snga mar 'gro/ 
77a4(phal chen): ba'i dbang po bzhin// yongs su smin byas de bas 'khor kun kyang // sems dag sangs rgyas dbang po'i stobs la 'jug/ 'jig rten kun gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang / 
77a5(phal chen): bsam pa ji bzhin sbyor ba rnam spyod pa// de dag ji bzhin rgyal ba chos ston te// rang byung mos pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ston to// phyogs rnams ma lus zhing rnams rgya mtsho
77a6(phal chen): dang // 'byam klas sems can khams dang chos kyi khams// nam mkha'i khams rnams mnyam nyid mkhyen mi rtog/ rang byung spu rtser khams mkhyen stobs kyang ston// bder gshegs
77a7(phal chen): ye shes rgya chen kun tu 'gro// skad cig gcig gis dus gsum ma lus 'gengs// phyogs dang zhing dang bskal pa 'gro bkang zhing // sems can kun la stobs 'jug mngon par bstan// 
77a8(phal chen): bsam gtan rnam thar stobs sa mtha' dpung med// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i tshul ni 'gro kun snyed// thams cad rgyal ba'i sku la bstan pas na// sems can bsam pa'i gnas kyi nyon mongs
77b1(phal chen): sel// sangs rgyas ye shes dus gsum bsgribs pa med// skad cig kun la dus gsum spu rtser ston// zhing dang sems can sangs rgyas de bzhin chos// de ltar rgyal bas rjes su dran stobs
77b2(phal chen): bstan// thub pa'i spyan ni na mkha' mnyam pa ste// des ni chos dbyings ma lus gsal bar gzigs// thams cad tshul gyis chags med gzhal yas sa// brnyes pas ye shes spyan ni rnam mang
77b3(phal chen): bstan// 'jig rten kun gyi sbyor mang ji snyed dang // 'gro ba'i bag chags bag nyal ma lus par// thabs sgo kun nas nyon mongs ni mdzad cing // rgyal ba 'jig rten gang bar kun nas byung / 
77b4(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kun nas sgrog pas// sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
77b5(phal chen): pa 'di dag smras so// rgya chen sangs rgyas byin rlabs phyogs/ kun tu// sangs rgyas ston kyang rtog pa mi mnga' ste// pha rol phyin pa rgya chen yongs bkang ba// byang chub
77b6(phal chen): spyod pa rgya chen de dag snang // 'gro ba rnams la thugs rje che bskyed cing // sbyin pa'i mthar phyin sngan chad spyad pas na// de phyir thub pa'i sku ni mtshan gyis rgyan// 'gro ba kun gyis blta zhing dga' ba
77b7(phal chen): skye// bskal pa rgya mtsho mang po mtha' yas sngon// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa yongs sbyangs pas// de phyir bskal pa phyogs su dri med cing // shin tu 'phags par 'jig rten sdug bsngal sel// 
77b8(phal chen): ma log mnyam pa nyid la dad bskyed de// sngan chad bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam sbyangs pas// 'gro dang mtshungs mnyam yon tan kun ston te// de bas phyogs su 'od rnams shin tu 'phro// bskal pa
78a1(phal chen): rgyam tsho mang por sngon spyod che// 'gro ba rnams kyi bsgribs papibs po bsngal// de phyir phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba kun bkang ste// shing badrud na rgyal ba mngon par
78a2(phal chen): mdzes// bsam gtan yan lag rgya mtsho sbyong ba'i tshe// bskal pa yangs par rgyal bas rab tu spyad// de bas 'gro ba'i gzhal med dga' bskyed// nyon mongs dri ma sgrib pa kun kyang sel/ 
78a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i drung du sngon spyod cing // shes rab mthar phyin rgyal bas sngon bkang ste// 'gro ba'i gti mug mun pa yongs su bsal// de bas rgyal ba kun tu rnam par mdzes// 'gro ba
78a4(phal chen): kun mnyam thabs sgo thams cad kyis// yang dag byung zhing 'gro ba rnam sbyangs pas// phyogs rnams kun na kun la mngon par bzhugs// phyi ma'i bskal par 'gro ba mngon
78a5(phal chen): dulta// smon lam pha rol phyin pa rab spyod che// bskal pa rgya mtsho shin tu rgya che zhing // phyi mtha'i bskalapar 'gro ba'i sprin mnyam par// spyad pas de phyir 'gro ba
78a6(phal chen): kun na mdzes// rgyal bas chos kun stobs kyi mthar phyin pa// bskul ba gzhal yas mang por yongs su sbyangs// de phyir rang drung stobs kyi pha rol phyin// phyogs kyi zhing rnams kun na de phyir/ 
78a7(phal chen): 'phags// thams cad mkhyen nyid na mkha' mtshungs mnyam pa'i// ye shes kun gyi sgo nas sngon sbyangs pas// de phyir chags med ye shes pha rol phyin// phyogs bcu kun na rgyal ba mngon par
78a8(phal chen): mdzes// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprin yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i zla bas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 'khor rgya mtsho yod pa thams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
