78b1(phal chen): pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yul ni phyogs rnams kyi// 'gro ba'i rgyu dbyings na mkha' mnyam par snang // sa rnams yangs pa ji ltar sngon bskyed pa// de bzhin kun kyang rin
78b2(phal chen): chen sgo nas brjod// dang po'i sa ni dga' ba'i shugs kyi yul// phyogs dbyings kun gyi bder gshegs rnams mthong zhing // gzhal med bskal par dri med yongs sbyangs pas// chos dbyings
78b3(phal chen): yangs la ye shes rab tu byung // thams cad chos la dri mangs gnyis to// bskal pa rgya mtsho mang por rnam spyad cing // rgyal ba tshad med rgya mtsho mchod byas nas// 'gro ba tshad med dri med sbyangs
78b4(phal chen): bas byung // bsod nams dkyil 'khor 'od ni sa ra gsum ste// snying po bzod pa'i dkyil 'khor lhag mthong brta na// gang du de skyes rin chen sgo dag nas// chos kyi sprin ni
78b5(phal chen): rgya chen rab tu thos// 'od 'phro rgya mtsho ldan pa gzhal mangs// mthu'i 'khor 'od snying po snying rje ste// zhing rnams kun tu sgrib dang mnyam pa'i lus// 'gro ba'i nyon mongs
78b6(phal chen): kun nas rnam sbyangs pa'o// dka' rgyal snying po mnyam dbyings mnyam nyid de// zhing rnams kun tu 'gro zhing zhi la gzhol// sangs rgyas chos yul kun nas rab tu skyes// de yang rnam dag ji
78b7(phal chen): bzhin rgyal bas bstan// shes rab rgya mtsho yangs pa'i sprin la spyod// 'byam klas chos kyi mthar thug rnam pa kun// zhing rnams kun la mngon sum na mkha' 'dra// de 'byung byang chub shing chen 'ang/ 
78b8(phal chen): las grag/ chos dbyings mkha' dang 'dra ba'i lus can te// 'gro ba kun 'gengs 'gro ba kun snang byed// 'byam klas thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par dag/ ring du song mchog de ni rgyal bas bstan/ 
79a1(phal chen): thams cad chos dang smon lam spyod mang dang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i dbyings kyang mnyam rtogs pas// bskal pa kun tu 'gro mchog mi g.yo ste// gzhal
79a2(phal chen): med sa de'i sprin kyang rab tu sgrog/ tshad med yul can stobs kyis rab tu snang // rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'gro zhing stobs la 'jug/ 'di ni rdul med dge ba'i blo gros sa// bskal pa rgya mtshor byang chub shing
79a3(phal chen): las brjod// chos kyi sprin ni rgya chen sa bcu ste// dus rnams kun 'gengs na mkha'i rang bzhin 'dra// sangs rgyas yul gyi sgra dang dbyangs kun tu// rgyal ba'i byin gyis 'di las rab tu grag
79a4(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gnon pa gti mug med pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs
79a5(phal chen): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam pa du mar 'khor rnams// gnas pa ni// dad pa sna tshogs yongs su dag pa'i sems// rgyan dang yul rnams kun la rab tu zhugs// 
79a6(phal chen): de dag sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur// phan tshun smon lam rnam dag spyod yul te// dag pa mtha' yas bya ba rab tu byas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul thams cad kyang // 
79a7(phal chen): gzhan dang gzhan gyi sgo nas rab tu mthong // bder gshegs chos kyi sku la zhugs pa dag/ la las rgyal ba'i chos sku de nyid la// kun tu sprin 'dra gzhal med chags med pa'i// mtha' yas
79a8(phal chen): chos kyi rang bzhin chos nyid mthong // la las rgyal ba'i gzugs sku de nyid la// phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par 'phrul mdzad cing // yon tan mtha' yas 'od sprin rab 'bar ba// 'gro ba dang tshul
79b1(phal chen): sprin du gyur par mthong // la la rgyal ba'i ye shes chags med 'jug/ dus gsum mnyam nyid mkha' dang 'dra ba'i sku// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa'i tshul 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas stobs la/ 
79b2(phal chen): rab tu 'jug par mthong // sangs rgyas gsung ni thogs pa med 'byung ste// phyogs kun zhing rnams ma lus rgyas 'gyur zhing // 'gro ba snod bzhin skul bar byed pa yi// de bzhin gshegs
79b3(phal chen): pa'i gsung la la la 'jug/ la la sangs rgyas snang ba sna tshogs 'jug/ sna tshogs snang bas 'gro ba kun bkang zhing // rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul kun tu snang mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas 'od ni la
79b4(phal chen): las der yang mthong // ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer rab bkye ba'i // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin la la la 'jug/ sngan chad rgyal ba'i spyod pa bstan pa la// la la dga' zhing rgyal ba
79b5(phal chen): shes par byed// la las bsod nams sna tshogs mtshan gyi rnams// bder gshegs bsod nams byung ba ji bzhin mthong // pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho sbyong ba'i tshe// ji ltar
79b6(phal chen): dag gyur mtshan kyang la las mthong // sgo rnams kun nas rgyal ba tshad med de// mtha' dang dpung med chos kyi dbyings bkang zhing // sangs rgyas byin rlabs rab tu brjod pa kun// rnam 'phrul/ 
79b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas yul ni la las mthong // de nas sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis// 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gzhi dang snying po rgya mtsho thams cad rnam pa drug tu
79b8(phal chen): g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul to// rab tu 'gul to// kun tu 'gul to// ldeg go// rab tu ldeg go// kun tu ldeg go// che mchem/ rab tu chem
80a1(phal chen): chem/ kun tu chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro// shig shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun tu shig shig go/ 'jig rten gyi
80a2(phal chen): dbang po de dag thams cad re res kyang mchod pa mngon par sgrub pa'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mngon par rab tu phab bo// 'di ltar spos kyi
80a3(phal chen): me tog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char thams cad rab tu phab bo// rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin dang rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i pad mo'i dra ba thams cad kyi sprin dang / nor bu rin po che'i 'od
80a4(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin dang / rin po da che kha dog sna tshogs dang / mu tig thams cad kyi sprin dang / spos dang / tsan dan rin po che thams cad
80a5(phal chen): kyi sprin dang / rin po che'i gdugs thams cad kyi sprin dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sgra dbyangs bzang po yid du 'ong ba'isprin dang / nor bu nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba mang po'i sprin
80a6(phal chen): dang / rin po che'i 'od zer gyi mdzod thams cad kyi sprin dang / rang rang gi lus las rgyan thams cad 'phyang ba'i sprin dang / de lta bu dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po re res kyang mchod
80a7(phal chen): pa mngon par sgrub pa'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du mngon par phab bo// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams
80a8(phal chen): 'dir 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnam rab tu dga' bar gyur pa de bzhin du gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po ri ris kyang mchod pa mngon
80b1(phal chen): par sgrub pa'i sprin gyi char de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag tu rab tu phab par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams mos pa
80b2(phal chen): gzhan dang / dmigs pa gzhan dang gzhan/ ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyi sgo rgya mtsho gzhan dang gzhan dang / tshogs gzhan dang gzhan dang / yang dag par sgrub pa gzhan dang gzhan dang
80b3(phal chen): dga' ba'i shugs kyis spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / phyogs kyi tshul gzhan dang gzhan dang / chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang byin gyis
80b4(phal chen): brlabs la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / yul dang stobs la 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan dang / rnam par thar pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sgo gzhan dang gzhan gyis/ de bzhin
80b5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa khong du chud par byed do// 'di na ji lta ba bzhin phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i
80b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad na yang de bzhin no// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyi tshul rab
80b7(phal chen): tu byung ba zhes bya ba ste/ le'u dang po'o// // bam po drug pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ sangs
80b8(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yul ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
81a1(phal chen): 'das rnams la byin gyis brlabs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas
81a2(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mi bsnyengs pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
81a3(phal chen): 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
81a4(phal chen): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/  sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mi 'phrogs pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom
81a5(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi spyan ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi snyan ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
81a6(phal chen): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi shangs ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ljags ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs
81a7(phal chen): rgyas kyi sku ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'od ni ji lta
81a8(phal chen): bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni ji lta bu zhig mngang/ 
81b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni ji lta bu zhig mnga'/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad byang chub
81b2(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su
81b3(phal chen): ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la tshogs rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la theg pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu
81b4(phal chen): yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu gnas pa rgya mtsho thams cad ni ji lta bu zhig du yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la spyod
81b5(phal chen): pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig du yongs su ston/ byang // chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'byung ba rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston// byang chub
81b6(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad la mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ 
81b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad las rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la smon lam rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston// byang chub
81b8(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams la ye shes rgya mtsho rnams ni ji lta bu zhig tu yongs su ston bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs rtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam
82a1(phal chen): pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sems can rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho
82a2(phal chen): rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang // sangs rgyas
82a3(phal chen): kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa
82a4(phal chen): mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya mtsha rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang / sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad
82a5(phal chen): rgya mtsho rnams kyang bstan pa mdzad grang snyam pa dang / de nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyis brlabs kyis mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin de dag las tshig su bcad
82a6(phal chen): pa 'di dag byung ngo // mtha' yas rgya chen bskal par rab spyod de/ byang chub shing drung rang byung yang dag skyes// phyi mtha' bskal par 'gro ba'i sprin gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pas sku
82a7(phal chen): ni byin gyis brlabs// 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi the tsom gcod// mos pa'i stobs ni yangs pa rab tu skyed// sems can sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi bar mdzad// sangs rgyas bde la 'gro ba thams
82a8(phal chen): cad 'god// byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas zhing rdul snyed// de bzhin gshegs la lta zhing kun nas gnas// de dag bsam pa spyod yul ji bzhin du// the tsom gsal bar chos rnams
82b1(phal chen): rab bstan gsol// rgyal ba kun gyis ni ji lta bu// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi rgyud rnams dang // sangs rgyas byin brlabs mtha' dang dpung med pa// de dag tshul ni rnam dag bstan// 
82b2(phal chen): tu gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ci yis 'jug/ rgyal ba'i mkhyen la ji ltar 'jug pa dang // rgya chen mtha' yas stobs rnams rnam sbyang ba// rgyal sras kun la yang dag bstan du
82b3(phal chen): gsol// sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ji ltar mtha' yas dang // mi bsnyengs chos nyid ji ltar rnam sbyangs dang // rdzu 'phrul mthu yang mtha' dang dpung med pa// 'gro ba'i bsam pa rnams la bsgrag
82b4(phal chen): tu gsol// ji ltar chos rgyal po brang mnga' mdzad cing // rgyal ba'i spyod yul ji ltar mi 'phrogs dang // sangs rgyas chos gzhan rgya chen de dag kyang // thugs brtse'i slad du
82b5(phal chen): yang dag bstan tu gsol// rgyal ba'i spyan ni ji ltar tshad med cing // snyan dang shangs dang de bzhin ljags dang sku// sangs rgyas thugs kyang ji ltar mtha' yas pa/ 
82b6(phal chen): 'di dag tshul la 'jug pa bstan tu gsol// zhing rnams rgya mtsho ji ltar sems can khams// chos dbyings tshul rnams rgya mtsho de dag dang // sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mtha' dang dpung med pa// 'di
82b7(phal chen): dag rgyal ba'i sras la bstan tu gsol// pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho bsam yas dang // rnam par thar la 'jug tshul rgya mtsho dang // chos rnams kun gyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho dag/ byang chub snying por thams
82b8(phal chen): cad bstan tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/ zhal gyi sgo tshems kyi mtshams
83a1(phal chen): kyi gseb nas 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu bkye ba 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i ze ba rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste chos kyi
83a2(phal chen): dbyings su dbyangs sna tshogs kyis rgyan byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste 'od shin tu phra ba'i sprin kun nas lding ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu
83a3(phal chen): 'phrul dang / snying po byang chub kyi 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste rin po che thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i gdugs kyi sprin ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste rnam par snang bas chos kyi dbyings
83a4(phal chen): rab tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'byung zhing 'khyil ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste rin po che
83a5(phal chen): rdo rje dri ma med pa mang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyun ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di lta
83a6(phal chen): ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i sgra rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/ 'od zer
83a7(phal chen): de dag re re zhing yang 'khor gyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// 'od zer de dag re re zhing yang rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog shin tu ston pa dag ste/ de dag rab tu 'bros
83a8(phal chen): nas phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
83b1(phal chen): bsnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshonas 'od zer gyi sgod de dag thams cad kyi mthus/ gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyun gyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa
83b2(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to// 'od zer de dag thams cad kyi sgo nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to// bskal pa rgya
83b3(phal chen): mtsho mtha' yas spyod spyad de// phyogs rnams rgya mtshor sangs rgyas kun kyang mchod// sems can rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas nas// rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mngon sangs rgyas// phyogs
83b4(phal chen): rnams kun tu snang zhing mngon par mdzes// spu rnams kun nas sprul pa'i sprin rnams 'gyed// des ni sems can snod bzhin bskul byas nas// byang chub sbyor ba chags
83b5(phal chen): med rnam par dag/ srid pa'i rgyud na sngan chad 'khor ba'i tshe// rgyal bas sems can yongs su smin mdzad pa// de dag skad cig gcig gis rab tu bkrol/ 
83b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di dag mtha' yas so// rgyan rnam sna tshogs kun tu 'od kyang snang // byang chub shing ni yal ga rin tshon 'phyang // 'od rnams bkye ba kun tu rnam par brgyan// byang
83b7(phal chen): chub bsam gyis mi khyab der sangs rgyas// phyogs rnams kun tu sgra ni rab tu sgrog/ sems can kun gyi sems bzhin tshi ma byas te// sna tshogs thabs kyi sgo nas rnam par 'dul// de las chos
83b8(phal chen): nyid zhi sgra rab tu 'byung // zhing rnams stong gi rdul snyed sngan chad du// spyod tshe pha rol phyin kun rgyas par mdzad// stobs rnams kun la sangs rgyas rab bzhugs kyi// rgyal ba de'i
84a1(phal chen): zhal ljang kun kyang dang // shing gi rdul snyed phyogs rnams thams cad nas// rgyal sras mang po rab tu dga' ste lpags// mchod pa sna tshogs char pa rab 'bebs/ 
84a2(phal chen): shing // thams cad 'khod de rgyal ba mngon sum lta// gsung dbyangs gcig las mtha' yas mdo yi rnams// rgya mtsho dag kyang sangs rgyas shin tu ston// 'gro kun yid bzhin chos kyi char
84a3(phal chen): 'bab kyis// rkang gnyis gtso bo de la ltar yang deng // dus gsum rgyal ba'i smon lam gang yod pa// skad cig thugs la de dag mngon sum ste// rgyal ba byang chub shing drung ston mdzad
84a4(phal chen): kyis// rgyal ba'i drung du sbyar te 'dong bar gyis// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ye shes mtsho// 'od zer kun gyi sgo nas rab tu snang // de yi chos nyid ji ltar ci 'dra de dag
84a5(phal chen): ltos// sangs rgyas 'gro kun mngon sum chos ston to// de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag nas de bzhin/ gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul ba'i rnams// 
84a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rang rang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang // lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der 'ongs par gyur
84a7(phal chen): te/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang / snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di dang mdab chags su shar phyogs logs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho pad+mo'i
84a8(phal chen): dpal dri ma med par snang ba'i brgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phreng ba rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs
84b1(phal chen): pa'i chos kyi chu bo rnam par sangs rgyas pa/ nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad+mo rnam par lta ba'i
84b2(phal chen): rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mchod nas 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang
84b3(phal chen): na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing rin po che'i char gyi 'od zer pad+mo'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par
84b4(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i ri bo'i zom gyi desprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
84b5(phal chen): sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba'i sprin bcus namakha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sil
84b6(phal chen): snyan sgra thams cad 'byin pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / phye ma'i shing gi mdzod kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spos
84b7(phal chen): dang / bdud spos gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas
84b8(phal chen): yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa mchod pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / 
85a1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin ste/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su brten te/ me tog snang ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng
85a2(phal chen): ge'i khri mngon par sprul nas skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang / mdab chags su lho phyogs logs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
85a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho rin po che thams cad snang bas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams 'od mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
85a4(phal chen): rgyan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas mkhyen pa'i 'od dpal gyi ri'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' chos rgya mtsho rnam
85a5(phal chen): par snang ba'i blo gros shes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jigarten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas 'phags te/ bcom
85a6(phal chen): ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad kyis rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i snying po'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing
85a7(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas snang ba rin po che'i rgyan gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'od 'phro ba rab tu 'bar zhing / sangs
85a8(phal chen): rgyas kyi mtshan shin tu sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po kun nas sgra 'byin cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrog pa'i
85b1(phal chen): sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po shing gi yal ga sna tshogs kyis snying po byang chub kyi rgyan byed pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par
85b2(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sgo kun nas rin po che'i 'od zer dang / sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas snang bar byed pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
85b3(phal chen): pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad dang / ma 'dres par 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gzugs brnyan ston pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor
85b4(phal chen): bu'i rgyal po 'od 'phro shin tu stug po'i sgron mas/ sangs da rgyas thams cad kyi yul rjes su sgrog pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang
85b5(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang gi gzugs brnyan yang dag par ston pa'i sprin bcus nam
85b6(phal chen): mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshon gyis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan rnam par snang ba'i sprin bcus nam
85b7(phal chen): mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra mo snyed kyis na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
85b8(phal chen): par byed cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ lho phyogs su brten te in dra nI la dang / 'dzam bu nA da dang / pad+ma
86a1(phal chen): rag sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri mngon par sprul nas/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
86a2(phal chen): mtsho 'di dang mdab chags su/ nub phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od yid du 'ong bar snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams gos
86a3(phal chen): kyi stan yongs su 'byung ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos mngon tu snang ba'i yon tan rin po ches brgyan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' spos 'od 'phro ba'i rgyan zla ba'i
86a4(phal chen): 'od ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig du/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che dang
86a5(phal chen): spos dang me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing nor bu'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pas brgyan
86a6(phal chen): nga'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang / spos 'od 'phro ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun
86a7(phal chen): nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mu tig thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi
86a8(phal chen): ze ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i phreng bas yongs su brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas
86b1(phal chen): yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'od zer gyi snang ba phyogs kun tu 'gro ba'i snying po dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgyan thams cad 'byung ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
86b2(phal chen): brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i tshon thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan cing rgyan du ma yang dag par ston pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang
86b3(phal chen): phyogs thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan par kun tu rgyas par 'gangs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sgo kun tu me tog gi
86b4(phal chen): rta babs dang / dril bu'i dra ba bres pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa khang pa brtsegs
86b5(phal chen): pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ 
86b6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ nub phyogs su brten to seng ge'i khri rin po che'i pad mo chen po lo ma sna tshogs gser las byas pa'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas skyil mo dkrung bcas
86b7(phal chen): te/ 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang / mdab chags su byang phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bai dUr+ya pad+mo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po
86b8(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ud pa la'i rgyan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal kun tu dbyangs kyi rgyal po bzhugs
87a1(phal chen): pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i 'od zer snang bas mthu 'byin pa'i blo gros shes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
87a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ spos dang nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi shing gi
87a3(phal chen): sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / sgo thams cad nas lo ma'i dog pa'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
87a4(phal chen): pa dang / shing gi gzugs thams cad las rgyan mtha' yas pa yongs su ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog
87a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi sprin rab tu nar pa'i me tog gi shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
87a6(phal chen): kyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed yang dag par ston
87a7(phal chen): pa'i shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sngon gyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston pa'i shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas
87a8(phal chen): yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa'i gos kyi mdzod kyi nyi mas rnam par snang ba byas pa'i shing gi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sgra dbyangs
87b1(phal chen): thams cad rab tu sgrog cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra kun tu gtong ba'i shing gi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa shing gi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
87b2(phal chen): mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ byang
87b3(phal chen): phyogs su brten te/ seng ge'i khri nor bu sgron ma'i pad+mo'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang / mdab
87b4(phal chen): chags su byang dang / shar gyi phyogs mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'dzam bu chu klung dang / shel gyi kha dog chen gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig
87b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi snying po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i sgron ma
87b6(phal chen): bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod mi zad pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid mar me zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi kham rgya mtsho'i
87b7(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ seng ge'i khri rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam
87b8(phal chen): mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / seng ge'i khri nor bu'i rgyal po kun tu mngon pas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
88a1(phal chen): brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rgyan mang po thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 
88a2(phal chen): seng ge'i khri rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri phyogs kun nas phreng ba rin po che'i
88a3(phal chen): char 'bebs pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri spos kyi me tog pad+ma'i phreng ba rin po che thams cad kyi snying po can gyi sprin
88a4(phal chen): bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa/ dang / seng ge'i khri sangs rgyas kyi gdan thams cad kyi rgyan yang dag par ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i snying po
88a5(phal chen): can gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rgyan dang phreng ba thams cad 'byang zhing rta babs dang stegs bus rab tu brgyan pa'i snying
88a6(phal chen): po can gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri shing thams cad kyi yal ga las nor bu rin po che dang phye ma 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus na mkha'
88a7(phal chen): kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / seng ge'i khri spos dang rin po che'i cho sa tshe kyis kun nas brgyan pa'i nyi mas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun
88a8(phal chen): nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa seng ge'i khri'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
88b1(phal chen): par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na bder byin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang dang / shar gyi phyogs mtshams su brten te/ seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che
88b2(phal chen): snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad mo sna tshogs kyi snying po can mngon par sprul nas/ skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang / mdab
88b3(phal chen): chags su shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bai dUr+ya'i 'od zer kun tu snang ba gser gyi rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag las
88b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi dpal dri ma med par snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dga' ba'i shugs dpal gyi rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
88b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od zer shes rab kun nas sgron ma'i blo gros shes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra
88b6(phal chen): bsnyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal po thams cad kyi bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis
88b7(phal chen): brlabs pa dang / rin po che in dra nI la'i ze ba can gyi me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spos rin po che'i bla re thams
88b8(phal chen): cad kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa
89a1(phal chen): dang / nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / 'od dang sgra dbyangs rab tu ston pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs/ 
89a2(phal chen): pa dang / nor bu dang / gos dang / rgyan thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan yang dag par ston pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog thams
89a3(phal chen): cad kyi dog pa lta bu rin po che'i bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dril bu sna tshogs kun tu sgras khyab par byed pa'i dra ba'i bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas
89a4(phal chen): yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / pad+mo'i dra ba mtha' yas rab sna tshogs rin po che'i snying po can gyi bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / gser
89a5(phal chen): gyi ze ba 'od 'phro zhing snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzugs brnyan rab tu ston pa'i
89a6(phal chen): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bla re'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa bla re'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis
89a7(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten
89a8(phal chen): seng ge'i khri pad+mo sna tshogs rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can mngon par sprul nas/ skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang
89b1(phal chen): mdab chags su lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nyi ma'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar bas kun tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i rgyud
89b2(phal chen): de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma dang seng ge ltar snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgo kun nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas
89b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od 'phro gtsug pud rab tu 'phyang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te
89b4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ sna tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / 'od
89b5(phal chen): zer snang ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mu tig mang po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad/ 
89b6(phal chen): kyi gdugs kyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo nas rab tu sgrog pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus
89b7(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba sna tshogs kyi phreng ba'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin
89b8(phal chen): po che'i tshe na rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis rab tu brgyan cing dril bu'i dra ba bres pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i shing gi yal ga thams
90a1(phal chen): nga sa brnyan pa gzugs kyi san 'dus pa' kun nas sog pa rgya gyis bzlas pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal ba tsam rnam par snang ba'i ste pa'i gdugs kyi
90a2(phal chen): bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spos dang bdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tsan dan
90a3(phal chen): gyi phyi ma mang pos kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas sog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po rnam par bstan pas kun tu rgyan
90a4(phal chen): gyis khyab par byed pa'i gdugs kyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlangs pa dang / de dag nga la sogs pa gdugs kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
90a5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis na mkha' kun nas yog par byin/ gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
90a6(phal chen): nas/ lde dang / nub kyi phyogs mtshams su bstan te/ seng ge'i khri in dra nI la yid du 'ong bar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// 
90a7(phal chen): de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di dang mdab chags su/ nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i skar mda' 'od kyi snying
90a8(phal chen): kho zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams par ma'i chung de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyan yid du 'ong ba'i snying pon/ de bzhin gshegs pa son tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa
90b1(phal chen): 'ong bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dang / gzi brjid mi zad pa'i rgyal po'i blo gros shes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams
90b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur to// rin po che thams cad du snang ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun
90b3(phal chen): nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing / rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / me tog gi sprin gyis rnam par
90b4(phal chen): snang bar byas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'od zer gyi sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
90b5(phal chen): sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabasapa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzugs brnyan gyi khongs su chud pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin
90b6(phal chen): bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i yal ga'i sgo kun nas sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu sgrog pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog
90b7(phal chen): par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che dUr+ya'i rigs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sems skad cig gis
90b8(phal chen): sems can mtha' yas pa'i gzugs yongs su ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam 'byung
91a1(phal chen): ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba rab tu gtong ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
91a2(phal chen): thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i sgra sgrog pa/ nor bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bcus nim mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
91a3(phal chen): gyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan
91a4(phal chen): 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ nub dang byang gi phyogs mtsham ngas su brten te/ seng ge'i khri 'od zer 'bar ba mi zad ba'i gzi brjid kyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas// skyil
91a5(phal chen): mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// de nas yang 'jig rten gyi kham/ sa rgya mtsho 'di dang / mdab chags su 'og gi/ phyogs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho pad mo dri zhim
91a6(phal chen): dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar mo'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i seng ge snang zhing 'bar ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings snang
91a7(phal chen): bar mdzad pa'i 'od zer bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'od 'phro ba rnam par snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros shes bya ba/ byang chub
91a8(phal chen): sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer
91b1(phal chen): gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing // spos thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che'i 'od 'gro ba/ 
91b2(phal chen): thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod pas khyab par byed pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha'
91b3(phal chen): kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa
91b4(phal chen): dang / me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od da zer gyi sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bskal pa thams cad
91b5(phal chen): gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par sangs rgyas yang dag par 'byung zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba brjodade'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin
91b6(phal chen): gyis brlabs pa dang / rin po che zad mi shes pa thams cad dang / me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer gyi sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dag la
91b7(phal chen): sogs pa 'od zer gyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na der phyin nas
91b8(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 'og gi phyogasu brtan nas seng ge'i khri rin po che'i sgron ma rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// 
92a1(phal chen): de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho ga zhi dang / snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di dang mdab chagasu/ steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams
92a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od rgya mtsho'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan yid du 'ong ba rnam par snang ba zhes
92a3(phal chen): bya ba na// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dang grags pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu snang ba'i rgyal po bzhugs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nas/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs
92a4(phal chen): dang brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i blo gros shes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i da rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu 'phags nas/ bcom
92a5(phal chen): ldan 'das gang na ba dar 'ong bar gyur te/ rin po che kha dog mtha' yas par 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus na mkha'/ kun nas yog par byin gyis brlob cing / nor bu rin po che kun
92a6(phal chen): nas 'od kyi dra ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rgya chen pos rnam par snang bar 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog
92a7(phal chen): par byin gyis brlabs dang / spos thams cad 'phro ba'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rgyan thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin
92a8(phal chen): gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / shing dang ze ba rnam pa sna tshogasu 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus
92b1(phal chen): namakha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rdo rje sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
92b2(phal chen): mtha' yas pa brjod cing 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs pa dang / mu tig gi sgron ma 'od 'phro ba'i sprin bcus nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs
92b3(phal chen): pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis na mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis brlabs par byed cing / bcom ldan 'das
92b4(phal chen): gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshanas/ steng gi phyogs su brten te/ seng ge da khri sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgrog pa'i 'od zer 'byung ba'i pad+mo'i snying
92b5(phal chen): po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod do// de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin
92b6(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
92b7(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' ra re zhing yang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis
92b8(phal chen): nam mkha' kun nas yog par byin gyis rlob cing 'ongs par gyur te phyin nas gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogs su brten te/ seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi snying po can dag mngon par sprul cing
93a1(phal chen): dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'khod par gyur to// 'khod pa'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ba spu'i lung bu thams cad re re nas 'od zer gyi sprin rin po
93a2(phal chen): che thams cad ltar kha dog sna tshogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu byung bar gyur to// rin po che re re'i sgo nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i
93a3(phal chen): snying po can la 'khod pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu byung bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i khams kyi rdul shin
93a4(phal chen): tu phra ba thams cad kyi sbubs gang bar byas nas/ rdul shin tu phra ba re re la yang zhing 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du rab tu 'jug par gyur
93a5(phal chen): to// zhing re rer yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mthong zhing shes paragyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la yang rmi lam lta bu'i
93a6(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par bskal ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed re re'i lha'i
93a7(phal chen): gnas thams cad du skye ba dang 'chi 'pho ba yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur te// sems kyi skad cig re re la yang 'jig rten gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub
93a8(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i sgo gnas yang dag par sprul bar gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
93b1(phal chen): zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu bskyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rab tu brjod cing rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo gnas yang dag par sprul pa byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la
93b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bsgrag pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag
93b3(phal chen): bar bskul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'gro ba thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan
93b4(phal chen): lag rnam par bstan cing brjod pa'i sgo dag nas/ yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re/ del 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ 
93b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin thams cad kyi char dbab pa'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin
93b6(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su chos kyi dbyings snang bas rgyas par rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu'i sgo dag nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re/ 
93b7(phal chen): la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi skus chos kyi dbyings gang bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa dang / 'od thams cad kyi sgo dag
93b8(phal chen): nas yang dag par skul ba byed par gyur to// sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad na byang chub sems dpa'
94a1(phal chen): kun tu bzang po rab tu gnas pa'i spyo gnas yang dag par bskul ba byed par gyur to// de lta bu'i chos kyi byings rgyas par bkang ste/ sems can rnams
94a2(phal chen): kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par skul ba byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag tu rab tu bdal te/ zhing re re yang sems kyi skad cig re re la/ sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin
94a3(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi ngan song gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni rab tu zhi bar byed do// sems can phyin ci log la nges pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni yang dag par nges pa'i phung po
94a4(phal chen): la rab tu 'god do// sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni dge ba dang yid du 'ong ba dang / mtho ris su skyesadapa la rab tu 'god do// sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu
94a5(phal chen): phra ba snyed ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rab tu 'god do// sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni dge ba'i bshes bsnyen bkur ba'i bsod nams kyi
94a6(phal chen): tshogs la rab tu 'god do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ni sngan chad ma skyed pa'i byang chub kyi sems skye bar byed do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi
94a7(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa phyir mi ldog pa yang dag par thob pa la yang dag par skul lo// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ de bzhin
94a8(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyan chos thams cad kun nas snang zhing gzigs pa la yongs su sbyangs te rab tu 'god do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed stobs thams cad
94b1(phal chen): kyis rab tu gnas pa dang / ye shes kyi tshogs zad mi shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god do// zhing de dag re rer yang sems can ri rab
94b2(phal chen): kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gdung dang rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i gnas rgya mtsho rnam par spyod pa la rab tu 'god do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi
94b3(phal chen): 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag drung bar gyur to// 'od zer thams cad sgo nas sgra 'byung ste// ji snyed byang chub spyod par 'jug pa dang / rgyal sras
94b4(phal chen): yon tan phun sum gang yod pa'i// dbyangs kyis phyogs rnams kun tu bkang zhing sgrog/ bskal pa rgya mtshor skyo de med spyad pa spyod// sdug bsngal kun las 'gro ba kun 'grel
94b5(phal chen): kyang // yid la skyo med zhum pa gang yang med// 'di'i tshul la rgyal sras rab tu zhugs// chos kyi sgo rnams kun la rab spyod cing // tshul 'dir bskal pa rgya mtsho zad par byed// 
94b6(phal chen): mtha' med dpung med lhag ma gang yang med// de dag chos nyid zhi ba rab tu sgrog/ dus gsum rgyal ba'i smon lam gang yod pa// rgyal sras de dag 'gro la phan don du// de dag thams cad ma
94b7(phal chen): lus yongs su sbyong // de dag spyod pa'i rgyan ni 'di 'dra'o// rgyal ba kun gyi 'khor du nyer phyin te// phyogs rnams kun na gzugs brnyan lus 'chang zhing // rgyal sras ye shes rgya mtsho'i
94b8(phal chen): blo gros can// de dag chos nyid zhir 'jug 'di 'dra'o// 'od zer sgo rnams re rer mtha' yas pa'i// bsam yas zhing rnams de dag rab tu 'jug/ spyod pas mig ni kun nas yongs dag ste// rgyal
95a1(phal chen): sras de dag spyod yul 'di yin no// skra rtse gcig tu de dag rab gnas shing // zhing rnams dbyings kun kun nas bskyod byas kyang // sems can rnams la 'jigs par
95a2(phal chen): mi byed de// sa 'di rnam dag 'tshul 'chang dag gi'o// tshul rnams kun la bsam gyis mi khyab lus// de dag kun tu zhing rnams sna tshogs sprul// skad cig sems la 'chi 'pho skye ba snang / 
95a3(phal chen): rgyan 'di sems la chags med rnams kyi'o// dus gsum bskal pa gang yod ma lus par// skad cig gcig gis thams cad rab tu sten// rgyu ma lta bu lus med dngos kyang med// de 'dra'i
95a4(phal chen): chos nyid chags med blos rtogs so// bzang po'i spyod pa mchog la zhugs pa rnams// 'gro ba kun la yid du 'ong ba'i lus// rgyal sras de dag chos nyid 'di yin te// 'od zer
95a5(phal chen): kun gyi sgo nas dbyangs kyang sgrog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das/ kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dang dpung med pa de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pas
95a6(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa thob par bya ba'i phyir smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas/ 'od zer chen po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes kyi snang bas phyogs rnam par ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu bkye'o// 
95a7(phal chen): 'od zer rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog sgron ma sprin du 'dal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu snang ba de byung nas/ tshul thams cad kyi phyogs 'byam klas pa rab tu snang bar byas te/ phyogs
95a8(phal chen): thams cad kyi dbyings rgya mtsho rnams rab tu snang bar byas nas/ sems can rgya mtsho rnams rab tu snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bstan nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
95b1(phal chen): zhing mang po thams cad rab tu bskyod pa'i rgyan gyi tshul thams cad kyis rab tu bstod nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad
95b2(phal chen): dang mnyam pa dag tu rab tu spros nas/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba rgya mtsho dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi char dus
95b3(phal chen): gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa bab ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho rab tu bstan nas/ sems can thams cad ma lus par 'khor ba thams
95b4(phal chen): cad las rab tu gdon par bya ba'i phyir mos pa ji bzhin du 'byung ba dang 'thun pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu dbab pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam ma lus pa'i
95b5(phal chen): sprin gyi char rab tu dbab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'khor dag tu dga' bar phrad pa byas nas/ bcom ldan
95b6(phal chen): ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pad mo chen po chu ba rin po che thams cad las bsgrubs pa nang rim nor bu'i rgyal po'i mdzod sna tshogs las byas pa
95b7(phal chen): lo ma rin po che thams cad kyi char 'bebs pa/ ze ba'i phreng ba'i rgyun spos rin po che thams cad las byas pa snying po 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi tshon gyis rab tu mdzes par bris pa/ 'od kyi
95b8(phal chen): 'khor rnam par dag cing 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bar byas pa'i sprin dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad rab tu 'thung ba/ sems kyi skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas
96a1(phal chen): pa ston pa'i sgra rab tu 'byung ba / nor bu'i rgyal po mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin gyis thams cad du gang bar byed pa/ byang
96a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam thams cad rab tu ston pa'i dbyangs 'byin par gyur te byung ngo // pad+mo chen po de byung ba'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la pham pa med pi dbyangs shegs
96a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu de nyid nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan du mar g.yas phyogs su
96a4(phal chen): bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ pad+mo chen po de'i snying po la 'dug go// byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba
96a5(phal chen): snyed po de dag kyang ze ba'i phreng ba de dag la 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la pham pa med pa'i dbyangs chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhing tshad med pas rab tu
96a6(phal chen): dga' ba'i shugs shin tu skyes pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rjes su song ba'i ye shes can// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rab tu zhugs
96a7(phal chen): pa'i mthu dang ldan pa/ zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi drung du phyin pa/ ba spu thams cad las sprul pa'i sprin zad mi shes pas kun tu khebs par byed pa/ 
96a8(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig thams cad la dmigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings kun tu sgyur ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la dus gsum khyab par byed pa'i spyod yul gyis rnam par spyod pa/ phyogs thams
96b1(phal chen): cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'chang ba/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu 'jog cing phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa la rnam par
96b2(phal chen): spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi lus dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dpung
96b3(phal chen): med pa la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas sku ni chos kyi dbyings kyis gsal// 'gro ba kun la rgyal ba mngon sum ste// ji ltar mos pa'i
96b4(phal chen): sems can rgyas bkang nas// snying po byang chub de la rgyal ba debazhugs// zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mchog snyed kyi// / rgyal ba spu rtse kun la rab bzhugs te// byang chub
96b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor// kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa mchog ston to// spu gcig rtse la zhing mang rgya mtsho ste// byang chub snying por pad+mo gdan la bzhugs/ 
96b6(phal chen): chos dbyings rgya chen thams cad kun bkang ste// spu rnams kun la rnam par 'phrul pa ston// zhing rnams re re dag na rab bzhugs shing // zhing rnams 'byam klas kun tu rgyas mdzad pas// phyogs
96b7(phal chen): bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams// kun kyang snying po byang chub drung du 'dong // zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran mchog snyed kyi// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'od// sangs rgyas/ 
96b8(phal chen): kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dong // chos dbyings 'byam klas rtag tu rgyas par 'gengs// zhing rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan rab tu ston// chos dbyings rdul rnams ye shes spyod yul can// kun kyang
97a1(phal chen): bzang po'i spyod la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du yang dag byung // byang chub sems dpa' ye shes mchog yul can// chos sprin nyan cing rab tu
97a2(phal chen): mkhas pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams kun na gnas// zhing rnams kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod// rgya mtshor chos la rnam par snang bar spyod// de dag rgyal ba'i sa rnams rgyu
97a3(phal chen): mtshor zhugs// sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan 'byung ba// de dag smon lam rgya mtshor rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang // kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa de dag
97a4(phal chen): shes// sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang ning // de dag rnam 'phrul rgya chen kun la zhugs// zhing rnam ngas kun gyi rdul phran mang snyed kyi// lus kyi sman ni rtag pa
97a5(phal chen): rab tu ston// sems can kun bkang 'od kyis kun la spyod/ bsam pa yid bzhin chos kyi char yang 'bebs/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal pad+mo rnam par lta ba'i
97a6(phal chen): rgyal mtshan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas ye shes shin tu zab// dus rnams kun tu
97a7(phal chen): de 'byung ste// chos dbyings thugs su chud pas na// 'jig rten mgon zhes rab tu brjod// yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// 'dres pa med cing gnas pa med// sems can thams cad
97a8(phal chen): yid bzhin du// gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong // chos rnams thams cad mngon sangs rgyas// chos rnams kun la rab tu bzhugs// thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs/ 
97b1(phal chen): zhing rnams kun na rnam par mdzes// kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab par// sems can thams cad yid bzhin du// sems can mchog gi 'od rnams dang // de bzhin sku'i sprin kyang mthong // 
97b2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag las// mi zad sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rnams// zhing rnams kun tu rab sgrog cing // chos kyi rgya mtsho shin tu ston// spu rnams re re kun nas kyang // phyogs
97b3(phal chen): bcur 'od zer dra ba dag/ sangs rgyas gsung ni rab 'byin cing // gdul dka' thams cad rnam par 'dul// sangs rgyas 'od zer sgo rnams nas// sgra dbyangs zab mo rtag tu 'byung // sangs rgyas
97b4(phal chen): yon tan rgya mtsho ni// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul lo// // sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ mtha' dang dpung da med rab tu sbyor// ye shes zab mos shes bya ba// rgya chen
97b5(phal chen): phyogs su rab tu ston// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan/ chos kyi dbyings rnams kun bkang zhing // yang dag sangs
97b6(phal chen): rgyas ston pa mdzad// sku rnams re re kun las kyang // zhing rnams kun gyi rdul mnyam pa// sangs rgyas sems can mnyam phyung zhing // rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston// de nas byang chub
97b7(phal chen): sems dpa' chos rgya mtsho rnam par snang ba'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chos kyi dbyings
97b8(phal chen): rnams kun khyab par// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par mdzes// rgya chen gsung ni rab byung ba// zhing rnams rgya mtshor shin tu sgrog/ 'jig rten thams cad kun 'jug par// 'jig
98a1(phal chen): rten mgon po shin tu mdzes// 'gro bkun gyi bas ma mkhyen cing // byin gyi rmangs ni rab tu ston// sangs rgyas 'jig rten gan la mngon/ 
98a2(phal chen): sems can thams cad bsam pa bzhin// thams cad gzigs pas rangs rgyas kyi// rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad mthong // mtha' mas 'od mang sangs rgyas sprid// chos rnams rgya mtshom
98a3(phal chen): 'brug kyang sgrog/ ye shes rnam chu'i tshul bzhin du// rgyal ba'i sras rnams de la 'jug/ 'jug pa rnams la 'byung ba med// 'drung ba yod par rnam par bstan// gang la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa
98a4(phal chen): mo// tshes rnams 'drung brnama'i 'dzidzin/ 'phod gnas pa mi ma ste// 'on kyang rgyal bgan na snang/ sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings las drung // dbyings sa rgya
98a5(phal chen): rab tu brjed// yulan bzugs med rang bzhin med/ de la 'drung ba mi mnga' ste// sku dang mtshan kyang de bzhinameng// rgyal ba gzugs panan 'draba'o// 'gro bkun
98a6(phal chen): tu chos kyi sbyin// bsam ba kun la rab tu byung // yang dag sangs rgyas rnam kun tu// sems can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad kyi// snying po byang chung kun
98a7(phal chen): snang // 'khor gyi rgya mtsho thams cad na// zhing rnams kun gyis rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dgal// yon tan mtshond mi shes// sangs rgyas sngon tan mtha' yas te// de dag
98a8(phal chen): yin tan zad pa med// de nas byang chub sems dpa' smos 'di 'gro ba'i rgyan zla ba'i 'od kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcang
98b1(phal chen): 'di dag smras so// bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas sar// byang chub sems dpa' gang bzhugs pa// de dang de dag sangs rgyas kyi// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul thams cad mthong // ye shes
98b2(phal chen): lus kyis zhugs pa rnams// zhing kun rdul gyi sbubs su yang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // bdag nyid lus kyang der mthong ngo // gzugs brnyan zhing rnams thams cad dang // 
98b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar 'byung // kun tu byin gyis rlabs rnams dang // rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang // spyod pa gang gis rnam sbyangs pa// de dag ning
98b4(phal chen): rnams thams cad du// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam 'phrul mthong // kun tu mnyam pa nyid gyur cing // kun tu lus kyis rab gnas te// ye shes lus kyi rjes song nas// sangs
98b5(phal chen): rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa'o// sangs rgyas ye shes zhugs pa'i rnams// chos kyi dbyings la rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gyi spu dag tu// rgya mtsho'i zhing la rab tu 'jug
98b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing dag tu// byin gyi rlabs rnams rab bstan pas// gzhan dang gzhan gyi lus dag dang // ming gis kun na rab tu gnas// byang chub snying por rnam 'phrul dang // byang chub
98b7(phal chen): mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag/ skad cig sems kyi ston pa byed// zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad dang // bskal pa bye ba bsam yas dag/ byang chub sems dpa'
98b8(phal chen): mnyam bzhag rnams// skad cig sems kyis rnam par ston// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad na// byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa rnams// sangs rgyas sku la rnam spyod kyang // mtha' ma snyed par mi rung ngo // / 
99a1(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i 'od zer snang bas mthu 'byin pa'i blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe
99a2(phal chen): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor// chos dbyings tshul rnams thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas sprin gyis mngon tu yog/ 
99a3(phal chen): 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho dang // phyogs bcu kun na gang yod pa// thams cad kun tu 'khor lo 'khor// de ni smon lam rnam 'phrul pa'o// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba// gzhan dang
99a4(phal chen): gzhan gyi ming dag gis// zhing rnams gnas pa kun tu yang // chos kyi 'khor lo kun tu 'khor// rnam par snang mdzad byin gyi rlabs// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun tu yang / 
99a5(phal chen): kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dag/ rjod cing zhing rnams kun tu/ 'byung // zhing kun rdul la sku'i rnams// thams cad chos char rab tu 'bebs// 'dres pa med cing 'byung ba med// 
99a6(phal chen): 'jig rten dag na rnam par mdzes// bskal pa bye ba grangs med par// zhing kun rdul phran sbubs dag tu// rnam par snang ba mdzad pa'i gsung // sngon gyi spyod pa rab tu sgrogazhing rnams
99a7(phal chen): thams cad rdul snyed kyi// 'od zer dra ba phyogs bcu na// sangs rgyas 'od zer kun sgo nas// byang chub mchog phyir sems can 'dul// kun tu ma 'dres sku dag gis// chos dbyings yongs
99a8(phal chen): su rab gsal te// 'gro rnams 'dul ba ji bzhin du// gzugs kyi skur yang rab tu mthong // dus gsum zhing rnams thams cad kyi// mgon po ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams// de dag kun gyi
99b1(phal chen): mtshan kyang sgrog/ sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos// da ltar byung dang 'das pa dang // sangs rgyas gang rnams ma byon pa// de dag kun gyi bsam yas pa// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu
99b2(phal chen): grag/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yon tan gyi mdzod mi zad pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid mar mes sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshig
99b3(phal chen): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang gis byang chub sems dpa' yi// ye shes tshogs 'di kun non cing // ye shes rtogs pa rnyed pa'i rnams// de dag 'di yi tshul la zhugs// chos kyi dbyings dang
99b4(phal chen): mnyam pa'i dbyangs// zhing rnams kun tu rab tu 'byung // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul te// byang chub sems da pa'i ched du brjod// skad cig re re'i sems kun la// chos
99b5(phal chen): kyi dbyings su rnam par rgyu// de bzhin nyid la gnas shing brten// chos rnams rgya mtsho kun la zhugs// rgyan gyi pha rol phyin pa rnams// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ 
99b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad sku dag tu// zhing rnams kun na gnas shing spyod// rdul rnams re re'i stengs nas kyang // chos rnams kun ni rab tu 'byung // zhing rnams kun kyang khyab par byed// ye
99b7(phal chen): shes chags med spyod yul lo// sangs rgyas thams cad spyod yul du// lus pa med par kun bkang zhing // rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnam spyod pas// sangs rgyas spyod yul rnams la zhugs// 
99b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes snyegs dbyangs// chos kyi dbyings ni rab sgrog pa// chos dbyings rjes su shes pa'i rnams// dbyangs kyi rgya mtsho rnams la spyod// bskal pa rgya mtshor ma 'dres par
100a1(phal chen): sgra dang dbyangs rnams shin tu sgrog/ dus rnams thams cad shes pas gsal// dbyangs kyis de dag sa la zhugs// sgra'i shes la rmongs pa med// sems
100a2(phal chen): can sgra yang spyod yul te// thams cad mkhyen pa kun gyi yang // rnam par 'phrul pa'i dbyangs shes so// sa nas sar yang phyin gyur cing // stobs kyi sa la rab gnas te// bskal pa bye bar
100a3(phal chen): spyad pas na// chos nyid 'di la rab tu 'jug/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi 'od zer shes rab kun nas sgron ma'i blo gros kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ 
100a4(phal chen): phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang la sangs rgyas bzhug das pa yi// chos rnams de dag mtshan nyid med// ye shes
100a5(phal chen): sa ni thob pa'i rnams// 'jig rten gtso bo rab tu mthong // shes rab snang ba'i kun 'od can// byangachub sems dpa' mnyam bzhag rnams// sangs rgyas thams
100a6(phal chen): cad kun gyi yang // sku yi rnam par 'phrul la zhugs// chos kyi dbyings la rnam spyad cing // lus kyi dngos la rab 'jug ste// zab mo'i chos rnams rtogs gyur nas// smon lam dag gis
100a7(phal chen): yang dag byung // bsod nams rgya mtshos byung gyur cing // ye shes sa la rnam par gnas// chos la rnam spyod khong du chud// spyod pa'i mchog la rab tu spyod// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad
100a8(phal chen): kyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi drung dag du// chos kyi dbyings la spyad pas na// rang bzhin lus ni rab tu mthong // zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad du// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// 
100b1(phal chen): thams cad gzigs pa'i chos kyi rnams// rgya mtsho kun la rab tu spyod// bdag mthong bas ni lus dang rdul// gcig tu 'dres par mngon par byas// ma skyes mtshan nyid med pa ste// zhing / 
100b2(phal chen): rnams kun tu'ang rnam par mdzes// 'jig rten kun gyi bsam 'thun par// sems can kun la mngon sum du// lus kyi sprin ni bstan byas shing // byang chub don tu sems can
100b3(phal chen): 'dul// sangs rgyas thams cad mthu yis na// byang chub sems dpar brjod pa ste// gang gis mgon po mthong ba yi// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs shin tu zab// mgon po ji snyed gang bzhugs
100b4(phal chen): pa'i// byin rlabs mtha' dang dpung med de// chos dbyings rab tu gang byas nas// byang chub sems dpa' rnam 'tshang nga rgya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog kun nas 'od 'phro
100b5(phal chen): gtsug pud rab tu 'phyang bas// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams
100b6(phal chen): kun tu sangs rgyas kyi// gsung gi dkyil 'khor sgra 'byin te// chos kyi dbyings rnams gang byas nas// yon tan sprin ni rab tu brjod// yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku// rnam dag na mkha'
100b7(phal chen): 'dra ba ste// gzugs kyi sku yang rab bstan cing // chos nyid 'di la shin tu 'jug/ dga' dang mos pa'i shugs rnams dang // sangs rgyas stobs rnams thams cad la// rab tu
100b8(phal chen): gnas shing de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug/ shes rab chung ngus chos 'di dag/ kun nas shes par mi nus te// ye shes mig ni rab sbyangs shing // 'di'i
101a1(phal chen): tshul la 'jug par 'gyur// rab tu gnas dang byin rlabs dang // chos kun rnam par spyad pa dang // rab tu 'jug dang ldan pa yi// mnyam pa nyid la rab tu zhugs
101a2(phal chen): chos rnams mtha' yas glong gi rnams// chos kun mtshan nyid rnams la te// kun mkhyen nyid la rab zhugs shing // chos kyi rgya mtsho kun la spyod// sangs rgyas zhing na kun 'khod cing // 
101a3(phal chen): thams cad kun na rnam par mdzes// 'ong ba med cing 'phos pa med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de 'dra'o// gzugs brnyan 'dra ba'i sku rnams ni// sems can rgya mtsho'i nang na snang // mos pa
101a4(phal chen): ci 'dra yod pa'i rnams// de bzhin mgon po kun gyis mthong // kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang // spyod pa dmang po sus sbyangs pa// de dag thams cad ba spu la'ang / 
101a5(phal chen): rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag mthong // lus kyi rnams ni re res kyang // chos kyi dbyings rnams kun tu khyab/ 'khor lo kun ni 'khor ba ste// chos kyi 'khor lo bsam mi khyab/ 
101a6(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dang / gzi brjid mi zad pa'i rgyal po blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// / 
101a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas sku ni thams cad nas// 'od zer sprin mang phyogs rnams bcur// kha dog mtha' yas 'bar ba'i 'od// sems can bsam pa kun la 'phro// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad kyi// snying
101a8(phal chen): po byang chub kun na bzhugs// bdud rnams thams cad rab btul te// 'khor gyi nang na rnam par mdzes// thams cad rdul na'ang ma 'dres par// 'od zer dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs// phyogs
101b1(phal chen): rnams gzhan dang gzhan lam tu// zhing gi rgyud rnams rab tu ston// zhing gi rnams ni rgya mtsho'i gleng // phyogs kyi rnams kyang kun tu gnon// zhing rnams thang chen mnyam zhing dag/ in dra nI lar
101b2(phal chen): kun nas gnas// spyi'u tshugs dag dang snrel ni dang // pad+ma'i dbyibs dang khyad khrud dang // dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i khyad par du// gzugs rnams kun gyis rab tu gnas// chos kyi dbyings
101b3(phal chen): rnams gar phyin par// thug pa med par 'gram 'dal ba// de dag kun gyi 'khor rnams su// shin tu bstan pa'i chos 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dbyings na// 'khod pa'i zhing rnams
101b4(phal chen): bsam mi khyab// de dag kun tu chos nyid 'di// 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyang ston// tha dad med pa'i chos kyi dbyings// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu 'khor// gcig gi tshul gyi rnam
101b5(phal chen): pa yis// chos bstan pa ni kun tu 'byung // sangs rgyas gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni// tshul rnams thams cad rab tu brjod// dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul dag gis// mi zad tshul rnams rab
101b6(phal chen): tu bstan// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun na yang // rgyal ba rnams ni mig yor 'drar// snying po byang chub rnams na snang // 'byung ba dag kyang yod pa min// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings/ 
101b7(phal chen): su 'od 'phro ba rnam par snang ba 'byung ba'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// blta zhing blta zhing
101b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnams// sku gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ste// dga' ba rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung // chos kyi shugs ni rab tu 'phel// mtshan rab kun nas sangs rgyas rnams// phyogs bcu
102a1(phal chen): kun tu rab tu 'byung // rdul rnams kun tu 'jug pa yis// sangs rgyas smin kyang de bzhin bstan// skad cig skad cig sems kun la// sangs rgyas
102a2(phal chen): 'od ni dpal gyis 'bar// rnam 'phrul gzhan dang gzhan dag gis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang // byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che// rgya mtsho chos las 'byung ba rnams// sangs
102a3(phal chen): rgyas kun gyis byin rlabs pa// 'di'i yul la rnam par spyod// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam la// gang rnams shin tu gnas gyur pa// de dang de rnams zhing dag tu// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul
102a4(phal chen): kun la lta// ye shes zab mo rnam gnon cing // chos kyi da dbyings la gzhol ba ni// mos pa rgya mtsho shes pa ste/ smon lam kun gyis byung ba'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku dang
102a5(phal chen): gsung // chags pa med la rab tu zhugs// spyod pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis// spyod yul kun kyang khong du chud// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gnas shing // ye shes spyod
102a6(phal chen): yul gyur pa'i rnams// chos kyi dbyings la rab brtson pa// rgyal ba rnams kyi sa gnon to// skad cig sems kyis zhing gi rnams// sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul mnyam pa// de dag chos nyid rje
102a7(phal chen): bzhin du// rdul gcig steng du rnam par sbyong // zhing rnams ji snyed thams cad na// zhing gi rnam 'phrul gang yod pa// chos nyid 'di la zhugs pa'i rnams// zhing gcig du ni sdud pa byed// de nas bya
102a8(phal chen): chub sems dpa' stobs dang / brtson 'grus chags pa med pa'i blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams
102b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad du// de dag gsung ni zab mo 'byung // dbyangs kyi yan lag kun rgyas pa// chos kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs so// brjod pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyis// sems can kun gyi skad dag tu/ 
102b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu yang // chos rnams bstan po rab tu 'byung // zhing rnams kun tu ma lus par// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul mthong zhing // sangs rgyas gsung rnams thos pa dang / 
102b3(phal chen): byang chub mchog phyir kun kyang 'jug/ rdul rnams re re'i steng nas kyang // chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun bkang zhing // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston pa byed// chos
102b4(phal chen): kyi sku ni tha dad min// na mkha' bzhin te chags pa med// gzugs kyi skur ni rnam dmigs pa// mig yor snang da ba'i mtshan nyid do// mig yor yul la mi gnas te// na mkha' bzhin
102b5(phal chen): du dngos po med// mnyam pa nyid 'di rtogs gyur nas// ye shes rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sku ni ma skyes te// gzung ba med cing byung ba med// nam mkha'i mnyam pa nyid
102b6(phal chen): dang mtshungs// gzung du med las 'di bstan to// zhing rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas rnams// de dag spu gcig rtse la tshogs// ye shes mig dang ldan pa yis// spu rnams kun tu rnam 'phrul mthong // 
102b7(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad smon lam ste// chos kyi dbyings ni kun bkang zhing // bla med chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ zhing rnams kun na rtag tu 'khor// ji ste bskal pa bsam yas par// spu rtse gcig
102b8(phal chen): tu rnam sprul pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad mdzad kyang // de'i mtha' ni snyed par dka'// ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'dir/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang chub tu phyogs
103a1(phal chen): bcu nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dus par gyur pa/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gling bzhi pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa re rer yang
103a2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa'i snying po byang chub dag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho byed pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun nas 'dus par gyur
103a3(phal chen): to// 'di na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi snying po byang chub/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa dag tu/ kun nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang
103a4(phal chen): chos nyid 'di kho na rab tu ston te// / shin tu rgyas da pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las / de bzhin gshegs pa'i le'u ste gnyis
103a5(phal chen): pa'o// bam po bdun pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ byang chub sems dpa'asems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i
103a6(phal chen): snying po can de nyid la 'dug ste/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa
103a7(phal chen): thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjesu song ba'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par btags pa'i tshogs na mkha'i dbyings chags pa med cing / rgya che ba khyab par byed pa'i rang bzhin chos
