103a8(phal chen): kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i glong mnyam pa nyid kyi rje su song zhing / shin tu 'dal ba'i tshegs chos thams cad kyi sgo'i dbyings ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par 'byung bar rgyas par 'gengs pa/ 
103b1(phal chen): phyogs thams cad du yang dag par zhugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi lus kyis kun nas yog par byas pa'i rang bzhin gyi snying po can dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ye shes snang ba rgya mtsho'i klong / 
103b2(phal chen): phyogs thams cad du sgo kun nas tshul rgya mtsho rnam par rig par bya bas mngon tu yang dag par ston pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang rnam par thar pas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi
103b3(phal chen): lus rgyas par 'gangs pa'i snying po can/ zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par chos kyi dbyingasu 'jug pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgyu
103b4(phal chen): mtsho thams cad yongs su grub par byed pa bskal pa thams cadang du smon lam rgya mtshos rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi
103b5(phal chen): 'khor lo ston cing rjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs la mnyam par bzhag/ par gyur to// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu/ bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du byang
103b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa/ 
103b7(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi khams su gtogs pa/ dus gsum thams cad na yod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byung
103b8(phal chen): ba'i khams chos kyi dbyings rgya chen pos non pa'i rigasu gtogs pa/ shin tu phra zhing bsgribs pa med pa dang / phyogs rgya chen po rgya mtsho thams cad snang ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ris
104a1(phal chen): su gtogs pas rnam par non pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs pa sangs rgyas kyi stobs thogs pa med pas chung pa/ chos kyi dbyin
104a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sku thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rdul ma lus pa kun tu gtogs pa/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par gang ba'i 'jig
104a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa dag tu rdul phra mo re re la'ang zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs nas/ zhing re re zhing yang
104a4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs dpa re re'i zhabs kyi drung du yang lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
104a5(phal chen): mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snangamadzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di la mnyam par bzhag go/ 
104a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i snying po zhes bya ba de la mnyam par bzhag
104a7(phal chen): pa'i rjes la/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhal bstan to// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
104a8(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang / 
104b1(phal chen): mdzad kyi sku'i snying po 'di la mnyam par gzhog pa legaso leg so// kye rgyal ba'i bu khyod la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
104b2(phal chen): pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi brlabs dang / khyod kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam dang / spyod pas yongs su dag pa'i yang mthus 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas
104b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dbye ba dang / chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi phyogs rgya mtsho ma lus par
104b4(phal chen): snang bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par dag par bya ba dang / chags pa med par 'jig rten gyi
104b5(phal chen): khams 'byam klas pa thams cad yongasu gnan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor thams cad sgo
104b6(phal chen): kun nas rab tu brjod pa dang / chos kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la zhugs pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su gzung ba dang / chos kyi snang ba thams cad kyi tshul rnam par blta ba
104b7(phal chen): dang / sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag rgya mtsho'i dbyangs yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byin gyis
104b8(phal chen): rlob pa mdzad do// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la/ thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyi stobs la rab tu 'jug pa'i
105a1(phal chen): ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi
105a2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'jig pa dang 'du ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// chos kyi dbyings
105a3(phal chen): 'byam klas pa mtha' dang dpung med pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa zab mo tha mi dad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par gnas pa'i ye
105a4(phal chen): shes nye bar bsgrubs so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// sems can thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho
105a5(phal chen): dang chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// 'jig rten gyi khams mang po thams cad kyi rje su song zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus yang dag par
105a6(phal chen): gzhol ba'i ye shes kyang nye bar bsgrub so// sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi yan lag dang sgra dbyangs kyang nye bar bsgrubs so// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug pa
105a7(phal chen): la nye bar bsgrubs pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag dang rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs na lus 'khod pa thams cad la yang nye bar
105a8(phal chen): bsgribs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
105b1(phal chen): ngag gis phyag g.yas pa mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par mdzes par brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyi dra ba'i me tog sna tshogs shin tu rgyus pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin 'gyed
105b2(phal chen): pa/ rin po che 'od 'gro ba thams cad kyi sprin gyis rnam par gsal bar gyur pa/ phyogs thams cad du spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi 'od kyis rnam par snang ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
105b3(phal chen): gsung gi yan lag gi dkyil 'khor gyi rjesu sgra 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'das
105b4(phal chen): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang rab rnam par ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
105b5(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo'i snang ba yang dag par ston pa/ dusagasum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba rnams brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' kun
105b6(phal chen): tu bzang po'i spyi bor bzhag go// 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad dang rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs na yod pa thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung
105b7(phal chen): dag tu byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyi bo la phyag rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams rab tu bzhag go/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis reg ma
105b8(phal chen): thag tu de nas de'i mod la ting nge 'dzin de las ldang ba'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dus gsum thams cad du sems kyi skad cig re re la ting nge 'dzin las ldang
106a1(phal chen): bya/ pa'i ye shes ma 'dres pa la mkhas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin las ltung ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sde chos kyi dbyings dang / dus gsum dumanam pa'i rdum thams cad
106a2(phal chen): kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi ning 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sgo dang / sems can ma lus pa'i gnas thams cad dang mnyam zhing sems can thams cad
106a3(phal chen): kyi sems rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ming gi 'khor lo las ldang ba'i sgo dang / sems can phyogs mtshams thams cad du chos kyi dbyings rnam par
106a4(phal chen): 'byed pa'i sgo dang / rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad du sangs nga rgyas kyi sku'i sprin mtha' dang dpung med par 'byam klas dpa'i sgo dang / chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu bstan
106a5(phal chen): pa'i sgo dag las langs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po ting nge 'dzin las langs ma thag/ tu/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang so so re re zhing
106a6(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu zhugs par gyur to// gzungs rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
106a7(phal chen): la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul
106a8(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// spyod pa rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab
106b1(phal chen): tu zhugs par gyur to// chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs su rnam par snang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba'i yon tan gyi snying po can rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams
106b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / ye shes ma 'dres pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin
106b3(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i rtse mo thams cad la zhing gzhan dang gzhan rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin
106b4(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'pho ba da dang / 'byung ba dang / byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mya
106b5(phal chen): ngan las 'das pa bstan pa rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi
106b6(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho thams cad yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor rgya mtsho rnams dang rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad kyi khongs na yod pa kun tu yang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho
106b7(phal chen): rnams rab tu zhugs par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos nyid rab tu thob pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams
106b8(phal chen): cad ma lus par bag langs tsam du g.yos te/ rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan par gnas shing / chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sgra yang shin tu grag par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
107a1(phal chen): nga'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du yang nor bu'i rgyal po bcu'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab par gyur to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal/ 
107a2(phal chen): po mtshan dang ldan pa'i gser dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dbal gyi spri cha mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyis rnam par gsal bar byed pa'i sprin char mngon par bab po// 'di lta
107a3(phal chen): ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur rin po che'i 'khor lo rab tu 'grems pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan rin po che'i
107a4(phal chen): snying po'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor da lo rab tu sgrog pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po// 'di lta ste/ 
107a5(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po zhing rnam par snang bar byed cing snying po byang chub tu dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur
107a6(phal chen): snang ba'i sprul pa 'gyed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan gyi 'khor lo dang mthu rab tu grag par byed pa'i sprin gyi
107a7(phal chen): char mngon par bab po// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab po// 'di lta ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong bas phyogs thams cad
107a8(phal chen): khyab par byed pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi char bcu po 'di dag mngon par bab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang
107b1(phal chen): 'od zer gyi sgo thams cad nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung bar gyur to// zhing rnams 'byam klas kun na kun tu bzang po de// pad mo yid du 'od la rab tu 'dug pa mthong // kun tu rnam
107b2(phal chen): 'phrul rnam pa 'di 'dra ston byed pa// ting 'dzin yul la 'jug pa mtha' dang dpung med do// lus rnams thams cad nas kyang kun tu bzang po de// sprul pa rab tu 'gyed cing chos dbyings
107b3(phal chen): rtag par 'gengs// ting 'dzin kun gyi tshul dang ming dang rnam 'phrul pa// thams cad dbyangs kyis chags pa med pa rgya che sgrog/ ting 'dzin thams cad gzhan dang gzhan gyi rnam 'phrul
107b4(phal chen): gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhabs kyi drung de dag tu// rgyal ba kun gyi spyod yul yangs pa gang byas/ te// zhing rnams kun tu rnam par 'phrul pa mang po ston// zhing kun
107b5(phal chen): rgyal ba kun gyi zhabs drung ji bzhin du// de ltar zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul phran la// ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul/ pa thams cad ma lus ston// rnam par snang mdzad smon lam
107b6(phal chen): dbyings la rab tu zhugs// kun tu bzang po'i lus ni namakha'i mtshan nyid de// thams cad zhing la mi gnas de bzhin nyid la gnas// lus kyi sprin ni 'gro ba kun dang mnyam par kun bkye zhing // sems
107b7(phal chen): can kun la bsam pa bzhin du de dag ston// sangs rgyas sku rnams kun la zhing rnams gang yod pa// mtha' dang dpung med kun la rab tu zhugs pa rnams// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gnas pa dag la
107b8(phal chen): bstan/ rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra dam pa tshad kyang med// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rdul bral mtha' dang dpung med pa// tshad med thams cad lus kyi nang du kun chub cing // dbyangs la zhing mang dra bar rnam
108a1(phal chen): 'tshang rgya ba ston// skad cig sems la bskal pa mang po de bzhin ston// zhing rnams thams cad 'byam klas pa na rnam gnas shing // rnam par 'phrul ba dam pa ston par
108a2(phal chen): rab tu snang // phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing gi dbyings rnams ma lus spyod// kun tu bzang po de la rnam lta kun kyang mthong // rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ye shes stobs la zhugs// ting 'dzin sa ni tshul rnams
108a3(phal chen): kun gyis rab tu mnon// chos rnams 'byam klas gzhan dang gzhan la rab tu zhugs// rang gi byang chub spyod pa sngan chad spyad pa sten// de ltar zhing rnams kun tu bsam yas rnam 'phrul pa/ 
108a4(phal chen): phyogs rnams rgya che kun tu bkang ste rab tu bstan// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jug pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir// rgyal ba'i 'od zer sprin las yon tan legs smra 'byung // de nas byang chub
108a5(phal chen): sems dpa'i 'khor yod pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po lta zhing dbyangs kyi nga ro gcig tu de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag
108a6(phal chen): smras so// rgyal ba thams cad chos las skyes pa ste// smon lam kun gyis sangs rgyas rab tu byung // de bzhin nyid mnyam na mkha'i snying po ste// chos kyi sku yis rnam par rab tu mdzes// zhing rnams
108a7(phal chen): 'byam klas kun la bzhugs med kyang // kun tu bzang po'i 'khor rnams kun na snang // phyogs bcu kun tu yon tan grags pa khyab// ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba mnga'// rgyal ba thams
108a8(phal chen): cad sku thob phyir spyod pa// phyogs bcu'i yon tan rgya mtsho yod pa rnams// rdul sbubs kun tu de dag chud byas shing // zhing rnams kun tu rnam par rab tu mdzes// zhing rnams kun gyi rgyal ba'i
108b1(phal chen): zhabs drung na// rgyal sras ting nge 'dzin dang spyod pa dang / chos rnams kun la spyod cing gnas pa'i rnams// rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par kun kyang snang // chos kyi dbyings rnams lus kyis// 
108b2(phal chen): khyab byas shing // zhing rnams 'byam klas kun la shin tu zhugs// sems can rgya mtsho'i don du de spyod cing // rdul phran kun la chos kyi dbyings su bzhugs// chos kyi dbyings la de ltar
108b3(phal chen): zhugs nas kyang // rdul phran kun la mi zad tha mi dad// na mkha'i dbyings ni lus kyis gang byas shing // rgyal ba'i chos rnams yangs pa rab tu ston// yon tan rgya mtsho 'od kun gzhal du med// rnam
108b4(phal chen): yangs stobs chen 'od zer yon tan sprin// 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i da don du spyod byed cing // rgyal ba'i spyod lam gzhal du med pa da ston// gang gi don du bskal pa rgya mtsho dag/ mtha' yas par
108b5(phal chen): ni bzang po'i spyod spyad pa// de dag chos kyi dbyings rnams gang byas nas// thams cad chos kyi sprin las rab tu brjod// zhing rnams ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang // stobs bcu rnam
108b6(phal chen): kyang ji ltar 'byung 'gyur dang // sems can rgya mtsho ji ltar 'byung 'gyur ba// sems can rnams la sgra dbyangs gtong zhing ston// 'khor rnams yangs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang // kun tu bzang
108b7(phal chen): bo khyod la mngon sum gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyis gnang bar gyur pa yi// chos kyi 'khor lo ring khyod kyis bskor// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba
108b8(phal chen): las/ kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'dul ba rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste/ le'u gsum pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ 
109a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rnam par bltas/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ chos kyi
109a2(phal chen): dbyings rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas
109a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ dus rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par 'byung ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas/ sangs rgyas
109a4(phal chen): thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la rnam par bltas nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod ra ba thams cad la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ sangs
109a5(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'du zhing 'jig pa yongs su dag pa 'byung ba'i ye she sa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 
109a6(phal chen): rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las 'byung ba rgya mtsho mkhyen pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par
109a7(phal chen): gnas pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad mtha' dang dpung med par bstan pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis
109a8(phal chen): mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
109b1(phal chen): bsam pa dang dad pa dang / dbang po rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi skad cig gcig la/ dus thams cad kyi mnyam/ 
109b2(phal chen): pa nyid thug su chud pa'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho yang dag par bstan pa'i ye shes
109b3(phal chen): ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par dgod pa
109b4(phal chen): rab tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu bstan pa yongs su dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs
109b5(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' dang / dpung med pas rnam par snang ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang dpe
109b6(phal chen): byad bzang po yongs su dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa mtha' yas pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas
109b7(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa mdzad pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dpal rin po che'i
109b8(phal chen): 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho rnam par rgyu ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu 'grub pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 
110a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum yongs su bstan pas/ sems can rgya mtsho yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / gdul ba mdzad pa ni
110a2(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gdul ba rgya mtsho thams cad la brtson pa don yod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
110a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi sa la rab tu bzhugs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom
110a4(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu ni bsam gyis mi de khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par rgyu ba ni bsam gyis
110a5(phal chen): mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs la thub pa med pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgya sa bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mi bsnyengs pa zil gyis mi
110a6(phal chen): non pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la tha mi dad par spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
110a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' chen po'i ye shes rnam par dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 
110a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'phrogs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi
110b1(phal chen): byin du rlabs pas/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la gzud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la rab tu 'god
110b2(phal chen): ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
110b3(phal chen): gdung rjes su bsab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad du chos kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dad pa rgya mtsho tha dad pa ji lta ba bzhin
110b4(phal chen): du rab tu bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la sangs rgyas kyi tshe kyi tshul kun tu snang ba yang dag pa dar bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa
110b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gzhom pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'byung ba'i lam rnam par sbyang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
110b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir yang dag par bstan par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya
110b7(phal chen): mtsho rnams de bas kyang shin tu dga' bar bya ba dang / chos la dga' ba'i shugs thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / mos pa'i tshul yangs pa rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung bar bya ba
110b8(phal chen): dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / snying po sgo kun dang ldan pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam rgya mtsho la rab tu dgod par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi mig
111a1(phal chen): dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba yongasu sbyang ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang bar byed pa'i snying po shes rab chen po'i rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar bya ba
111a2(phal chen): dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i gzungs kyi stobs yang dag par bskyed pa dang / snying po byang chub thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang / de bzhin
111a3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul snang ba'i 'od chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dga' ba'i shugs rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
111a4(phal chen): 'di dag smras so// yon tan rgya mtsho rnams kyi ye shes zab/ mtha' dang dpung med des ni zhing rnams khyab// sems can bsam la sbyor ba ji bzhin snang // rnam par snang mdzad chos
111a5(phal chen): kyi 'khor lo'o// bsam gyis mi khyab rgya mtsho'i zhing yod pa// bskal pa rgya mtshor rgyal bas rnam sbyangs pas// sems/ can rgya mtsho yongs su smin bya'i phyir// sems can nang
111a6(phal chen): na rgyal ba rnam par mdzes// sems can rgya mtsho 'byung ba bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas yul la 'jug pa shin tu zab// srid pa'i gnas can dad pa chung ba yis// sangs rgyas byang chub shes
111a7(phal chen): par mi nus so// gzhan du gang rnams shin tu sems brtan cing // dge ba'i bshes kyis yongs su bzung ba dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlabs pa dag/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'di la
111a8(phal chen): rab tu 'jug/ gang rnams sems dag g.yo med sgyu med cing // snying rje'i bsam can khong nas byams dga' dang // dad pa che zhing rlabs chen de dag ni// 'di dag thos shing dga' ba thob par 'gyur// 
111b1(phal chen): kun tu bzang po'i smon lam sa dag dang // chos dbyings na mkha'i dbyings su khyab pa la// gnas shing spyod pa rab tu sus spyod pa// de dag rgyal ba'i spyod yul 'di shes so// gang gis rgyal ba'i
111b2(phal chen): rnam 'phrul 'di mthong ba'i// byang chub sems dpas thob bya legs par thob// gzhan gyi yul gyis shes par mi nus te// 'di ni kun tu bzang pos rtogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun
111b3(phal chen): gyis byin rlabs shing // 'gro ba mtha' dang dpung med 'di dag na// kun tu chos kyi 'khor lo rab 'khor ba// rnam par snang mdzad yul dang mthu yin no// bdag gi lus su zhing rnams thams
111b4(phal chen): cad kyang // rab tu zhugs shing de zhugs zhing rnams kun/ de dag spu rtse kun tu blta bar gyis// rgyal ba'i spyod de yul shin tu bshad par bya// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam
111b5(phal chen): spyod pa rnams// mtha' dang dpung med mngon par sgrub pa dang / kun tu mig gi yul dang lus ldan pa// de dag mgon po'i spyod yul 'di nyan to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ bcu po 'di/ 
111b6(phal chen): dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu ston pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// 
111b7(phal chen): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu rkyen shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas pa shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di
111b8(phal chen): lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyibs dang rnam pa shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi
112a1(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig
112a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ bskal pa
112a3(phal chen): mtha' yas pa'i rgyud rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa shin tu bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
112a4(phal chen): bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang
112a5(phal chen): ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras/ dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad ni rgyu
112a6(phal chen): dang rkyen la dmigs pa'i sgo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phrag bcus byung ngo // 'byung ngo // 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
112a7(phal chen): nga'i byin gyi rlabs dang chos nyid rab tu thob pa dang / sems can rnams kyi las kyi tshogs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par sgrub pa'i chos
112a8(phal chen): nyid dang / sems can rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag dang / bsod nams kyi rtsa ba skal ba 'thun pa bsags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhing yongasu dag
112b1(phal chen): pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pas rnam par bsgrubs pa'i smon lam gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i
112b2(phal chen): dbang rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / rgyu 'thun pas mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa khyu mchog
112b3(phal chen): gi mthu dbyung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams kyi smon lam gyis smon par 'phrul pa'i sgo'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa'i sgo bcu
112b4(phal chen): po 'di dag la sogs pa rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 'chi ngag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad byung ngo // 'byung ngo // 
112b5(phal chen): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byung ba shin tu/ bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas
112b6(phal chen): kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas ye shes yul ni bsam yas pas// byin rlabs rnam 'phrul de dag 'di lta bu// zhing rnams rgya mtsho bstan
112b7(phal chen): pa mtha' dpung med// rnam par snang mdzad chos kyis yongs su sbyangs// byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi bsam pa bzhin// smon lam rgya mtsho bsam yas rnam sbyangs shing // sems can las
112b8(phal chen): rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas pas// phyogs kun zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad 'byung // byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi rnam 'phrul dang // thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'i sgos// smon las
113a1(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad mngon bsgrubs shing // nam pa'i dbyings la 'byam klas zhing 'byung ngo // spyod pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dpung med rnams// spyod cing tshad med
113a2(phal chen): bde gshegs yul la 'jug/ phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun sbyong zhing // bskal pa mtha' yas zhing rnams re rer spyod// sems can bsam dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// las kyis
113a3(phal chen): zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad byung // nyon mongs las kyis de dag nyon mongs bcas// mos dang bsam pas rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam dag rgyan can rnams// rin
113a4(phal chen): chen rgyus byung sna tshogs dri med pa// dad pa rgya mtsho rnam par spel ba'i phyir// rgyal sras rnams ni phyogs bcur zhing rnams sbyong // chos dbyings rdul gyi khengs su rgyal sras
113a5(phal chen): rnams// kun tu bzang po'i spyad pa spyod pa dag/ rdul gyi khong / su mtha' yas zhing ston te// rnam dag mkha' bzhin mtha' dang dpung yang med// namakha'i dbyings 'dra'i rnam
113a6(phal chen): 'phrul 'di 'dra ste// snying po byang chub rgyal ba'i zhabs drung na// pad+mo'i stan 'khod kha dog mtha' yas kun// de dag zhing bcas lus kyi nang na 'khod// skad cig sems kyis dus gsum byung ba/ 
113a7(phal chen): yid/ zhing 'byung tshul dang 'jug pa kun kyang ston// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dus gsum zhing stan pa// rnam par snang mdzad rgya mtsho'i zhing mi zad// tshul gyi khyad par mtha' yas sna tshogs pas/ 
113a8(phal chen): rdul rnams kun la mtha' yas rgyan gyi rnams// sangs rgyas skad cig gcig la byin gyis rlob// rgyan gyi rnam pa tshul kun rab tu mkhyen// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la gnas pa shin tu/ 
113b1(phal chen): bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ rgyan thams cad kyi
113b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho kun la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni na mkha'i dbyings kyi gnas la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od// 
113b3(phal chen): zer gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin
113b4(phal chen): po che thams cad kyi kha dog gi mdog la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu gan so// 'jig
113b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sgyu ma lta bu'i las kyis byung ba lha ma yin dang mthu bo che lta bu'i lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la
113b6(phal chen): ni 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnaso// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus rgya mtsho la
113b7(phal chen): rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyis byung ba'i rgyan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas te/ de dag
113b8(phal chen): la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu gnas pa shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems
114a1(phal chen): dbu kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu gnas pa shin tu bstan pa'i don 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ de'i tshe
114a2(phal chen): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kun kyang zhing rnams rgya mtsho 'di dag rin chen rang bzhin dri med pa// rnam dag sna tshogs nor bu kun 'bar 'od zer rgya mtsho'i 'od ldan ltos// 'di dag rgyal
114a3(phal chen): ba'i byin rlab rgyu yis dbyibs legs 'khor bar rnam par snang // de dag gis ni phyogs bcu'i na mkha'i dbyings rnams gzhi kun rab tu khyab// zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la dri med 'od can na mkha'i
114a4(phal chen): dbyings la gnas// snang ba'i snying po 'od can nor bu'i rgya mtsho dadug la legs par gnas// 'gro ba de dbus rgyal ba da'akhor la chos kyi 'khor lo bzang po skor// 'di ni sangs rgyas
114a5(phal chen): yul yin sems can rgya chen shin tu mgu byed pa'o// la la me tog sgron ma kun tu rgyas pa'i mu tig nor bus brgyan / 'od zer dra ba'i kun nas sprin 'bar spos 'bro sprin gyi 'od can
114a6(phal chen): te// zhing mang mtha' dang dpung med rgya chen pad+mo'i rgya mtsho dag la gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab brgyan zhing rnams 'byam klas kun kyang rab tu mdzes// zhing rnams rgya mtsho dkyil 'khor dbyings
114a7(phal chen): rnams la la sangs rgyas byin la gnas// yangs shing rin chen mang ldan rgya che de dag byang chub sems dpas gang // lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho mang tshogs lha dbang lus la de bzhin gnas// de na bcom
114a8(phal chen): ldan rnam par snang ba mdzad kyi 'khor lo rtag tu 'khor// nor bu'i shing dang spos kyi 'phro'i sprin rnams mnyam pa'i dbyings la gnas// chu'i phung po dag dang rdo rje rgya mtsho brtan la'ang de bzhin gnas/ 
114b1(phal chen): la la gos dang brag dang rgyal mtshan me tog sna tshogs rgya mtsho dag la gnas// kun na'ang rnam 'phrul 'di dag rgya chen rnam par snang mdzad ston pa mdzad// zhing rnams ring dang thung dang glong gi gzugs
114b2(phal chen): dang rnam pa sna tshogs te// sna tshogs rgyan can snying po dri ma bral ba yongs dag dri med snang // rnam pa sna tshogs de dag smon lam rgya mtsho'i dbyings la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun nas
114b3(phal chen): yog par rtag tu na mkha'i dbyings la gnas// zhing rnams rgya mtsho 'byam klas la la spyi'u tshugs yod dang med la gnas// byang chub sems dpa'i cod pan rin chen 'khor los bzung bas dag par
114b4(phal chen): gnas// de nas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chen thams cad kun nas rab tu snang rin chen sangs rgyas gsung rnams kun tu gtong ldan las kyis de dag sprul// chos kyi dbyings
114b5(phal chen): mnyam zhing rnams 'byam klas mig yor sgyu ma dang yang 'dra// mig 'phrul rnam phye rnam dag dri med sems kyis shin tu/ bskyed pa ste// na mkha'i dbyings rnams sna tshogs rgyan gyi
114b6(phal chen): snying po gnas 'gyur 'di la snang // las kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab 'di dag bde bar gshegs pas bstan// skad cig sems kyis zhing rnams 'byam klas 'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa'i rnams// 
114b7(phal chen): zhing rdul kun la kun tu bzang po rtag par rab tu sgrub byed cing // de na bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba smin par bya phyir spyad pa spyod// chos dbyings rgyas par bkang ste de dag kun tu rnam 'phrul rgya che ston// / 
114b8(phal chen): rdul rnams kun na chos dbyings yangs pa'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang gnas// sangs rgyas sprin gyis byin gyis brlabs pas kun kyang yog cing yongs su rgyas// ji ltar rdul phran gcig la rnam
115a1(phal chen): sprul de bzhin 'gro ba kun na'o// rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgya chen rab tu ston pa mdzad// zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad mig yor lta bu sgyu ma smig
115a2(phal chen): rgyu 'dra// snang ba med cing 'byung mid phyogs bcu dag na 'gro dang 'ong ba med// mkha' la gnas pa de dag rtag par 'byung zhing 'jig par de bzhin 'gyur// shin tu yangs pa de dag smon lam rnam
115a3(phal chen): sbyangs las kyis yongs su bzung // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams kyi dbyibs ni rnam pa sna tshogs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la/ 
115a4(phal chen): la ni kun nus zlum po'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni kun nas gru bzhi'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni namakha'i rnam pa du mar
115a5(phal chen): rnam par phye ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni kun nas 'khyil pa'i dbyibs su 'dug/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni 'od 'phro ba
115a6(phal chen): ri'i dbyibasu 'dug go/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni shing sna tshogs kyi lhun gyi dbyibasu 'dug go/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni me tog sna tshogs kyi
115a7(phal chen): dbyibasu 'dug go/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni khyim sna tshogs kyi dbyibasu 'dug go/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyi
115a8(phal chen): dbying su 'dug go// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni mtshan sna tshogs kyi dbyibs su 'dug ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbyibs shin tu bstan pani/ 
115b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i dbyibs kyi tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongasu bstan pa'i phyir
115b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rnam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i zhing la ltos// rnam phye sna tshogs mtha'
115b3(phal chen): yas dbyibs su gnas// dbyibs kyis rnam par phye ba sna tshogs te/ phyogs rnams kun na zhing rnams rgya mtsho snang // la la zlum po la la zur gsum ste// de dag la la phyogs na
115b4(phal chen): gru bzhir gnas// nor bu pad+mo 'khor lo yan lag brgyad// / kun kyang las rnams rgya mtshos rnam par bris// rdul med 'od kyi dbyibs dang tshul 'dzin cing // gser las grub
115b5(phal chen): pa rnam phye sna tshogs te// sgo mang mtha' yas pa nas rgyu zhing 'jug/ las rnams rgya mtsho bsam pa dag pas/ gnas// zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs snying po can// nam
115b6(phal chen): mkha' 'di la ji ltar sprin gnas bzhin// de dag rin chen mang gzhi rnam par phye// de dag kun na sangs rgyas rnam par mdzes// zhing rnams 'di kun sems kyis rnam par brtags// sna
115b7(phal chen): tshogs rgyan dang snang bas kun na gnas// rnam par 'phrul pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad// bde dang sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa ni// rnam
115b8(phal chen): par dag dang nyon mongs tshul bzhin te// chos nyid 'di ni rtag tu yod pa yin// de ltar las rnams rgya mtsho bsam mi khyab// skra gcig rtse la bsam gyis mi khyab zhing // thams cad
116a1(phal chen): rdul snyed sna tshogs dbyibs su gnas// kun na sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs// 'khor rnams rgya mtsho chos rnams rab tu ston// rdul gcig
116a2(phal chen): rtse la phra dang yangs pa'i rnams// thams cad rdul snyed kha dog kun dang ldan// kha dog dbyibs rnams kun kyang rnam par brtags// de dag kun na rgyal ba'i 'khor lo 'khor// rdul
116a3(phal chen): rnams kun la rab tu zhing bstan pa// de dag smon lam rnam par sprul pa yin// na mkha'i dbyingasu las kyi sprul pa ni// sna tshogs sems dang bsam pa rnam par brtags// sems can
116a4(phal chen): kun mnyam rdul rnams thams cad la// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa dag/ rnam par snang mdzadad chos nyid de yin te// rdul phran kun la ning rnams
116a5(phal chen): shin tu gnas// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun dag ni gzhan dang gzhan du shes par bya ste// 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
116a6(phal chen): la la ni rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che gcig las rnam pa sna tshog su bkod pa'i rgyan gyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
116a7(phal chen): mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi lhun ca no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni 'od kha dog sna tshogs kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan thams cad kyi
116a8(phal chen): mdog gi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rdo rje'i gzhi mi shigs pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi brlabs kyi/ 
116b1(phal chen): lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che'i mtshan nyid kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi
116b2(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho la la ni nyi ma'i nor bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che shin tu phra ba 'dzin pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la
116b3(phal chen): la ni snang ba'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog 'od 'phro ba'i rnam pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dri dang kha dog sna
116b4(phal chen): tshogs kyi spos kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams de rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi cod dpan gyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni
116b5(phal chen): rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rgyan thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sems
116b6(phal chen): kyi rnam par rtog pa skad cig gis dmigs pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi rin po che'i dbyibs kyi
116b7(phal chen): lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung dbyangs
116b8(phal chen): rnam par dmigs pa'i lhun cano// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos// yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i lhun shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di nyid la rab tu gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ 
117a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la ni// rin chen rang
117a2(phal chen): bzhin kun nas gnas// rdo rje bzhin du mi shigs sra// rin chen pad+mo rnams la gnas// la la 'od zer rang bzhin te// dag cing gzung med 'od zer 'byung // rgyan rnams kun gyi 'od ce
117a3(phal chen): gyis/  sna tshogs mkha' bzhin dri ma med// la la 'od kyi rang bzhin te// dag cing 'od gras la zer la gnas// 'od kyi sprin can sna tshogs 'od// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas/ 
117a4(phal chen): zhing rnams rgya mtsho la la ni// mig yor lta bur gnas pa ste// / brjod du med cing gzung du med// smon lam dbang gis rab tu byung // la la nor bu mu tig rgyu// snying po thams cad rnam par
117a5(phal chen): 'bar// mu tig 'khor lo'i gzhi dag pa// byang chub sem/ sa dpas yongs su gang // rin chen 'od 'phro byung ba'i zhing // 'od 'dre'i sprin gyis mngon khebs shing // rin chen
117a6(phal chen): thams cad sna tshogs ldan// thams cad las kyis sprul pa yin// la la mtshan las byung ba ste// gzhi kun mtshan gyis kun tu bris// cod pan rnam pa sna tshogs bkod// sangs rgyas kun
117a7(phal chen): gyis mngon par sprul// rgya mtsho'i sems las byung ba yi// zhing rnams mos pa nyid la gnas// yul na mi gnas sgyu ma gzhin// yongs su rtog pas yang dag bskyed// sangs rgyas sku'i 'od
117a8(phal chen): zer gyi// nor bus sna tshogs kun tu gnas// sangs rgyas sprin rnams rnam par snang // sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu sprul// la la kun tu bzang po yis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho shin tu sprul// nam
117b1(phal chen): mkha'i rgyan rnams thams cad dang // smon lam rnams kyis rnam par bris// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
117b2(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar dmigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phros pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan
117b3(phal chen): gyi 'khor lo rjes su brjed cing rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi las rnam par smin pa rgya mtsho las rab tu byung ba'i rgyan
117b4(phal chen): dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cadakyi smon lam rgya mtsho'i glong yongasu ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di/ da lta ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs
117b5(phal chen): brnyan sna tshogs rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ sems kyi skad cig la bskal pa mtha' yas pararnam par 'phrul pa'i yul yongs su ston pa'i rgyan dang
117b6(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ rin po che dang / spos thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ 
117b7(phal chen): snying po byang chub kyi rgyan dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par ston pa'i rgyan dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang / spyod pa yongs su ston pa'i
117b8(phal chen): rgyan dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// de nas
118a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid yongasu bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ 
118a2(phal chen): phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rgya che mtha' yas te// rnam dag las kyi rnam pa sna tshogs gnas// phyogs bcu'i
118a3(phal chen): zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnams kun kyang // sna tshogs rgyan can yangs par kun nas gnas// kha dog sna tshogs yangs pa'i zhing gi rnams// rgya mtsho rtag par phyogs rnams kun tu 'byung // rgyun
118a4(phal chen): dang rin chen 'od 'phro sna tshogs sprin// sgra 'byin zhing gi dbyings rnams khebs par byed// byang chub sems dadapa'i yon tan rgya mtsho rnams// de dag kun kyang rgya mtsho'i
118a5(phal chen): zhing na grag/ sna tshogs rgyan dang smon lam sprin gyi rnams/ de dag zhing mang rgya mtshor sgra yang 'byin// 'gro ba'i las rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa dag/ rgyan gyi sprin rnams
118a6(phal chen): kun nas sgrar 'byin te// sems can de dag rnam smin ji 'dra ba// sangs rgyas byin gyis kun nas sgra yang sgrog/ dus gsum 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa yi// rnam 'phrul zhing rnams rgya mtsho
118a7(phal chen): kun na snang // dmigs pa re re la yang sangs rgyas kun// de 'dra'i zhing mang rgya mtsho'i rgyan la ltos// 'das pa'i bskal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs dang // phyogs bcu'i da ltar byung ba ji snyed pa'i// 
118a8(phal chen): bskal pa de dag rgyan mang yangs pa yang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho re re dag na snang // dmigs pa kun la sangs rgyas sprin gyi rnams// 'gro dang mnyam pas 'jig rten kun tu 'gengs/ 
118b1(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul zhing sems can rnam par 'dul// 'di ni zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam thar to// spos 'od sprin dang de bzhin me tog klong // rgyan rnams sna tshogs thams cad kun nas kyang // 
118b2(phal chen): rtag par kun tu khyab par rab tu 'byung // 'di ni zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam thar to// phyogs bcu kun gyi snying po byang chub rnams// sna tshogs rgyan canas kya ma lus par// thams cad rgya
118b3(phal chen): mtshe'i zhing 'di dbyings dag na// nam mkha'i sprin bzhin rnam par ston pa snang // rgyal sras kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi// zhing rnams mtha' yas 'byam klas rgyan gyi rnams// 'gro ba'i
118b4(phal chen): grangs snyed bskal pa rgya mtshor rnam sbyangs pa// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun nas rab tu snang // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i
118b5(phal chen): tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu/ phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad
118b6(phal chen): la brtan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas skal ba mnyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi bsod nams rgya chen po'i sprin rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems
118b7(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu brtan pa'i yul la rnam par spyod pa dang / 
118b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / yongs su sbyang ba dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyi
119a1(phal chen): dbyings la rab tu dgod cing gzung ba'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa dang / 'byung ba rgya mtsho la rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub
119a2(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa la
119a3(phal chen): rab tu 'jug pa dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshul yang dag par bsgrubs pa rnam par dag pa dang / de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs
119a4(phal chen): su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten
119a5(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'di nyid rnam par bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas
119a6(phal chen): te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad sna tshogs rgyan// smon lam tshul rnams rgya mtsho kun gyis byung // kha dog mtha' yas las kyi rgya
119a7(phal chen): mchos dag/ zhing rnams rgya mtsho rtag tu 'od mang 'gyed// sngan chad dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur cing // skal ba mnyam pa'i las dge yongs sbyangs te// snying rje byams pas
119a8(phal chen): 'gro yangs kun bkang zhing // zhing rnams rgya mtsho yangs pa 'di kun sbyangs// chos sgo kun tu ting 'dzin sa kun gyis// sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho yongs sbyangs te// bsam gtan
119b1(phal chen): tshul dang rnam thar sa sbyang zhing // zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs yangs pa byung // mos pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas stobs bskyed cing // rgyal ba'i mnyam nyid ma nor rtogs byas
119b2(phal chen): nas// bzod pa rgya mtsho'i tshul rnams yongs sbyangs shing // rnam dag kha dog mtha' yas zhing rnams byung // bsod nams sprin no nam mkha' mnyam bskyed cing // 'gro ba kun phan bde
119b3(phal chen): don spyod spyad de// bsod nams rgya mtsho sems can kun bstan pas// 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho kun kyang 'byung // zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed tshad med pa'i// pha rol
119b4(phal chen): phyin pa ma lus kun sbyangs te// smon lam mthar phyin mi zad goms byas pas// dri med rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams yangs pa 'byung // 'byung ba'i spyod pa gang yod tshad
119b5(phal chen): med dang // chos rnams thams cad yangs pa yongs sbyangs te// sna tshogs thabs sgos sems can sbyangs pas na// 'di 'dra'i yid 'ongs rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams
119b6(phal chen): 'byung // rgyan rnams kun gyi tshul dang sa sbyangs shing // rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho kun zhugs nas// 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal mtsho skams pas// zhing gi mtsho yangs 'di kun
119b7(phal chen): dag par 'gyur// stobs rnams rgya mtsho gzhal med yongs sbyangs shing // 'gro ba 'di 'dra tshad med rnam sbyangs te// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yangs kun bsnyen bkur bas// zhing rnams
119b8(phal chen): rgya mtsho rnam mang rnam par dag/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re rer sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin
120a1(phal chen): tu phra ba skyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku chung ngur kun tu ston to// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas 'drung ba la la ni chos kyi dbyings
120a2(phal chen): thams cad gzugs kyi skus gang bar ston to// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku tshe'i tshad mi ring ngo // sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sku tshe'i tshad ring ngo // sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sangs
120a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing cig yongs su dag par byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la
120a4(phal chen): ni tshul gcig gis bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis ra rlob bo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni tshul bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlob bo// 
120a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'byung ba la la ni sems can gyi khams nyung ngu/ rnam par gdul ba byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas 'byung / ba la la ni sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa rnam par gdul
120a6(phal chen): ba byin gyis rlob ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re rer sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// 
120a7(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i phyogs 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur
120a8(phal chen): rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal ba 'byung ba thabs rnams sna tshogs kyi// sgo nas zhing rnams rgya mtshor rab tu 'byung // de dag sems can
120b1(phal chen): bsam pa ji bzhin mkhyen// sangs rgyas thabs kyi sgo mang rgya mtsho'o// sangs rgyas chos sbubasam gyis mi khyab ste// mig yor ma yin mtshan nyid med pa'i gzugs// gzugs kyi/ 
120b2(phal chen): khyad par 'gro ba 'di dag tu// sems can bsam pa'i phyogs bzhin ston la ltos// sku tshe thung bar la la rnam par ston// la la bskal pa bsam yas byin gyis rlob// chos kyi sku ni phyogs
120b3(phal chen): rnams kun gyi sgo// rab tu mdzes par 'gro nang 'di na bzhugs// la la zhing rnams rgya mtsho bas ma yas dag/ skyeng zhing 'byam klas phyogs bcu kun na yang // la la zhing gcig rnam par
120b4(phal chen): sbyong bar mdzad// smon lam ma lus kun kyang tshul gci/ dag go// la la bsam gyis mi khyab theg pa'i rgyan// sems can yid bzhin sangs rgyas ston pa mdzad// la la
120b5(phal chen): theg pa gcig kyang rab ston te// rgyal ba'i thabs ni gcig kyang mtha' yas so// rang byung la la byang chub sangs rgyas nas// sems can mi mang lam la gzhog
120b6(phal chen): pa mdzad// la la skad cig gcig gis sems can rnams// rgya mtsho bsam yas byang chub don tu 'dul// la la spu'i sgo nas bsam yas pa'i// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sprin
120b7(phal chen): rnams rab tu 'gyed// 'gro ba kun tu de dag mngon bkang zhing // thabs kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul ba mdzad// la la sangs rgyas gsung gis kun bkang zhing // zhing du sems can yid bzhin
120b8(phal chen): rab tu sgrog/ bsam yas bskal par de dag gsung sgrog cing // sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas rnam par 'dul// la la zhing rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ste// 'khor rnams yongs
121a1(phal chen): dag kun nas 'khod bcas pas// zhing mang rgya mtsho phyogs su gang byas shing // sangs rgyas mkha' la sprin ltar khyab par bzhugs// de ltar sangs rgyas thabs/ 
121a2(phal chen): ni bsam mi khyab// zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun tu rgyas bkang zhing // 'gro ba kun la sangs rgyas mngon sum ste// sna tshogs rgyan mang du ma'i tshul dang ldan// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la
121a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste// 'di ltar zhing rgya mtsho
121a4(phal chen): la la ni bskal pa grangs med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// / zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa tshad med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa dpag tu
121a5(phal chen): med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa mtshungs pa med par
121a6(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa kun nas mtha' yas par byin gyis rlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa kun nas mu med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing
121a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa gzhal du med par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// zhing rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa brjod du med par byin gyis brlabs pa ste// de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams
121a8(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis tshul shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jig
121b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi tshul shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe/ 
121b2(phal chen): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten rgya mtsho bskal pa tha dad de// sna tshogs tshul 'jug rgyan rnams gzhan dang gzhan// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun na snang / 
121b3(phal chen): bskal pa'i tshul ni rgya mtsho grangs kyang med// bskal pa mi mthun 'gro ba kun dang mnyam// phyogs dbyings 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams na snang // bskal pa mtha' yas la la ring dang thung // 
121b4(phal chen): bskal pa sna tshogs rgyal ba'i sgras kyang bsgrags// rgya mtsho nga'i zhing rnams 'di dag phyogs dbyings snang // byin rlabs bskal pa zhing rdul snyed dang ldan// la la gzhan rnams
121b5(phal chen): bskal pa gcig gis 'jug/ la la bskal grangs smon lam du mas byung // bskal pa la la dri med la la nyon mongs can// la la rnam dag la la nyon mongs rnam
121b6(phal chen): par gnas// bskal pa'i ming ni smon lam rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis byung // sems can 'du shes rnam pas tha dad tshul la 'jug/ bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed sngan chad spyod spyad pas/ 
121b7(phal chen): 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho shin tu yangs shing dag/ de dag kun nas sangs rgyas yul rgyan tshad kyang med// 'di dag rgya chen bskal par 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams/ 
121b8(phal chen): bskal pa'i 'od dang 'od zer rin chen ming sna tshogs// bcom ldan 'das dang 'od mnyam 'od 'phro'i mig snang ba// snang dang dri med bzang po bskal pa'i ming la 'jug/ bskal pa 'di dag rnam
122a1(phal chen): dag bskal pa kun las byung // dri med bskal pa la lar sangs rgyas gcig skye'o// bskal pa la lar mi'i gtso bo mtha' yas 'byung // bskal pa'i tshul
122a2(phal chen): rnams thams cad sa tshul zad mi shes// smon lam stobs mthus bskal pa sna tshogs 'jug par 'gyur// bskal pa la la mtha' yas rnams kyang bskal pa gcig tu 'dus// bskal pa/ 
122a3(phal chen): la la gcig kyang bskal pa bye ba'i mthu// bskal pa rgya mtsho kun kyang sna tshogs sgo nas 'jug/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi nang nas sgra yang 'byin// bskal pa la lar bskal
122a4(phal chen): ba kun gyi rgyan kyang 'byung // ming gi rgyan rnams rnam par dag pa'ang de la yod// bskal pa la la sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mthu yis byung // bskal pa'i tshul
122a5(phal chen): rnams kun gyi 'di ni rgyan yangs yin// zhing dang bskal pa rgya mtsho tshul ni gcig gis dag/ zhing gi rdul rnam sa kun kyang tshad med gzhal du med// skad cig yud tsam
122a6(phal chen): nyi ma'i grangs kyi bskal par 'gyur// 'di dag thams cad sems can 'du shes rnam par 'byung // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag bskal pas mtha' yas pa'i
122a7(phal chen): rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ 'di ltar chos nyid rab tu thob pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag bskal pas 'jig cing 'du
122a8(phal chen): ba la rab tu 'jug par gnas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pas bskal pa mtha' yas pa kun nas gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste
122b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho rgya chen po bsags pa/ rnam par dag pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kun nas nyon mongs la rnam
122b2(phal chen): par dag par gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' mos pa sna tshogs kyis spyod pa rnams skya bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnam par dag la kun nas nyon mongs par gnas pa
122b3(phal chen): dang / 'di lta ste sems can rgya mtsho rgya chen po byang chub kyi sems la gnas pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu dag par gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams
122b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan du 'dong bas dbaskal ba rgyan tha dad pa'i tshul du gnas pa dang / 'di dalta ste phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ 'jig
122b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtshor 'dus pas/ bskal pa mtha' yas pa rgyan shin tu mang por kun nas gnas/ pa dang / 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya
122b6(phal chen): ngan las 'da' bas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi rgyan nub par 'gyur ba dang / 'di lta ste sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams rgyan gyis brgyan par kun nas
122b7(phal chen): gnas pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa mtha' yas pa yongs su dag par gnas pa dang / de dag la sogs
122b8(phal chen): pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskal pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i rgyud kyi tshul rgya mtsho kun nas gnas pa'i tshul ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// 
123a1(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bskul pa mtha' yas pa'i tshul rgyu mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir
123a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ning rnams rgya mtsho'i chos nyid 'di dag ltos// chos kyis byung
123a3(phal chen): ste ji ltar gnas pa ltar// de dag 'byung zhing 'jig par 'gyur bar yang // zhing rnams rgya mtshothams cad rab tu snang // sems can nyon mongs mi bzang ldan pa dang // las dang / 
123a4(phal chen): nyon mongs ngan pas bsgribs pa'i rnams// de dag dbasamal zhing gi rgya mtsho rnams// kun nas nyon mongs da ldan par gyur pa yin// sems can rnam dag bsam pa
123a5(phal chen): ldan pa dang // bsod nams brtan dang rnam dag spyod yul can// rnam dag yul la nyon mongs ldan gyur// rnams// de dag mos pa sna tshogs spyod yul gyi// 
123a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i dus dag na// bskal pa de ni rnam par dag par snang // sems can nyon mongs ldan par gyur pa yang // de'i chos nyid bsam yas yangs pa yi// byang
123a7(phal chen): chub bsam pa ji ltar bskyed pa dang // de dag bsam pa ji ltar rnam 'phel bas// de bzhin bskal pa rgya mtsho mang pi dag/ bsam gyis mi khyab zhing rgyan yongs su sbyong // bye ba mang po
123a8(phal chen): mtha' yas mi zad pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu kun rgyu yang // rgyan la rnam pa tha dad yod pa min// bskal pa tha dang tshul gyi bye brag snang // rdul rnams re re sbubs su
123b1(phal chen): sa na tu// rangs rgyas zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa yi// rgyal skus ji tshul 'dod bde bzhin du/ zhing rnams rgya mchod rdul dag par gyur/ gral te rgyal ba rnams ni
123b2(phal chen): 'gyur na// zhing rnams rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan par 'gyur// bsam pa yongs dag de bzhin rgyas 'gyur te// 'di ni zhing rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o// gal te rgyal ba mya ngan 'das 'gyur
123b3(phal chen): na// de tshad zhing rgyan rnams 'grib par 'gyur// sems can rnams kyang snod du rung ba min// zhing gi rgya mtsho yang nyon mongs ldan// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul yangs pa dag/ 
123b4(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab gang tshe ston pa na// de che zhing rnam des rgya mtsho mang po dag/ kun kyang rgyan gyis rnam parabargyan par 'gyur// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig
123b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya ste/ de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 'das
123b6(phal chen): pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// de ni 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi
123b7(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu
123b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas skye zhing 'byung ba tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi snying po byang chub thams cad nas/ chos kyi dbyings kyis phyogs rgyas par 'ges
124a1(phal chen): pa tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta
124a2(phal chen): ste 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gangs pa tha mi dad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams
124a3(phal chen): cad kyi sprul pa'i sprin dang / mtshan gyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bskal pa mtha' yas
124a4(phal chen): par brjod cing rgyas par bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu chos dkyi 'khor lo'i tshul tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig
124a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag tu rdul shin tu phra gcig la 'jigarten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su 'du ba tha mi dad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
124a6(phal chen): mtshe dag tu rdul 'byam klas pa thams cad la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po ston cing rjod pa tha mi dad pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams
124a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa'i tshul// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
124a8(phal chen): tha mi dad pa'i tshul rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa 'di nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag
124b1(phal chen): smras so// rdul gcig steng na zhing mang rgya mtsho ste// kun na rgyan mang rnam dag kun yod kyang // gnod pa med cing 'dre ba gang yang med// 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'di la ltos/ 
124b2(phal chen): rdul rnams kun la bsam yas sangs rgyas bzhugs// sems can kun gyi bsam pa yid bzhin du// zhing rnams rgya mtsho thams cad khyab byas kyang // de dag thabs la tha dad gang yang med// rdul
124b3(phal chen): rnams kun la shing dbang mtha' yas pa// sna tshogs rgyan phyung kun nas bres sbyangs te// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing du mngon bkang yang // de dag tha dad 'gyur ba nam yang med// rdul phran
124b4(phal chen): rgya mtsho rdul phran re re la// mi'i gtso bo 'khor rnams kun bskor cing // 'jig rten kun tu bkang ste 'phags bzhugs kyang // gnod pa dag dang 'dre ba'i nyes pa
124b5(phal chen): med// rdul gcig la ni mtha' yas 'od kyi sprin/ phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho kun bkang zhing / bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub spyod bstan kyang // rgya
124b6(phal chen): mtsho'i zhing rnams tha dad gang yang med// rdul rnams kun la kha dog bsam mi khyab// sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun tu gang byas te// sangs rgyas sprul pas sems can rnams 'dul yang // 
124b7(phal chen): 'byam klas phyogs na tha dad gang yang med// rdul rnams kun la rgya mtsho'i chos brjod de// de dag 'khor lo tshul bzhin 'khor mdzad cing // thabs dang mthu'i sgo mo sna tshogs kyis// thams
124b8(phal chen): cad brjod kyang de la tha dad med// rdul gcig la ni rgyal ba kun gyis gsung // 'gro ba snod du gyur la de dag brjod byas te// rgya mtsho'i zhing du bskal par byin brlabs kyang // de dag gsung
125a1(phal chen): gi yan lag tha mi dad// zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas rgyan gyi rnams// thams cad rdul sbubs gcig tu rab tu 'jud// rgyal ba rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul
125a2(phal chen): mthu la ltos// las kyi dngos las de dag skyes pa min// rdul gcig la ni dus gsum rgyal ba dag/ ji ltar byung ba de dag thams cad snang // de dag gshegs dang byon pa gang yang med/ 
125a3(phal chen): 'gro ba kun na sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa'i phyogs gsal bar bya
125a4(phal chen): ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u bzhi pa'o// / bam po brgyad pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang
125a5(phal chen): snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di bcom ldan 'ad/ sa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bskal pa rgya
125a6(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su dag par byas te/ bskal pa re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba
125a7(phal chen): snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung du smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su dag par byas so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
125a8(phal chen): mcho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa de ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis shin tu bzung ba ste/ de la rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'og ma ni/ ga ni/ 
125b1(phal chen): kun nas rton pa zhes bya ste/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar bas brgyan pa'i gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de
125b2(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po 'od rnam par dag pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzhis ston to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che'i mthu zhes bya ba yod de/ rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i gzhis rton
125b3(phal chen): to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'od 'phro mnyam par rton pa zhes bya ba yod de/ nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi
125b4(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rgyan kun nas rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba yod de// 'od zer gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi me tog gi gzhis rten to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhi kun nas
125b5(phal chen): dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ me tog thams cad 'od 'phro ba'i seng ge'i khri'i gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor phyogs su sgra sgrog cing kun
125b6(phal chen): tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba yod de/ mu tog dang man shel gyi rgyal mtshan sna tshogs kyi gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor rin po che thams cad 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ nor bu'i
125b7(phal chen): rgyal po'i shing dang me tog sna tshogs kyi glong gi gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun nas 'dzin pa'i shugs zhes bya ba yod de/ spos kyi nor bu thams cad kyi ri rab kyi
125b8(phal chen): sprin gyi gzhis rton to// de'i steng na rlung gi dkyil 'khor khyim kun tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba yod de/ rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang / spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyi gzhis rton to// 
126a1(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag thams cad kyi steng ma ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid bzang po dpal
126a2(phal chen): gyi snying po zhes bya ste/ nor bu kun nas snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i spos kyi chu rgya mtsho'i gzhis rton to// spos kyi chu rgya mtsho nor bu kun nas snang ba'i gzhis brgyan pa'i snying po zhes bya ba de las
126a3(phal chen): pad mo chen po spos kyi rgyal mtshan khyer ba'i 'od zer dang / ze ba sna tshogs shes bya ba mngon par 'byung ste/ pad mo chen po de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan
126a4(phal chen): gyi brgyan pa kun nas gru bzhir 'dug pa/ rnam par dag pashin tu brtan pa/ rdo rje dang nor bu thams cad kyi khor da yug gis bskor ba/ rim gyis gzhol bar gnas pa
126a5(phal chen): shing gi rgyud rgya mtsho sa la rab tu gnas pa 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang snying po me tog gi
126a6(phal chen): rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'di nyid kyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i phyogs 'di nyid brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe
126a7(phal chen): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gzhi rgyan me tog 'jog rten khams kyi rgya mchod// rin chen kun gyi snying po kha deg sna tshogs te// rdul rnams kun dang mnyam pa'i
126a8(phal chen): sngan chad sangs rgyas kyi// drung du sngon tshe rgya mtshor sbyangs pas dri ma med// rgya chen snying rje'i sprin gyis khams rnams kun bkang zhing // zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa'i lus kyang
126b1(phal chen): kun btang nas// sngon gyi bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod pa spyad pas na// 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i khams de yangs shing rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang bas smon lam che mdzad de/ 
126b2(phal chen): 'od snang btang ba mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa ni// rlung gi phung pos btab kyang mi skyod mi g.yo ste// nor bu kun rgyan sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan snying po'o// me tog mdzod bkye gtor ba
126b3(phal chen): rin chen yid 'ong bzhin// sngon gyi smon lam dbang gis mkha'i dbyings la gnas// rgya mtsho'i rgyan rnams thams cad sna tshogs brtan par gnas// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun
126b4(phal chen): tu 'od kyi sprin kyang gtong // nor bu thams cad sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam// byung zhing 'od zer sprin 'bar phyogs rnams kun tu 'dong // 'od zer me tog
126b5(phal chen): chen dang 'od zer 'khor lo'i tshegs// phyogs rnams ma lus kun gyi chos dbyings khyab par byed// rin chen kun gyis 'od zer sprin rnams bkye ba ni// phyogs dang
126b6(phal chen): phyogs mtshams kun gyi zhing rnams khyab par byed// sdug bsngal thams cad bcil zhing byang chub mchog la 'god// 'jig rten rgya mtsho thams cad 'od 'phro rab tu 'bar// 'gro ba kun
126b7(phal chen): dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa sna tshogs rnams// rin chen kun dang spu rnams kun nas rgyal ba 'gyed// brgya byin dag dang tshangs pa'ang 'khor lo sgyu 'dra dang / 'gro ba kun gyi lus su lus
126b8(phal chen): rnams kun kyang gnas// sprul pas 'od bkye chos kyi dbyings kyi tshad mnyam pa// 'od zer sgo nas sangs rgyas thams cad mtshan kyang sgrog/ 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi bsam pa tshim
127a1(phal chen): byas nas// tshul rnams sna tshogs sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul// 'jig rten rgya mtsho me tog snying po de nang na// rdul phran kun gyi khongs/ 
127a2(phal chen): na chos dbyings thams cad kyi// rin chen 'od bkye sangs rgyas sprin rnams 'bar bar snang // rnam pa snang mdzad rnam par 'phrul pa'i zhing la ltos// bskal pa rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sdug
127a3(phal chen): bsngal bsal byas te// smon lam yangs pa'i sprin ni chos kyi dbyings mnyam dang // bzang po'i spyod pa brnyes shing ye shes sa ldan pa'i// dgongs pa las ni rgyan mdzes de dag byung
127a4(phal chen): ba yin// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas dngol po che zhes bya ba las 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchog zhi dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i yon tan
127a5(phal chen): rgya mtsho yongs su dag pas snang ba zhes bya ba ste/ le'u lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gzhi dang / 
127a6(phal chen): snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i 'khor yug chen po ni nor bu'i rgyal po pad+mo nyi ma'i gzhi la brten pa ste/ nor bu'i rigs rgya mtsho spos kyi tsan dan thams cad las grub pa nor bu'i
127a7(phal chen): rgyal po rgyan gyi yul thams cad kyis lhun shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis gnon pa nor bu'i spos zhim po gzi brjid kyi 'khor lo rnam par snang ba'i snying po can/ nor bu'i rgyal po/ 
127a8(phal chen): rdo rje sra zhing mi shigs pa ltar shin tu mkhregs shing sra ba rin po che'i chu thams cad kun nas 'byung ba rin po che'i shing gi nags tshal gyi rgyan thams cad me tog shin tu rgyas pa
127b1(phal chen): spos kyi rtsi mchog bzang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ spos kyi me tog dpal can shin tu bzang bas rnam par brgyan pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs
127b2(phal chen): lta bu'i dra bas kun nas bres pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa rgyan bzang po'i rnam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba bsnyed kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o// de nas byang chub sems
127b3(phal chen): dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'khor yug gi rgyan dang / yon tan yongs su dag pa 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i
127b4(phal chen): tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'jig rten khams rnams rgya mtsho gang yod pa// mtha' dang dpung de med sna tshogs rnam pa can// nor bu mang pos rnam dag mtha'/ 
127b5(phal chen): yas mdog/ de dag sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pas byung // dri med khor yug rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni/ nor bu mang po de bzhin spos mang dang // mu tig gsal ba'i
127b6(phal chen): tshogs la rab tu gnas// kha dog mtha' yas rin chen rnams kyis brtan// snying po nor bu'i sprin sna tshogs sra// 'dzam bu chu klung 'od 'phro snying po'i tshogs// 'od 'phro dam pa phyogs su snang
127b7(phal chen): zhing 'tsher// khor yug dri ma med pa rnam par mdzes// nor bu rdo rjes 'dus byas shin tu sra shing brten// mtshams rnams mi phyed nor bu sna tshogs 'brul// mtshan ldan nor bu rin chen
127b8(phal chen): rnam bkod pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis yongs su dag par snang // spos chu'i sprin gyis kha dog mthara' yas te// rin chen can dan me tog kun tu bgram// pad mo sna tshogs gos kyis
128a1(phal chen): kun nas yog/ rin chen gyi mchog dri ni ma rnams dang ldan// sna tshogs shing gi sprin gyis kun nas brgyan// nor bzang kun gyis kun nas gzi brjid 'bar/ 
128a2(phal chen): 'od zer sprin gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can// gos kyi mdzod kyis shin tu 'bar bar gnas// spos kyi 'od 'phro bdug pa'i gdugs 'chang ba'i// byang chub sems dpa' mang pos chos
128a3(phal chen): dbyings gang // sgra dbyangs mang po rgya mtsho thams cad 'byin/ 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad chos 'khor lo// rin chen mdzes pa de dag thams cad dang // nor bu dag dang kun nas 'od 'dro'i shing / 
128a4(phal chen): kun la rnam par snang mdzad sku gsal ba// gzugs brnyan tshul tu nang na yod pa snang // thams cad gzugs su sku rnams mtha' yas te// sangs rgyas sprul mang kha dog
