128a5(phal chen): mu med pa// thams cad phyogs dang chos kyi dbyings bkang zhing // sems can mang po tshad med rnam par 'dul/ thams cad rgyan las sgra dbyangs kun 'byung ste// rnam par
128a6(phal chen): snang mdzad smon lam 'khor lo yis// zhing rnams rgya mtsho yongs su dag byas pa// de kun de las rnam par 'phrul zhing grag/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 
128a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i khor yug gi rgyan rgya mtsho shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la khor yug chen po
128a8(phal chen): de'i nang na 'jig gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa chen po'i gzhi ni/ nor bu mang po'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje ltar shin tu 'khregs shing sral brtan pa/ rin po che'i rigs thams
128b1(phal chen): cad las grub pa/ rgya mchos rnam par phye ba mi shigs pa'i snying po can/ mi mthong mi dma' ba'i thang mnyam zhing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang 'od thams cad kyis rab
128b2(phal chen): tu brgyan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs lta bu'i nor bu'i gzugs sna tshogs kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa/ rin po che'i tshon thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che yid du
128b3(phal chen): 'ong ba'i pad mo thams cad kyis gni byas pa/ dmigs pa thams cad du sna tshogs su gyur pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po spos kyi mdzod thams cad kyis gzhi mnyam
128b4(phal chen): bar bdal ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin dgashegs pa'i zhing gi rgyan gyi sprin gyi dra ba rnam par bres pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul
128b5(phal chen): gyi 'od dang / nor bu'i dra ba mig 'phrul lta bu rnam par bya ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa sa'i dkyil 'khor de'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten
128b6(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi'i rgyan rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su brjod pa'i phyir sangs
128b7(phal chen): rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa'i dkyil 'khor gzhi ni rnam dag mnyam// 'khor lo'i dra bas
128b8(phal chen): bsgrubs pas mi shigs sra// rin chen sna tshogs mnyam pa'i gzhir gnas shing // rin chen sna tshogs kun gyis kun tu gang // yid 'ongs ni rdo rje gser gyi gzhi// rin chen chu/ 
129a1(phal chen): ba ri bo'i 'khor los bsgrubs// pad+mod kyil 'khor gzhi yin me togs// tsan dan phye ma rin chen kun tu bkram// 'od zer sna tshogs rin chen me tog
129a2(phal chen): rnams/ 'od 'phro 'gyed pas phyogs su smin kyang 'bar// sangs rgyas 'od snang nor bu rnam par bkram// sa kun me tog yid du 'ong bas yog/ thams cad sprin ni phyogs na sdug lding bas/ 
129a3(phal chen): mi zad yangs pa kun nas khabs par 'dug/ zhing rnams thams cad phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing // sangs rgyas chos ni snyan par rab tu sgrog/ rin chen nang snang sangs rgyas smon lam
129a4(phal chen): kun// shin tu dus ring rtag tu kun tu ston// sngan chad spyod pa ji 'dra spyod pa dag/ kun kyang nor bu'i 'bru las gsal bar snang / de rgya mtshonor bu sna chags gting / de'i nang
129a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas spyod yul snang / sangs rgyas spyod yul de dag zhing gi rnams// rgya mtsho kun gyi rdul phran re rer snang // me tog snying po tshon gyi 'khor los bsgrubs// der ni byang chub sems
129a6(phal chen): dpa' rtag 'dong zhing / byang chub sems dpa' rtag 'dang zhang // byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam kun kyang sgrog/ snying po byang chub 'khor du rnam 'phrul lo// rin chen 'od zer 'od dang
129a7(phal chen): ldan pa dag/ sa'i nor bu rgyan las rab tu 'byung // sangs rgyas chos nyid 'di yang rtag tu ston// chos dbyings na mkha' lta bu kun tu 'gengs// sangs rgyas kun yul ye shes rgya
129a8(phal chen): chen dang // kun tu bzang po'i smon lam sus shes pa// de dag phyogs rnams rgya mtsho kun tu yang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho dbyings kyi 'phrul la 'jug/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ 
129b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas ngal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sa'i gzhi'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la
129b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzhi sa'i dkyil 'khor de la spos chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ de dag kun kyang gzhi rin po che thams cad kyi
129b3(phal chen): rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po dang spos thams cad kyis klung rab tu bsgrubs pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po bzang zhing yid du 'ong ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba'i dra bas kun nas bres pa'o// 
129b4(phal chen): rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang mchog tu snang ba'i spos kyi/ chus yongs su rgyas pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi me tog sna tshogs klong du khyil pa'o// tsan dan gyi phye ma
129b5(phal chen): dang 'dres pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang / smon lam rgya mtsho'i sgra 'byin pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor
129b6(phal chen): gyi sprin rnam par snang ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin me tog sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bur rab tu 'gyed pa'o// kha dog dang dbyibs mtha' yas pa'i gdugs kyis khebs par rnam
129b7(phal chen): bar 'phrul pas brgyan pa'o// dmigs pa thams cad la 'jig rten gyi khams mang po rgya chen po thams cad snang ba'o// phyogs kun nas rin po che'i them skas kyi phreng ba bcur rab tu bkye
129b8(phal chen): ba'o// mu tig rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i mu khyud kyis kun nas bskor ba'o// rin po che shel gyi rgyal mtshan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa bcus kun nas brgyan pa'o// 
130a1(phal chen): 'di lta ste nor bu dang me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa chu klung gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kha dog mtha' yas pa bcus kun nas bskor ba'o// 'di lta ste nor bu thams/ 
130a2(phal chen): cad kyi pad mo yid du 'ong ba'i grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba'o// 'di lta ste nor bu rdo rje shin tu sra ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
130a3(phal chen): kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa'o// rin po che thams cad kyi me tog pun da ri ka dang / spos kyi chu yongasu rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba'o// 'di lta ste rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba rin po che 'bar zhing
130a4(phal chen): kun nas 'phyang ba'i nor du'i 'dra ba can gling bzhi'i 'jig rten dgyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba'o// tsan dan dang spos dang / nor bu mang po
130a5(phal chen): sgra thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag gis rnam par snang bar byas pa/ chu klung gangaga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis 'gram shin tu brgyan pa'o// 'di
130a6(phal chen): lha ste rin po che dang / gos dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu mang po thams cad kyi sgra 'byung bas rgyan shin tu rgyas pa'o// rin po che yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu thams cad kyi rab bye ba khrag
130a7(phal chen): khrig brgya stong brjod du med pas kun nas bskor ba'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin
130a8(phal chen): gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sa stengs de na spos kyi chu bo yis// rgya mtsho nor bus brgyan pa rnam brjod de// gzhi
130b1(phal chen): rnams rin chen gos kyis kun bting ba// mi shigs rdo rje la bu sra ning mdzes// spos dang nor bu'i rgyal po mang po dang // nyi ma'i nor bu 'od 'gro sdug sbyin dang // pad mo rin chen phreng bal/ 
130b2(phal chen): kun nas bres// gzhi rnams dri med yid du 'ong ba'o// spos kyi chu yis yongs su rgyas pa ste// rin chen 'od zer sna tshogs me tog glong sgra dbyangs rab tu gtong ba'i dbyangs kyis kyang // sangs
130b3(phal chen): rgyas rnam par 'dul pa rab tu sgrog/ thim skas phreng ba yid du'ong dang ldan// gnon rin chen nor bu mang pos brgyan// stegs bu kun bkod rin chen pad mo yi// sprin sdug
130b4(phal chen): dra ba rnam par bres pa ste// rin chen nor bu'i shing gi phreng rab dag/ rin chen gser gyi kha dog yid 'ongs 'bar// 'od kyi tshogs dang rol mo'i sgra dag kyang // rnam par 'phrul
130b5(phal chen): mang dbyangs su rab tu sgrog/ spos chus yongs gang rin chen bsgrubs pa ste// me tog pun da rikas kun nas bskor// spros dang 'od dang gdugs spos 'od
130b6(phal chen): zer 'gyod// de dag 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par yangs// rin chen rgyal mtshan mu tig 'bar ba can// gos dang nor bu sna tshogs kun 'phyang zhing // rin chen nor bu'i dril bu dra ba dag/ 
130b7(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen par 'jug pa'i sgra yang sgrog/ pad mo'i grong khyer rnams kyis kun nas bskor// kha dog mtha' yas nor bus rnam par brgyan// phyogs rnams kun nas mu tig sprin bkye ba'i/ 
130b8(phal chen): grong khyer rgya mtshos de dag rab tu brgyan// dra ba bzang pos kun nas bskor ba ste// rin chen byas pa'i gzugs bzang khyim gyi rnams// rnam pa du mar 'bar zhing yid 'ong ba'i// grong khyer
131a1(phal chen): rgya mtshos bzang ning mdzes par rab tu rgyan// sngan chad rnam par snang mdzad kyi// sna tshogs rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams yongs sbyangs pa// shin tu rgya che mtha' dang dpung
131a2(phal chen): med pa'ang // de dag kun na rnam par 'phrul pa byed// spos chu rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang spos chu'i chu klung g.yas phyogs su 'khor zhing 'bab pa gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu
131a3(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyis 'khor byas pa ste// spos chu'i chu klung de dag thams cad kyang / 'khor kun nas rdo rje'i pad mo kha dos dri mtha' yas pas bsgrubs pa'o// nor bu'i 'khor lo dang / nor bu'i 'od
131a4(phal chen): rnam par dag pa sna tshogs kyis mtha' kun nas dkris pa'o// / sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rin po che thams de cad kyi kha dog lta bus rnam par snang bar byas pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin
131a5(phal chen): dang ldan pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs sgrogapa'i dril bu'i dra ba rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pas kun nas khebs pa'o// spyod pa'i 'od kyi glong
131a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs lta bu rab tu 'byung ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad nang na snang zhing 'od shin tu 'bar ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho lta bur snang ba thams cad kyis
131a7(phal chen): shin tu yog par byas pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rnam par snang ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i snying po'i me tog shin tu rgyas pas kun nas
131a8(phal chen): khebs pa'o// dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan gyi 'khor lo dbyangs su sgrog pa'o// spos kyi chu dang rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi 'od dang // 'od zer
131b1(phal chen): gyi smin rab tu 'byung ba ste/ chu klung de dag re re shing yang rgyun shin tu bstan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// de nas byang chub sems dnga' kun tu bzang pos yang
131b2(phal chen): spos chu'i chu klung gi rgyan dang / yon tan rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
131b3(phal chen): smras so// chu klung dri ma med pa'i chus rgyas shing // gzhi ni nor bu'i rdo rje pad mos byas// rin chen mang po'i sil bus gzhi bkram zhing // kun nas brgyan pa sna tshogs yid du 'ong // them
131b4(phal chen): skas phreng bas de dag kun nas bskor// pad mo 'phyang ba'i dmu khyud 'khor can te// me tog brgyan pa'i mu trig daphreng ba dang // me tog lnga ldis sna tshogs kun nas bres/ 
131b5(phal chen): nor bu'i chu bo spos chu 'byung ba ni// rin chen kun gyi kha dog mdog ltar 'bab// rin chen nor bu me tog mdzes par bkod// sil snyan sgra ni sangs rgyas gsung skad rjod/ 
131b6(phal chen): de dag rnyog pa nor bu zla ba ste// rin chen sna tshogs thams cad dba' glong ngo // phyogs rnams bcu po kun tu rtag par yang // spos dang bdug pa 'od 'phro'i rgyan 'byung ngo // chu bo rnams las rin chen
131b7(phal chen): thams cad kyi// 'od zer 'phro ba kun tu rab tu 'byung // me tog nor bu'i phung po gdugs rnams kyang // rin chen kun gyi gzer du rab tu 'bar// phyogs bcu'i zhing gi gzugs brnyan mang po dang / 
131b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rin chen rnams las snang // rin chen 'khor lo'i gzhi rten yid 'ong las// spos chus rgyas pa'i chu klung rnams kyang 'bab// rin chen gser gyi dril bu'i dra ba yis/ 
132a1(phal chen): yog cing sangs rgyas gsung du sgra sgrog 'bab// rgyal ba kun gyi byang chub spyod pa dang // kun tu bzang po'i spyod mchog rab tu 'dzud// sangs rgyas smon lam sgra dbyangs
132a2(phal chen): rnam pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad sngon gyi sbyor ba dag/ rnam dag nor bu'i ngos dang ngogs kun nas// sgra rnams sgrog pa kun na rab tu snang // chu bo thams cad dbang klong dag las kyang
132a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen 'bar ba dag/ chos kyi dbyings rnams rab tu rgyas byed pa// 'byam klas phyogs rnams kun na rab tu snang // chu klung de dag thams cad dri med cing // nor bu'i/ 
132a4(phal chen): rgyal po sprin gyis kun khyab pa// mdzod spu'i dpal dang da sangs rgyas gzi brjid 'bar// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan snang // spros chu'i chu klung de dag
132a5(phal chen): gi bar dag kyang sa sna tshogs la rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa ste/ chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i me tog pun da ri ka'i phreng ba gling bzhi'i
132a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor ba'o// chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
132a7(phal chen): kyis rnam par phye ba'o// shing gi gseb thams cad nas kyang rgyan thams cad kyi sprin rtag par rab tu 'byung ste/ nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i dpal 'byung ba'i sprin dang / 'od
132a8(phal chen): rnams kyang rab tu 'byung ngo // shing gi bar de dag thams cad kyang 'od shin tu 'bar ba ste/ spos dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis rab tu gang ba'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon
132b1(phal chen): lam bskal pa thams cad du byin gyis rlob pa'i sgra sgrog pa'i sprin gyis yongs su gang ba'o// spos 'od 'phro ba'i sprin gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par snang bar byed pa'i sprin gyis mngon par khyab pa'o// 
132b2(phal chen): spos kyi rgyal po yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyas pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po brgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i kha dog yang dag par ston pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par gang ba'o// gos/ 
132b3(phal chen): kyi tshogs sna tshogs sprin lta bus mngon par yog pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po phyogs bcur 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin gyis yog par byed pas rnam par rgyas pa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas
132b4(phal chen): thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od kyis mngon par gang dpa'o// nor bu'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi las darnam par smin pa rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan shin tu sten pas
132b5(phal chen): rgyas pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa chu klung gi bar de dag re re zhing yang rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad do// de nas byang chub
132b6(phal chen): sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang spos chu'i chu klung gi bar gyi rgyan yongs su dag pa/ rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur
132b7(phal chen): rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chu klung bar rnams shin tu rnam par dag/ rin chen rgyan can gser gyis rnam par bris// yal ga me tog
132b8(phal chen): sprin rnams 'phyang lding ba'i// shing gi phreng bas kun nas mngon par khyab// shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor sgo dag nas// rin chen mang po'i sprin rnams kun kyang 'byung // me tog
133a1(phal chen): 'od mang rin chen snying po can// phyogs rnams kun sgor 'gro ba khyab par byed// gzhi rnams nor bu mngon par bkram pa ste// me tog rnam bris
133a2(phal chen): rin chen 'bru dang ldan// kun nas rin chen sprin gyis khyab pa ste// rgyan dang sems can thams cad gzugs brnyan snang // sangs rgyas 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po yis// sa rnams thams cad
133a3(phal chen): kun nas rnam par gang // phyogs rnams thams cad 'bar zhing snang ba'i sprin// rdul phran kun la gzugs brnyan gyur par snang // nor bu'i rgyan gyis shin tu rnam par rgyas// mu tig gsal ba'i dra bas
133a4(phal chen): rnam par phye// nor bu'i 'khor lo kun nas rab tu bkod/ kun na rgyal ba rnam par 'phrul pa snang // 'byam klas 'od zer ldan pa'i rin chen gyis// sangs rgyas sprul pa
133a5(phal chen): bkye ba kun na snang // sangs rgyas mang pos phyogs rnams kun khyab cing // stobs bcu mnga' ba'i chos nyid/ rab tu sgrog/ rin chen sna tshogs pun da ri ka yis// 
133a6(phal chen): chu rnams kun rgyas snying po nor bu spos// de las mi zad 'od zer rgya mtsho rnams// rab tu 'byung ba'i pad mo sna tshogs 'byung // dus rnams gsum po'i rgyan rnams thams cad kyang // nor bu
133a7(phal chen): de dag 'bru'i nang na ste// 'byung ba med cing gzung du'ang yod pa min// de ni sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul ba'i mthu// rgyab rnam par snang mdzad thams cad du// rgyan dang sprul pa thams
133a8(phal chen): cad rab tu 'gyed// sngan chad sangs rgyas smon lam mthu dag gis// de dag 'gro zhing 'ong bar snang ba med// rdul rnams rgya mtsho thams cad dag la yang // rgyal sras thams cad spyad pa
133b1(phal chen): rab spyod de/ rang gi ning dang lung bstan sa'i rnams// bsam pa rnam dag tshul bzhin de dag mthong // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
133b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu bstan pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchog ni dang snying po me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i
133b3(phal chen): dmigs pa dag la'ang dmigs pa re re zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan dang / rgyan shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// 
133b4(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho yongs su dag cing / yon tan mtha' dang dpung med pas yon tan rnam par dag pa'i rgyan
133b5(phal chen): shin tu bstan pa/ rgya mtsho 'di nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
133b6(phal chen): pa 'di dag smras so// ning gi rgya mtsho 'di rnams thams cad kyang // rin chen rgyan can 'od zer gnas pa ste// sdug cing bskul pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog/ rin chen thams cad
133b7(phal chen): 'od kyang rnam par 'bar// mu tig nor bu'i sprin mang zad mi shes// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan phyogasu rnam par snang // zhing na yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams// byang chub
133b8(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams la rtag tu ston pa byed// sangs rgyas gsung gi sprin ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste// nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad snyan par sgrog/ rnam par snang mdzad sngon gyi
134a1(phal chen): spyod pa rnams// rin chen rnams la rtag par snang zhing grag/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dri med 'od// rgyun rnams thad nang na rnam par snang / 
134a2(phal chen): 'khor rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid 'chang ba dang // sprul pa rnams kyis zhing gi rgya mtsho gang // sangs rgyas sprul pa rnams ni sgyu ma 'dra// de dag la ni byon pa gang yang med// sangs rgyas/ 
134a3(phal chen): yul rnams byin gyis brlabs pa yi// zhing rnams kun na sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul// zhing rnams 'byam klas par ni rnam 'phrul zhing // ji snyed zhing du de dag kun rgyu ba// de dag nor bu kun la
134a4(phal chen): rab tu snang // de ltar zhing gi rgya mtsho rnam par sbyangs// sprul pa rnams ni mig yor 'dra ba ste// thams cad dag/ dan chos nyid 'di yang snang // 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad
134a5(phal chen): spyod yul te// smon lam rnam par 'phrul las byung ba'o// bzang po'i spyod pas gang rnams byung gyur pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' shes mchog rgya mtsho can// de dag rdul
134a6(phal chen): phran kun la rang rang gis// rang gi zhing rnams rgya mtsho dag par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi zham ring du// bskal pa bye ba rgya chen bsam yas su// de dag spyod yul thams cad
134a7(phal chen): mthong bas na// skad cig sems la de dag thams cad ston// zhing rnams mnyam med 'byung ba med pa ste// de dag mtha' 'dra mnyam zhing mtshan nyid med// smon lam stobs kyis kun tu
134a8(phal chen): gnas pa ste// sems can rnams la phan phyir rab tu sbyangs// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
134b1(phal chen): dgra 'jig rten gyi khams spros chu'i rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra/ 
134b2(phal chen): bsnyed rab tu gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'o// 
134b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa de dag thams cad kyang gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa/ phyogs gzhan dang gzhan la lta ba/ rnam pa gzhan
134b4(phal chen): dang gzhan gyis 'jug pa/ rgyan gzhan dang gzhan yod pa/ gzhan dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzhan/ dang gzhan du 'du ba/ rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du ma 'dres
134b5(phal chen): pa rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gyis brlabs gzhan dang gzhan yod pa dag ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni
134b6(phal chen): rin po che'i phreng ba mu tig gi 'bru'i snying po can gyi rgya mtsho la 'byam klas pa la la ni rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i me tog rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas
134b7(phal chen): pa la la ni rin po che'i phreng ba mu tig gi 'bru'i snying po can gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni spos chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig
134b8(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni me tog thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni nor bu rin po che'i dra ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnaso// 
135a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho glong du gyur pa'i chu bo la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam
135a2(phal chen): klas pa la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu'i cod pan sna tshogs kyi rgyan la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni sems can gyi lus sna tshogs rgya mtsho la rab
135a3(phal chen): tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung nor bu'i rgyal po la rab tu gnas so// de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
135a4(phal chen): 'byam klas pa'i gnas shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyang dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan
135a5(phal chen): du 'dug pa sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshe 'byam klas pal la ni ri rab kyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jigarten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni chu klung gi dbyibs lta
135a6(phal chen): bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni kun tu 'khor ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni kun nas 'khyil pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten
135a7(phal chen): gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni 'khor ba'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni mig mangs ris kyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la
135a8(phal chen): ni shing gi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni lang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyings lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni rdo'i rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs la
135b1(phal chen): bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni phyogs 'byam klas pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la la ni khang pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi
135b2(phal chen): khams 'byam klas pa la la ni pad mo'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi kha mos 'byam klas pa la la ni rta babs kyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sems
135b3(phal chen): can gyi lus kyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sprin gyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs lta
135b4(phal chen): bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni dra ba sna tshogs bkye ba'i dbyibs
135b5(phal chen): lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni sgo kun nas yog pa'i dbyibs lta bu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa la la ni dmigs pa thams cad kyi
135b6(phal chen): dbyibs lta bu ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i dbyibs rnam par phye ba shin tu bstan pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed do// 
135b7(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag ni lhun gzhan dang gzhan du bstan pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni phyogs thams cad kyi nor bu'i sprin gyi
135b8(phal chen): lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni 'od kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che dang spos 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi lhun can no// 'jig rten
136a1(phal chen): gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi me tog kha sprod las bsgrubs pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni byang chub
136a2(phal chen): sems dpa'i lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi lhan can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che'i 'od kyi
136a3(phal chen): lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi kha dog gi lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog gi 'od kyi lhun can no// 
136a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sems can thams/ cad kyi bsod nams rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba'i dasgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni
136a5(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho yang dag par 'byung ba'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor
136a6(phal chen): yongs su dag pa'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni
136a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi tshul thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni zhing gi rgyan thams cad 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi
136a8(phal chen): khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs mtha' dang dpung med pa'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i
136b1(phal chen): sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sems can thams cad kyi dge ba 'byung ba'i sgra'i lhun can no// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul la la ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon
136b2(phal chen): tan rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i sgra'i lhun can no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa'i tshul gyi lus ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i/ 
136b3(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa'i tshul gyi lus rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa 'di
136b4(phal chen): nyid gsal bar brjod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// zhing gi rgyud
136b5(phal chen): rgyan shin tu brtan par grub// dri med dri bral 'od 'gyed snying po can// nor bu pad mo rgya mtsho kun la gnas/ la la ga gA'i rgya mtsho dag la gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs
136b6(phal chen): tshul gyi gzhi gnas shing // dbyibs kyang sna tshogs kha dog gzugs kyang mang // ri rab grong khyer shing gi dkyil 'khor dang // zhing rgyud thams cad la la phyogs kun lta// la la 'od lus me
136b7(phal chen): tog snying po can// nor bus byas pa kun nas sprin dang chu// la la'i rgyud gsal mu tig 'od zer lus// nor bu'i gzhi gnas kun kyang mi shigs sra// 'byam klus la la kha dog
136b8(phal chen): sna tshogs gsal// 'od 'dra 'od 'phro ma mar sprin gyi mdog/ la la'i rgyud ni sgra dang skad kyi lus// de las sangs rgyas gsung dbyangs mtha' yas 'byung // la la'i rgyud ni smon lam sgra'i
137a1(phal chen): lus// spyod pa rnam 'phrul sprin gyi sgra'i lus// la la bsod nams yangs dang las kyi sgra// la la'i lus ni rgyal ba'i yon tan sgra// zhing gi
137a2(phal chen): rgyud rnams rgya mtsho bsam yas pa// kun nas mi zad du ma'i sgo nas 'jug/ rnam 'phrul yangs pa mi zad rgyan gyi rnams// tshad med kun gyis phyogs kun rgyas par 'gengs// phyogs
137a3(phal chen): rnams kun tu zhing rnams 'du 'gyur te// yangs pa'i tshul gyis zhing gi rgyud zhugs par// phyogs bcu kun tu 'du bar snang ba yang // 'gro ba med cing 'jug pa yod pa min// tshul
137a4(phal chen): gcig gis ni rgyud rnams kun kyang 'gangs// thams cad ma lus re rang rab tu 'dug/ de la tha dad gang yang mi dmigs te// gzhi med kun 'gengs mtha' dang
137a5(phal chen): dpung yang med// zhing rnams tshul gyi rgyud la rnam 'phrul pa// sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad pa kun nas snang // smon lam sgra ni rgya mtshor rab brjod cing // zhing
137a6(phal chen): gi dbyings na sems can kun kyang 'dul// zhing rnams sangs rgyas sku yis kun khyab snang // bsam gyis mi khyab byang chub sems dpa' gang // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mi
137a7(phal chen): mnyam stobs ston cing // sems can mang po tshad med rnam par 'dul// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ zhing gi rgyud kyi gnas shin tu
137a8(phal chen): bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u brgyad pa'o// // bam po dgu pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho'i dbyings
137b1(phal chen): de na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho mig 'phrul gyi snang ba lda bye ba gzhi kun la rab tu gnas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la gang chen mtsho'i
137b2(phal chen): dbyings kyi spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nang na spos chu'i rgya mtsho dbus ma ni ze ba yid du 'ong zhing 'od zer mtha' yas pa zhes bya ste/ de'i nang
137b3(phal chen): nas nor bu'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus rnam par dmigs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi pad mo chen po bzhi spos dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i
137b4(phal chen): rgyan can zhes bya ba mngon par byung ste/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud phyogs kun nas rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
137b5(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ dmigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gyis brgyan pa'i lhun can rab tu gnas te/ de dag las thams cad kyi
137b6(phal chen): 'og ma ni dpal 'byung ba'i 'od zer rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/ de ni rdo rje thams cad kyi rgyan dang 'od kyi 'khor lo'i sa mtshams nor bu rin po che'i ze ba mang po la
137b7(phal chen): rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i 'khor thams cad dang / rin po che'i me tog gi rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu yog par gyur pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu
137b8(phal chen): pra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can dag ste/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshul rnam par dag cing
138a1(phal chen): dri ma med pa'i mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i skyeng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rdul shin tu phra bsnyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten rgya
138a2(phal chen): khams smos sna tshogs kyi dad mo dpal gyi rgyan ces bya ba rgyan thams cad kyis mtshams can rin po che'i pad mo shin tu mang ba la rab tu gnas pa/ seng ge'i khri'i dbyibs lngar 'dug pa/ mu tiH
138a3(phal chen): gi 'bru rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog lta bu'i bla ra'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu
138a4(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ de nad bzhi dan gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer mchog gi 'od ces bya dab bzhugs so// de'i stengs sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
138a5(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba spos kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis mtshams
138a6(phal chen): can rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba sna tshogs la rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i 'khor lo gzi brjid bzang po'i nyi ma'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yan lag brgyad du dma' ba'i dbyibs can
138a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba skyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od du
138a8(phal chen): ma med pa'i ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer sna tshogs
138b1(phal chen): kyi yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyis mtshams can kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i rdo rje brag gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che pad mo'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ 
138b2(phal chen): rdo rje'i 'od zer dang / rin po che 'bar ba mtha' yas par snang ba'i 'od kyi nor bu'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ gcig tu dag pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
138b3(phal chen): bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i 'od zer stobs dang brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// 
138b4(phal chen): de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od shin tu bkye ba'i me tog sil ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba
138b5(phal chen): rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu'i dra ba'i rgyan gyis mtshams can/ shing dang nags tshal gyi rgyan thams cada'abyung ba'i rin po che'i 'khor lo mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu
138b6(phal chen): gnas pa/ phyogs thams cad nas grA du ma'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po tshangs pa'i dbyangs su sgrogs pas kun nas yog pa/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa
138b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi 'od zer dga' ba'i stobs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhug so// 
138b8(phal chen): de'i steng 'jig gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba sna tshogs kyi rnam pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
139a1(phal chen): drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa rin po che shI la'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyun gyis mtshams can
139a2(phal chen): rdo rje'i khyim gzhal med khang rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kun nas gru bzhi'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ 'khor lo nor bu gtsug gi bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin
139a3(phal chen): gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i 'od kyi dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
139a4(phal chen): rgyan gyi 'od zer me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shi ngan tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba gcig tu dag
139a5(phal chen): pa/ khang partsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ me tog pad mo sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis sa mtshams can/ rin/ po che thams cad kyi 'od zer dang / rin po che'i kha dog
139a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kha dog thams cad kyi gos dang // mu tig dang stegs bus kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba rgya mtsho'i shugs dang / yon
139a7(phal chen): tan grags pa'i dbang phyug 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa yang dag
139a8(phal chen): par 'byung ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa nor bu'i rgyal
139b1(phal chen): po sgra thams cad gtong ba'i rgyan gyis mtshams can/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i pad mo la 'dug cing / na mkha'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ mig 'phrul gyi dbyibs
139b2(phal chen): lta bur 'dug pa/ 'od kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin kha dog mtha' yas pas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rgya chen po'i ye shes rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan
139b3(phal chen): zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams
139b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i 'khor lo'i shing gi
139b5(phal chen): rgyan gyis mtshams can/ nor bu'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyi sprin 'bar ba'i sgra'i rgya mtsho'i gzhi la rab tu gnas pa/ tshangs pa'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar
139b6(phal chen): 'dug pa/ seng ge'i khri sprin rin po che yid du 'ong ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyan can gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi gzi brjid thub pa med pa'i zla ba zhes bya
139b7(phal chen): ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
139b8(phal chen): kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag brgyan mtha' yas pa dang / mu tig gi 'bru rab tu 'phyang ba dang / rin po che'i phreng ba'i rgyan gyis
140a1(phal chen): mtshams can rin po che'i seng ge'i khri'i rgyan dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa nor nga'i rgya mtshol rab tu gnas pa/ 
140a2(phal chen): kun nas zlum pa'i dbyings su 'dug pa/ smos dang / nor bu dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi rab kyi sprin re rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas sog pa yod de/ den de bzhin
140a3(phal chen): gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyis shin tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i stang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na
140a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams mdog rnam par snang ba zhes bya 'jig derten gyi khamasas su rgyas kyi gang bcu gcig gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bsko pa/ kun na
140a5(phal chen): nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa rdo rje ltar mi shigashing sra ba'i rgyan gyis mtshams can/ me rtogs tshogs rnam pa mang de'i rgya mtshol rab tu gnas pa/ zla/ 
140a6(phal chen): kham pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ lha rdzas rin po che'i bla res kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i yon tan chos nyid tshad med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// 
140a7(phal chen): de'i ste 'jog rten gyi khams spangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu dra ba snyed 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba'i mdog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ni bcu gnas kyi
140a8(phal chen): du shi chub ny-i kyi la gyis shes/ rnam pa ga nga ma /  can pa sa mas cams kyi chung rgya ma nas
140b1(phal chen): can gyi gang chen mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ me tog 'khyil pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ gos sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
140b2(phal chen): tshangs pa'i dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba 'jig
140b3(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par dag pa/ rdo rje'i gzhi'i sa mtshams can/ rlung gi dkyil
140b4(phal chen): 'khor kha dog sna tshogs can gyis shin tu bzung ba/ pad+me'i/ 'dra ba la rab tu gnas pa kun nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su gnas pa/ na mkha'i lha'i khang pa can gyis brgyan
140b5(phal chen): pa 'di yod de/ de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di bzhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
140b6(phal chen): kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam la rdul med pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor
140b7(phal chen): gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyis mtshams can/ rin po che'i gos sna tshogs rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas/ rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar/ 
140b8(phal chen): 'dug pa/ rdo rje'i sprin kha dog mtha' yas pas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig
141a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i mar me zhes bya ba 'jin
141a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan mang po thams cad kyi bla re'i sa mtshams can/ me tog gi dra brgya
141a3(phal chen): mtsho rnam par dag pa la rab tu gnas pa dbyibs dpal gyi be'u ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i shing dang spos chu'i sprin rgya mtshos kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
141a4(phal chen): stobs la thub pa med pas kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig
141a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'od 'phro snang ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu drug gi rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ nyon mongs shing
141a6(phal chen): rnam par dag pa nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che mi zad pa 'gyed pa'i sa mtshams can/ spos dang 'od 'phro ba sna tshogs can gyi pad mo'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs ru sbal gyi
141a7(phal chen): mgo ltar 'jug pa/ nor bu 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba'i 'khor lo'i tsan dan gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi nyi ma dri ma med pa'i spyan
141a8(phal chen): zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyis rab tu brgyan gyis snying
141b1(phal chen): ngo zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ dbyibs sems
141b2(phal chen): can thams cad kyi lus ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgyan gyis mtshams can nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyi snying po 'byung ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs yan lag
141b3(phal chen): brgyad du 'dug pa/ 'khor yug thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyan dang / me tog dang shing gi dra bas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa'i ye shes
141b4(phal chen): phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
141b5(phal chen): khams rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad kyi rdul phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag brgyan gyi rnam pa thams
141b6(phal chen): cad kyis mtshams can me tog gi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs mu tig gi phreng ba bskyil ba lta bur 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad kyi spos kyi 'od kyi
141b7(phal chen): dkyil 'khor gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal tshad med pa'i tshul dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
141b8(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs yongs su dag cing snang ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
142a1(phal chen): snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i sprin mi zad pa rab tu 'gyed pa'i sa mtshams
142a2(phal chen): can/ spos dang 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa'i ri rab kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs nor bu'i ze ba 'khyil ba ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i dbang po'i 'od kyi dkyil
142a3(phal chen): 'khor 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings dang na mkha' kun tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// 
142a4(phal chen): de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin dpo che'i 'od 'bre 'khyil pa'i dpal yang dag par 'byung ba zhes
142a5(phal chen): bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig pu rnam par dag pa/ rin po che'i nyi zla rnam par snang ba'i sa
142a6(phal chen): mtshams can/ dbyibs lnga'i dbang po thams cad ltar 'dug pa/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rgyan gyi rnam pa du ma dang rin po che sna tshogs thams cad dang / rdo rje'i
142a7(phal chen): rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ nor bu sgron ma'i 'bru'i dra bas kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan bsod nams kyi sprin gyis shin tu 'phags
142a8(phal chen): pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyung phyogs kun nas rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa gzhan
142b1(phal chen): dang gzhan la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan du 'dug pa lhun gzhan dang gzhan can/ phyogs 'byam klas pa gzhan dang gzhan la lta ba/ rnam pa gzhan dang
142b2(phal chen): gzhan gyis 'jug pa/ rgyan gzhan dang gzhan can/ gzhan dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzhan dang gzhan du yongs su 'du ba/ gzhan dang gzhan gyi rnam par ma 'dres
142b3(phal chen): pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gyi rlabs gzhan can/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi
142b4(phal chen): khams kun nas skor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o// / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu klung sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i
142b5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas skor ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig
142b6(phal chen): rten gyi khams kun nas 'khyil pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor lo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang // 'jig
142b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten
142b8(phal chen): gyi khams kyi phung po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten
143a1(phal chen): gyi khams phyogs 'byam klas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khang pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul
143a2(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams khyad khyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu
143a3(phal chen): phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sems can sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang / lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad
143a4(phal chen): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas da kyi mtshan gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ sangs rgyas dkyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten
143a5(phal chen): gyi khams 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang
143a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sa la mngon par lta ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
143a7(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dmigs pa thams cad kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa// sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun
143a8(phal chen): nas yongs su bskor ba ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis// kun nas yongs su bskor
143b1(phal chen): ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa de dag re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa rnam par gdags pa spangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yongs
143b2(phal chen): su bskor ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum klas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag ra re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i rnam par
143b3(phal chen): gdags pa shin tu bstan pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad de/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho ze ba mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba chu klung gi 'khor dang bcas
143b4(phal chen): pa/ chu klung gi klong dang bcas pa'i khongs na 'dug go// spos chu'i rgya mtsho za ba mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer yidadu 'ong ba de dang / mdab chags su shar phyogs
143b5(phal chen): logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho gang chen mtshodri ma/ med pa'i 'od zer gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud zhing kun nas 'khyil
143b6(phal chen): pa rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba spos dang rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad la rab tu gnas pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i pad mo chen po la rab tu gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
143b7(phal chen): spyod pa'i sgra rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa'i nga re'i lhun can yod do// de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams khyim gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
143b8(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan gyis gang chen mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ 'khor kun nas gru bzhir
144a1(phal chen): 'dug pa/ pad mo 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal rnam par snang ba'i mdzod spu'i 'od ces
144a2(phal chen): bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ze ba'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams
144a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi ze ba rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs kun nas dkyil 'khor du
144a4(phal chen): 'dug pa/ mu tig grong khyer dpal gyi dpal gyi seng dge'i khri'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi rgya mtsho mtha' yas
144a5(phal chen): pa'i blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jin/ rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sprul pa'i
144a6(phal chen): spos zhim po dpal gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon
144a7(phal chen): mongs pa rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan dang dril bu'i dra ba rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog
144a8(phal chen): pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mtshan nyid sprul pa med par kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin
144b1(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi'i kha dog dang 'od yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba
144b2(phal chen): gcig tu dag pa spos chu kha dog mtha' yas pa rin po che'i tshon dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyibs nor bu'i 'khor lo ltar 'dug pa/ mu tig nyi ma'i tshul kun tu snang ba'i
144b3(phal chen): 'od kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ da na de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor legs par byung ba rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams
144b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i las kyis khyab pa zhes bya da ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul shin tu
144b5(phal chen): phra snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ spos dang rdo rje rgya mtsho la rab/ tu gnas pa/ pad mo'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ 'od
144b6(phal chen): zer rdul dang bral ba dang / spos chu'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ da na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi shugs kyis dgyes pa mi zad pa'i blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i
144b7(phal chen): steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
144b8(phal chen): kyi zhing drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa rin po che thams cad kyis brtan par bsgrubs pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa zur gsum gyi dbyibs su
145a1(phal chen): 'drug pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i nor du'i snong pan gyi 'od dang 'od zer gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba dri ma med pa kun tu/ 
145a2(phal chen): snang ba zhes byab bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i pad mos brgyan pa zhes bya ba
145a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdun gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ pad mo'i rgyan thams cad kyi mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ zla ba kham pa'i
145a4(phal chen): dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog/ gi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rnam par dag pa
145a5(phal chen): me tog gi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'dzan rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi nang gi rdul shin tu phra bsnyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro
145a6(phal chen): ba'i dbyings dri ma med pas yang dag par bsags pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam
145a7(phal chen): par dag pa rin po che'i 'od mang po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ rin po che rim gyis gzhol ba'i 'od 'phro snang ba'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rtag tu spos kyi char 'bebs pa'i lus
145a8(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la thub pa med pa'i blo gros shin tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sa
145b1(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i 'od bzang ngo zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis
145b2(phal chen): bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa rin po che'i gos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dga' ba 'khyil pa'i dbyibs lhur 'dug pa/ me tog
145b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi rgyan gyi bla re'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' yangs pa'i spyan zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
145b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs rdul dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i
145b5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa mig 'phrul gyi dbyings
145b6(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa/ sil snyan thams cad kyi sgra dang nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser shin tu 'bar ba'i ri rab mar me
145b7(phal chen): zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i kha dog gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba
145b8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gcig gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ brgya byin gyi lus kyi dbyings/ 
146a1(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa/ nor du'i rgyal po'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ nyi ma sprul pa'i me tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi smin gyis kun nas log pa yod de/ de/ 
146a2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal shin tu 'phags pas chos kyi dbyings su rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu
146a3(phal chen): phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po gser gyi kha dog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu gnyis kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba
146a4(phal chen): rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rin po che'i da rgyan thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ mkhar gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ snying po byang chub kyi me tog
146a5(phal chen): rin po che shin tu rgyas pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i sgron ma kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// da'i
146a6(phal chen): steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu
146a7(phal chen): gsum gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che'i gos kyi glong gi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ me tog gi ze ba 'khyil pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ 
146a8(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs sgrog pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'bar ba'i pad mo la rnam par rol pas shin tu rnam par snang ba
146b1(phal chen): zhes byab bzhugs so// de'i sted 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i snying pos bsgrubs pa'i dam pa zhes bya ba
146b2(phal chen): 'jog rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi nang bcu bzhi'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba'i rgya mtsho la rab tu
146b3(phal chen): gnas pa/ gling bani dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba rab tu stug po 'byung ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
146b4(phal chen): bsod nams mi zad pa'i me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das
146b5(phal chen): pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me long gi mdog ltar rnam bar snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco lnga'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ 
146b6(phal chen): rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ rdo rje'i pad mo rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ lha ma yin gyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus mig yor gyi sprin
146b7(phal chen): rin po che'i cod pan rab tu 'bar ba'i lus can gyis kun nas yog pa yod de / de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i stobs bdud rtsi'i sgra dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng
146b8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams can dan mchog ltar yid du 'ong ba'i zla bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba// 'jig
147a1(phal chen): rten gyi lanas sangs rgyas kyi shing bsu drug gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rdo rje ltar 'khregs pa'i can dan rin/ 
147a2(phal chen): ngo tsha'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa yan lag brgyad du rnam par bkod pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ mu tig gi me tog mang po shin tu rgyas pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas leg pa yod
147a3(phal chen): de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa chos dam pa thugs su chud pas shin tu 'phags pa'i dpal gyi gzi brjid yang dag par 'drung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams
147a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi dri ma med cing kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu bdun gyi
147a5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa/ rin po tshe'i 'od kha dog mtha' yas pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa
147a6(phal chen): spos chu'i gling gi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ dri zhim po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun tu gsal ba'i dbyangs na mkha' rnam
147a7(phal chen): bar snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi mdog bzang pos rab tu
147a8(phal chen): brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ me tog sna tshogs
147b1(phal chen): kyi rgya mtshol rab tu gnas pa sangs rgyas dran pa'i glong gi dbyings su 'dug pa sil snyan gyi slad dbyangs thams cad 'byung ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na
147b2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu zhal ston pas shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na
147b3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i dpal gyi dbyangs shes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning bcu dgu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rnam par
147b4(phal chen): dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ gser gyi sang+ga'i khri rgya mtsho la rab da tu gnas pa/ seng ge'i khri'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ seng ge'i da khri pad mo kha dog sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi sprin gyis kun nas
147b5(phal chen): yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mu med par rnam par snang bas grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi
147b6(phal chen): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dpal gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
147b7(phal chen): kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa rin po che'i gos dang spos kyi rgyal mtshan rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi phyag gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs su 'dug
147b8(phal chen): pa nor bu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi sgron ma
148a1(phal chen): namakha' kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhug so// de dang mang ba chags su lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mi zad pa 'byung ba zhes
148a2(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan gyi gtsug rnam par bres pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i sgra'i lhun can rab tu gnas so// 
148a3(phal chen): de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog yid du 'ong ba snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcin
148a4(phal chen): tu dag pa nor bu'i rgyal po shing gi snying porgya mtshol rab tu gnas pa/ nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rin po che dam pa thams cad las byang chub sems
148a5(phal chen): dpa'i lus su sprul pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mthong na dga' ba pad mo snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng
148a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan 'thun par bres pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
148a7(phal chen): pa rin chen ri rab sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan gyi 'od rin po che
148a8(phal chen): thams cad kyi kha dog du snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings shin tu sprul pa'i dbyangs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig
148b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi snying po rdo rje'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rdo rje rnam
148b2(phal chen): bar snang ba'i dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so// gzhung de bzhin tu de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rnyog pa med pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
148b3(phal chen): pa brtson 'grus kyi stobs la thub pa med pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i pad mos rab tu brgyan pas shin tu dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de
148b4(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi grong khyer gyi blo gros rab tu sgrog pa'i sgra dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba skyed po zhes bya ba yod de
148b5(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcur snyan pa rnam par grags pa'i ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi dri ma med cing dri ma
148b6(phal chen): dang bral ba'i dra ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nags/ 
148b7(phal chen): tshal gyi rgyal mtshan rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi me tog pad mo kun tu rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi
148b8(phal chen): khams rgyan du mas rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gyis kun tu khyab pa chos kyi dbyings kyi dpal gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na
149a1(phal chen): na'ag na gyi 'dus rin po malas basmras pa can na nga bzhes bya ba med de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa zlo gas dam pa zang po / 
149a2(phal chen): zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i snying na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu dra ba snyed 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams ze ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin
149a3(phal chen): gra shogs pa 'od mdzad pa zunga'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi rlung gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams mdzod drim
149a4(phal chen): med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i gzi brjed ces bya ba bzhugs so// gzhung de bzhin du
149a5(phal chen): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od kyi lhun can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshes/ sa pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stobs nam pa'i sgron ma
149a6(phal chen): zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i glong gi phreng ba rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi
149a7(phal chen): bsod nams rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo'i tshon gyis kun tu khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshes
149a8(phal chen): pa chags pa thams cad rnam par 'dul bas dga' ba mdzad pa zhes bya ba ba zhug so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ze ba yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs
149b1(phal chen): dgrags pabachen po dang yon tan sangs pa'i byangs rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba bzugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyun gyis kun tu brgyan pas mdzes pa
149b2(phal chen): zhes bya ba rjod de/ den de bzhin go shegs pa ye shes ma 'dros pa'i da zer yon tan rgya mtshogs bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning
149b3(phal chen): gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od mi zad pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi la
149b4(phal chen): gyis bskor bgacig tu dag pa/ rin po thams cad kyi chu'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa pad mo'i rgyun gyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ nor
149b5(phal chen): rgyal po pad mo sdang ba'i bla re'i dra bas kun nas yog pa yod/ de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhug so// 
149b6(phal chen): de'i lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dpal rin po che 'od 'phro ba rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i
149b7(phal chen): snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo rjes su sgrog pa'i lus can rab tu gnas te/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od
149b8(phal chen): 'phro ba pad mo rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che thams cad
150a1(phal chen): kyi bdog lnga bu'i chu'i glong rgya mtshol rab tu gnas pa// rin po che'i gro cha dang mdzod sgra'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa rgyan gyi dbyibs pa dang
150a2(phal chen): khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten
150a3(phal chen): gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzi brjid 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
150a4(phal chen): rnam par 'drul pa la chags pa med pa'i 'od kyi blo gros zhes bya rab bzhugs so// gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'ji ga rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'khor log ni mnyam pa'i rgyan
150a5(phal chen): ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhug so// / de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams can dan gyi shing gi ze ba'i
150a6(phal chen): rgyal mtshan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa thams cad rnam par dag pas gti mug med pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi
150a7(phal chen): khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zhal mthong na dga' ba yangs pa skye ba tshangs pa'i dbyangs thugs/ 
150a8(phal chen): su chud pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od srab pa'i rgyan rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyangs la rnam par rol
150b1(phal chen): pa'i ye shes shin tu yangs pa'i dad la zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog dang dbyings mu med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes thogs
150b2(phal chen): ba med pa yang dag par 'byung ba'i blo zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro ba'i sprin sdug po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyir
150b3(phal chen): mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs yongs su dag par dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yod de// de na
150b4(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs yongs su sbyangs pa'i mtshan dgyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba dbazhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung
150b5(phal chen): ba shin tu 'byam klas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i spyan chags pa med pa zhes bya ba bzhug so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
150b6(phal chen): kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i gdan brtan pa bsgrubs pas dpal rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
150b7(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings la ye shes kyi sku shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig
150b8(phal chen): rten gyi khams phyogs shin tu rgyas rmongs pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu mkhas pa'i sgron ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na
151a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo'i nags tshal zab mo'i sgra zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen
151a2(phal chen): pa'i spyod pa zab mo rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog dang 'od tha dad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i
151a3(phal chen): me tog gi sprin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i sgo sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun
151a4(phal chen): nas mchog tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhug so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i mdzod spus bsgrubs dpa'i ze ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
151a5(phal chen): gshegs pa dbyangs kun tu rab tu sgrog pa'i gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams shugs zab mo'i gangs chen mtsho zhes bya ba yod de
151a6(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer phyogs su gsal bas sems can gyi rgyan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rtse mo 'bar ba'i
151a7(phal chen): 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa'i ye shes mchog gis chos kyi dbyings la mngon par 'phags pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig
151a8(phal chen): rten gyi khams gser gyi pad mo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dri ma med pa'i mdzod kun nas snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng
151b1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nor bus bsgrubs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni
151b2(phal chen): shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rgyan dang / spos dang / nor bu dang / shing thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ dbyings
151b3(phal chen): dpal gyi be'u ltar 'dug pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun tu 'byung bas sprul pa chen po'i dra ba rnam par
151b4(phal chen): snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de nas lho phyogs logs na spos chu'i rgya mtsho rin po che in dra ni las rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na
151b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud snang bas phyogs rnam par snang / bar byed pa zhes bya ba spos thams cad kyis rab tu rgyan pa'i rgyan gyi pad mo sprin la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas
151b6(phal chen): kyi spyod pa dang / gsung mtha' dang dpung med pa'i lhun can mngon par byung ba yod de/ de thams cad kyi 'og na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan gyi mdzod phyogs su mi zad pa'i dkyil
151b7(phal chen): 'khor ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdzod kha dog mtha' yas pa'i rgya mtsho
151b8(phal chen): la rab tu gnas pa/ zur du ma'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ rgyan mig 'phrul lta bu thams cad kyis kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad
152a1(phal chen): pad mo'i spyan rnam par snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na
152a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i tshogs kyis rab tu grol ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i seng ge'i blo gros chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng
152a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo'i gdan yongs su byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
152a4(phal chen): pa chos kyi dbyings su dpal gyi 'od zer 'byam klas pas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so// gzhung / de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i rgyal
152a5(phal chen): mtshan sgra mnyam par sgrog pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan shin tu rgya che ba'i grags pas kun tu khyab pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i
152a6(phal chen): steng na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu rdo rje ltar brtan pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma ltar shin tu 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// 
152a7(phal chen): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dbang phyug gi me tog gi ze ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na
152a8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams tshon gyi 'khor lo'i gzhi dang snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba yangs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od tshangs pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs so// 
152b1(phal chen): de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi kham sna sna tshogs kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen po'i dpal bzang po'i ded dpon zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na
152b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams blta na don yod pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs ri rab kyi gzi brjid ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi
152b3(phal chen): khams tshad med pa'i rgyan dang dbyibs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i zla ba smon lam gyi tshul gyi 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs so// 
152b4(phal chen): bam po bcu pa gzhung de bzhin du de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog sna tshogs rab tu bkye ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
152b5(phal chen): pa chos rgya mtsho'i smon lam rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs shes/ bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyi glong gis rab tu brgyan pa zhes
152b6(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rin po che'i mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sra zhing mi shigs
152b7(phal chen): pa'i gzhi yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs kyi gsung snyan pa dam pa'i lha zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams
152b8(phal chen): gzhi thams cad nas 'od kyi sprul pa bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus zhi ba mchog gi blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig
153a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgyan shin tu bsrungs pas spyod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba mngon sum du dga' bar lta ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// 
153a2(phal chen): da'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams in dra nI la dang tsan dan gyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi sgul bar zab pa'i 'od zer rnam par snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros
153a3(phal chen): shes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog rgya mtsho sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od rab tu 'gyed pa bsam gyis mi
153a4(phal chen): khyab pa'i don mngon par mdzes pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcur sprul pa shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
153a5(phal chen): gshegs pa yon tan gyi gzi brjid dam pa mnyam pa med pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jigarten gyi khams ri rab kyi sprin gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ 
153a6(phal chen): de na de bzhin gshegs pa shugs kyi 'od tshangs pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so// de'i steng na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
153a7(phal chen): gyi khams pad mo rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi shu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ gcig tu dag pa/ spos dang
153a8(phal chen): nor bu'i char kha dog mtha' yas pa 'bebs pa'i rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa/ kun nas zlum pa/ rgyan dang thag pa mang pos kun nas yog pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
