179a2(phal chen): sprul pa'i gsung yang yin// zhing gi dra ba bsam mi khyab// rin chen cod pan sna tshogs dang // byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan rnams dang // gdan las de bzhin la la byung // 'od dang sprul
179a3(phal chen): pa'ang rab tu 'gyed// tsan dan phye ma sna tshogs dang // mdzod spu rnam par snang ba'i 'od// sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'od zer rnams// zhing rnams 'byung ba rab tu brjod// la la rgyan dang 'od
179a4(phal chen): gcig par// zhing rnams dri ma med par snang // lal rgyan rnams thams cad kyis// rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu brgyan// la la zhing rnams bcu dag gi/ rgyan gyis
179a5(phal chen): mngon par rab tu brgyan// lal zhing rnams stong dag kyang // rnam par brgyan cing rab tu gnas// zhing ni rgyan mang bye ba yis// zhing rnams la la rnam par bris/ 
179a6(phal chen): rgyan dang tshul rnams tha dad par// sna tshogs mig yor lta bur snang // brjod du med pa'i zhing gi rnams// rgyan cig la yang rab tu snang // 'od ni gzhan dang gzhan bkye ba// sangs
179a7(phal chen): rgyas smon lam mthu las byung // smon la rgya mtsho rnam mang bas// zhing rnams la la rnam par sbyangs// de dag rgyan mang thams cad du// zhing gi rgya mtsho shin tu snang // kun tu bzang po'i
179a8(phal chen): smon lam gyis// zhing rnams yongs su gang sbyangs pa// de dag kun la dus gsum gyi// zhing gi rgyan rnams kun kyang snang // zhing gi rgyud kyi rnam sprul pa// kye ma rgyal
179b1(phal chen): sras khyed ni ltos// ma 'ongs pa'i zhing rnams kyang // rmi lam bzhin du de dag snang // ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi// 'das pa'i zhing rnams rgya mtsho yang // zhing cig
179b2(phal chen): nang na thams cad snang // mig yor bzhin du sprul pa yin// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rnam sprul zhing rnams gang yod pa// zhing gi rgyud ni 'di la snang // 
179b3(phal chen): kun kyang nang na yod par gnas// zhing gi rdul gyi rtse mo la// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul pa// shong bar de dag kun na snang // mig yor mtshan nyid med pa'o// la la
179b4(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i dbyibs su 'dug/ zhing brgya mang po de dag daltos// ri rab ri yi dbyibs 'dra dang // 'jig rten khams ni bsam mi khyab// zhing rnams la la rnam
179b5(phal chen): par bris// mig yor dbyibs su gnas pa ste/ sna tshogs shing gi dbyibs su gnas// sangs rgyas kyis kyang kun tu khyab// zhing rnams nor bu'i 'khor lo'i
179b6(phal chen): dbyibs// la la pad mo'i dbyibs su gnas// yan lag brgyad pa sna tshogs mang // sna tshogs kha dog dri ma med// la la khri'i dbyibs lta bu// grwa'i dbyibs dang khyad khyud de// 
179b7(phal chen): la la grong khyer dbyibs su 'dug/ tshangs pa'i lus su rab tu gnas// lha'i dbang po'i gtsug pud dbyibs// zla ba kham ltar la la gnas// nor bu'i ri'i dbyibasu 'khod// nyi ma'i
179b8(phal chen): dkyil 'khor dbyibs kyang 'dra// spos chu'i rgya mtsho'i glong lta bur// 'jig rten khams rnams rab tu gnas// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dbyibs 'dra ba// sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams
180a1(phal chen): kyis sbyangs// 'khor lo bkra shis dbyibs lta bu// 'jig rten la la dkyil 'khor te// mdzod spu'i spyi gtsug dbyibs lta bu// la la mig gi
180a2(phal chen): tshul yang 'dra// sangs rgyas phyag gi dbyibs lta bu// la la rdo rje'i dbyibs su 'dug/ 'od 'phro ri'i dbyibs kyang 'dra// byang chub sems dpas kun tu gang // zhing rnams la la seng
180a3(phal chen): ge'i dbyibs// nor bu'i go char mngon bsgrubs pa// gzugs dang dbyibs ni du ma ste// gzugs rnams kun gyis rab tu gnas// zhing gi rgyud ni gcig la yang // zhing gi dbyibs/ 
180a4(phal chen): rnams mi zad pa// rab tu gnas pa byin rlabs dang / sangs rgyas smon lam rnams kyis byung // zhing rnams la la bskal pa tsam// la la bskal pa bcu pa ste/ 
180a5(phal chen): zhing rnams la la rdul mnyam pa'i// bskal pa bye bar brjod pa yin// la la bskal pa gcig la yang // / zhing rnams mang po 'byung bar snang // tshad med grangs
180a6(phal chen): kyang med pa yi// 'jig pa de bzhin bsam mi khyab// zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas med// zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas bcas// la la'i zhing na sangs rgyas gcig/ la la
180a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas mang po'o// sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing rnams dang // 'jig rten gzhan gyi khamasu yang // sangs rgyas sprul pa gshegs mdzad cing // rnam par 'phrul pa ra
180a8(phal chen): tu ston// 'pho dang 'byung dang sku tshe dang // byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya dang // bdud kyi sde dag 'dul ba dang // chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba ston// sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du
180b1(phal chen): gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun kyang ston// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// 'jig rten kun na tha mi dad // sangs rgyas zhing rnams re re yang // rgyal ba gcig ni skye
180b2(phal chen): 'gyur te// lo grangs bye ba drag stong du// chos kyi dam pa rab tu ston// sems can snod du ma gyur la// sangs rgyas ston pa mi mdzad de// sangs rgyas bsam dang ldan pas na/ 
180b3(phal chen): de nyid gcig kyang kun tu mthong // sangs rgyas mang po'i zhing gi rnams// zhing rnams re re dag tu yang // sangs rgyas bye ba bsam mi khyab// rgyal ba rnams ni rab tu skye// rgyal ba so so
180b4(phal chen): de dag na// sprul pa mang po rab 'gyed cing // chos kyi dbyings ni khyab mdzad nas// sems can rgya mtsho 'dul ba mdzad// zhing rnams la la 'od med de// mun
180b5(phal chen): pa 'jigs pa shin tu che// reg na sdug bsngal spu gri 'dra// blta na mi zad skyi yang g.ya'// zhing rnams la la lha 'od can// la la khyim gyi 'od can te// la la nyi zla'i/ 
180b6(phal chen): 'od dang ldan// zhing gi dra ba bsam mi khyab// zhing rnams la la rang gi 'od// shing gi 'od can dri ma med// gang du sdug bsngal mi mthong ba// de dag sems can dag pas byung / 
180b7(phal chen): la la ri yi 'od can te// zhing rnams la la nor bu'i 'od// la la mar ma'i 'od can te// sems can rnams kyi las kyis byung // zhing rnams la la sangs rgyas 'od// byang chub sems
180b8(phal chen): dpa' kun tu gang // zhing rnams la la pad mo'i 'od// 'od 'phro 'od can rab tu mdzes// zhing rnams la la me tog 'od// spos chu'i 'od dang ldan pa'ang yod// spos dang 'dug pa'i 'od
181a1(phal chen): 'phro can// smon lam dbang gis rnam par sbyangs// zhing rnams la la sprin 'od can// nor bu'i go cha'i 'od kyis bskul// sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs
181a2(phal chen): kyis snang // yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs ldan// rin chen cod pan 'od dang ldan// rdo rje gser gyi 'od kyis snang // yongs su dag pa'i sgra dbyangs can// de dag na ni sdug bsngal med// thams
181a3(phal chen): cad rgyan gyi 'od can dang // zhing rnams la la nor bu'i 'od// la la snying po byang chub 'od// 'khor rnams kun tu rab tu snang // sangs rgyas sprul pa'i snang ba can// sangs rgyas sprin gyis
181a4(phal chen): mngon par log/ kun tu 'od kyis rab tu snang // chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i 'od// ning rnams la la 'jigs smran na// mi bzad 'jigs pa'i nga ro can/ 
181a5(phal chen): nub cing brlung ba'i sgra rnams dang // yid myong 'jigs pa chen po sgrog dmyal ba byol song skye gnas dang / gi shin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal rnams/ mya ngan
181a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rnams// nyon mongs ldan pa'i sgra yang 'byung // la la dag na yid 'od sgra// dga' bar byed cing ston 'dams pa// dge ba'i las dang 'bras bu'i dbyangs// ning gi la
181a7(phal chen): narab tu stsog/ la la brgya byin lnga dbang dbyangs// gzhan dag tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs to// 'jig rten kun gyi dbyangs su yang // ma la'i zhing na rab tu grag/ zhing rnams la la sprin gyi
181a8(phal chen): sgra/ rin chen rgya mtsho'i 'od zer dang / nor bu'i shing gi gzugs smang ngo // rol mo'i sgra mas kun tu khyab// 'od zer grong gi sgra rnams dang // sangs rgyas sprul pa che/ 
181b1(phal chen): zad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dag dang // 'od zer sgra ni snyan pa 'byung // chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra rnams dang // kha cig zhing na bsam yas pa'i// smon lam rgya mtsho'i
181b2(phal chen): nga ro dang // spyod pa'i sgra yang snyan pa 'byung // dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang // de dag zhing rnams 'byung ba'i sgra// zad pa med
181b3(phal chen): pa'i dbyangs su sgrog/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs sgra dang // tshad med sa dang pha rol phyin// chos kyi rang bzhin sgra dag kyang // kha cig zhing na rab tu grag/ kun tu bzang po smon
181b4(phal chen): lam gyi// sgra ni zhing rnams bye ba 'byin// bskal pa gnas shing rab tu sgrog/ sgra dbyangs 'byin pa zang mi shes// zhing gi dbyings rnams la lan// sangs
181b5(phal chen): rgyas rnam par sprul pa yi// sgra yis chos kyi dbyings bkang / ba// de dag kun na rab tu grag/ shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes
181b6(phal chen): bya ba las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam par dgod pa shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u dgu pa'o// / bam po bcu gnyis pa// rigs kyi bu
181b7(phal chen): dag sngon 'das pa'i skal pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi pha rol/ de bas kyang ba snga'i dus de'i tshe/ de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshul dri ma med par
181b8(phal chen): phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i dbus su 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de ni/ rin po che'i pad mo mang po'i
182a1(phal chen): rgya mtsho la rab tu gnas pa rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra bsnyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba/ kun
182a2(phal chen): nas zlum pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa gzhi rgyan mtha' yas pas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi khor yug brgya phrag gsum gyis kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i rgyan
182a3(phal chen): thams cad kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog pa/ ri rab dang grong khyer dang / khang khyim dri ma med cing 'od rnam par dag par snang bas brgyan pa zas dang skom dang / gos kyi longs spyod yid
182a4(phal chen): kyis bsam pas 'byung ba/ rgyan gyi rnam pa bkod pas tshogs dang ldan pa zhig ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams dungal gyi sgra zhes bya ba de'i dbus na/ spos chu'i rgya mtsho 'od
182a5(phal chen): rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de las me tog rab me tog 'od 'phro ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rin po che'i khri 'phang bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor cing brgyan pa zhig/ 
182a6(phal chen): byung ste/ ri rab de'i steng na nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba spos kyi rgyal mtshan stong phrag dpag tu med pa shin tu bsgreng ba'i rgyan can me tog
182a7(phal chen): gi khang pa brtsegs pa/ dpag tu med pa'i phreng ba rnam par bres pa/ nor bu'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bkod pa rin po che'i rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dpag tu med pas kun nas brgyan pa/ 
182a8(phal chen): rin po che'i me tog pun da ri ka dpag tu med pa'i phreng gis kun nas bskor ba/ spos dang rin po che'i pad mo mang po dpag tu med pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ rol mo sna tshogs
182b1(phal chen): kyi sna yid du 'ong ba'i sprin dpag tu med pas kun nas rgyas pa spos dang bdug pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin dpag tu med pas kun nas snang bar byas pa/ grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
182b2(phal chen): bcu sems can sna tshogs snang bas kun nas bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar nags tshal chen po'i yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de'i shar phyogs logs na grong
182b3(phal chen): khyer chen po 'od 'phro snang ba zhis bya ba/ mi'i rgyal po'i gnas grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba/ rin po che 'ba' shig las byas pa/ mchu dang nang
182b4(phal chen): du dpag tshad stong phrag bdun yod pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing rtags dang / phru ma'i rab bdun gyis da brgyan cing kun nas bskor ba// rin po che'i 'obs spos
182b5(phal chen): chus gang ba/ rin po che'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad mo dang / ku mud dang / me tog pun da rikas rnam par brgyan pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ shing rta
182b6(phal chen): la'i phreng ba rgyan sna tshogs kyi tshogs mang po 'byin pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i rgyan dang / khang pa brtsegs pas rab tu brgyan pa/ steng nas gser gyi dra ba dang / dril
182b7(phal chen): bu'i dra ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba'i dra ba dang / in dra nI la'i dra ba dang / rdo rje'i pad mo'i dra bas kun nas yog pa/ rin po che'i shing drung me tog gi dra ba dang / rol mo'i sgra mang po
182b8(phal chen): thams cad kyi sprin yid du 'ong bas kun tu khyab pa/ spos dang phreng ba rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yod de/ de'i 'khor kun na sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu yod de/ sgo de
183a1(phal chen): dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa ste/ sgo de dag re re'i mdun yang rin po che'i rdo'i rgyal mtshan rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bdun
183a2(phal chen): bdun gyis brgyan pa'o// bza' shing gi ra ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas bskor ba ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba de dag thams cad kyang spos dang rin po che'i shing sna tshogs
183a3(phal chen): kun nas spos kyi dri kun tu 'byung ba/ bya sna tshogs thams cad yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o// grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba'i sprin ces bya ba der/ mir skyes pa thams cad kyang las
183a4(phal chen): kyi rnam par smin pas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dag ste/ na mkha' las rgyu ba mi dang lha mnyam du spyod pa yid bzhin gyi yul la longs spyod pa sha stag go/ de nas lho phyogs
183a5(phal chen): logs na/ lha'i grong khyer shing gi me tog sna tshogs shes bya ba yod do// de nas lho phyogs logs na klu'i grong khyer kun tu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba yod do// de nas lho
183a6(phal chen): phyogs logs na gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo rje'i dpal sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod do// de nas lho phyogs logs na/ dri za'i grong khyer gzhal meng khang bzang po zhes bya ba
183a7(phal chen): yod do// de dang mdab chags su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer 'khor lo'i tshon ces bya ba yod do// de dang mdab chags su mdab ma bzang po'i grong khyer rin po che sna tshogs bzang po'i lte ba zhes
183a8(phal chen): bya ba yod do// de dang mdab chag su bram ze'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs shes bya ba yod de/ de dag la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'khor gyis
183b1(phal chen): bskor ba'o// grong khyer de dag re re zhing lung rgyan mung po dums brgyan pa nas/ grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i bar du skye/ nags tshal chen po lal
183b2(phal chen): ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de'i dbus na/ snying po byang chub rin po che'i me tog rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba rin po che thams cad kyi shing yal ga sdug cing rgya che ba
183b3(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rab tu rgyas pas kun nas bskor ba rin po che'i me tog gzugs dang dbyibs rnam pa tha dad pa mang po shin tu rgyas pa spos dang / me mar rin po che thams cad
183b4(phal chen): kyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i phreng ba mang po rgya chen po'i sprin kun tu bkram pa/ rin po che'i 'od thur tu 'gro bas zhing kun tu khyab pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag
183b5(phal chen): pa'i sprin gyis brgyan pa/ phyogs bcu 'od zer ma bos rnam par snang bar byas pa/ rgyan tham sa cad rin po che sna tshogs mang pos smras pa/ rol mo
183b6(phal chen): thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs shin tu 'byung ba/ nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i lus 'byung ba/ phyogs bcur me tog sna tshogs mang po rab tu 'byung ba
183b7(phal chen): yod de/ de'i mdun du pad mo chen po me tog gi za ba 'od 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba/ rgyar dpag tshad bye ba phrag brgya yod pa rtsa ba spos dang / rin po che dang / rdo rje'i rgya mtsho
183b8(phal chen): la zug pa/ chu ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshon gyis rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa / rin po che rnam pa thad cad med pa'i mdab ma can rin po che 'od 'phro ba dang / spos kyi ze ba'i
184a1(phal chen): dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa snying po la rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i tshon bkye ba pad mo'i dkyil 'khor brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
184a2(phal chen): brag bcu'i 'khor gyis bskor ba/ phyogs bcur 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po rab tu 'gyed pa/ ze ba thams cad las yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba mngon par byung ngo // 'jig rten
184a3(phal chen): gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de dag las/ bskal pa'i
184a4(phal chen): thog ma pa thams cad kyi thog mar bla na med pa yang dag parardzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i nga bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan thams cad kyi
184a5(phal chen): ri bo ri rab kyi dbyangs shes bya ste/ des 'jigarten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i tshul dri ma med par phyogs kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'di yongs su sbyangs so// kye
184a6(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra zhes bya ba der lo brgyan de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i tshe/ nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor/ 
184a7(phal chen): rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de yang / rgyan thams cad kyi rgyan par gyur te/ 'di ltar rin po che'i 'od 'phro'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu gtong ba'i snying po can du gyur
184a8(phal chen): nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra yang rab tu 'byin/ phyogs bcu dag kyang 'od zer gyi dra bas rnam par snang bar byed/ gzhal med khang dang / khang khyim
184b1(phal chen): kyi rdul thams cad kyang rab tu snang bar byed/ rin po che'i me tog dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin yang rab tu 'gyed/ sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs pa'i sgra dang / 
184b2(phal chen): dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan kyi 'khor lo rab tu gtong ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / spyod pa dang / 'byung ba mngon par
184b3(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs rab tu bsgrags pa'i sgra dag kyang rab tu 'byin to// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa skye
184b4(phal chen): ba'i ltas te/ rgyan de dag zung bas 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'jig rten gyi dbang po rnams kyis khong du chud do// de bzhin
184b5(phal chen): gshegs pa las mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa dang / sangs rgyas blta bar mos pa dang / snying po byang chub tu mngon par gzhal ba de dag thams
184b6(phal chen): cad kyang / ltas sngon du byung bas yang dag par bskul to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri ba ri rab kyi dpal zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid kyis chos
184b7(phal chen): kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa'i sku can/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yongs su skye ba rab tu 'phros pa/ sku snying po byang chub thams cad la bzhugs pa/ gzugs kyi sku mtha'
184b8(phal chen): dang dpung med pa/ rnam par dag pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon por 'phags shing zil gyis gnon pa mtshan rin po che'i me tog thams cad shin tu rgyas pa/ sems
185a1(phal chen): can thams cad kyi gnas su gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad la mngon tu ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sprin
185a2(phal chen): gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis khyab par mdzad pa/ 'od zer gyi dra ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu gtong ba de/ pad mo chen po de
185a3(phal chen): la mngon par byung bar gyur to// ji ltar spos chu'i rgya mtsho rnam par dag pa'i 'od la rab tu gnas pa'i ri rab me tog gi 'od 'phro bas brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan/ gser shin tu 'bar ba'i
185a4(phal chen): rgyan ces bya ba'i rtse mo la nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas par sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal
185a5(phal chen): gyi sgra kun tu yang ri rab bye ba stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi rtse/ mo la bzhugs par kun nas snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho kun tu tshul rgya che ba kun gyi 'jig rten
185a6(phal chen): gyi khams kyi rgyud sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag gi gling bzhi pa thams cad na'ang / snying po byang chub la bzhugs par snang ngo // de nas
185a7(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyis/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su skyed pa zhes bya ba
185a8(phal chen): 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba rab tu bkye ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par mdzad nas/ 'dul ba thams cad yang dag
185b1(phal chen): par bskul to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyis 'od zer de dag bkye ma thag tu/ de'i mod la sems can thams cad kyi
185b2(phal chen): nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur/ bsgribs pa'i dra ba thams cad kyang shin tu bskul/ sangs rgyas blta ba la bsgribs pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par bcom/ sems
185b3(phal chen): can thams cad kyi rnyog pa yang rnam par dag/ dge ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyang rab tu byung / mos pa yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor yang yongs su dag/ mi khom pa dang / ngan song
185b4(phal chen): dang ngan 'gro'i g.yang sa dang / 'jigs pa tham das cad kyang rnam par bsal/ lus dang sems da kyi gnod pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi/ sangs rgyas
185b5(phal chen): mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs kyang rnam par dag/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu gzhol ba yang shin tu thob par gyur te/ de dag 'od zer des yang dag par
185b6(phal chen): skul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad 'khor brgya stong du ma dag gis bskor cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'dong bar gyur to// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la grong
185b7(phal chen): khyer chen po 'od 'phro ba'i 'od ces bya ba/ der rgyal po blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros shes bya ba/ grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i bdag po byung ste/ de la
185b8(phal chen): bud med bsod nams kyi dpal la sogs pa stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun yod do// de la bu gzi brjid chen po la sogs pa lnga brgya yod do// rgyal po'i bu gzi brjid chen po la yang
186a1(phal chen): bud med blta na bzang ba la sogs pa stong phrag bcu yod do// de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong
186a2(phal chen): nas/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rgyas chos bcu khong du chud par gyur to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud
186a3(phal chen): do// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings la/ sgo kun nas rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ tshul yangs pa'i sprin gyi snying po zhes
186a4(phal chen): bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ da/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste
186a5(phal chen): sgra'i sprin gyis kun nas rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ yon tan mtha' dang dpung med pas yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i
186a6(phal chen): dga' ba chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i btang snyoms chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ tshul gyi gzhi rgya chen po rgya mtsho'i/ 
186a7(phal chen): snying po zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa chen po khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/ mos pa rgya mtsho'i stobs dang shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i smon lam gyi tshul gyi sgo chen po khong du
186a8(phal chen): chud do// 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi 'od la yang dag par gzhol ba'i shugs shes bya ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes chen po'i sgo khong du chud do// de nas
186b1(phal chen): rgyal po gzhon nu gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba de/ chos kyi snang ba chen po thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ nyi ma
186b2(phal chen): mang po stong gi rnams// mkha' la mngon par 'phags pa bzhin// snying po byang chub dri med la// sangs rgyas 'od ni shin tu snang // bskal pa bya ba stong dag gis// mgon po
186b3(phal chen): 'jig rten byung ba ni// sangs rgyas yang dag skyes pa rnams// rgyal ba kun ni rab tu snang // bltos shig sangs rgyas 'od zer la// sangs rgyas sprin ni bsam mi khyab// gnas rnams kun na
186b4(phal chen): kun kyang snang // de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par bzhag/  'od 'phro'i sprin rnams rab bkye ba// 'od zer sprin la zad mi shes// 'jig rten 'di dag snang bar byed// sangs
186b5(phal chen): rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku dag/ las// 'od zer rnams ni dri med pa// sems can kun dang mnyam pa'i lus// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams
186b6(phal chen): rgyas 'gangs ltos// sangs rgyas gsung ni yid 'ong ba// 'gro ba kun du rab tu bsgrags// 'gro kun dbyangs kyi yan lag tu// sangs rgyas yon tan rnam par brjod// sangs rgyas
186b7(phal chen): 'od kyis phog pa yis// sems can kun kyang bde bar gyur// sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi// 'gre kun kun kyang dga' ba skyes// byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gyi rnams// rin
186b8(phal chen): chen sprin rnams rab 'gyed cing // bstod pa'i sprin gyis rgyal ba'i drung // phyogs bcu kun nas mngon par 'ongs// snying po byang chub 'di la yang // sgra'i rgya mtsho zab mo grag/ sems
187a1(phal chen): can thams cad sdug bsngal ni// sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul la ltos// kun kyang srid nu ldan gyur te// dga' zhing shin tu mos byas shing // chos
187a2(phal chen): kyi rgyal po blta ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten mgon gyi drung du 'dod// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi byin
187a3(phal chen): gyis rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi sgra thams cad kyi sems can gyi gnas kun du shin tu grags par gyur to// de nas rgyal po blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i blo gros kyis
187a4(phal chen): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas dga' ba chen po skyes te/ rang gi 'khor de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ zhang blon rnams dang gzhon nu dang // rgyal po'i mi dang blon
187a5(phal chen): po dang // tshong pa rnams dang de bzhin du// yul mi rnams kyang kun 'dus shig/ grong khyer rnams ni kun tu yang // rnga sgra dag gis myur du sgrogs// kun
187a6(phal chen): kyang 'thun par lhan cig tu// rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir dang shig/ srang rnams thams cad kun du yang // dge ba'i dril gyi sgra sgrogs shig/ bu dang chung ma 'khor bcas pa// rgyal ba blta
187a7(phal chen): ba'i phyir yang 'deng // grong khyer rnams kyang brgyan par gyis// rgyan rnams kun dang kun du res// rgyal mtshan dam pa bzang po'i rnams// nor bu sna tshogs brgyan pa sgreng // rin chen
187a8(phal chen): dra ba'i blar rnams// nam pa'i dkyil du bre bar gyis// namakha' 'di las thams cad du// sil snyan sprin gyi sgra dag phyung // lam gyi srang yang brgyan par gyis// rin chen char
187b1(phal chen): yang kun du phog/ gzhon pa rin chen bsdad par gyis// rgyal ba blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo // rang rang so so'i 'khor rnams kyis// sna tshogs sprin gyi char pobashig/ rgyan gyi sprin
187b2(phal chen): rnams thams cad kyis// na mkha'i dbyings kyang dgab par bgyis// spos dang pad mo'i 'od kyi sprin// me tog gdugs rnams bsam yas dang // se mo do dang 'bring sprin rnams/ 
187b3(phal chen): gos kyi sprin gyi char phob shig/ ri rab rnams dang spos kyi ri// nor bu'i 'khor los brgyan par gyis// dri med tsan dan phye ma'i rnams// nam mkha'i dkyil la rab tu ston// nor
187b4(phal chen): bu'i 'brang dang me tog 'phreng // rin chen phreng ba dri med dadang // rin chen sgron ma'i sprin gyi rnams/ nam mkha'i dbyings la sgrub par gyis// thams cad sangs
187b5(phal chen): rgyas mngon gyis la// dga' zhing spo ba'i sems bskye da de// bu dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams// rgyal/ kha blta phyir kun 'deng ngo // de nas rgyal bu blta na dga'
187b6(phal chen): ba shin tu gtsang ba'i bdag po bsod nams dpal la sogs pa bud med stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun dang / gzi brjid chen po la sogs pa gzhon nu lnga brgya dang / blo gros kyi stobs la
187b7(phal chen): sogs pa blon po stong phrag drug cu dang / de dag la sogs pa 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ grong khyer chen po 'od 'phro snang
187b8(phal chen): ba nas byung nas/ sde'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ na mkha'i dbyings su mngon par 'phags te/ rgyal po'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos na mkha' thams cad rgyan gyi
188a1(phal chen): / sprin thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te
188a2(phal chen): phyogs cig tu 'khod do// lha'i grong khyer shing gi me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba nas/ lha'i dbang po rab mtsho ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba lnga bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang lhan cig tu/ bcom
188a3(phal chen): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do// klu'i grong khyer kun du rdzogs pa nas kyang // klu'i rgyal po
188a4(phal chen): bcu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba/ klu bye ba nyi shu rtsa lnga dang lhan cig/ gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer rdo rje'i dpal rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba nas kyang / gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dpal
188a5(phal chen): pas rgyal ba zhes bya ba gnod sbyin bye ba bdun cu rtsa bdun dang lhan cig/ dri za'i grong khyer gzhal med khang / bzang po nas kyang / dri za'i rgyal po blta na dga' ba zhi bya ba dri za
188a6(phal chen): dgu bcu rtsa bdun dang lhan cig/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer 'khor lo'i tshen nas kyang lha ma yin gyi dbang po gzugs rnam par dag pa las/ sems dpa' zhes bya ba lha ma yin bye ba
188a7(phal chen): stong phrag lnga brgya'i 'khor gyis bskor ba/ nam mkha' lding gi grong khyer rin po che sna tshogs bzang po'i lte ba nas kyang na mkha' lding gi bdag po stobs bcu spyod pa zhes bya ba na mkha' lding gi 'khor
188a8(phal chen): dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang lhan cig/ mi 'am ci'i grong khyer rtse ba'i dga' ba dang ldan pa nas kyang / mi'am ci'i dbang po rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba/ mi 'am ci bye ba brag bco brgyad dang lhan
188b1(phal chen): cig/ lto 'phye chen po'i grong khyer rin po che rdo rje sra ba'i rgyal mtshan nas kyang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rin po che grags 'i rgya mtshan zhes bya ba lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
188b2(phal chen): phrag gsum dang lhan cig/ tshangs pa'i grong khyer rgyan bzang po sna tshogs nas kyang / tshangs pa'i dbang po gzhan gyis pham pa med pa zhes bya ba tshangs po bye ba phrag bco brgyad
188b3(phal chen): kyi 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal de bzhin gshegs pa gang na ba der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
188b4(phal chen): spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do// / de dag la sogs pa grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grong khyer gyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag nas/ sems can gyi
188b5(phal chen): ris tha dad pa na gnas pa'i rgyal po mang po 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs cig tu
188b6(phal chen): 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyis sems can de dag 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
188b7(phal chen): gyi rgya mtsho dar/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i mdo'i 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang bsam pa ji lta ba
188b8(phal chen): bzhin du sems can rnams la yongs su ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos chos kyi gzhung 'di bstan pa thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
189a1(phal chen): yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyis sngon yang dag par sgrubs pa'i chos rgya mtsho la chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi
189a2(phal chen): dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgol ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ thog ma chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa'i ye
189a3(phal chen): shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i mig rnam par dag pa la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas
189a4(phal chen): kyi chos thams cad kyi ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu snang zhing rnam par dbye ba'i smon lam rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ yon tan chen posatshe mtha' dang
189a5(phal chen): dpung med pa rnam par dag pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ sgo yangs pa nas snang ba zab mo yang dag par 'byung
189a6(phal chen): brgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs chen po'i shugs kyi snying po dang / mthu chen po'i rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ 
189a7(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med par sprul pas brgyan cing 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho tshad med par rab
189a8(phal chen): tu 'jug pa la mngon par sgrub pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs shing mos pa rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rgyan yang dag par bskur
189b1(phal chen): ba rgya mtsho la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med pa dang mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad
189b2(phal chen): mngon du bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho la ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos stobs dang mi 'jigs pa thams cad la ye shes
189b3(phal chen): kyi snang ba rab tu thob bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab kyi dpal gyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la ye shes
189b4(phal chen): kyi snang ba rab tu thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal da pa'i chos nyid 'di thos nas// bdag gi ye shes snang ba
189b5(phal chen): skyes// des ni sangs rgyas sngon spyod pa// rgya mtsho rnam sa kyang rab tu mthong // sku tshe kun tu ji lta bur// phun sum tshogs 'gyur kun kyang mthong // mtshan gyi rnam pa
189b6(phal chen): rnam dmigs dang // gang gis sangs rgyas mchod pa'ang shes// sngan chad sangs rgyas drung dag tu// bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod spyad de// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mang mchod nas// zhing gi
189b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs// sku'i rgya mtsho mang po dag/ rgya chen yongasu kun btang zhing // spyod pa'i dam pa rab spyad de// rgya mtsho'i zhing yang shin tu sbyangs// snyan dang shangs mang rgya mtsho
189b8(phal chen): dang // phyag zhabs dbu yang de bzhin te// rgyal srid btsun me'i 'khor btang zhing // zhing gi rgya mtsho yongs su sbyangs// zhing rnams so so re re la// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// byang chub
190a1(phal chen): spyod parab spyad de// zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam gyi// spyod pa rgya mtsho kun spyad nas// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun drung du
190a2(phal chen): zhing gi rgya mtsho rab tu sbyangs// ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od snang bas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba bzhin// sangs rgyas ye shes 'od snang bas// sngon gyi spyod pa rnams kyang mthong // byang chub
190a3(phal chen): 'tshang rgya zhi ba yi// chos kyi dbyings ni kun gang ba'i// zhing gi rgya mtsho dag pa'i rnams// dri med 'od can kun kyang mthong // sangs rgyas kun gyi byin brlabs kyis// byang chub spyad pa
190a4(phal chen): spyod pa'i tshe// zhing gi rgya mtsho yangs pa'i rnams// de ltar bdag gis sbyangs par bya// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen pos// bcom
190a5(phal chen): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri ri rab dpal gyi sprin de mthong ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mched pas de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon par
190a6(phal chen): khong du chud de/ 'jig rten thams cad ni snang bar byed/ sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho ni rab tu rjod/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i tshul ni rab tu sgrog/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon
190a7(phal chen): tan rgya mtsho'i tshul ni shin tu brjod/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyi sgo yongs su sbyang ba ni shin tu ston/ snying po byang chub thams cad la mngon par
190a8(phal chen): 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni rab tu brjod sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang / mi bsnyengs pa dang / ye shes tha mi dad pa ni shin tu brjod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sgo kun nas rnam par
190b1(phal chen): dmigs shing mthong ba ni rab tu brjod/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni shin tu ston/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha' dang dpung med pa'i rgyan ni rab tu ston/ 
190b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam ni mngon par sgrub pa byed cing / sems can ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sangs rgyas
190b3(phal chen): kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'ang yongs su 'dzin du btsud do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal gyi sprin gyis
190b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub don du khyod zhugs pa// gzi brjid chen po
190b5(phal chen): leg so legs// bsod nams snying po grags pa che/ snang ba khyod kyis rab tu non// chos kyi dbyings ni khyababyas shing // bsod nams chen po sprin ldan pa'i// sangs
190b6(phal chen): rgyas ye shes rgya mtshor 'gyur// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// zhing gcig na yang spyod spyad cing // nga yi ye shes ji lta bur// khyod kyis mthong ba de ltar 'gyur// tshul 'di kun nas shes
190b7(phal chen): par ni// brtson 'grus chung ngus mi nus te// brtson 'grus stobs chen ldan pa'i rnams// rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams dag par byed// thams cad rdul la 'jug tshul du// bskal pa rgya
190b8(phal chen): mtshor su spyod pa// rgya mtsho'i zhing gi rgyan gyi rnams// de la 'di 'drar rab tu 'gyur// sems can rnams ni re re'i phyir// bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad spyod cing // 'khor kyang skyo ba med pa'i rnams
191a1(phal chen): de dag 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur// bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar thug pas// rgyal ba re rer mchod byed kyang // gang gi sems la skyo med pa// de dag de bzhin
191a2(phal chen): gshegs par 'gyur// dus gsum gshegs pa'i mgon po kun// khyod kyi smon lam dbang gis gsal// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor rnams na// khyod kyi lus kyang rab tu gnas/ 
191a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kun gyi smon lam dag/ mtha' dang dpung med rgya mtsho la// blo chen gang rnams 'jug pa ni// de dag tshul 'dir gnas par 'gyur// ngal mchod pa byas pas kyang // gzi brjid
191a4(phal chen): chen po'i stobs chen gyis// sems can ri rdul mnyam pa/ byang chub yongs su smin par byas// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag/ kun tu bzang po dpa' ba'i rnams// chos kyi dbyings ni
191a5(phal chen): kun bkang zhing // zhing gi rgya mtsho dag par byed// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la bskal pa rgya chen po rig pa zhes bya ba de la// bskal pa bar ma chu klung gang ga'i bye ma
191a6(phal chen): snyed cig byung ste// de'i dus na mi rnams kyi tshe yang bskal pa bar ma gnyis thub par gyur te/ rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi ri bo ri rab dpal/ 
191a7(phal chen): gyi sprin de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni/ le bye ba phrag lnga bcur gyur to// de yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten
191a8(phal chen): du nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de nyid la byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i
191b1(phal chen): rnam par 'bral pa rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang sgo rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i snying po zhes bya ba rab tu thob bo// ye shes rgya chen po'i byin gyis rlabs dang
191b2(phal chen): chos kyi gleng gi gzungs kyang rab tu thob bo// kun gyi rjes su song bar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i byams pa chen po yang rab tu thob bo// dmigs pa'i sgo'i sprin thams cad kyis
191b3(phal chen): rgyas par byed pa zhes bya ba'i snying po yang rab tu thob bo// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rgya mtsho dang byin gyis brlabs kyi mdzod ces bya ba'i dga' ba chen po yang rab tu thob bo// chos kyi rang
191b4(phal chen): bzhin na mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i btang snyom sa chen po yang rab tu thob bo// rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i chos da kyi dbyings yongs su dag pa'i lus shes bya ba'i shes rab kyi
191b5(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa yang rab tu thob bo// chags pa med pa'i/ dbyings rnam par snang ba'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yang rab tu thob bo// rab tu khong du chud pas dri ma
191b6(phal chen): med pa'i klong la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa yang rab tu thob bo// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi snang
191b7(phal chen): ba yang rab tu thob bo// de dag la sogs pa chos kyi sgo stong phrag bcu kun nas non par gyur te/ de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu gzi brjid chen pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'khor gyi tshogs
191b8(phal chen): thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bskal pa bye ba bsam gyis mi khyab du/ 'jig rten gtso'i dam pa shin tu dkon// sangs rgyas zhing 'di sems can thob rab thob// de dag sangs rgya
192a1(phal chen): gnyis pa 'di yang mthong // sangs rgyas sku las 'od rnams rab bkye ba// kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnam par dag/ 'od zer sprin gyis 'jig rten kun tu khyag/ kun/ 
192a2(phal chen): tu rgyal ba'i yon tan grags par byed// 'od kyis reg pa rmad kyi dga' ba skye// 'gro ba de dag kun gyi sdug bsngal zhi// phan tshun sri zhu byams pa'i sems gyur cing // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul
192a3(phal chen): 'di dag kun kyang mthong // sprul pa'i dra ba'i sprin rnams bsam mi khyab// rnam pa du ma'i 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams kun kyang sa byas shing // sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu
192a4(phal chen): ston/ nga rgyal ba rnams kyi spu rtse re re nas// dbyangs sprin bkye ba sran mkha' kun bkang zhing // mun nag chen po kun nas snang bar byed// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun kyang rnam par sel// sangs
192a5(phal chen): rgyas dbyangs ni phyogs rnams bcu po na// sems can rnams kyi sngon dge rgya mtsho rnams// thams cad dbyangs kyis kun tu sgra yang sgrog/ sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ltos/ 
192a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas 'khor rnams rgya mtsho rgya che ba// mtha' dang dpung med yang dag rab tu byung // de na rgyal ba chos kyi 'khor lo skor// sems can rgya mtsho mi zad rnams kyang 'dul// tshad med rnam par
192a7(phal chen): 'phrul pa dag la bltos// zhing rnams kun na rgyal ba mngon par bzhugs// de ltar bde gshegs ye shes chags pa med// sems can don tu rnam par mngon sangs rgyas// dga' zhing mos
192a8(phal chen): bar kun kyang 'dong bar gyis// bde ba'i yid dang sri zhu spro ba yis// bde gshegs de ni blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo // de mthong sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// byang chub sems ni yang dag
192b1(phal chen): bskyed byas shing // 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i sems 'gyur te// kun tu bzang ngo'i smon lam kun btab cing // chos rgyal ji bzhin bdag cag 'gyur bar bya// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
192b2(phal chen): rlabs kyis de'i sgra la thogs pa med pas// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par gyur te// de thos pa'i sems can chad med pa rnams kyang byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur to// de yang
192b3(phal chen): pa dang ma dang lhan cig tu 'khor thams cad dang // sems can bye ba phrag khrag khrig brgya stong de dag gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin lngas na mkha' thams cad du
192b4(phal chen): kun nas yog par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bde dadong ngo // 'ongs pa de dag la bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas
192b5(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i mdo/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdza 'i 'khor can yang dag par bstan to// des de zos nas tshul
192b6(phal chen): thams cad rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa 'byung bar rab tu skyes so// ye shes kyi rim pa rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba yang non par gyur to// pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor
192b7(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar lta ba'i rgyan ces bya ba la yang zhugs par gyur to// zhing thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa dang snang ba mtha' yas pa mthong bas rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor
192b8(phal chen): la yang rab tu zhug so// spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsod nams kyi sprin dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// rjesu rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chos rgya
193a1(phal chen): mtsho 'byam klas pa thams cad snang ba zhes bya ba yang rjes su rtogs par gyur to// 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor ye shes chen po'i shugs kyi rgyun ces bya ba la sang
193a2(phal chen): rab tu zhugs so// rang byung du 'gyur ba shin tu mthong ba'i shugs kyi dbang skur ba'i ye shes rgya mtsho la yang zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i mtshan nyid kyi 'ong/ 
193a3(phal chen): rnam par snang ba'i snang ba chen pos kyang shin tu snang bar gyur to// smon lam gyi stobs tshad med pa la mos pa rgya mtsho'i snying po'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi stobs la yang rnam
193a4(phal chen): par dag par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pa/ rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal pos/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigasu bcad de gsungs
193a5(phal chen): pa/ legs so yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho can// sangs rgyas byang chub smon lam yang dag gnas// sems can kun gyi mgon dang gnas gyur pa'i// rgyal ba dam pa bsam gyi
193a6(phal chen): khyab 'gyur// ye shes rgya mtsho chen por mngon par byung // chos kyi dbyingasu thams cad rgyas byas te// sangs rgyas spyod yul rgya chen mi zad pa'i// bsam gyis mi khyab tshul la 'jug par
193a7(phal chen): 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad yon tan sprin mthong ba'i// ye shes sa yang mi zad non par gyur// pha rol byin pa rgya mtsho kun gyi tshul// grags pa chen po yongs su rgyas par byed// 
193a8(phal chen): gzungs kyi tshul rnams rgya mtsho mang po dang // so so yang dag rig tshul mi zad dang // spyod pa smon lam khyod kyis mngon bsgrubs pas// gzhal med ye shes ldan par khyod 'gyur ro// ting nge
193b1(phal chen): 'dzin gyi rgya mtshor 'jug par 'gyur// smon lam rgya mtsho'i nang du khyod skyes te// rnam 'phrul 'di la'ang shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid bsam mi khyab// chos dbyings
193b2(phal chen): dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bsam pa rgya chen rnam par sbyang byas te// sangs rgyas sprin la rnam par blta bar gyis// rgya mtsho'i zhing rnams dri med rnam par sbyongs// nga yi byang chub
193b3(phal chen): spyod la 'jug par gyis// sngon gyi sbyor tshul rgya mtsho mang po'i// spyod pa ngas ni ji ltar rnam sbyangasu// de 'dra'i tshul yang khyod kyis shes par gyis// zhing rnams re re sangs rgyas mang po ngas// 
193b4(phal chen): rgya mtsho brgya mang shin tu mchod pa byas// sngon spyod de'i 'bras bu 'di yin te// 'di 'dra dri ma med pa'i rgyan la ltos// / las kyi rgya mtsho mi zad rgya chen dang // zhing rnams rgya mtsho
193b5(phal chen): dag bya'i spyod pa dang // smon lam bsam yas go cha bgos pas na// 'di rnams 'di 'dra'i rnam par 'phrul/ bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho ma lus mchod byas
193b6(phal chen): shing // zhing rnams rgya chen rgya mtsho sbyangs byas nas// bskal pa 'byam klas kun tu spyad byas shing // rgyal ba'i yon tan 'od chen mnga' bar 'gyur// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bzhi
193b7(phal chen): gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyan bzang po rgyan gyi rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas// blta na dga' ba shin tu gtsang ba'i bdag po de yang dus byas par gyur te/ rgyal bu gzhon
193b8(phal chen): nu gzi brjid chen pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par gyur to// nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba der yang / de bzhin gshegs
194a1(phal chen): pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba gsum pa byung bar gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de mngon par 'tshang
194a2(phal chen): rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas/ 'khor thams cad dang dpung gi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs dang / rin po che bdun dang / grong gi mi dang / yul mir bcas te/ bcom ldan
194a3(phal chen): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pa gang na bzhugs pa der dong nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de la rin po che'i khang
194a4(phal chen): pa brtsegs pa spos dang nor bu thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba phul lo// der de bzhin gshegs pa des kun tu lta ba'i spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba zhes
194a5(phal chen): bya ba'i mdo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor dang bcas pa'ang yang dag / bar bshad par gyur to// de thos nas byang chub sems dpa
194a6(phal chen): gzi brjid chen pos/ bsod nams chen po rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab thob bo// ting nge 'dzin de thob pas kyang // dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams
194a7(phal chen): rgya mtsho mngon du gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams rgya mtsho shin tu 'phags shing / zil gyis mi non pas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rnam
194a8(phal chen): par gzigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po la tshigasu bcad de gsungs pa// yon tan bsod nams kun gyi gzi brjid can// byang chub mchog du smon lam yid ldan pa/ 
194b1(phal chen): 'gro ba kun la snying rje rgya mtsho yis// nga yi drung du khyod 'ongs legaso legs// snying rje'i snying po khyod ni sems can rnams// sdug bsngal gyur pa kun grol don zhugs pas// 'gro ba kun gyi mgon
194b2(phal chen): dang skyab su 'gyur// byang chub spyod pa'i tshul yang de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' shin tu brtan pa'i rnams// skyo med yid kyis spyad pa spyod pa dag/ mchog tu gyur cing dam pa chags / 
194b3(phal chen): pa'i// ye shes 'di 'dra shin tu thob par 'gyur// de ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang po yi// mthu chen smon lam spyod par zhugs pas na// bsod nams 'od dang bsod nams dpal yin te// bsod
194b4(phal chen): nams 'byung gnas bsod nams mchog kyang yin// bsam gyi rangs mi khyab rgyal ba rgya mtsho dag/ mtha' dang dpung med mang po khyod kyis shes// mtha' dang dpung med de dag mthong gyur nas/ 
194b5(phal chen): de dag bsod nams rgya mtsho rtogs par 'gyur// khyod kyis phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad kyi// rgyal ba'i sprin rnams kun kyang shin tu mthong // de dag spyod pa rgya
194b6(phal chen): mtshe thams cad kyang // sngan chad ji ltar spyad pa bzhin du mthong // 'di tshul rgya mtsho 'di la su zhugs shing // ye shes sa la su dag gnas gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes slob cing / 
194b7(phal chen): thams cad gzigs par gdon mi za bar 'gyur ro// khyod ni zhing kun rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed kyi// bskal pa rgya mtsho'i spyod pa spyad byas nas// rgyal ba kun gyi sngon spyad rgya mtsho rnams// bslabs
194b8(phal chen): nas rang byung nyid du 'gyur bar 'ong // zhing rnams rgya mtsho yongs su dag pa'i rnams// phyogs bcu dag tu ji ltar mthong ba bzhin// khyod kyi zhing yang rnam par dag 'gyur te// smon lam kun
195a1(phal chen): kyang shin tu sgrog par 'gyur// 'khor gyi rgya mtsho 'di dag thams cad kyang // khyod kyi smon lam thos gyur rab tu dga'// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i lam dag
195a2(phal chen): gis// byang chub mchog la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur// mtha' dang dpung med zhing rnams 'byam klas par// bskal pa rgya mtsho dag tu spyad pa spyod// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thams cad dang // smon
195a3(phal chen): lam rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyis// nags tshal chen po yal ga'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i me tog rgyas pa de nyid du// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grag pa'i
195a4(phal chen): spyan pad mo'i dpal zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to// rgyal po gzi brjid chen po de yang de nas shi 'phos nas rgya mtsho'i steng na lha'i grong khyer rin po che zhi ba'i gnas shes bya bar
195a5(phal chen): byin te/ der bsod nams dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i lha'i rgyal po chen por gyur to// de nas de lha'i 'kho/ ra gyi tshogs chen po dang bcas te// rin po che'i me tog
195a6(phal chen): gi sprin gyi char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grags pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dpal gang na bzhugs pa der dong ngo // der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
195a7(phal chen): gshegs pa grags pa rnam par grag pa'i spyan pad+mo'i dpal gyis tshul yangs pa'i sgo kun tu rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i mdo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdo'i 'khor
195a8(phal chen): dang bcas pa yang dag par bstan to// des de dag zos nas dga' ba'i snying po kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo// chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyingasu yang zhugs
195b1(phal chen): par gyur to// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las rnam par snang mdzad kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// bam po bcu gsum pa// bcom ldan
195b2(phal chen): 'das 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ni// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i dbyibs
195b3(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab ni kun tu bzang po tshangs pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni yongasu 'dzin pa
195b4(phal chen): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa da// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni lhan cig spyod dpa 'phrul dga'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ stong
195b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa/ dga' ldan gyi lha'ilus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'arje garten gyi khams ni gnas kyi dam pa mtshe ma'i lha'i lus
195b6(phal chen): kyi dbyibs ltar 'jug pa/ gling ni byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ grong rdal gyi mdzod mtha' yas pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar
195b7(phal chen): 'dug pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba ni mya ngan dang bral ba/ snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyib su 'dug pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa ni kun nas smad du med pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rang bzhin
195b8(phal chen): chos nyid kyis gnas pa'i dbyibasu 'dug pa na bzhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tshad med pas kun nas bskor ba ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin
195'a1(phal chen): gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la gnas par ming 'thun pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang / de bzhin gshegs
195'a2(phal chen): ba'i sku'i dbyibs su 'dug pa sha stag dang / gzhung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi lag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par ming 'thun
195'a3(phal chen): pa/ thams cad nyan thos kyi lus kyi dbyibasu 'dug pa sha stag dang / gzhung de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi/ 
195'a4(phal chen): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin/ pa'i lag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas par ming 'bru/ ngan pa thams cad kyang / mi ma yin pa'i lus kyi dbyibasu
195'a5(phal chen): 'dug pa sha stag gis yongasu bskor ba ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni sangs rgyas kyis rgya mtsho// 'jig/ rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bar snyed kyi ma
195'a6(phal chen): dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi gnas 'phos pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mgul dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
195'a7(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi phrag pa'i lhun dang ldan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lag pa dang ldan
195'a8(phal chen): pa'o// snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi kham
195'b1(phal chen): rgya mcho ba cu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lho dang ldan pa'o// nyan pos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba rgya ma do 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu rdus shin tu gru ba skyed
195'b2(phal chen): ba spu'i bu ga dang ldan pa'o// rang sangs rgyas kyis rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sta zur dang ldan pa'o// nyan thos kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
195'b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bad+ma dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten pa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byin pa dang ldan pa'o// 
195'b4(phal chen): sems can gyi khams kyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten dgyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni
195'b5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi kha mas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi spyi gtsug dang
195'b6(phal chen): ldan pa'o// chos kyi dbyings na mkha' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'phral ba dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rang bzhin gyis 'od gas
195'b7(phal chen): ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdzod spu dang ldan pa'o// byang chub kyi lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
195'b8(phal chen): snyed kyi smin tshugs dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan gyi khams gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
196a1(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mig dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa snyan gyi khams gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
196a2(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rna pa dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa shangs kyi khams gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgyu mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya ma
196a3(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snang ba dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ljags kyi khams gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
196a4(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin garags pa sku'i khams gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad/ kyi dbang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
196a5(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa thugs kyi khams gangs chen mtsho rnam par snangamadzad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu
196a6(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yid dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku sprul pa rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
196a7(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sku dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud 'dul ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skur sprul pa rgya mtsho/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
196a8(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ba spu dang ldan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i dbang po rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mdog dang ldan pa'o// rnam par
196b1(phal chen): thar pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi kha dang ldan pa'o// chos kyi ro rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sgom dang ldan
196b2(phal chen): nga'o// sems can yongs su smin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zas dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni 'jig rten gyi khams
196b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas yog par khebs pa'o// 
196b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi sprin rgya mtsho 'jig rten dgyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi char mngon par 'bab pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
196b5(phal chen): dril bu'i dra ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun tu bres pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bla re 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
196b6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam par bkram pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis
196b7(phal chen): kun tu khebs par bkang ba'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni/ kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin
196b8(phal chen): du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// mig sna tshogs kyi chu rgya
197a1(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lde dang / lus dang / yid kyi chu rgya
197a2(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho re re nas yid kyi chu rgya mtsho'i bar re re las kyang / me tog ud pa la dang
197a3(phal chen): pad mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon te/ me tog ud pa la de dag re re dang / me tog pun da ri ka de dag re re
197a4(phal chen): la yang me tog ud pa la'i 'khor dang / me tog pun da da ri ka'i 'khor gyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu bla snyed dang ldan pa ste/ me tog ud pa la
197a5(phal chen): dang me tog pun da ri ka'i bar de dag re re las kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab rnam par phye ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par
197a6(phal chen): byung ba dag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri'i rgyan dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi pad mo'i tshal dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi smig ma'i tshal mang po dag kyang mngon par 'thon pa sha
197a7(phal chen): stag go/ ci'i phyir kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/ de dag tu sems can gang yang rung ste/ chu 'thung ngam/ khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyis
197a8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di'i gzugasu snang ba 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba'am/ nang gi 'am/ byi'i 'am/ che ba 'am/ chung ba'am/ bzang ba'am/ ngan pa'am
197b1(phal chen): rgyang ring po 'am/ thag nye ba yang rung ste/ gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad khongs na snang bar so so'i mig gis mngon par mthong bas de'i phyir/ kha dog gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la 'dos
197b2(phal chen): gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi chu rgya mtsho dag kyang shes par bya'o// ci'i phyir mig gi chu rgya mtsho la mig gi chu/ 
197b3(phal chen): rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe no/ de dag du sems can gang yang rung ste chu 'thung ba dang / khrus byed pa de dag thams cad kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/ 
197b4(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na/ gzugs su sna dpa 'das pa'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am/ phyi'i 'am/ che ba'am/ chung ba
197b5(phal chen): 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring po 'am/ zag nye ba'ang rung ste/ gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nang na snang bar rang rang gi mig dang gzhan gyi
197b6(phal chen): mig gis mngon par mthong bas/ de'i phyir mig gi chu rgya mtsho rnams la mig gi chu rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi chu rgya mtsho dag
197b7(phal chen): kyang shes par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gzugs brnyan/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis lhun shin tu brgyan
197b8(phal chen): pa ste/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho rab tu snang ba'i dpe byad bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par gsal bar byas pa'i lus can no// 
198a1(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho zab mo 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mtshan dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshod ni 'jig
198a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du/ rdul shin tu phra ba re re la yang gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bar 'byung ba'o// ci'i phyir
198a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi dmas rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas bde la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi/ 
198a4(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho zhes bya zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i phyag gi mthil na rdul shin tu phra ba'i snying po
198a5(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i nang na rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i/ rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// de dag gi steng na chos kyi
198a6(phal chen): dbyings rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na na mkha'i dbyings rgya mtshos mtshams yongasu chad pa med
198a7(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na me'i khams rgya mtsho drag shul can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
198a8(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na chu'i khams kyi rgya mtsho sbrang rtsi can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gan so// de dag
198b1(phal chen): gi steng na sa'i khams rgya mtsho rin po che'i snying po can zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu gnas so// de dag gi steng na me tog mtshan ma med pa las skyes
198b2(phal chen): ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'then te/ me tog de dag kyang so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig
198b3(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tsam gyi thag gru dang ldan pa ste/ de dag gi steng na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'di gnas pas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi
198b4(phal chen): mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa de la/ de bzhin da gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya'o// de lta de ltar de dag/ 
198b5(phal chen): la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
198b6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na/ yon tan ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de skad ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun
198b7(phal chen): tu bzang po zhes bya ba/ tshangs pa'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor dang ldan pa
198b8(phal chen): yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i spo mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
199a1(phal chen): sed dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bang rim chen po'i khri'ang du drug/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu thu ba sted/ 
199a2(phal chen): dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i ngos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa'o// ci'i phyir na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de la
199a3(phal chen): kun tu bzang po zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de na yongs su ma dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang yang med de/ der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad
199a4(phal chen): chos gang dang gang la yongs su dmigs pa byed pa'i dmig/ ngas pa de dang des kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun
199a5(phal chen): tu bzang po de la kun tu bzang ngo zhes bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab ni de ltar de dag la sogs pa yon tan tshad med pa dag dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na 'jig rten gyi
199a6(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho de na/ yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po do na yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po de na/ stong
199a7(phal chen): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang
199a8(phal chen): bo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de ni lha'i rnam par dgod
199b1(phal chen): pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad la rab tu gnas pa'o// de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / 
199b2(phal chen): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i rnam par dgod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par dgod pa 'jig/ 
199b3(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi rnam par dgod pa 'jig rten gyi
199b4(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigarten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba der sems can
199b5(phal chen): gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag kyang / 'du shes tha dad pa ma gtogs par lam gyi rgyud la tha dad pa med do// skye gnas tha dad pa med do// theg pa tha dad pa med do// 
199b6(phal chen): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba de la/ ci'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongasu
199b7(phal chen): 'dzin pa der sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad la/ ngan song gi 'jigs pa yang med/ theg pa dman par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ ser snar ltung ba'i 'jigs
199b8(phal chen): ba'ang med/ tshul khrims ngan par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ mi bzod par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ le lor ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ rnam par 'khrug par ltung
200a1(phal chen): pa'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ shes rab 'chal bar ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'ang med pas/ de'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa'i stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig
200a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams la yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yong su 'dzin pa de ni yon tan ched med pa mang po dang ldan pa ste/ 
200a3(phal chen): mdor na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kun tu bzang po na yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa na yod do// 
200a4(phal chen): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongasu 'dzin pa de na/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba 'phrul dga'i lha'i dbyibasu 'dug pa/ 
200a5(phal chen): stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi/ khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor/ kyis bskor ba yod do// steng gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ 
200a6(phal chen): lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de na rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od rgya mtsho mang po dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od gzer gyi dra ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// 
200a7(phal chen): rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rgya
200a8(phal chen): mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po rgya
200b1(phal chen): mtshe dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad phung drung du bya ba rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// rtag tu bdud kyi las thams cad yongs su gcod pa rgya mtsho dang mi 'bral lo// 
200b2(phal chen): stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba dang / sems can gang ji skad cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
200b3(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
200b4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba de la ci'i phyir na lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya zhe na
200b5(phal chen): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang lhan cig 'grogs shing 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
200b6(phal chen): pra ba snyed kyi chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag thams cad du rnam par spyod pas lhan cig spyod pa de la lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa stong gnyis kyi 'jig
200b7(phal chen): rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod
200b8(phal chen): pa/ de snyed kyi yon tan ni stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de na yod do// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa zhes bya ba na/ stong gi 'jig rten
201a1(phal chen): gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba dga' ldan gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyings su 'dug pa/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
201a2(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba de na/ bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten
201a3(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang ba mtha' yas kyi chos kyi sku 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
201a4(phal chen): snyad kyis rgyas par gang ba/ chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho 'ji ngag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par brlan pa ste/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
201a5(phal chen): kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba der/ sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i/ 
201a6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya
201a7(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa nas/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
201a8(phal chen): bar la rab tu gnas pa/ mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sems can yongasu smin par bya ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten
201b1(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha
201b2(phal chen): stag go/ ci'i phyir na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba de la kun tu spyod pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
201b3(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag na/ chos kyi khams rgya mtsho dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgyas kyi khams rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' khams rgya mtsho dang
201b4(phal chen): sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ji snyed pa de dag thams dacad kun nas rnam par spyod pas kun tu spyod pa de la kun tu spyod pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa stong
201b5(phal chen): gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa de ni yon tanaH med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams lhan cig spyod pa de na yon tan
201b6(phal chen): gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa na yod do// stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa zhes bya ba den gling bzhi pa gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba ma/ 
201b7(phal chen): ma'i lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ gling bzhi pa'i
201b8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de ni snying po byang chub rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/ snying po byang chub
202a1(phal chen): kyi rgyan de dag de re la snang se ge'i khri rgya mtsho'i rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu ba skyed dpa tu gnas pa/ se ge'i khro rgyan te/ 
202a2(phal chen): dag re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mang po 'khod pa ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa der
202a3(phal chen): sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus dang spyod lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang
202a4(phal chen): ldan pa sgo mtha' yas po nas/ mngon par sgrub pa'i de mdo/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shi ngan tu phra ba snyad yongs su 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
202a5(phal chen): thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi
202a6(phal chen): dam pa zhes bya ba de la/ gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa na/ sems can rnams kyi 'byung gnas dang gnas
202a7(phal chen): su bya ba'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gi nang na 'di mchog tu bya bas na/ de'i phyir gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de la gnas
202a8(phal chen): kyi dam pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de ni yon tan gzhal du med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na stong gi 'jig
202b1(phal chen): rten gyi khams kun tu spyod pa na/ yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pabaden yod do// gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi
202b2(phal chen): khams gnas kyi dam pa zhes bya ba de na/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa/ gling 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
202b3(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba yod de/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan ces bya ba de ni rin po che'i ri khang pa brtsegs pa ltar 'dug pa/ rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
202b4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis kun nas bskor ba/ de bzhin ga/ shegs pa'i ye shes kyi 'od gzer gyi dra ba rgya mtsho 'ji ngag rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/ 
202b5(phal chen): kun tu khyab pa chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par brlan pa ste/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan
202b6(phal chen): zhes bya ba der/ sems can gong ji snyed skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyan gyi dam par gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
202b7(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ theg pa tha dad pas 'byung ba rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mkhas pa/ chos kyi dbyings
202b8(phal chen): rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rnam par spyod pa sha stag go// ci'i phyir na gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la/ byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan
