203a1(phal chen): zhes bya na na/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de na byang chub kyi shing rnam pa'i rten ces bya ba// byang chub kyi shing 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas
203a2(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ der skad cig skad cig du de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par rdzogs
203a3(phal chen): par 'tshang rgya bas/ de'i phyir gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de la byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o// da ltar de dag la sogs pa gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang
203a4(phal chen): ldan pa ste/ mdor na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas kyi dam pa de na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de dag ni/ gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na/ 
203a5(phal chen): yod do// gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa grong rdal 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
203a6(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
203a7(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho re re zhing yang / ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
203a8(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi 'ongs rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
203b1(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ni gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / yon tan gyi me tog
203b2(phal chen): ud pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu pra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par gang ba'o// grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de
203b3(phal chen): ni byang chubakyi sems rin po che shin tu rnam par dag pa'i pha gu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las brtsigs pa/ sa bcu'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang
203b4(phal chen): gzhal med khang gi phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par phye ba ste/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa der sems can
203b5(phal chen): gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi sku dang ngang tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa/ skad cig skad cig ci sems can
203b6(phal chen): gyi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
203b7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sdug bsngal gyi drung po rgya mtsho'i khur/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bkur ba la yongs su skyo ba med pa sha stag go/ ci'i phyir na grong
203b8(phal chen): rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya zhe na/ grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de'i sa'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ chu'i khams kyi rdul
204a1(phal chen): shin tu phra ba 'am/ me'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ rlung gi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ namakha'i khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba
204a2(phal chen): yang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de dag la chos kyi mdzod rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed ma bzhag pa de lta bu gang yang med pas// de'i
204a3(phal chen): phyir grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de la mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na gling byang
204a4(phal chen): chub kyi rgyal mtshan na yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa'i yon tan de skad ni grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de na yod do// grong rdal mdzod mtha
204a5(phal chen): yas pa de na bza' shing gi rab mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba/ snying po byang chub mya ngan med pa'i dbyibasu 'dug pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
204a6(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/ bza' shing gi rab mya ngan dang bral ba de na nags tshal rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ 
204a7(phal chen): nags tshal de dag kyang so so nas stong pa nyid kyi gser rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyu las grub pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi 'od rgya mtsho
204a8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi me tog dang ldan pa'o// rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ba cu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'bras bu/ 
204b1(phal chen): dang ldan pa'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad sdig pa las yongs su skyobs pa/ rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lo ma dang ldan pa'o// sems can
204b2(phal chen): gyi khams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shi du phra ba snyed kyi grib ma bsil ba dang ldan pa'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa'i sa rgyu
204b3(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la/ snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba rab tu gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gangs chen mtsho'i sngon
204b4(phal chen): gyi smon lam rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi yal ga dang ldan pa'o// rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i dar gyi lnga ldi dang / chun po rgya mtsho
204b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ kun tu bres pa'o// dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa'i/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bden rgya mtsho 'jig
204b6(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par bskrang pa'o// bza' shing gi rab mya ngan dang bral ba de ni rdzing rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams brgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
204b7(phal chen): kyis yongs su brgyan pa ste/ rdzing de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ni gnas rgya mtsho'i chu 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o// rdzing
204b8(phal chen): de dag re re zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang yon tan gyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad mo dang / pun da ri ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis
205a1(phal chen): kun nas khyab par gang ba'o// bza' shing gri ba mya ngan dang bral ba der sems can ji snyed cig 'dong ba de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
205a2(phal chen): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes gangs chen mtsho'i sku dang thugs dang phrin las mnyam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par 'gyur ba sha
205a3(phal chen): stag ste/ dus gsum thams cad du thog pa med pa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag go/ ci'i phyir na
205a4(phal chen): bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de la mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya zhe na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya
205a5(phal chen): ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba bzhugs ste/ de dang 'thun/ pa'i rgyus grub pas de'i phyir na bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan/ dang bral ba de la/ mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o// de dag
205a6(phal chen): la sogs pa bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa ste/ mdor na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa na yon tan gang ji skad yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni bza'
205a7(phal chen): shing ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de na yod do// bza' shing gi ra ba mya ngan dang bral ba de'i nang na khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rang bzhin chos nyid kyis
205a8(phal chen): gnas pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa/ khang pa rtsegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod do// khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med
205b1(phal chen): ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bskyed las byung ba'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi
205b2(phal chen): bsam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi snying po dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dam pa'i rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
205b3(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rjes su 'dong pa'o// khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa der/ sems can gang ji snyed skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das de
205b4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams de rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis sprul pa/ ye shes
205b5(phal chen): sgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rnam par bsgrubs pa/ ye shes rgyu ma rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra
205b6(phal chen): ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa theb pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su bsgrubs pa
205b7(phal chen): gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis sems can de dag gi spu'i bu ga ra ra nas mngon par grub pa sha stag go/ ci'i phyir na khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de la// kun+da nas smad
205b8(phal chen): du med pa zhes bya zhe na chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de la kun
206a1(phal chen): nas smad du med pa zhes bya'o// de ltar de dag la sogs pa khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med den ston ga ldan ste/ mdor na bza' shing gi ba mya ngan dang / 
206a2(phal chen): bral ba na/ yon tan gang ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi yon tan ni khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de na yod do// de lta bu'i pho brang brtsegs pa kun nas smad du med pa de na/ byang chub
206a3(phal chen): sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i lhun dang ldan pa'i seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
206a4(phal chen): gangs chen mtshe rnam par snang mdzad 'das pa dang dam 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
206a5(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor cing / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
206a6(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor te/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos kyi 'khor gyi rnam pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
206a7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor cing / de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang
206a8(phal chen): mi ma yin pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas bskor cing bzhug sa
206b1(phal chen): rnam par spyod do// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar
206b2(phal chen): byung ba de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
206b3(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ rang sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams mtsho bcu'i
206b4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyan thos 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
206b5(phal chen): mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa de bzhin du/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am/ 
206b6(phal chen): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi yin pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
206b7(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyi 'khor dang / de ltar 'khor dang / 'khor gyi 'khor gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du shes par bya'o// 
206b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa'
207a1(phal chen): re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar re re dag kyang lus rnam pa tha dad pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag
207a2(phal chen): ste/ lus rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las lus re re la yang mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i
207a3(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// mgo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag las mgo re re la yang mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad
207a4(phal chen): brgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lnga dang / lus dang / yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho
207a5(phal chen): bar du yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ mig gi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pargyamatsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phrag
207a6(phal chen): snyed nas yid kyi dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bar 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag la dbang po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las/ dbang po ra ra la yang
207a7(phal chen): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam
207a8(phal chen): par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa/ rgya mtsho'i bar du 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa rgya mtsho nas/ yid kyi rnam
207b1(phal chen): par shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dgu la rnam par shes pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las rnam par shes pa re re la yang ye shes
207b2(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod do// ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag
207b3(phal chen): la ya shes ji skad cig yod pa de dag las ye shes re ras kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po'i sangs rgyas tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i ye shes rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i tshul du/ chos kyi
207b4(phal chen): 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu bskor ba byed do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du
207b5(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du nyan thos dang / de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci
207b6(phal chen): dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la yang shes par bya ste/ ye shes la ji lta ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la yang shra pa bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 
207b7(phal chen): mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi gnas kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed yod pa dang / stan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i yon tan
207b8(phal chen): rnam par phye ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / rgyan gyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / gos kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag dang / byang chub
208a1(phal chen): sems dpa' nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag gi mig gi rdul shin tu pra ba re re nas lus kyi rdul shin tu phra ba re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
208a2(phal chen): du rgyas par 'gengs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis/ bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
208a3(phal chen): snyed du bstan cing brjod kyang zad par mi rung ngo // / bam po bcu bzhi pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis sku'i ba spu'i bu ga re re nas
208a4(phal chen): kyang / 'od gzer rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bkye'o// 'od gzer rgya mtsho de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho pad+ma rgya mtsho la
208a5(phal chen): bzhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par byung ste/ sangs rgyas re re'i sku'i ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs/ 
208a6(phal chen): bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon to// de dag las yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho re re zhing shwar phyogs kyi
208a7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa dang / rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / rdul shin tu phra ba re re la byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / rang sangs
208a8(phal chen): rgyas rgya mtsho dang / nyan thos rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dad / 
208b1(phal chen): mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad la yongs su skul ba byed do// shar phyogs dang 'dra bar phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du de bzhin te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya
208b2(phal chen): mtsho de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od gzer gyis yang dag par bskul nas
208b3(phal chen): rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho dag na/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang bzhugs pa de dag la zhus te gnang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar
208b4(phal chen): de dag re re zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor rgya mtsho'i bar dang ldan par 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag
208b5(phal chen): gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa gang na ba der 'dong bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bde dag la byang chub sems dpa' ji
208b6(phal chen): snyed cig yod pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' re re dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag re re zhing yang lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams
208b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ lus re re la yang lhag pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ lus re re la yang
208b8(phal chen): mgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ mgo re re la yang kha'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa/ kha'i
209a1(phal chen): sgo re re la yang lce rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod pa sha stag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho de dag dang / mi dang
209a2(phal chen): mi ma yin pa'i bar rgya mtsho de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la lus re res kyang g.yas phyogs su bskor ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten
209a3(phal chen): gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis bskor ba byas te/ lag pa re re nas kyang me tog rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod nas/ de bzhin
209a4(phal chen): du mar me dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
209a5(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod de/ lha re re zhing yang bstod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i/ rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis mngon par bstod nas
209a6(phal chen): rang rang gi stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul pa'i stan rgya mtsho dag la 'khod par gyur to// 'khod nas kyang lho re re zhing zhu ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs
209a7(phal chen): su nub byed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtshe rnam par snang mdzad des zhus pa de dag re re la shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
209a8(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyis shin tu bstan pa mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rgya mtsho'i bar rnam pa de ltar 'dus pa de dag thams cad
209b1(phal chen): la chos rgya mtsho mang po rnam grangs du mar rnam par phye'o// rnam par bkrol lo// gsal bar mdzad do// yang dag par bstan to// de nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
209b2(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gnas kyi snying po zhes bya ba yod de// de na
209b3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes te/ thog mar yang dag/ bar du yang dge/ tha mar yang dag pa'i
209b4(phal chen): chos / don bzang po/ yi ge bzang po dang / dag pa / yongs su gsal ba/ yongs su byang ba/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston cing / byang chub sems dpa'
209b5(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu ston pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par
209b6(phal chen): snang mdzad de'i gnas kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji skad cig mnga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sku tshe'i yon tan rnam
209b7(phal chen): par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / skra yongs su bstan pa'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya
209b8(phal chen): mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba dang / chos bstan pa'i yon tan rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho ji snyed cig mnga' ba de dag ni/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
210a1(phal chen): kyis dus gsum rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed du gsungs te/ bstan kyang zad par mi rung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams
210a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gnas kyi snying po zhes bya ba de ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
210a3(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i bdag po lha dang mi'i dbang po yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshod dag re re zhing yang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phrag
210a4(phal chen): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ shwa stag go/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen dmang po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor rin yang rin po
210a5(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed yod de/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi spyan rin po che rgya mtsho dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi snyan dang / shangs/ 
210a6(phal chen): dang / ljags dang / sku dang / thugs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / sangs rgya kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rin po che rgya mtsho dang / thams cad
210a7(phal chen): kyis blta na yid du 'ong ba'i bud med rin po che rgya mtsho dang / don thams cad grub pa'i khyim bdag rin po che rgya mtsho dang / kun tu rnam par phye ba'i blon yi pa rgya mtsho dang / na mkha'i mthas glo ba'i rta
210a8(phal chen): rin po che rgya mtsho dang / yid bzhin du 'gro ba'i glang po rin po che rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi dbyings rdo rje'i lte ba can gyi 'khor lo rin po che rgya mtsho dang / kun tu snang bar byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor
210b1(phal chen): du rin po che rgya mtsho dang / nam kha'i rgyan gyis 'gengs pa'i gdugs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pa'i gos rin po che rgya mtsho dang / zla ba'i gzer lta bu'i rdul yab rin
210b2(phal chen): po che rgya mtsho dang / shes rab kyi lam gyi rin po che rgya mtsho dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong ba'i spyi gtsug bsgribs pa med pa rin po che rgya mtsho dang / thams cad du 'gro
210b3(phal chen): ba'i lham rin po che rgya mtsho dang / ting nge 'dzin dang mnyam par bzhag pa thams cad kyi mdzod du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che rgya mtsho dang / chos gangs chen mtsho thams cad kyi gleng dang ldan
210b4(phal chen): pa'i gzungs rin po che rgya mtsho dang / de ltar de dag la so/ gas pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho re re na yang rin po che rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
210b5(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ rin po che rgya mtsho de dag la/ rin po che ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las rin po che re re zhing yang las 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
210b6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed byed pa sha stag go/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po dal bu rgya mtsho kun kyang mi chen po'i mtshan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
210b7(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ 'od chen po'i rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ lus dpe byad bzang po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
210b8(phal chen): mche bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu gsal bar brgyan pa/ phas kyi rgol ba'i sde 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'joms pa/ sa bcu rgya
211a1(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
211a2(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob pa/ snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su gnon pa la/ 
211a3(phal chen): mkhas pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad yod do// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de la bu mo rgya mtsho kun kyang / byang chub sems dpa'
211a4(phal chen): kun tu bzang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul ngan tu phra ba snyed kyis sprul pa'i bud med rin po che dang 'dra ba / yid kyi lus 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
211a5(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa byang chub
211a6(phal chen): kyi sems bla na med pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi mgo dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings na mkha' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
211a7(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi 'phral ba dang ldan pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi smin tshugs can/ shes rab dang ye shes
211a8(phal chen): yangs pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mig dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thos pa 'dzin pa 'jig rten gyi khams
211b1(phal chen): rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi rna ba yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ sdom pa chen po yang dag par blang ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sna legs pa
211b2(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ chos rgya mtsho rab tu sgrogs pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lce dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' gnyis yongasu spangs pas
211b3(phal chen): 'dzum par dgod pa/ rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
211b4(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyad kyi lag pa dang ldan pa sems can/ thams cad kyi don yongs su sgrub pas mi ngoms pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu
211b5(phal chen): phra ba snyed kyi snying dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi nu ma legs pa dang ldan pa
211b6(phal chen): chos zab mo sna tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi lte ba dang ldan pa/ dmigs pa thams cad yongs su gsal ba'i mthar thug pa rgya mtsho
211b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rjes su rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin yangs shing mi shigs la brtan pa/ 'jig rten gyi
211b8(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sta zur dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad rim gyis legs par 'brel pa// rgya mtsha
212a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rkang pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang / phreng ba rgya mtsho 'jig
212a2(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mdzes par thogs pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i gos rgya mtsho
212a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed shin tu bzang bar gyon pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyan rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
212a4(phal chen): kyis legs par brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi kham des rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi spos kyis lus shin
212a5(phal chen): tu byugs pa/ dga' ba'i rgyan dang / thabs mkhas pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ 'jig
212a6(phal chen): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/ de dag gi kha nas ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba'i chos rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo // de dag gi lus kyi ba spu'i
212a7(phal chen): bu ga thams cad nas kyang / snying rje'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyi spros rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'byung ngo // spros rgya mtsho de dag gi dri zhim pos
212a8(phal chen): kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po yongs su rgyas par 'gengs te/ de dag gi dga' ba'i rgyan dang thabs mkhas pa
212b1(phal chen): rgya mtshos 'dul ba'i sems can rgya mtsho gang ji snyed cig yod pas dri zhim po rgya mtsho de dag tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dri zhim po rgya mtsho/ 
212b2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob po// sems can gang dga' ba'i rgyan dang / thabs mkhas pa rgya mtshos 'dul ba de dag gis gzugs kyi yon tan rnam
212b3(phal chen): par phye ba rgya mtsho de dag mthong ba de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyi sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
212b4(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo// gang gis dbyangs rgya mtsho thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin dgashegs pa thams cad las thos pa yongs su 'dzin pa rgya
212b5(phal chen): mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo// gang gis lag nas bzung ba de dag thams cad kyang / byams pa chen po dang
212b6(phal chen): snying rje chen po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo// gang gis mthong la reg pa de dag thams cad kyang / bsod nams dang ye shes sna tshogs/ 
212b7(phal chen): kyi tshogs kyi tshogs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob po// gang dang stan gcig la lhan cig du 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang snying po byang chub kyi
212b8(phal chen): seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gi kha dang khar phrad par byas pa de dag thams cad kyang / rnam par thar
213a1(phal chen): pa'i sgo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad rab tu 'thob bo// gang gis bang du 'khrud pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs
213a2(phal chen): nga'i chos kyi sku mnyam pa nyid rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob bo// gang dang chos kyi dbyings su rten par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po
213a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa rgya mtsho la/ de bzhin
213a4(phal chen): gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'jig rten gyi khams nga rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu 'thob pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar sa
213a5(phal chen): bon rgya mtsho rab tu 'deb so// de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po des yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigasu bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
213a6(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad du khyab pa'i rna ba rgya mtshos thos nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs rgya mtsho chags pa med cing bsgribs pa med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams
213a7(phal chen): cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la mgo rgya mtsho'i spyi bos btud te phyag 'tshal nas chos kyi dbyings rab tu
213a8(phal chen): sgrog pa'i lce'i dbang po rgya mtshos zhu ba yongs su zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
213b1(phal chen): skyed byung ba de su'i mthu las byung ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin
213b2(phal chen): chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po 'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
213b3(phal chen): rgya mtshod bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar
213b4(phal chen): bzhugs so// chos kyang ston to// yang dag paraskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi kham ngas rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ba 'di yang de'i
213b5(phal chen): mthus byung ngo // de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
213b6(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtshe rnam par
213b7(phal chen): snang mdzad kyi zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bskur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
213b8(phal chen): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po de'i dus
214a1(phal chen): la dbab par shes na/ 'gro la rag ste rgyal po chen po 'jig rten khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa
214a2(phal chen): der ni 'gro bar dka' ste/ der 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan par ni de bzhin gshegs
214a3(phal chen): pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par bye ba'i snying po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed la
214a4(phal chen): rab tu gnas pas kyang bang blag du bya bar slab ma yin gyi/ rgyal po chen po de lta ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham ngas rgya mtshos mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs shes bya ba zhig yod
214a5(phal chen): na da khyod kyis sngan chad mthong ngam/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs ni gang na 'dug/ 'jig/ rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni nye 'am ring / de na da ltar
214a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig bzhugs shing 'tsho ga zhes pa dang / chos ston pa mdzad pa shes sam/ rgyal po rin chen mang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
214a7(phal chen): gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshod mthong ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ni nye ba 'am ring zhig na
214a8(phal chen): mchis pa dang / da ltar de na de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs pa dang / 'tsho gzhes shing chos ston pa ni smos su yang ma mchis te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni
214b1(phal chen): sngan chad bdag gis mthos so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
214b2(phal chen): to// rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de 'di nas ji srid pa dang / de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang
214b3(phal chen): bzhugs shing 'tshe ba zhes pa dang / chos ston pa legs par soms shig/ de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad tu yongs su gzhol ba'i ting
214b4(phal chen): nge 'dzin rgya mtsho la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho 'jigarten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dal mnyam par bzhag kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya/ 
214b5(phal chen): mtsho de phyogs gang na yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi kham sa rgya mtsho de 'di nas nye 'am ring ba dang / de na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs shing 'cho ga zhes pa
214b6(phal chen): dang chos ston pa yang ma shes te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de'i mtshan ma tsam yang ma mthong ngo // de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po ting nge 'dzin rgya mchod dag las langs
214b7(phal chen): tre/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
214b8(phal chen): de mthong ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de phyogs gang na mchis pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshod 'di nas ring ba 'am nye ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang zhig
215a1(phal chen): ltar de na bzhugs shing 'tshog zhes pa dang / chos ston pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de'i mtshan
215a2(phal chen): ma tsam yang ma mthong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka'
215a3(phal chen): stsal to// de lta bas na rgyal po chen po rnam grangs des kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pade na ni de bzhin
215a4(phal chen): gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs ma gtogs par/ ting nge 'dzin snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba'i snying po rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin
215a5(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos kyang 'gro bar bya ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba 'am/ de la phyag bya ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur ba
215a6(phal chen): 'am/ de las chos mnyan pa bde blag ma yin par shes par gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho
215a7(phal chen): rnam par snang mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de ni phyogs gang na mchis/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
215a8(phal chen): de 'di nas ni thag ji srid cig na mchis/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig da ltar de na bzhugs shing 'tshe gzhes pa dang / chos ston pa bstan tu gsol// de nas de bzhin
215b1(phal chen): gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyal po rin chen mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gyi khams
215b2(phal chen): 'di'i nub phyogs logs kyi sa 'tshams kyi mtha' 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams glog gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos
215b3(phal chen): mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrud pa'i gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad ces
215b4(phal chen): bya ba da ltar bzhugs so// 'tshe'o gzhes so// chos kyang // ston to// de nas de skad ces bka' stsal kyang / rgyal po rin chen mang pos 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dri ma
215b5(phal chen): shes ma mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams so// ji ga 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de de lta nye na'ang bdag la mthu'i khyad par med na/ de bas ring ba lta ci smos snyam nas/ de lta
215b6(phal chen): rjes su bsams te/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs legs par len pa'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu bsgribs pa med pa la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin
215b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mnyam par gzhag go/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i mod la rgyal po rin tshan mang po/ 
215b8(phal chen): la de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ 
216a1(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byin du rlab pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas
216a2(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de ltar rgyal po rin chen mang po la byin gyis brlab pa mdzad ma thag tu de'i mod la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshos mtshams bzang po'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin
216a3(phal chen): gshegs pa spyod pa thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi
216a4(phal chen): mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa dang / de bzhin ga/ shegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtshe rnam par snang mdzad dang / de ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho mang
216a5(phal chen): po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dag na/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
216a6(phal chen): kyi ye shes kyi stobs dam pa rgya mtsho la sogs pa ye shes rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu shes so// dus gsum kun tu lta ba rnam par rgyu ba rgya
216a7(phal chen): mtsho la sogs pa mig rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rab tu mthong ste/ 'di ltar dper na/ lag mthil du sbyar ru ra'i 'bras bu bzhag pa'am/ ma le/ 
216a8(phal chen): shin tu gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor la ngo snang bzhin no// de nas rgyal po rin chen mang pos ting nge 'dzin rgya mtshod dag las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad
216b1(phal chen): kyi don gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad la yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der/ 
216b2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtshe rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o// 
216b3(phal chen): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi don gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rgyal po rin chen mang po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po de'i
216b4(phal chen): dus la dbab par shes na song la byang chub sems dpa' 'dul pa'i skyes bu rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya/ mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan
216b5(phal chen): 'das ye shes grangs chen mtshe rnam par snang mdzad de la phul cig/ de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag dang / 
216b6(phal chen): bu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad po de dag dang lhan cig ste/ bu re re zhing ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi
216b7(phal chen): khams mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'khor los sgyur ba/ rgya mtsho re re zhing ni 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho
216b8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
217a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtshoga'ajig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
217a2(phal chen): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtshor re zhing ni/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
217a3(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba/ rgya mtsho re re zhing ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi
217a4(phal chen): khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor los sbyar ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ gling gcig gi 'khor los
217a5(phal chen): sgyur ba rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ gling gcig gi 'khor los sgyur ba rgya mtsho re re zhing ni/ khams kyi rgyal
217a6(phal chen): pe 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig/ khams kyi rgyal po rgya mtsho ra re zhing ni/ mi'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
217a7(phal chen): dang lhan cig tu 'dod par chas pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po de'i chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang / bu mo rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul
217a8(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed po de dag gis 'di skad ces smras te/ lha'i zhal snga nas gsan du gsol/ bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gi
217b1(phal chen): mthil gyi snying po la rab tu gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad de'i zhal lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen
217b2(phal chen): bkur ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi ba gsol lo// de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po rin chen mang pos chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtsho de dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag la 'di skad
217b3(phal chen): ces smras so// ji ste khyed sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i zhal blta ba ni don du mi gnyer/ chos rgya mtsho mnyan pa ni tshol bar mi byed/ dge 'dun rgya mtsho bsnyen bkur ba ni don du mi gnyer/ sangs
217b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba da ni tshol bar mi byed/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rgya dmatshe mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni don tu mi gnyer/ 
217b5(phal chen): nyan thos kyi byang chub rgya mtsho mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni don du mi gnyer/ yul rgya mtsho 'di nas ni 'gro bar 'dod pa med/ yul rgya mtsho gzhan du ni 'gro/ 
217b6(phal chen): bar 'dod pa med la/ gal te khyed sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings la gnas par gyur te/ 
217b7(phal chen): 'dod chags dang bcas pa'am/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la yang mi gnas/ sems can thams cad gsod bod kyang zhe sdang 'am/ byams pa la mi gnas/ mu stegs
217b8(phal chen): can thams cad kyi lta ba rgya mtsho la 'jug cing spyod kyang log pa'i ye shes sam/ yang dag pa'i ye shes la mi gnas/ chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa yang
218a1(phal chen): ston la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo zhe na/ deng la rag go/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen mang po des bstan pa 'di shin tu bstan pa'i
218a2(phal chen): tshe/ chung ma'i 'khor rgya mtshod dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag las chung ma re re dang / bu mo re ras kyang mig khams re res chos kyi dbyings thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i sangs rgyas
218a3(phal chen): kyis rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad rab tu thob par gyur to// rna ba'i khams re res kyang na mkha'
218a4(phal chen): khong du chud pa'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dadapa'i sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shi/ na tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to// sna'i khams re res
218a5(phal chen): kyang gcig la rten pa'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob par gyur to// lce'i khams
218a6(phal chen): re res kyang sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sa rgya mtsho la sogs pa nyan thos kyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo// lus kyi khams re res kyang pha rol
218a7(phal chen): tu phyin pa dri ma med pa rgya mtsho la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob po// yid kyi khams re res kyang sa'i dbang po'i stobs
218a8(phal chen): rgya mtsho la sogs pa stobs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rab tu thob bo// de nas rgyal po rin chen mang po'i chung ma rgya mtsho de dag dang / bu mo rgya mtsho de dag
218b1(phal chen): gis theg pa chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi gting rnyed nas spyod pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la
218b2(phal chen): gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par byas te/ rgyal po rin chen mang po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag cag kun gyis sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong // yongs su mchod de bsnyen bkur zhu
218b3(phal chen): babagyis// 'on kyang 'di 'dra rgya mtsho'i chos ma thos// sa mang rgya mtsho 'di dag thob ma gyur// da ni sangs rgyas phrin las sgrub pa yi// sa mang rgya mtsho'i mig kyang thob par gyur/ 
218b4(phal chen): byang chub don du phyogs rnams kun dbyings su// rna bas spyod pa dam pa spyad par bgyi// sna'i khams kyis rang nga rgyal sa thob ste// rten 'brel 'byung ba'i chos rnams rtogs
218b5(phal chen): par gyur// lces kyang nyan thos sa mang rgya mtsho thob// des ni zhi ba'i bde ba tshor bar gyur// lus kyis sa mang / rgya mtsho thob pas na// sgrub pa sna tshogs rab tu sgrub par
218b6(phal chen): bgyi// yid kyis dus gsum chos mang rgya mtsho'i rnams// 'tshal bar gyur pas gzhan la bstan par bgyi// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ de bzhin
218b7(phal chen): gshegs pa phal po che'i le'u ste bcu gcig go// / bam po bco lnga pa// bcom ldan 'das thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas pa ma ga d+ha'i chos kyi dgon
218b8(phal chen): pa'i snying po byang chub na bzhugs te/ blo shin tu rnam par dag pa mi gnyis pas/ yang dag par spyod pa/ chos mtshan nyid med pa la shin tu gzhol ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
219a1(phal chen): spyod pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyas pa/ bsgribs pa med pas rtogs par thugs su chud pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can spyod yul
219a2(phal chen): 'phrogs pa med pa/ rnam par dgod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la shin tu byung ba/ pho brang kun tu 'od na seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can la bzhugs te/ byang
219a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas/ 'dus pa/ sems can gyi khams la dpyod
219a4(phal chen): pa/ chos kyi dbyings la dpyod pa/ 'jig rten gyi kham/ sa la dpyod pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la dadapyod pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la dpyod pa/ bsam pa'i
219a5(phal chen): rgyud la dpyod pa/ don dang yi ge la dpyod pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa la dpyod pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa la dpyod pa/ 'das pa dang / 
219a6(phal chen): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba la dpyod pa sha stag dang thabs gcig go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtsa
219a7(phal chen): bar dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi
219a8(phal chen): zhing gi rgyan yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad pa yongs
219b1(phal chen): bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rang bzhin yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi mthu yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su bstan kyang rung / sangs
219b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su bstan kyang rung / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa bcu ji ltar rnam/ 
219b3(phal chen): par bkod pa de dag yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung byang chub sems dpa'i tshad med pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub
219b4(phal chen): sems dpa'i gter rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams yongs su bstan kyang rung byang chub sems dpa' smon lam rnams yongs su bstan
219b5(phal chen): kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bcu rnam sa yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung
219b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i mgo bcu yongs su bstan kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung mi bcad pa dang / sems
219b7(phal chen): can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nye bar nyon mongs pa med par bya ba dang / 'du byed thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba dang / chos thams
219b8(phal chen): cad yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba dang / the tsom thams cad yongs su bcad pa dang / nem nur thams cad shin
220a1(phal chen): tu gsal ba dang / gnas thams cad rab tu gzhom par bya ba'i phyir/ gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin
220a2(phal chen): gshegs pa'i yul bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs bston kyang rung // gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul bstan kyang rung / gong du de
220a3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bsnyengs pa bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan kyang rung
220a4(phal chen): gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' chen po bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul
220a5(phal chen): bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' chen po bstan kyang rung gong du de bzhin ga/ shegs pa'i mi 'phrogs pa bstan kyang rung / gong du de
220a6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan bstan kyang rung gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i shangs bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin
220a7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ljags bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs
220a8(phal chen): ba'i spobs pa bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bstan kyang rung / gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu bstan kyang rung snyam pa dang / de nas
220b1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba
220b2(phal chen): mngon par 'du mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa de dag mngon par 'du mdzad pas shar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i
220b3(phal chen): pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed mi g.yo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal/ byang chub
220b4(phal chen): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phye ba snyed dang lhan cig du/ bcom ldan 'das gang na dab der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ 
220b5(phal chen): shar phyogasu brten nas seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// lho phyogs logasu 'jig rten gyi khams
220b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed mi skyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
220b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig du/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste byin nas/ 
220b8(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ lho phyogs su brten nas/ seng ge'i khri pad+ma'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// nub phyogs logasu
221a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mo'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin
221a2(phal chen): gshegs pa rig byed bcings med kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig
221a3(phal chen): tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ nub phyogs su brten nas/ seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ 
221a4(phal chen): skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi
221a5(phal chen): khams tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed kun spyod kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal byang chub sems
221a6(phal chen): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ byang phyogs su brten
221a7(phal chen): nas/ seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
221a8(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa la'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed nyi ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub
221b1(phal chen): sems dpa' yon tan dang lu byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom
221b2(phal chen): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su brten nas/ seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// shar
221b3(phal chen): lce'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs
221b4(phal chen): pa rig byed mtha' rgal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing / byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' da sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan
221b5(phal chen): cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ shar lho'i phyogamatshams su brten nas/ seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can
221b6(phal chen): dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad 'das pa'i
221b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed dam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal/ byang chub
221b8(phal chen): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig du/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ lho nub kyi
222a1(phal chen): phyogs mtshams su brten nas/ seng ge'i khri bad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par spru te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// nub byang gi phyogs
222a2(phal chen): mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig
222a3(phal chen): byed dbang phyug gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dpal zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra bskyed dang lhan cig du
222a4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ nub byang gi daphyogs mtshams su brten nas/ seng ge'i khri bad+mo'i snying
222a5(phal chen): po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// 'og gi phyogs logs su 'jigarten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
222a6(phal chen): snyad 'das pa'i pha rol/ 'jig rten gyi khams shel gyi mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed tshangs pa'i dbang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ye she
222a7(phal chen): dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig du/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
222a8(phal chen): te 'og gi phyogs su brten nas/ seng ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// steng gi phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi
222b1(phal chen): khams sangs rgyas kyi ning bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig byed sna tshogs kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi/ 
222b2(phal chen): zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin
222b3(phal chen): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ steng gau phyogs su brtan nas/ seng ge'i khri pad+ma'o snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'khod do// de nas
222b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun thams cad la bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras
222b5(phal chen): so// byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni ngo/ mtshar thob pa dag ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni bsam gyis mi khyab
222b6(phal chen): bo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan
222b7(phal chen): ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
222b8(phal chen): yongs su dag pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
223a1(phal chen): rnams kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam kyisas rgya rkyen sum chub ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs
223a2(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dgra par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
223a3(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams drug tu/ sems can 'dul ba rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud cing / namakha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa ches kyi dbyings kyis klas
223a4(phal chen): bdag tu chos ston te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzad 'di de nyid dang / de ma yin pa'i gling bzhi pa gzhan dag narang
223a5(phal chen): sku gzhan dang gzhan/ mtshan ma gzhan dang gzhan/ kha dog dang dbyibs gzhan dang gzhan/ chu zhang / gzhan dang gzhan/ sku tshe'i tshad gzhan dang gzhan
223a6(phal chen): skye mched brnyas pa gzhan dang gzhan/ dbang po brnyes pa gzhan dang gzhan/ 'byung ba'i skye mched gzhan dang gzhan/ sku gzugs gzhan dang gzhan du de bzhin gshegs pa
223a7(phal chen): sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams gling bzhi pa bcom pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid na'ang / de bzhin
223a8(phal chen): gshegs pa la don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya bar rab tu sheso// seng ge'i nga ro can zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// shAkya thub pa
223b1(phal chen): zhes bya ba rab tu shes so// drang srong dam pa'i mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so// rnam par snang mdzad zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// go'u ta ma'i rigs shes bya bar rab tu shes/ 
223b2(phal chen): dge sbyong chen po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rgyal ba dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mu stegs byed ces bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs
223b3(phal chen): pa 'jig rten gyi khams gling bzhi pa bcom pa dang ldan pa na/ mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
223b4(phal chen): gling bzhi pa 'di dang mdab chags su/ shar phyogs log das na gling bzhi pa shin tu bsrungs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la rdo rje zhes bya bar rab tu sha
223b5(phal chen): so// dbang phyug ces bya bar rab tu shes so// blo gros mnga' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thub par/ dga' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// sprin gyi rgyal po
223b6(phal chen): zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// skyabs mdzad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thugs dgyes pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 
223b7(phal chen): mtshungs pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// tshig gcod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa shin tu bsrungs pa
223b8(phal chen): zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mtshan stong phrag bcur/ sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang mdab chags su
224a1(phal chen): lho grogs logs na gling bzhi pa bzod par dka' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la dbang po zhes bya bar rab tu sheso// nor grags zhes bya bar
224a2(phal chen): rab tu shes so// dri ma med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// yang dag par gsung ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'dul ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dgyes pa mnga' ba
224a3(phal chen): zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rnam par grags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// don mdzad bo zhes bya bar rab shes so// mtha' yas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dpal
224a4(phal chen): dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa gleng bzhi pa bzod par dka' ba na/ mtshan stong phrag bcur de
224a5(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu ni sa so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang mdab chags su nub phyogs logs na/ gling bzhi
224a6(phal chen): pa gnyen dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la chu'i lha zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// blta na dga' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rgyal po dam pa zhes bya
224a7(phal chen): bar rab tu shes so// seng ge 'dul ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// bden pa'i blo gros shes bya bar rab tu shes so// mtha' las 'das par gshegs pa zhes bya bar rab tu
224a8(phal chen): shes so// dgyes pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// chos kyi blo gros zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// phrin las grub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mkhas pa zhes bya bar rab
224b1(phal chen): tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa gnyen dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams
224b2(phal chen): kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang mdab chags su byang phyogs logs na gling bzhi pa seng ge yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
224b3(phal chen): pa la thub pa chen po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dka' thub kyis bsgrubs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// zhing la dpa' ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thams cad thugs su
224b4(phal chen): chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// yid bzang po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// yongs su dag pa zhes bya da bar rab tu shes so// shugs 'dzin zhes bya bar rab tu
224b5(phal chen): shis so// lnga ldi bzang po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// brtul zhugs brnyes pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa gling
224b6(phal chen): bzhi pa seng ge yod pa na/ mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang mdab chagasu
224b7(phal chen): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na/ gling bzhi pa rnam par bsags pa shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la bdud rnam par 'jom pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 
224b8(phal chen): yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// zhi ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// bzang po lha zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya bar rab tu sheso// 
225a1(phal chen): blo gros mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so// thugs mnyam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 
225a2(phal chen): blo gros kyi dbyangs shes bya bar rab tu shes so// ring du bzhud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa rnam par bsags pa zhes bya/ 
225a3(phal chen): ba na/ mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang mdab chags su shar lho'i
225a4(phal chen): phyogs mtshams na/ gling bzhi pa dga' ba zhes bya ba/ yod da/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jigs da pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// me'i phung po zhes bya bar/ 
225a5(phal chen): rab tu sheso// thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// khyab pa dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mi ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rang bzhin 'dzin
225a6(phal chen): pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rigs par spyod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mig gi rgyal po zhes par rab tu shes so// shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 
225a7(phal chen): stobs kyi brtson 'grus shes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa dga' ba na/ mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa
225a8(phal chen): sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang mdab chags su/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams na/ gling bzhi pa snying po dam pa zhes
225b1(phal chen): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la mi g.yo ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya bar rab tu
225b2(phal chen): shes so// mi skyed pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mdzes pa'i spyan can zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rgyal po'i mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so// dbyangs kyi dbang phyug
225b3(phal chen): ces bya bar rab tu shes so// thams cad gtong ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// drang srong 'dzin pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// ri rab dpal zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal
225b4(phal chen): ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa snying po dam pa na/ mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras
225b5(phal chen): dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang mdab chags su nub byang gi phyogs mtshams na/ gling bzhi pa sa bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag
225b6(phal chen): pa'i mtha' zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rin po che'i gtsug ces bya bar rab tu shes so// dran par bya ba zhes bya bar rab
225b7(phal chen): tu shes so// don gyi mchog ces bya bar rab tu shes so// shin tu gzhad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rigs gtsang ma zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'od kyi dkyil
225b8(phal chen): 'khor ces bya bar rab tu shes so// phyag shin tu 'phyang ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thog mar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag
226a1(phal chen): la sogs pa gling bzhi pas bzang po na mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i
226a2(phal chen): sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang mdab chags su 'og logs na gling bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la shin tu grub pa zhes bya
226a3(phal chen): par rab tu shes so// sang ga'i kha dog ces bya bar rab tu shes so// rno ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// gser gyi 'od 'phro ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thams cad kyi
226a4(phal chen): bshes gnyen zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// gsung mthar thug pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// phan pa mdzadad pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mthar thug pa zhes bya
226a5(phal chen): bar rab tu shes so// lha ma nor ba zhes bya bar rab tu she sa so// sbyin pa snyoms pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa gling
226a6(phal chen): bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa na/ mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gling bzhi pa 'di dang mdab
226a7(phal chen): chags su steng logs na gling bzhi pa nor 'dzin ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la blo gros dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// zhal dag pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes
226a8(phal chen): so// bshes gnyen dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thog mar gshegs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// byin rnam par bkod pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 
226b1(phal chen): dga' bar mdzad pa shes bya bar rab tu shes so// dgongs pa grub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// me zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya bar ra
226b2(phal chen): tu shes so// gcig la rten pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de dag la sogs pa gling bzhi pa nor 'dzin mtshan stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems
226b3(phal chen): can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag
226b4(phal chen): brgya yod de/ de dag kun na yang de bzhin gshegs dpa la mtshan gzhan dang gzhan gyis rjod de/ mtshan bya ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems
226b5(phal chen): can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang mdab chags su/ shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi
226b6(phal chen): khams khebs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshags pa la mnyam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'phags pa lhag pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 
226b7(phal chen): dbugs phyin pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// bsam pa grol ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// nyan pa'i bdag po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// khyab par bzhugs pa zhes bya bar
226b8(phal chen): rab tu shes so// dbang du gyur pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// sru la'i lhun ces bya bar rab tu shes so// rtsal chen po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// blo 'dra ba med pa
227a1(phal chen): zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang ldan pa na/ mtshan bye ba rgya
227a2(phal chen): stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang mdab chags lho phyogs logs na/ 
227a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la rang bzhin thugs su chud ces bya bar rab tu shes so// bsam pa grol ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes
227a4(phal chen): te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis

227a7(phal chen): par rab tu shes so// khyab cing grol ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// don mkhyen pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// bye brag la dgyes pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// gzigs
227a8(phal chen): pa dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// 'dul ba thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes// kun tu snyoms pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dgyes pa dang ldan pa

227b3(phal chen): 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa la tsam pa ka'i kha dog ces bya bar rab tu shes so// nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// mthu shin tu gnas pa
227b4(phal chen): zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// byin gyis brlabs yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rang bzhin dam pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// blo gros kyi nyi ma zhes
227b5(phal chen): bya bar rab tu shes so// thogs pa med pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// zla ba shar ba zhes bya bar rab tu sha so// rlung gi shugs shes bya bar rab tu shes so// 
227b6(phal chen): sgra shin tu gsal ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par byung ba na/ mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de

228a1(phal chen): grol ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rgyu dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// grol zhing mkhas pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes// 'das pa'i gte
228a2(phal chen): zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rin po che'i 'od ces bya bar rab tu shes so// 'jig rten ston pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// gnas med pa'i sa thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu
228a3(phal chen): shes so// dang ba'i snying po zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// thugs mi sgul ba zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams
228a4(phal chen): 'pho bar byed pa na/ mtshan bya ba brgya stong phrag bcur/ dad bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig rten gyi

228a6(phal chen): tu 'joms pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// byang ba thugs su chud pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// gsung snyan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// rtsa ba khyad du 'phags pa zhes bya bar

228b7(phal chen): bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang mdab chags su/ nub byang gi

229a2(phal chen): so// chos kyi ldum bu zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// shin tu sbyangs pa'i gdugs shes bya bar rab tu shes so// spyan shin tu
229a3(phal chen): yangs pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// tshul bzang po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// chos rtse gcig ces bya bar rab tu shes so// dra ba'i snying po zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/

229b1(phal chen): la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na/ mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'jig
