229b6(phal chen): shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na/ mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis
229b7(phal chen): rab tu shes so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dgra/ ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs
229b8(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong tshad med bgrangs med dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pas mtshams mengs
230a1(phal chen): brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / de bzhin gsheg
230a2(phal chen): pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes so// gzhung de ltar lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
230a3(phal chen): dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi
230a4(phal chen): phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 
230a5(phal chen): mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pas mtshams med pa/ brjod du med pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas
230a6(phal chen): gtugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis rab tu shes te/ sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpar
230a7(phal chen): gyur pa'i tshe/ yongs su smin par mdzad pa de dag gis ni/ spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / gsung gi rnam pa tha dad pa dang / nga ro rnam pa tha dad pa dang / phrin
230a8(phal chen): las rnam pa tha dad pa dang / rnam par smin pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sbyor ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa dang
230b1(phal chen): mos pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / skye mched rab tu thob pa gzhan dang / gnan gyis sems can rnams la chos yongs su bstan pa'ang rab tu shes so// shin tu rgyas pa
230b2(phal chen): chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas pal po che zhes bya ba las/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan shin tu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// 
230b3(phal chen): bam po bcu drug pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
230b4(phal chen): 'dri na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bdon po zhes bya ba de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na yang byung zhes bya'o// gnod pa zhes bya'o// skal ba mi mnyam
230b5(phal chen): pa zhes bya'o// dmigs pa zhes bya'o// kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o// gsal shing gi rang bzhin zhes bya'o// gnas kyi rtsa ba zhes bya'o// gdon mi za
230b6(phal chen): ba zhes bya'o// shu ba'i gzebs zhes bya'o// byis pa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'di na kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi
230b7(phal chen): khams mi mjed 'di nyid na yang yongs su 'brel pa zhes bya'o// chud za ba zhes bya'o// tshor bar gcen pa zhes bya'o// myong bar byed pa zhes bya'o// sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya'o// 
230b8(phal chen): nges pa zhes bya'o// dran pa can zhes bya'o// brjod pa zhes bya'o// sems can gyi phyi bzhin snyegs pa zhes bya'o// phyin ci log gi rtsa ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang / 
231a1(phal chen): sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'di nyid na sang 'jud pa zhes bya'o// rdul dang bral ba
231a2(phal chen): zhes bya'o// zhi ba zhes bya'o// mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya'o// ma nyams pa zhes bya'o// rang bzhin med pa zhes bya'o// so sor ldan pa zhes bya'o// nub par 'gro ba zhes bya'o// rang
231a3(phal chen): bzhin du gyur pa zhes bya'o// rang bzhin la gnas pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyu'i sras dag/ gang yang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phagos pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang
231a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na/ theg pa gcig ces/ bya'o// zhi bar 'gro ba zhes bya'o// dgra dang bral ba zhes dbya'o// yongs su rtog pa zud pa zhes bya'o// shin tu mnyam pa
231a5(phal chen): bzhag pa zhes bya'o// khu 'dor ba zhes bya'o// 'gro ba med par 'gro ba zhes bya'o// 'phags pa'i rjes su 'brang bo zhes bya'o// drang srong gi spyod pa zhes bya'o// gter bcu zhes
231a6(phal chen): bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ming bye ba brgya phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis
231a7(phal chen): sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya
231a8(phal chen): ba la/ de 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa yod pa na tshol ba'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o// mi 'byung ba zhes bya'o// rtsa ba mi brtan pa zhes bya'o// bya ba ma byas pa zhes bya'o// rtsod
231b1(phal chen): pa thams cad ces bya'o// rnam par bya ba nyam chung ba zhes bya'o// kun bzhi dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// gsod pa'i mchog ces bya'o// 'gul zhing g.yo ba zhes bya'o// dngos po'i
231b2(phal chen): gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang / 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa yod pa na las su
231b3(phal chen): rung ba zhes bya'o// ldan pa zhes bya'o// sreg pa zhes bya'o// 'jigs pa zhes bya'o// 'jig pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o// mtshams dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// sdig pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o// 
231b4(phal chen): 'dod pa zhes bya'o// glad pa na ba zhes bya'o// skal pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsnga ngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten
231b5(phal chen): gyi khams khebs pa yod pa na don ces bya'o// 'jigs/ pa sel ba zhes bya'o// yon tan thob par byed pa zhes bya'o// dbugs 'byin pa zhes bya'o// tshul bzang po
231b6(phal chen): zhes bya'o// 'dul ba zhes bya'o// yan lag gcig pu zhes bya'o// sdig pa med pa zhes bya'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya'o// rtogs pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 
231b7(phal chen): gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang ldan pa na/ sde'i dbang po zhes bya'o// gyen du 'gro ba zhes bya'o// / 
231b8(phal chen): 'byung ba zhes bya'o// sbyor ba dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// lta ba mnyam pa zhes bya'o// mtha' las grol ba zhes bya'o// rtogs par byed pa zhes bya'o// rjes su brtul ba zhes bya'o// mig
232a1(phal chen): dam pa zhes bya'o// phyogs su snang ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams khebs pa dang ldan pa na/ 'ab
232a2(phal chen): pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'jig rten gyi

232a4(phal chen): bya'o// nye bar bsal ba zhes bya'o// rnam par sreg ra pa zhes bya'o// khon du 'gyur ba zhes bya'o// nad dang ma bral ba zhes bya'o// rgyud 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o// dka' bar
232a5(phal chen): bsgrubs pa zhes bya'o// rab tu brtags pa zhes bya'o// / mos po dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden
232a6(phal chen): ba zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams lhag pa na/ rab tu 'jig pa zhes bya'o// gti mug gi rtsa ba zhes bya'o// dgra dam pa zhes bya'o// bkres pa'i yan lag ces bya'o// ro med pa
232a7(phal chen): zhes bya'o// kun skyed pa zhes bya'o// rang bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya'o// bkur bar bya ba zhes bya'o// mun pa khyer ba zhes bya'o// blo gros bcom pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang

232b1(phal chen): pa zhes bya'o// mthong ba zhes bya'o// rtog pa med pa zhes bya'o// mchog du dul ba zhes bya'o// rtag tu mnyam pa zhes bya'o// gnas par byed pa zhes bya'o// yan lag byas pa med pa

232b3(phal chen): dang po zhes bya'o// rnam par gdon mi za ba zhes bya'o// mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya'o// tshul zab mo zhes bya'o// 'byung ba zhes bya'o// mi dma' ba zhes bya'o// rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya'o//

232b5(phal chen): bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'jig

233a6(phal chen): pa zhes bya'o// mi smad pa zhes bya'o// mchog tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// srid pa'i mtha' ma zhes bya'o// sba ba'i snying po zhes bya'o// mthar thug par byed pa zhes bya'o// yongs su

236a8(phal chen): pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o// nang thibs po zhes bya'o// sdig pa byed pa zhes bya'o// sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin ces bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gong sdug bac+doM

236b2(phal chen): bya'o// chos 'phel ba zhes bya'o// rtog pa med pa zhes bya'o// sdud pa med pa zhes bya'o// sdud par byed pa zhes bya'o// lang du red pa zhes bya'o// chos kyi gzhi zhes bya'o// 
236b3(phal chen): lta ba chung ba zhes bya'o// mthong ba chung ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams
236b4(phal chen): yongs su dga' ba na gnas zhig pa zhes bya'o// rmongs pa med pa zhes bya'o// yang dag pa zhes bya'o// des shin tu rtog pa zhes bya'o// dge bar byed pa zhes bya'o// 
236b5(phal chen): skyon med pa zhes bya'o// 'khor ba med pa zhes bya'o// mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya'o// bdag nyid rtog sa pa zhes bya'o// ma skyes pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i
236b6(phal chen): sras dag/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams yongasu dga' ba nas mtshams nye bar gyur pa zhes bya'o// sel
236b7(phal chen): dang 'grogs pa zhes bya'o// skal pa mi mnyam pa'i don can ces bya'o// rang bzhin yangs pa zhes bya'o// yongasu rtogs pa zad pa zhes bya'o// byin gyis brlabs kyi lam zhes
236b8(phal chen): bya'o// tshogs kyi tshul zhes bya'o// dran dang bral zhes bya'o// rtag pa'i lam zhes bya'o// grol ba sgrub pa zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la sogs pa 'jig
237a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams yongs su dga' ba na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa
237a2(phal chen): ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che na
237a3(phal chen): 'tshogs pa zhes bya'o// rdza ma lta bu zhes bya'o// nad dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// lus la yod pa zhes bya'o// rab tu 'phel ba zhes bya'o// sogs pa'i sgo zhes bya'o// sdug bsngal
237a4(phal chen): gyi skyon can zhes bya'o// brtag par bya ba zhes bya'o// rang ral gzhog pa med pa zhes bya'o// 'gro zhing 'ong ba zhes bya'o// kye rgyal po'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung
237a5(phal chen): ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten/ gyi khams mi che ba na 'tsho ba zhes bya'o// mdud par 'dzin pa zhes bya'o// rab tu sbyar ba zhes bya'o// tshor ba'i
237a6(phal chen): yan lag ces bya'o// a na sems pa zhes bya'o// rab rab byed pa zhes bya'o// 'dud par byed pa zhes bya'o// rnam par bral ba zhes bya'o// shin tu gdung ba zhes bya'o// kyi drung na
237a7(phal chen): zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'grog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba ni sogs pa med pa zhes bya'o// gso
237a8(phal chen): med pa zhes bya'o// skyon med pa zhes bya'o// ma nyams pa zhes bya'o// 'grogs pa med pa zhes bya'o// tshad med pa zhes bya'o// yangs pa zhes bya'o// sangs rgya kyi yin
237b1(phal chen): lag ces bya'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya'o// ma chags pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden
237b2(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba de la yang 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba na bstan pa'i spyod yul zhes bya'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa mtshams zhes bya'o// bden pa la thug pa zhes bya'o// don rab
237b3(phal chen): tu chud pa zhes bya'o// rang bzhin la gtugs pa zhes bya'o// lta ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o// dran pas sgrub pa zhes bya'o// gro bas sdud pa zhes bya'o// skyob pa'i sa
237b4(phal chen): mtshams zhes bya'o// 'khrug pa med par 'gro ba zhes bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la/ sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mi che ba no// 'phags
237b5(phal chen): pa'i bden pa rnams la ming bye ba brgya phrag bzhi bcu po da de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang 'jig rte/ 
237b6(phal chen): gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang / 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na bsam pa nub pa zhes bya'o// shin tu 'gro ba zhes bya'o// yan
237b7(phal chen): lag gnas pa zhes bya'o// g.yo sgyu tsha ba zhes bya'o// 'brel pa zhes bya'o// 'dod pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o// myang du mi rung ba zhes bya'o// skye gnas ma rungs pa zhes bya'o// nye bar 'gro ba zhes bya'o// 
237b8(phal chen): dngango skam zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang / 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrogs pa na gdul ba'i gzhis
238a1(phal chen): bya'o// sems kyi tshul zhes bya'o// bcings pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// nges par rtogs pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o// rnal
238a2(phal chen): 'byor dang mi mthun pa zhes bya'o// brtag par bya ba zhes bya'o// sgo zhes bya'o// rtogs par bya ba zhes bya'o// bsgribs pa zhes bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog
238a3(phal chen): pa'aphags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba de la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na gnas med pa zhes bya'o// sbyin bsreg gi dam pa zhes bya'o// phyir log pa zhes bya'o// mya ngan
238a4(phal chen): dang bral ba zhes bya'o// kun tu song ba zhes bya'o// chen/ po zhes bya'o// du ba med pa zhes bya'o// mi zad pa zhe// sa bya'o// yangs pa zhes bya'o// shin tu mchod pa zhes bya'o/ 
238a5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba da la 'ang 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na mthong bas
238a6(phal chen): mthong ba zhes bya'o// spang ba'i don ces bya'o// rnam par sgom pa'i rgya zhes bya'o// mtshan nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya'o// rnyed par dga' ba zhes bya'o// de ma thag pa'i don ces bya'o// mkhas
238a7(phal chen): pas brtag pa zhes bya'o// 'grogs pa'i don ces bya'o// mi g.yo ba la mngon du gyur pa zhes bya'o// khyad par gyi don ces bya ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar de dag la sogs
238a8(phal chen): pa 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs sgrog pa na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
238b1(phal chen): 'dul lo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dgra/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/ ji ltar 'dugs pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bstan pa yod pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten
238b2(phal chen): gyi khams bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa dpag tu med pa grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med
238b3(phal chen): pa/ brjod du med pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis mtha' gtugs pa dgra na yang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su bstan pa yod do// 'jig
238b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams re ra na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul
238b5(phal chen): lo// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na ji lta ba/ de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du/ nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin
238b6(phal chen): du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams/ 
238b7(phal chen): dang de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab
238b8(phal chen): pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i
239a1(phal chen): / dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa yong su bstan pa yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams/ 
239a2(phal chen): kyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul lo// 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig
239a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams thams cad shar phyogs nas steng gi phyogs shes bya ba nas/ phyogs bcu ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dag na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su
239a4(phal chen): bstan pa yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang sdug bsngal gyi ming bye ba brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu spyod de/ de dag gis sems can rnams bsam pa dzi
239a5(phal chen): bzhin du 'dul lo// kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'i ming dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa'i ming dang / lam gyi bden pa ming dag kyang de bzhin no// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ 
239a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas bral po che zhes bya ba las/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gsum mo// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil gnyis
239a7(phal chen): nas 'od zer bye ba phrag brgya bkyi ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// shar gyi lus 'phags gling
239a8(phal chen): bye ba phrag brgya dang / nub kyi ban lang spyod bye ba phrag brgya dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan bye ba phrag brgya dang/ rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// khor yug rdo rje'i ri bye ba phrag brgya bstan te/ 
239b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' skye ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// mngon par 'byung ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'tshang rgya ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// chos kyi
239b2(phal chen): 'khor lo skor ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// ri rab ri'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// rgyal po chen po
239b3(phal chen): bzhi'i khams kyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// mtshe ma'i lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// dga' ldan gyi lha'i
239b4(phal chen): ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// 'phrul dga'i lha'i ris bye dab phrag brgya bstan to// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi da lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
239b5(phal chen): bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// gya nom snang ba bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// 'bras bu chen po bye ba phrag brgya bstan to// 'og min bye ba
239b6(phal chen): phrag brgya bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i khongs su gang ji yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar 'di na bcom ldan 'das
239b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ skor cing mdun du byas par snang ba
239b8(phal chen): de bzhin du/ 'dzam bu'i gling bya ba phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ngo // de dag thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs
240a1(phal chen): bcu nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam
240a2(phal chen): dpal dang / sangs rgyas dpal dang / nor dpal dang / rin chen dpal dang / yon tan dpal dang / mig gi dpal dang / brtson 'grus dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang
240a3(phal chen): ye shes dpal dang / bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste// 'di
240a4(phal chen): ltar gser gyi mdog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang / pad+mo'i mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / ud pa la'i mdog dang / sa le sbram gyi mdog dang / rin/ 
240a5(phal chen): po che'i mdog dang / rdo rje'i mdog dang / shel gyi mdogadang / 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin
240a6(phal chen): gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod de/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang / rig byed mi skyod pa dang / rig byed bcings pa med pa dang / rig byed kun
240a7(phal chen): spyod pa dang / rig byed sgrib pa med pa dang / rig byed mtha' rgal dang / rig byed dam pa dang / rig byed dbang phyug dang / rig byed tshangs pa dang / rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba
240a8(phal chen): dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin te/ gci
240b1(phal chen): ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang ste/ 
240b2(phal chen): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to// 'jig rten kun dang mi ldan zhing // bral bar gyur te dngos med pa'i// yang dgra sangs rgyas su shes pa// de dag mig
240b3(phal chen): gi lam mi gnas// shes rab chen po sus mthong zhing // dngos po'i 'du shes mi 'jug la// rnam par bsgoms shing shes gyur pa// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'gyur// 
240b4(phal chen): 'jig rten khams 'di mthong gyur te// sangs rgyas che ba nyid dag la// gang gi sems ni mi g.yo ba// de dag/ mi'i mchog tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas chos la gang gi rnams/ 
240b5(phal chen): mnyam pa'i sems su rab 'jug cing // mi gnyis mdze na 'gyur brtan pa'i rnams// de dag bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur// gang rnams bdag dang sangs rgyas dag/ 
240b6(phal chen): rang bzhin mnyam par rab gnas shing // mi gnas len pa med pa'i rnams// de dag bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// gzugs dang tsher ba 'du shes dang // rnam par shes dang sems
240b7(phal chen): dpa' dag/ grangs med de bzhin shes pa'i rnams// de dag thub pa chen por 'gyur// blta bar bya las 'das pa dang // rnam par blta las de bzhin te// chos la gang dag mongs
240b8(phal chen): med pa// de dag rab tu 'od byed 'gyur// gang gis shes rab chen po'i rnams// sems bskyed kun la rab gnas shing // thams cad mthong yang skye med pa// de dag grags pa chen por
241a1(phal chen): 'gyur// sems can rnams la skye ba med// 'jig pa'ang yod pa ma yin te// de ltar gang gis shes pa ni/ de dag bla na med par 'gyur// gang gis gcig
241a2(phal chen): la mang shes shing // mang po'ang gcig tu rab rtogs te// gnas kyi rnams su'ang byung gyur pa// de dag 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams
241a3(phal chen): 'di nas 'das te/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bcu bcu snang bar byas so// de bzhi du lho phyogs dang // nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bcu bcu
241a4(phal chen): snang bar byas so// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / sher lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyidags mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 
241a5(phal chen): 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs dag tu yang 'jig rten gyi khams bcu bcu snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams re re zhing yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye
241a6(phal chen): brag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis
241a7(phal chen): bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig pa de bzhin
241a8(phal chen): du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dag gi gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
241b1(phal chen): brlabs kyi phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal
241b2(phal chen): dang sangs rgyas dpal dang / nor dpal dang / rin chen dpal dang / yon tan dpal dang / mig gi dpal dang / brtson 'grus dpal dang / chos kyi dpal/ 
241b3(phal chen): dang / ye shes dpal dang / bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs
241b4(phal chen): pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i mdog dang / pad mo'i mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdog dang / ud pa la'i mdog dang
241b5(phal chen): sa la sbram gyi mdog dang / rin po che'i mdog dang / rdo rje'i mdog dang / shel gyi mdog dang / 'dra/ ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o// byang chub
241b6(phal chen): sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham rings na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang / rig
241b7(phal chen): byed mi skyod pa dang / rig byed bcings pa med pa dang / rig byed kun spyod pa dang / rig byed bsgribs pa med pa dang / rig byed mtha' rgal dang / rig byed dam pa dang / 
241b8(phal chen): rig byed dbang phyug dang / rig byed tshangs pa dang / rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang
242a1(phal chen): / chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad/ 
242a2(phal chen): na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na brjod de/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag kyang se so
242a3(phal chen): nas smra bar gyur to// gang gis 'gro ba shin tu gces gyur cing // srid pa'i gsal shing ldan par kun shes nas// rang byung kun mkhyen yon tan tshol ba'i rnams// de dag
242a4(phal chen): chos nyid 'di 'dra 'di bzhin no// chos kyi rang bzhin ga nas pa mthong gyur nas// mtha' gnyis gang gis rab ra tu spang gyur cing // ldog pa med cing dgongs pa kun she
242a5(phal chen): ba// de dag pa'i 'khor lo mtshungs med skor// gang rnam sa chos dang ldan pa'i bsam pa yis// 'khor ba'i / skye dgu kun gyi don gyi phyir// bskal pa bsam yas rgya chen
242a6(phal chen): go gyon pa'i// drang song chen po'i longs spyod 'di 'dra'o// gzhan gyis mi pham dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan can// bdud rnams thams cad mthar 'byin mgon po rnams// byams pas gang dag mi 'jigs
242a7(phal chen): sgra 'byin pa// de dag chos nyid 'di 'dra 'di yin no// 'di dag nang nas byung ngo zhes bya bar// nyon mongs sel ba'i sems ni skad cig tu// thams cad shes pa su'i rgyud skyes pa// de dag rnam
242a8(phal chen): par 'phrul pa 'di dag ston// gang rnams chos kyi rnga ni rdung byed cing // byang chub sems kyang srog chags thams cad la// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams kun tu shes byed pa// rang
242b1(phal chen): byung de dag tshul ni 'di 'dra'o// gdul bar dka' ba mtha' yas spyod yul can// zhing rnams bye ba gang dag spyod gyur cing // nam yang dngos po dag la mos med pa// de dag de bzhin
242b2(phal chen): gshegs bzhin rnam par 'phrul// gang rnams dga' zhing mos pa mtha' yas pas// rgyal ba rnams ni shin tu rnam dag cing // de bzhin gshegs pa mkha' 'dra rjes
242b3(phal chen): 'dra ba// de dag la ni smon lam 'di yang gtad// sems can don la gang rnams mos gyur cing // re re dag gi mnar med sdug bsngal ba// bskal pa dpag med
242b4(phal chen): smin par bya dad pa// de dag skyon med pa ma med shin tu srung // gang rnams lus dang srog la mi lta zhing // / sangs rgyas chos la rtag tu rtul zhugs te// mkhas pa ba
242b5(phal chen): med rnam par su spyod pa// de dag sangs rgyas chos nyid 'di thob bo// de nas 'od gzer de dag 'jig rten gyi kham sa de dag 'das nas/ shar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi
242b6(phal chen): khams brgya snang bar byas pa nas// gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams brgya snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams re rer 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas// 'og
242b7(phal chen): min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongasu gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad rol gyis bstan to// ji ltar
242b8(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig pa de bzhin du/ 'jig
243a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams re de'i gling ba ni pabye ba brag brgya kun na rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad dung sangs rgyas kyi phyin
243a2(phal chen): gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpas
243a3(phal chen): dang / sangs rgyas dpal dang / nor dpal dang / rin chen dpal dang / yon tan dpal dang / mig gi dpal dang / brtson 'grus dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / ye shes
243a4(phal chen): dpal dang / bzang po'i dpa' zhes bya ba dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste
243a5(phal chen): 'di ltar gser gyi mdog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i mdogadang / pade'i mdog dang / tsam pa ka'i mdogadang / ud pa la'i mdog dang / sa le sbram gyi mdog
243a6(phal chen): dang / rin po che'i mdog dang / rdo rje'i mdog dang / shel gyi mdog dang / dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' da dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin
243a7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na/ tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod de/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba dang / rig byed mi skyed pa dang / rig byed bcings pa med pa dang
243a8(phal chen): rig byed kun spyod pa dang / rig byed bsgribs pa med pa dang / rig byed mtha' rgal dang / rig byed dam pa dang / rig byed dbang phyug dang / rig byed tshangs pa dang / rig byed
243b1(phal chen): sna tshogs shes bya ba dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang
243b2(phal chen): lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig gi ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba
243b3(phal chen): de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du// thugs su chud nas bsgrib
243b4(phal chen): pa med gzigs te// zil gyis ma non chags pa mi mnga' dbar// skye dgu rab tu 'dul bar shin tu snang / dal las gser gyi ri bo 'dra ba de// sku tsher skye bar gyur pa
243b5(phal chen): rab tu mthong // skyes dgu'i zla ba rnam par mdzes pa de// tha ma'i sku yang 'dzin par la las mthong // yon tan tshad las 'das pa kun mnga' zhing // dgongs pa mkhyen
243b6(phal chen): bzhin shin tu mkhas gyur pa// skyes dgu'i seng ge don yod gshegs pa de// la las 'chag cing gshegs par shin tu mthong // phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par snang ba de// la las
243b7(phal chen): mthon ting spyan du de bzhin mthong // 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa'i skye dgu rnams// gzigs nas bzhad par de bzhin la las mthong // gzi brjid mtshungs med mnga' la la la yis// sang ge'i nga ror
243b8(phal chen): gsung ba de bzhin mthong // zil gyi ma non ma log gsung mnga' bo// sku'i tha mar ston pa la las mthong // bcings pa kun las rnam par grol ba de// la las khab nas 'byung bar rab tu mthong / 
244a1(phal chen): sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas spyod pa rnams// gzigs shing zhi ba der gzhol la las mthong // la las byang chub snying po dmupa la// chos rnams thams
244a2(phal chen): cad mngon par sangs rgyas shing // yon tan thams cad pha rol phyin pa dang // mun pa rdul la nyon mongs sbyangs pa mthong // la las chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar yang // thugs rje/ 
244a3(phal chen): chen po brnyes pa de mthong ngo // la las skye dgu tshad med rnam 'dul bar// skyes bu'i dam pa de ni de bzhin mthong // la las gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa de// 'jig rten thams cad
244a4(phal chen): zil gyis mnan mdzad de// rdzu 'phrul tshigs med bla ma da stobs mnga' ba// seng ge'i nga ro sgrog par de bzhin mthong // le las rab tu zhi ba'i thugs mnga' ba// 'jig
244a5(phal chen): rten sgron ma mya ngan 'das par mthong // rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong nas kyang // stobs btsun stobs mnga' de dag rab tu shes// de nas 'od gze
244a6(phal chen): de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong snang bar byas pa nas// gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
244a7(phal chen): khams stong gri bar du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba brag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig
244a8(phal chen): rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste// gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par
244b1(phal chen): snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi gdan la zhugs par snang ngo // thams cad du'ang sangs/ 
244b2(phal chen): rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'adi dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag
244b3(phal chen): ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya bya nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar du'o// byang chub sems dpa'adi dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs
244b4(phal chen): bdag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag
244b5(phal chen): thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhe sa bya ba'i zham ring na/ tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas
244b6(phal chen): rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams kyang re re zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lhan cig
244b7(phal chen): phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba
244b8(phal chen): de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to// gang gis bde gshegs rnams kyi chos zab bo// zil gyis non pa
245a1(phal chen): med pa brjod pa'i rnams// gang la 'jig rten rtag tu mos 'gyur ba// de dag thams cad rim gyis rab tu ston// gal te bdag cag med du zin na ni/ 
245a2(phal chen): de'i spyod yul stong pa zhi ba'ang med// rab drung rdul rnams shin tu bsal ba yi// bde gshegs rnams kyi sku yang ji ltar 'byung // mkhyen dang rnam grol zhabs dang ldan pa'i rnams
245a3(phal chen): mtshungs pa med la grangs kyang nam yang med// de ni 'jig rten 'di na la la dag/ rgyu la thogs pa med par 'dod phyir ro// gang la phung po med cing khams med de// skye mched dag
245a4(phal chen): dang skye zhing 'chi med pa// de'i grangs ni 'jig rten 'di brnyes pas// skyes bu'i seng ge rnamasu rab tu brjod // nang dang phyi zhes bya bar gdags pa rnams// de dag
245a5(phal chen): rang bzhin dngos nyid song ba ste// rtog pa med cing rnam rtog de bzhin mod// gzhal du med pa'i chos nyid 'di 'dra'o// de dag la ni g.yo ba nam yang med// snyems
245a6(phal chen): shing ldeg dang sgrib pa gang yang med// 'jig rten thams cad rjes su rab tu mkhyen// mtha' yas 'dul ba'i tshul ni 'di 'dra'o// zhi ba'i ting 'dzin spyod yul dgyes pa'i rnams// rtse gcig/ 
245a7(phal chen): gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin te// yid kyis sogs pa'ang de la gang yang med// 'dir ni sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa'o// rgyu dang rkyen dang bya ba rnams dag dang // las kyi
245a8(phal chen): rnam smin sems can spyod pa yis// rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes mi ldog ste// bde gshegs chos ni de ltar bsam mi khyab// phyogs rnams bcu na ji ltar 'khod pa yi/ 
245b1(phal chen): 'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs kun gzigs shing // sems can tshad med yongs su 'grel mdzad kyang // skyes bu'i dbang po de dag rtog mi mnga'// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
245b2(phal chen): ni gser gyi mdog/ de yang kun na rnam par kun tu gnas// de dag bsam pa ci 'dra ji bzhin du// thub pa rnams ni de ltar chos kyang ston// 
245b3(phal chen): bam po bcu bdun pa// de nas 'od gzer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu snang bar bya'o// 
245b4(phal chen): gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams re rer 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa
245b5(phal chen): nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su ga yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad
245b6(phal chen): ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig
245b7(phal chen): bar snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dag gi gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad du'ang
245b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'angs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di
246a1(phal chen): ltar 'jam dngul nas bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes
246a2(phal chen): bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog nas 'dra ba'i mdog gi bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di
246a3(phal chen): zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na/ tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba nas rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad
246a4(phal chen): re re zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa de dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams
246a5(phal chen): cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do// de'i tshe tshigs su
246a6(phal chen): bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to// lha dang 'jig rten bcas pa zil mnan te// snying rje la ni gang zhig sems gtong zhing // 'gro ba thams cad bskyab par zhugs pa rnams
246a7(phal chen): de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // bde gshegs rnams la snying nas dang bskyed cing // gang gi sems ni nam yang mi ldog par// sangs rgyas spyod pa yongs su mi gtong ba/ 
246a8(phal chen): de dag la ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // gang rnams gang du'ang 'jug pa yod med cing // sangs rgyas yon tan rnams las mi ldog pa// shin tu brtan pa blo gdung med pa rnams/ 
246b1(phal chen): de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // gang rnams 'gro zhing 'dug dang 'chag pa'i tshe// nyin mtshan rgyun du rjes su sems byed cing // sangs rgyas bdag nyid che la sems
246b2(phal chen): spel pa// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // dus gsum thams cad rab tu gzhal byas kyang // gang gi sems ni zhum par mi 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas yon tan
246b3(phal chen): rjes su slob mos pa// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // bdag gi rang bzhin yongs su gzhal byas shing // thams cad ma lus zhi bar byed pa dang // bdag dang bdag med
246b4(phal chen): 'dod chags bral ba'i sems// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // gzhan gyi bsam pa yongs su gzhal byas shing // rtog dang rnam rtog thams cad
246b5(phal chen): rab spangs te// spyod pa 'di 'dra dag dang ldan gyur pa// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // gang rnams bsam gyis mi khyab zhing 'jal zhing // sems can
246b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho yid kyis 'thung byed de// blo chen rdzu 'phrul stobs dang ldan gyur pa// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // gang gis zhing rnams rnam par bsams pa na// gzugs dang gzugs
246b7(phal chen): med 'du shes yod med pa// thams cad grangs su nye bar 'gro ba ni// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // gang rnams zhing gi rdul tu gzhig byas shing // thams cad phyogasu bkang/ 
246b8(phal chen): zhing bgrang byas te// de dag nang du rgyal ba 'dzud byed pa// de dag las ni 'di 'drar 'gyur bar 'ong // de nas 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das nas/ shar phyogs su
247a1(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya snang bar byas pa nas/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas
247a2(phal chen): 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de thams cad ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar
247a3(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig
247a4(phal chen): rten gyi khams re ra'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dag na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag/ sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ste/ thams ca
247a5(phal chen): du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes
247a6(phal chen): bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas/ bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'dri zhes bya
247a7(phal chen): bdag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
247a8(phal chen): mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas/ rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub
247b1(phal chen): sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ 
247b2(phal chen): gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad
247b3(phal chen): na yang brjod do// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to// mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba mthu chen la// gang dag kha dog rigs kyis lta 'dod pa// mig
247b4(phal chen): nyams log par lta bar gyur pa ste// de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyid mi shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog dbyibs drag ni/ 'jig rten kun na'ang shes par
247b5(phal chen): nus pa med// gang gis bskal pa bye bar bsams byas kyang // mthu chen rnams kyi kha dog mtha' med do// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid mi mnga' ste// chos
247b6(phal chen): rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med cing dben// yan lag kun ldan blta na nyams med pa// bsam pa bzhin du kun na rab tu snang // sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhal du yod pa min// 
247b7(phal chen): gang rnams ci'ang 'di'i tshul bshad de// ldan pa ma yin mi ldan ma yin pas// sangs rgyas chos rnams rang bzhin rab tu dben// de bzhin gshegs pa phung po 'jig pa med// 'byung
247b8(phal chen): dang 'jig par spro ba mi mdzad de// mnga' brnyas mnga' sgyur rnam par gdon mi za// brjod du med pa rten pa rnam par spyod// lus dang sems kyang mnyam par rab gyur cing / 
248a1(phal chen): nang dang phyi yis rnam par dben pas na// gnyis po bgrang du mi rung shes pa'i rnams// chags med bcings med badre bar gshegs par 'gyur/ 
248a2(phal chen): gya nom snang zhing thugs gsal 'od mdzad pa// spyod yul yongs dag kun tu snang gyur te// thams cad mkhyen pa kun gzigs kun na bzhugs// skye dgu'i don kyang rgya chen yangs
248a3(phal chen): ba mdzad// gcig tu gyur cing mang por rab tu gyur// mang por gyur cing gcig tu de bzhin 'gyur// 'gro ba'i khams ni du mar thugs chud cing // thams cad tshul dang 'dra ba
248a4(phal chen): rab tu 'gyur// sku med de la chags pa gang yang med/ byon pa med cing bsags pa yod min yang // kha do/ dag mtha' yas rnam par dgod byas shing // 'gro ba sna
248a5(phal chen): tshogs lus su de dag snang // 'jig rten thams cad sems kyis brtags pa yin// sems ni rtog sa pa nam yang ma yin te// bde gshegs ye shes
248a6(phal chen): de 'dra'i rang bzhin no// de phyir rgyal ba'i sku ni 'di 'drar snang // de nas 'od gzer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong
248a7(phal chen): phrag bcu snang bar byas pa nas/ gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong phrag bcu'i bar du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling
248a8(phal chen): bye ba phrag brgya bston pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongasu gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril
248b1(phal chen): gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs cig par snang ba de
248b2(phal chen): bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dag na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ste/ thams cad
248b3(phal chen): du'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag
248b4(phal chen): sta/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dang dal gyi bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag
248b5(phal chen): nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs
248b6(phal chen): pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas/ rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems
248b7(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de
248b8(phal chen): bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do// de'i tshe
249a1(phal chen): sa sa su sa so//  sna mchog dang / sa brdzu pa nachagaganas
249a2(phal chen): slong chen po srod pa'i rgyu 'brel ba// don tan m+b+ha ldan ma dag 'di min no// 'dul mid cing chags pa mi ma la// 'du shes sa med gnas du med pa mas/ na
249a3(phal chen): dgeldan da pa mim // mgron po rnams kyi sa nyid khya ba dkar// shin tu 'ad snang dag bur gyung ba'i rnams// brgal du klags med rtag pa med pa'i rnams// sa me med mapar/ 
249a4(phal chen): marnam par spangs pa'i// bde gshegs rnams kyi sa/ shes tshul 'di yin// lus dang sems la rnam par rtog med cing // bde gshegs chos la gang zhig 'ju
249a5(phal chen): 'gyur ba// de dag chos rnams kun gyi dang bzhin ma/ nam yang ne ma nur dang du mi 'gro'o// 'jig rten dgan dmigs pa gang yod pa// de dag kun la bstan pa
249a6(phal chen): chos 'jug ste// gang dag phyir rgol med pas bstan mdzad kyang // rang bzhin ldog par 'gyur ba gang yang medra// dngos po rab shes las rnams yod min par// the tsom thams/ 
249a7(phal chen): cad rnam par spangs byas te// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu rtog pa'i tshe// sems la rnam par 'byed pa nam yang med// mi shes chos rnams rnam par phye ba dag/ byung med tshig gi
249a8(phal chen): lam gyis rab brjod pa// sangs rgyas gsung gi rjes su 'drang byas na// gcig kyang ma yin mang po'ang ma yin no// mang dang gcig pa nam yang yod min te// mang po rnams la gcig
249b1(phal chen): pa song med do// mang dang gcig pa rnam par bsgom byas na// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas shes par 'gyur// 'jig rten kun tu sems can zhing rnams dang // shin tu ni
249b2(phal chen): ba'i chos rnams rnam bltas te// mi gnas sems la rtogs pa med pa 'o// dran ldan sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// sems can chos dang de bzhin zhing gi rnams// de dag/ 
249b3(phal chen): rang bzhin ji bzhin brtags byas na// gcig dang tha dad gyur pa ma yin te// de ltar sangs rgyas tshul 'di shes pa yin// de nas 'od gzer de dgra 'jig rten gyi khams de drag nas
249b4(phal chen): 'das te/ shar phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi kham das bye ba snang bar byas pa nas/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba'i bar du snang bar byas te/ 'jig
249b5(phal chen): rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba phrag brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su
249b6(phal chen): gang ci yang rung ste// gtogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdun la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa'
249b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba
249b8(phal chen): phrag brgya dag/ sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo // thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu
250a1(phal chen): bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang
250a2(phal chen): po'i dpal gyi bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces
250a3(phal chen): bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na
250a4(phal chen): tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas/ rig byed sna tshedags shes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de
250a5(phal chen): dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste
250a6(phal chen): gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang
250a7(phal chen): brjod do// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to// shes rab dpag med ches rnams mtha' yas pa// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa dag/ tshe ring nad med
250a8(phal chen): mnyam med mtshungs med 'od// yon tan che mnga' de dag sbyor 'di'o// gang gis sangs rgyas chos rnams dngos rtogs shing // dus gsum kun tu brtags kyang mi ngoms te/ dmigs
250b1(phal chen): pa shes byed rnam par mi rtog pa// bsam yas mos pa de dag sbyor 'di'o// sems can yul mos sems can 'du shes med// 'jig tshogs chos shes lam gyi rgyud dang bral// / 
250b2(phal chen): bsam gtan nang dad sems la bcings pa med// chags med yid ldan de dag sbyor 'di yin// rtog mkhas rab tu rtogs pa'i chos can rnams// mya ngan 'das spyod rigs la
250b3(phal chen): brtson pa dag/ thar pa'i lam brtson mnyam pa nyid ldan pa// zhi ba thob pa de dag sbyor 'di'o// ded dpon rjes song sangs rgyas byang chub mchog/ thams cad mkhyen pa chos
250b4(phal chen): dbyings bzhin rtogs shing // bden 'jug mkhas dpas sems can rnam 'dul ba// bde gshegs bsam gtan de dag sbyor 'dri'o// sangs rgyas don tshig rjes
250b5(phal chen): shes bya zhing // chags med blo yangs rtogs shing bsam gtan byed// kun tu 'gro bar song bas rtsol spyod pa// rang byung spyod pa de dag sbyor 'di'o// nam mkha'i
250b6(phal chen): dbyings dang sprul pa yid ldan rnams// gnas dang rang bzhin mtshan nyid shes pa dag/ mya ngan 'das rigs spyod pa mkha' 'dra rnams// thob dka' thob pa rnams kyi sbyor 'dra'o// 
250b7(phal chen): zla ba zla phyed nyin dang nub 'grang zhing // lo dang bskal pa'i rang bzhin su sems pa// 'jig rten 'dru zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba dang // grangs tshul sus rtogs de dag sbyor 'di'o// 
250b8(phal chen): zhing gi sems can ji snyed skye 'chi ba// gzugs dang gzugs med 'du shes 'du shes med// de dag ming dang gnas pa rtogs shes pa// bsam gyis mi khyab rtogs pa'i sbyor
251a1(phal chen): 'di'o// 'das pa'i dus dang ma 'ongs da ltar la// ngag gi lam gyis gang na rtog byed cing // dus gsum rang bzhin ji ltar rtogs gyur pa// mnyam
251a2(phal chen): med de dag sbyor ba 'dri yin no// de nas 'od gzer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te// shar phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag bcu snang bar byas nas/ steng / 
251a3(phal chen): gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag bcu'i bar du snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya bstan pa nas/ 'og min bye ba drug
251a4(phal chen): brgya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dgangagi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs pa gyur pa de dag thams cad ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar
251a5(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du
251a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dag kun na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo // thams cad du
251a7(phal chen): yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya
251a8(phal chen): dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs
251b1(phal chen): bdag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa'adi dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes
251b2(phal chen): bya ba dag gi zham ring ni/ tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba nas/ rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go/ byang chub sems
251b3(phal chen): dang 'di dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' ri zhing byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu bya ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji ltag
251b4(phal chen): de bzhin thams cad do// thams cad na yang byung chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba sha sta ga/ don 'di nyid rjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams
251b5(phal chen): cad na yang brjod do// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to// 'das dus gang gis sgrub dka'i brtul zhugs che brtsams shing // nam
251b6(phal chen): srang zhum pa'i sems su gtong bar mi byed de// brgal dka' rgal te bdag gis sems can kun 'dul zhes// seng ge'i sgra sgrogs de dag spyod yul 'di yin no// gang zhig 'dod dang
251b7(phal chen): sred pa 'byung zhing 'jug pa dang // ma rig gzhol ba gti mug mang bsgribs 'jigs chen rnams// sems can rang bzhin bdag med brtan pa bzod par 'jug/ bdag kyang
251b8(phal chen): 'jig rten mgon 'gyur zhes pa de yul 'di// 'jig rten sems can meng po 'dod dregs 'dam bying ba// med pa'i chos la rtog pas sdug bsngal mthong gyur nas// sangs rgyas
252a1(phal chen): spyod yul chos la bag yod gang spyod cing // bdag gis sems can kun bsgral de dag spyod yul 'di// mngon mtha' shes dka' tshad med brtan
252a2(phal chen): pas mthong gyur cing // bdag rten sems can pha rol mtha' yas 'khor gyur pa// de dag rgyal bas theg pa zhi ba mchog la bkod// bdag gis de 'dra'i chos bstan de'i spyod yul
252a3(phal chen): lo// sems can khams rnams mgon med nad kyis gzir gyur cing // ngan song gzhol ba 'dod chags ni sdang gti mug gdungs// me lce 'bar phung 'jigs gzugs mi zang bsrem
252a4(phal chen): gyur pa// mthong nas dgrol phyir zhugs pa de dag spyod/ yul 'di'o// lam gol lam ma yin pa'i rkyen la/ spyod gyur cing // mun pa chen po rtol bar dka' rnyed 'gro
252a5(phal chen): mthong nas// snang ba chen po bskyed de/ sangs rgyas chos bstan ces// 'di skad tshig brjod de dag spyod yul 'di yin no// srid pa'i mtshos g.yangs sems
252a6(phal chen): can rab tu mang ba dag/ mtha' ma mi mthong skyabs med do zhes mi dga' ba// mthong nas brtson 'grus stobs bskyed chos kyi gru sbyar cing // pha rol su 'gro zhes brjod de dag spyod yul
252a7(phal chen): 'di'o// sems can rtsa ba med la gnas pa mi mkhas kun// g.yang sa chen por lhung zhing sems nyams rmongs mthong nas// snying rjes chos kyi zam la mkhas pa su dgod
252a8(phal chen): cing // dran par gyis shes su smra de dag spyod yul 'di'o// shin tu dog pa'i btson ra sdug bsngal sems can rnams// na dang rga bas gzir cing tsham gyis mnar ba dag/ mthong
252b1(phal chen): nas bdag gis thabs kyi chos rnams kun brtsams te// sems can kun dgrol sems dpa' de dag spyod yul 'di'o// sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad thos gyur the tsom med/ 
252b2(phal chen): chos dbyings spyod yul phyogs bcu kun tu rgyas bkang ste// 'di dag thams cad brtags na gsog kyang mi gzigs shing // sems can kun la snyoms byed de'i spyod yul lo// de nas/ 
252b3(phal chen): 'od zer de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nas 'das te/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong snang bar byas
252b4(phal chen): so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong snang par byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khras
252b5(phal chen): khrig brgya snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig stong snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi kha mas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snang bar byas so// 
252b6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa snang bar byas// 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa snang bar byas so// de bzhin du 'jig rten
252b7(phal chen): gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// mtshungs pa med pa// kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ brjod du med pa dag kyang snang bar
252b8(phal chen): byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang snang bar byas so// gzhung de bzhin du lho phyogs dang
253a1(phal chen): de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / 
253a2(phal chen): de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs nas steng gi phyogs kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba snang
253a3(phal chen): bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong snang bar byas nas/ namakha'i mthas gtugs pa'i bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang bar byas so// de ltar phyogs
253a4(phal chen): bcu shin tu rgyas par byas nas/ chos kyi dbyingasam lus pa thams cad kyang snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba phrag brgya
253a5(phal chen): bstan pa nas/ gzhung de bzhin du 'og min bye ba dragabargya'i bar du bstan to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi khongs su gang ci yang rung ste/ gtogs par
253a6(phal chen): gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang ril gyis bstan to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gdan la bzhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin
253a7(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed dang thabs gcig par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya dag sangs rgyas kyi
253a8(phal chen): gdan la bzhugs par snang ngo // thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcu nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu bcu 'ongs par gyur to// byang chub
253b1(phal chen): sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar 'jam dpal zhes bya ba nas/ bzang po'i dpal gyi bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
253b2(phal chen): cad kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams ming 'di zhes bya ba dag nas 'ongs pa dag ste/ 'di ltar gser gyi mdog ces bya ba nas/ 'dra ba'i mdog ces bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub
253b3(phal chen): sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi zham ring na/ tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar rig byed mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba
253b4(phal chen): nas/ rig byed sna tshogs shes bya ba'i bar dag go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / byad chub sems dpa' re re zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sas
253b5(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin pa dag ste/ gcig ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad// thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes
253b6(phal chen): bya ba sha stag don 'di nyid brjod de/ gcig na ji lta ba de bzhin thams cad na yang brjod do// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang so so nas smra bar gyur to// bskal pa gzhal yas
253b7(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab sems kyi skad cig la// gang gis mthong yang bsags med 'gro dang dngos pa'i tshul med pa'i// lam du rab tu 'jug pa de ni thams cad shes gyur te// stobs bcus
253b8(phal chen): tshul 'di ji ltar mkhyen bzhin 'jigs med sangs rgyas 'gyur// grags pa snyan par phyogs rnams kun tu mtshungs med grags gyur cing // bgegs rnams kun las 'das te chos
254a1(phal chen): nyid 'di la dgar spyad de// tshad med thams cad so sor zhi zhing don rnams kun rtogs pas// de phyir phyogs rnams kun bkang bde gshegs chos
254a2(phal chen): nyid 'di ston to// dgongs pa ji bzhin de ni spyad pa'i 'bras bu 'thun pa ste// 'jig rten don 'gyur de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa yang byas shing // de dag thams cad so sor 'thun par
254a3(phal chen): ye shes rnam bsgoms pas// sems can dam pa sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra phyogs bcur ston// thog mar nyan 'dod bla ma bsnyen bkur bzod pa des byas shing // rang bzhin med pa'i chos/ 
254a4(phal chen): la rab rtog bsam gtan bsnyen byed pa// bde gshegs de nyid ni rtogs 'gyur 'gro ba rnam sgom sems tshim byed// chos nyid de 'dra spyod pa myur du bde gshegs thob pa/ 
254a5(phal chen): 'gyur// snying nas 'dri zhing phyogs rnams rgyas byed rtse gtu gathub byed cing // rgyal ba'i yon tan mos las mi ldog/ spyod pas mi byed pa// dngos dang dngos med thams cad shes
254a6(phal chen): byas spangs shing dngos zad pa'i// sangs rgyas bdag med dpe med mthong ba de dag lus 'di yin// bzang po'i spyod yul can gyi sems kyis phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing // zhing rnams thams
254a7(phal chen): chos kyi gter gyis khyab byas tshim byed pa// ji bzhin chos gnas chos nyid mtha' la the tsom med pa rnams// stobs bcu ci 'dra de bzhin gyur pa'i lus ni 'di dag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis
254a8(phal chen): chos gang sgra brjod de la 'jug byed tsong // chos kyi 'khor lo ji bzhin pa lta dka' gzhal las rtag bskor ba// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung kun byang chub yan lag
254b1(phal chen): rtogs// de ltar 'jug pas rtag tu sangs rgyas sku rab 'di dag mthong // mthong yang mig gi rnam shes tshul du rdul med mthong ba med// rnam shes sgyu ma bzhin pas mig stong stobs
254b2(phal chen): bcu mi mthong ngo // 'du shes thams cad rnam rtog yin gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba yin// shin tu chags med yul med de ni rgyal ba mthong ba yin// sems sa / mang bsags pa de dag
254b3(phal chen): shin tu blta dka' ste// nang dang phyi dang dbyibs dang mdog du phyogs bcu kun na med// de bzhin rang byung sku ni gzhal yas phyogs rnams kun 'gengs pa// shes par dka' ba 'dren
254b4(phal chen): pa chen po bsgribs pa med pas brnyas// na mkha' dag/ la zhing rnams bye ba dngos por gnas par snang // de nas// 'ong ba med cing phyogs bcu kun tu 'gro ba med// tshig cing
254b5(phal chen): gnas par 'gyur yang de dag ci la'ang gnas pa med/ de bzhin rang byung rnams kyi sku ni mkha' dbyings rtag tu 'gengs// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas pa la/ 
254b6(phal chen): po che zhes bya ba las de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer las rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i le'u ste/ bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam
254b7(phal chen): dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras rang bzhin gcig pa'i sems la bye brag tha dad pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag 'di sa
254b8(phal chen): ste/ bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan song du 'gro ba dang / dbang po tshang ba dang / dbang po mtshang ba dang / skye ba 'thun pa dang / skye ba mo mthun pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug padang / 
255a1(phal chen): bde ba myong ba dang / sdug bsngal myong ba snang ba dag la ltos// las kyis ni sems mi shes so// sems kyis ni las mi shes so// tshor bas ni rnam
255a2(phal chen): par smin pa mi sheso// rnam par smin pas ni tshor ba mi shes so// sems kyis ni tshor ba mi sheso// tshor bas ni sems mi shes so// rgyus ni rkyen mi sheso// rkyen gyis ni rgyu mi sheso// dongos ngos ni
255a3(phal chen): dmigs pa mi // dmigs pas ni dngos po mi shes so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ 
255a4(phal chen): sems can bstan par bya ba'i phyir// gang 'di yongs/  su dris pa dag/ chos rnams chos nyid ci 'dra ba// 'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis// chos
255a5(phal chen): rnams 'di dag g.yo ba med// shin tu dngos po med pa ste// de phyir gzhan gyis gzhan dag gi/ ngo bo nyid kyang mi shes so// ji ltar chu klung rgyud kyi rnams// gzhan
255a6(phal chen): dang gzhan du 'grogs rgyu yang // gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te// chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar 'bar ba'i mtshan ma can// 'od 'phro gzhan dang gzhan 'grogs kyang / 
255a7(phal chen): gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te// chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar rlung gi sten tshul gyis// gzhan dang gzhan du rab tu rgyu// gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te// chos kyi/ 
255a8(phal chen): chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar sa'i khams kyi rnams// gcig la gcig ni gnas gyur kyang // gcig gis gcig ni mi shes te// chos kyi chos nyid de bzhin no// mig dang rna ba
255b1(phal chen): sna dag dang // lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnams// 'di dag las ni rgyu 'khod kyang // byed pa po ni gang yang med// 'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa yis// 'byung ba nye bar bstan byas kyang // 
255b2(phal chen): bstan par byas pa gang yang med// bstan pa la ni dngos med do// mig ni rang bzhin nyid kyis stong // rna ba sna yang rang bzhin gyis// lha dang lus dang yid rnams kyang // med de yongasu
255b3(phal chen): brtags pa yin// gang zhig rang bzhin dngos med par// tshul bzhin rab tu rtog byed pa// de'i mig la 'khrul pa med// chos mig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// yang dag pa dang yang
255b4(phal chen): dag min// bden nam 'on te brdzun yang rung // 'jigarten 'das dang 'jig rten kun// tshig gi lam gyis brjod pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal
255b5(phal chen): gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal la 'di skadaces smraso// kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can thams cad sems can med mod kyi// 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs
255b6(phal chen): pa ni sems can 'dul ba'i dus la ji ltar 'bab pa dang / sems can gyi tshe ji lta ba dang / lus ji lta ba dang / spyod pa ji lta ba dang / mos pa ji lta ba dang / mtshan ma ji lta ba dang / bsam pa
255b7(phal chen): ji lta ba dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba dang / sems ji lta ba dang / spyod pa ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can rnams kyis/ sems can 'dul ba'i phyir mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' nor
255b8(phal chen): dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang rnams rab tu zhi spyod cing // thos dang ldan pa'i sa 'di yin// 'di don ci 'dra de bzhin du/ 
256a1(phal chen): 'jam dpal bdag las mnyan par gyis// bdag gi lus la su gnas shes// gang gis nang ni rab shes pa// yang dag yod dam med pa'i don// 
256a2(phal chen): des ni rab tu shes pa yin// lus kyi rnam par dgod pa ni// phyogs na mi gnas brjod pa yin// de bas shes pa de gnas la// nam yang chags par mi byedado// lus ni rnam par spyod pa
256a3(phal chen): yis// dngos po kun kyang rnam par bsgoms// sems ni phyir ldog mi 'gyur te// dngos po kun ni brtags pa'o// gang gi tshe ni rjes su 'brang // gang gi tshe ni phyir ldog 'gyur// ji ltar
256a4(phal chen): mgal mi 'khor lo yi// thog ma tha ma 'khor ba bzhin // dngos po thams cad mi rtag par// skye bo gang rnams rtog pa yang // lus la bdag kyang med pa'i phyir// 'du shes
256a5(phal chen): phyir yang ldog par 'gyur// bdag med rmi lam lta bu yi// las ni kun tu rab tu 'byung // rnam par smin pas rab tu 'byung // phyi ma ji bzhin sngon de bzhin// sems ni
256a6(phal chen): dbang byed yin par bshad// dad pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin du// tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log/ 'jig rten thams cad ston par byed// ji snyed 'jig rten brda' yod pa// de dag thams cad
256a7(phal chen): brtags pa ste// chos nyid da ni nam du yang // chos gcig la yang mi gnaso// rkyen rnams la ni rten bcas te// chos rnams so sor rab tu 'byung // de dag ldog par de bzhin 'gyur// phyi ma
256a8(phal chen): ji bzhin sngon de bzhin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces smraso// kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can thams cad kyi 'byung
256b1(phal chen): ba chen po bzhi rnams yongasu 'dzin pa med cing / bdag gi med la mnyam pa yin yang / 'on kyang bde ba'i tshor ba dag kyang snang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag kyang snang / yid du 'ong bar
256b2(phal chen): byed pa dang / yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa dang / nang du byed pa dang / phyi rol tu byed pa dang / tshor ba chung ba dang / tshor ba che ba dang / tshe 'di la myong ba dang / tshe gzhan la myong ba dag kyang snang la// 
256b3(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings la ni yid du 'ong ba 'am/ yid du mi 'ong ba yang med pa 'di ci zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la
256b4(phal chen): tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar las rnams byas gyur/ dpa// chos de bzhin 'byung 'gyur gyi// 'di la byed pa gang yang med// 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o// shin tu
256b5(phal chen): phyis pa'i me long la// de ni ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin// de la de ni de bzhin snang // chos kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar zhing dang sa bon dag/ gcig gis gcig ni
256b6(phal chen): mi shes kyang // rang bzhin nye bar ston par byed// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// sgyu ma byed pa mkhas pa zhig/ lam po cher ni song 'dug ste// gzugs rnams ston par byed pa bzhin// 
256b7(phal chen): las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar shing gi 'khrul 'khor rnams// sna tshogs sgra mang brjod byed kyang // de ni bdag dang bdag med min// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar
256b8(phal chen): bya rnams mang po yi// sgo nga'i sbubs ni phye ba las// sgra skad gzhan dang gzhan 'gyur ba// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar ma'i mngal du yang // bu ni 'pho bar mi 'gyur te// 
257a1(phal chen): 'on kyang dbang po sna tshogs 'gyur// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar sems dmyal 'jigs pa na// gshin rje'i rigs gtogs sdug
257a2(phal chen): bsngal ba// de dag la ni 'ong ba med// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// ji ltar rin chen mchog rnams dang // lha'i bu rnams kun ldan yang // 'pho bar snang ba gang yang
257a3(phal chen): med// de bzhin las kyi rang bzhin no// ji ltar 'jig rten la la dag/ bsam gyis mi khyab 'bar gyur kyang // de dag 'ong ba gang yang med// las kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// de nas
257a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal da ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pas chos gcig mngon par
257a5(phal chen): sangs rgyas na/ 'on kyang chos tshad med pa yang yang dag pa ra ston zhing tshad med pa yang rnam par ston// sems can tshad med pa yang rab tu ston// gsung tshad med pa yang shin tu
257a6(phal chen): sgrog/ sku tshad med pa yang shin tu ston// bsam pa tshad med pa yang thugasu chud// rdzu 'phrul tshad med pa yang yang dag par ston// 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa yang shin tu
257a7(phal chen): skyod// rgyan tshad med pa yang byin gyis rlob// spyod yul tshad med pa yang shin tu ston la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam pa tha dad du mi snang ba 'di ci zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon
257a8(phal chen): tan dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshig su bcad de smras pa// gnas 'di shes par dka' ba ste// rgyal ba'i sras kyis bdag la dris// de ni mkhas pas
257b1(phal chen): rnam par shes// yon tan mos pa dpyod par byed// ji ltar sa ni gcig pu yang // sems can mang po rab tu rgyu// de la gcig dang tha dad med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// 
257b2(phal chen): ji ltar me ni gcig pu yang // 'jig rten kun na kun kyang 'bud// de la me lce tha dad med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar rgya mtsho gcig pu las// chu klung tshad med
257b3(phal chen): 'bab gyur kyang // de la chu'i bye brag med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar rlung ni gcig pu yang // 'jig rten kun tu rgyu zhing ldang // de la gcig dang tha dad med// sangs
257b4(phal chen): rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// sprin cen rnams ni 'brug/ bsgrags shing // sa rnams kun kyang ngoms par byed// de'i char la bye brag med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de
257b5(phal chen): bzhin no// ji ltar sa ni gcig pu yang // myi gu sna tshogs 'byin cing ston// sa la bye brag 'byed pa med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar sgrib med nyi ma ni// phyogs
257b6(phal chen): bcu kun na snang bar byed// de la 'od zer tha dad med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar na mkha'i zla ba ni// 'jig rten kun la rab tu snang // gnas nas 'gyur ba gang yang med// 
257b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// ji ltar tshangs pa mi 'jed bdag/ stong gsum na ni 'dug mod kyi// de la lus ni bye brag med// sangs rgyas chos nyid de bzhin no// de nas byang chub
257b8(phal chen): sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal la 'di skad ces smras// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba bskyed par gcig kyang / de bzhin
258a1(phal chen): gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can rnams/ gzugs sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / rigs sna tshogs dang / dbang po sna
258a2(phal chen): tshogs dang / longs spyod sna tshogs dang / dbang sna tshogs dang / 'khor sna tshogs dang / phyug dbul sna tshogs dang / yon tan sna tshogs dang / shes rab sna tshogs su'ang snang la// de
258a3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa ni gang la'ang mi mnyam pa 'am/ tha dad du dgongs pa gang yang med na 'di ci zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig gi dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam
258a4(phal chen): dpal la tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar sa ni ro gcig kyang / sa bon tshul bzhin myu gu ston// byams dang sdang bar sems pa med// sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin
258a5(phal chen): no// ji ltar chu ni ro gcig kyang // snod kyi dbang gis rnam par 'gyur// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba/ rgyud kyi rnams la rnam par 'gyur// ji ltar rgyu mkhan mkhas/ 
258a6(phal chen): pa ni// rtag tu 'khor kyang mgu bar byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba// shin tu sbyangs pa dga' bar byed// ji ltar mkhas pa'i rgyal po dag/ 'gro ba mang po shes par byed// de bzhin / 
258a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas yon phul ba// ji ltar bskyed bzhin shes par byed// ji ltar dri med me long la// ci 'dra'i gzugs rnams de bzhin snang // de bzhin sems can bsam tshul du// sangs rgyas
258a8(phal chen): yon phul rnam dag 'gyur// ji ltar dug phan sman gyi rnams// dug nad thams cad sos par byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba// nyon mongs dug ni chen po sel// ji ltar nyi ma
258b1(phal chen): shar ba ni// 'gro ba 'di dag snang bar byed// mun pa dag kyang rnam par sel// sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no// ji ltar zla ba dri med pa// kun tu mnyam pa nyid byas te// sa ni rab tu snang
258b2(phal chen): bar byed// sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin no// ji ltar chu'i stobs shugs kyis// sa ni thams cad g.yo 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas yon phul de bzhin du// srid gsum 'khor ba rnams kyang
258b3(phal chen): skyod// 'bar dang 'od 'phro bcas pa'i ma// thams cad dag tu sreg pa'i dngos// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon phul ba// 'du byed thams cad sreg par byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
258b4(phal chen): 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'gru/ sa dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa gcig na thams cad
258b5(phal chen): lta ba 'thun pas// nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar ci phyir mi 'gyur// de dag kun la yang gzugs ni gzugs nyid du zad// tshor ba yang tshor ba nyid du zad/ 'du shes kyang
258b6(phal chen): 'du shes nyid du zad// 'du byed rnams kyang 'du byed rnams nyid du zad/ rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa nyid du zad// 'dod pa'i khams kyang 'dod pa'i khams nyid du zad/ gzugs
258b7(phal chen): kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams nyid du zad/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyang gzugs med pa'i khams nyid du zad/ ma rig pa yang ma rig pa nyid du zad/ sred pa yang sred pa nyid
258b8(phal chen): du zad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang / phan par byed pa'am/ gnod par byed pa ma yin na/ de ci'i phyir/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus dpal gyis
259a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// de ltar khyod kyis gang dris pa// la la myur du rnam 'grol zhing // la la dka' bar
259a2(phal chen): 'gro la 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas sras po bdag la nyon// 'di ni dpag tu med pa yi// sangs rgyas bstan gyi nyes ma yin// dad dang brtson 'grus nan tan gyis// rtag tu khyad par
259a3(phal chen): 'gyur ba yin// ji ltar rtsa dang shing ga sher ba// mer bcug shin tu nyams chung zhing // ring por mi thogs 'chi bar 'gyur// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar gtsub nas
259a4(phal chen): gtsub pa'i tshe// ma byung ba ni myur bteg na/ myur du 'chi bar 'gyur ba bzhin// de ltar le lo bstan pa la// nyi ma'id nor bu lci ba la// yang dang yang bzhag bteg pa ni/ 
259a5(phal chen): de la me 'byung mi 'gyur te// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar nyi ma shar ba'i tshe// byis pa rnams ni mig btsums shing // mi mthong ci phyir zhes smra ba/ de bzhin
259a6(phal chen): le lo bstan pa la// rka lag med par skyes pa'i mi// ji ltar smig mda' kha bug gis// sa ni dbug par 'dod pa bzhin// de ltar le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar byis pas rgya mtsho las// yang dang
259a7(phal chen): yang du bcu byas shing // skam par la la 'dod pa ltar// de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar bum pa chus bkang bzhin// bskal pa'i me ni byung ba'i cha// la la bsad par 'dod pa ltar// 
259a8(phal chen): de bzhin le lo bstan pa la// ji ltar la la phyogs bcu yi// nam mkha' ji snyed tha mal pa'i// gzugs kyis rgyas par dgang smra ba// de bzhin le lo bsten pa la// de nas byang chub
259b1(phal chen): sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal la 'di skad ces smras// kye rgyal ba'i sras chos kyi tshul nyon mongs pa thams cad skams pa// 'di nyid blangs
259b2(phal chen): kyang / sems can la la 'dod chags kyi dbang du 'gro/ la la zhe sdang gi dbang du 'gro/ la la gti mug gi dang du 'grong rgyal gyi dbang du 'gro// 'chab pa'i dbang du 'gro/ khon du 'dzin pa'i dbang du 'gro/ phrag
259b3(phal chen): dog gi dbang du 'gro/ ser sna'i dbang du 'gro/ sgyu'i dbang du 'gro zhing / g.yo'i dbang du 'gro la/ chos de dag kyang sems med par yang gzung du yang mi nus te/ nyon mongs pa
259b4(phal chen): gdags pa kun gyi rnam pa kun tu sems kyi rgyud du zad ni/ dade ji lta bu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos dpalagyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su
259b5(phal chen): bcad de smras pa// gang gi don du dris pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas sras po nga las nyon// yang dgra sangs rgyas bsdu na pa 'di// thos pa tsam gyis mi 'grub bo// la la stobs
259b6(phal chen): med chu klung gis// nad kyis khyer bar gyur pa dag/ skom zhing shi bar gyur pa bzhin// ma bsgoms chos kyang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'gro ba mang po la// zas dang skom dag sbyin byas kyang // bdag
259b7(phal chen): nyid bkres pas shi bltar// de bzhin chos la ma bsgoms pa'o// ji ltar sman pa la la zhig/ sman rnams thams cad bdog bzhin du// lto'i nad kyis shi ba bzhin// chos lam bsgoms
259b8(phal chen): de bzhin no// ji ltar dbyig gi mdzod dag tu// rin chen mang po 'grang byed kyang // nam byed tsam yang mi 'thob pa// chos sa bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar bde ba kun ldan pa'i// rgyal
260a1(phal chen): de'i pho brang 'khor skyes kyang // zas dang skom dag mi bdog pa// de bzhin chos la ma bsgoms pa'o// ji ltar 'on pa rol mo yi// sil snyan glu la mkhas pa zhig
260a2(phal chen): gzhan dag de yis dga' byed pa// chos la ma bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar dmus long ri mo mkhan// tshong dus dbus su 'drir 'jug kyang // bdag nyid kyis ni mi mthong ba// chos la ma
260a3(phal chen): bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar mtsho chen mnyan pa zhig/ skye bo mang po sgrol byed kyang // bdag nyid de nang 'chi 'gyur ba// chos lam bsgoms de bzhin no// ji ltar lam gyi bzhi mdor yang // phun sum
