260a4(phal chen): tshegs pa kun brjod cing // bdag gis thob par mi 'gyur ba// chos lam bsgoms de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa'
260a5(phal chen): ye shes dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni ya shes sngon du 'gro ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
260a6(phal chen): sems can la la ni sbyin pa brjod pa mdzad/ la la la ni tshul khrims// la la la ni bzod pa/ la la la ni brtson 'grus/ la la la ni bsam gtan/ la la la ni shes rab brjod pa mdzad/ 
260a7(phal chen): la la la ni byams pa/ la la la ni snying rje/ la la la ni dga' ba/ la la la ni btang snyoms brjod pa mdzad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni chos gcig 'gas 'byung bar
260a8(phal chen): mi nus// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyis// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// sems can gzhan gyi bsam shes pa// ngo mtshar rmad du
260b1(phal chen): byung ba ste// de ltar gang gi don dris pa// sangs rgyas sras po bdag las nyon// smra ba'i mchog ni gang yang rung // chos gcig gis ni byung ba med// gang yang 'byung ba yod pa min// 
260b2(phal chen): 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin med// skal pa gang la gnas pa yi// bsam pa rnams ni mkhyen mdzad cing // gang la ci dag tshul 'thun pa// de bzhin chos kyang bstan pa mdzad// ser
260b3(phal chen): sna can la sbyin pa brjod// tshul khrims ngan la tshul khrims rnams// mi bzod la ni bzod dang des// brtson 'grus 'byor pa le lo la'o// rnam par 'khrugs la bsam gtan brjod// 
260b4(phal chen): shes rab 'byor pa shes med la'o// gdug pa'i sems la byams pa bshad// 'tshe ba rnams la snying rje ste/ zhum pa la ni dga' ba bshad// 'khyor ba'i sems la
260b5(phal chen): btang snyoms te// sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyang / rim pas de ltar 'byung ba yin// ji ltar sa la las/ bya ba// khyim gyi dngos la rim pa yin// de bzhin sbyin
260b6(phal chen): pa tshul khrims dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i thog mar 'gro/ rgyal ba'i gnas dang grong rdal rnams// rub pa'i phyir ni ra ba ste// de bzhin bzod pa brtson 'grus dag/ byang chub
260b7(phal chen): sems dpa' rub phyir ro// ji ltar gdugs gcig rgyal po ni// sa rnams thams cad skyong bar byed// de bzhin bsam gtan shes rab dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i skabs bzhin no// / 
260b8(phal chen): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni// bde ba thams cad ster ba ltar// de bzhin tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba 'byin// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
261a1(phal chen): 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
261a2(phal chen): kyi 'byung ba gcig na/ sangs rgyal zhing rnams na sbyor ba rnam pa tha dad pa dag 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos bstan pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can
261a3(phal chen): 'dul ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang / tshe'i tshad rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 'khor tshogs pa rnam
261a4(phal chen): pa tha dad pa dang / bstan pa'i tshul rnam pa tha dad pa dang / chos kyi byin gyis brlabs rnam pa tha dad pa dag ci'i phyir/ snang bar gyur// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs
261a5(phal chen): su ma rdzogs par ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dpal gyis/ byang
261a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// chos kyi rgyal po'i chos nyid ni// 'jam dpal rtag tu gcig pa ste// bsgrubs pa med pa gzigs pa yi// 'byung ba
261a7(phal chen): de yang gcig pu'o// sangs rgyas thams cad sku gcig ste// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku// shes rab thugs kyang gcig pa ste// mi 'jigs stobs kyang de bzhin no// sngan
261a8(phal chen): chad byang chub zhugs pa'i tshe// ji ltar yongs su bsngo mdzad pa// 'khor du chos rnams bstan pa dang // de dag zhing yang de bzhin 'gyur// zhing gi phun sum gang yod pa// sangs rgyas
261b1(phal chen): rnams la thams cad 'grub// sems can ji ltar sbyangs pa'i rnams// de'i rnam pa de ltar mthong // ji ltar sangs rgyas chos nyid du// kun gyis sangs rgyas mi mthong ste/ sangs rgyas/ 
261b2(phal chen): zhing dang sku dag dang // 'khor du chos bstan de bzhin no// gang rnams smon lam phun ldan zhing // sngan chad bsam pa yongs sbyangs pas// thams cad gzigs pa'i tshul gyi rnams/ 
261b3(phal chen): ji lta ba bzhin thams cad mthong // sems can bsam pa ji bzhin dang // las dang stobs kyang ji bzhin pa// de lta de ltar mthong 'gyur te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam 'phrul lo// 
261b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas zhing la rtog mi mnga'// de dag byams sdang yod dpa min// bsam pa'i tshul ni ji bzhin du// sreg chag ngas rnams kyis de bzhin mthong // rnam pa tha dad 'jig
261b5(phal chen): rten khams// de ltar snang bar gyur pa de// drang srong chen po kun gzigs pa'i// nyes pa'i skyon las gyur pa med// gang na 'dul ba yod pa yi// 'jig rten
261b6(phal chen): khams rnams thams cad du// skyes bu drang srong rnams kyang snang // de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis// byang chub sems dpa'
261b7(phal chen): 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smraso// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag gis rang rang gi spobs pa bstan pa'i rnams smras pa yin na/ da khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul
261b8(phal chen): la rtsoms te spobs par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi yul ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshogs ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'gro ba ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi
262a1(phal chen): yul la 'jug pa ni ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud pa'i shes pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rjes su 'gro ba ni gang / sangs rgyas
262a2(phal chen): kyi yul shin tu bstan pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul shes par byed pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rtogs pa ni gang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshul ni ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi
262a3(phal chen): yul ni ji tsam du yangs/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ na mkha'i yul dang 'dra ba ste// kun
262a4(phal chen): tu 'od la 'dra ste/ sems can thams cad 'jug pa ste/ chos nyid la ni 'jug pa med// tshogs rnams thams cad bstan par ni// bskal pa bye bar mi nus te// ji snyed
262a5(phal chen): rgyal ba'i tshogs mnga' ba// de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no// blo gros sems kyang de bzhin du// sems can tham sa cad rab tu 'jug/ de la bstan pa thogs pa med// de na
262a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas yul yin no// 'jig rten thams cad 'jug pa dang // 'jig rten rgyu ba gang yod pa// de dag kun la ye shes gnas// gzugs med snang ba ma yin no// sangs rgyas ye shes
262a7(phal chen): chags med de// dus gsum kun la chags pa med// nam mkha' 'byung dang mtshungs pa yin// de ni ye shes yul yin no// chos kyi dbyings ni tha midad// sems can khams rnams
262a8(phal chen): rtogs par mkhyen// dbyings rnams thams cad rab tu brnyes// de ni sangs rgyas yul yin no// sgrar gdags ji snyed yod pa dang // sems can kun gyi sgra skad du// sgra la mkhyen
262b1(phal chen): bathugs chud kyang // rnam par rtogs pa gang yang med// rnam shes rnam par shes bya med// sems kyis brjod pa'ang ma yin te/ ye shes rang bzhin shin tu dag/ sems can rnams
262b2(phal chen): la'ang rab tu bshad// nyon mongs med cing las med de// dngos po med cing gnas pa med// snang ba med cing rgyu ba med// 'jig rten dag tu'ang mnyam par spyod// sems can kun gyi sems
262b3(phal chen): kyi rnams// dus gsum kun tu rab yangs pa/ sems gcig la ni rab 'jug pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes 'jug/ de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can
262b4(phal chen): gyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / chos kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / da las kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / lus kyi rgyud ji snyed pa dang / dbang po'i rgyud
262b5(phal chen): ji snyed pa dang / skye ba'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang / tshul khrim sa kyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang / tshul khrims log pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa dang / yul gyi 'bras bu'i
262b6(phal chen): rgyud ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar gyur te/ ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rab tu snang bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
262b7(phal chen): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas pa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal
262b8(phal chen): du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/ thams cad na yang sems can gyi rgyu ba ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ gzhung de bzhin/ 
263a1(phal chen): du yul gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa'i bar du/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab tu snang bar gyur to// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang
263a2(phal chen): de bzhin nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi
263a3(phal chen): phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang / de bzhin stang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
263a4(phal chen): tshad med dpag tu med pa/ grangs med po/ bsam dgyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu mtha' yas dpa/ mu med pa/ sa mtshams med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod
263a5(phal chen): du med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na/ sems can gyi rgyud ji snyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ gzhung de bzhin du yul gyi
263a6(phal chen): 'bras bu'i rgyud ji snyed pa'i bar du// de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rab tu snang bar gyur to// shin tu rgyas chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba
263a7(phal chen): las/ byang chub sems dpa' dris pa snang bya ba'i le'u ste/ bco lnga pa'o// // bam po bco brgyad pa// // de nas byang chub sems
263a8(phal chen): dpa' ye shes dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar na kha na mthe bo med pa'i lus
263b1(phal chen): kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin/ lus kyi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ 
263b2(phal chen): dgi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ yid kyi las rnam par ma nyams pa yin/ lus kyi las ma smad pa yin/ ngag gi las ma smad pa yin/ yid kyis las ma smad pa
263b3(phal chen): yin/ lus kyi las mi 'phrogs pa yin/ ngag gi las mi 'phrogs pa yin/ yid kyi las mi 'phrogs pa yin/ lus kyi las mi zlogs pa yin/ ngag gi las mi zlogs pa yin/ yid kyi
263b4(phal chen): las mi zlogs pa yin/ lus kyi las mi 'khrugs pa/ yin/ ngag gi las mi 'khrugs pa yin/ yid kyi las dmi 'khrugs pa yin/ lus kyi las bsngags pa yin/ ngag
263b5(phal chen): gi las bsngags pa yin/ yid kyi las bsngags pa yin// lus kyi las rnam par dag pa yin/ ngag gi las rnam par dag pa yin/ yid kyi las rnam par dag pa yin/ lus kyi
263b6(phal chen): las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ ngag gi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ yid kyi las nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yin/ lus kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/ ngag gi
263b7(phal chen): las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/ yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/ rigs phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rus phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rgyud phun sum tshogs pa yin/ gzugs
263b8(phal chen): phun sum tshogs pa yin/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yin/ dran pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo gros phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ dga' ba phun
264a1(phal chen): sum tshogs pa yin/ blo phun sum tshogs pa yin/ blo gros mchog tu gyur pa yin/ blo gros dam par gyur pa yin/ blo gros rab tu gyur pa yin/ blo gros tshad
264a2(phal chen): med pa yin/ blo gros grangs med pa yin/ blo gros bsam gyis mi khyad yin/ blo gros mtshungs pa med pa yin/ blo gros gzhal du med pa yin/ blo gros brjod du med pa yin/ rgyu'i stobs
264a3(phal chen): can yin/ bsam pa'i stobs can yin/ sbyor ba'i stobs can yin/ rkyen gyi stobs can yin/ dmigs pa'i stobs can yin/ dbang po'i stobs can yin/ rnam par lta ba'i stobs
264a4(phal chen): can yin/ zhi gnas kyis stobs can yin/ lhag mthong gi stobs can yin/ nges par rtogs pa'i stob ngas can yin/ phung po la mkhas pa yin/ khams la
264a5(phal chen): mkhas pa yin/ skye mched la mkhas pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'dod pa'i khams la mkhas pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams
264a6(phal chen): la mkhas pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams la mkhas pa yin/ 'das pa la mkhas pa yin/ ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pa yin/ da ltar byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ dran pa yang dag
264a7(phal chen): byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin// brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa
264a8(phal chen): yin/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ rab tu byang ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan
264b1(phal chen): lag la mkhas pa yin/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la mkhas pa yin/ stong pa nyid yongasu bsgoms pa yin/ mtshan ma med pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ smon
264b2(phal chen): pa med pa yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
264b3(phal chen): pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ snying rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ dga' ba'i pha rol tu
264b4(phal chen): phyin pa yin/ btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung
264b5(phal chen): ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa shes par bya ba khong du chud payin/ dbang po dang / brtson 'grus tha dad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa khong du chud
264b6(phal chen): pa yin/ khams sna tshogs dang / khams du ma'i shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ kun tu 'gro ba'i lam
264b7(phal chen): shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 
264b8(phal chen): ldang ba shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ bsgribs pa med pa'i rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ lha'i mig chags pa med pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ 
265a1(phal chen): bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcad pa shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin/ lha'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ klu'i dbang pos/ 
265a2(phal chen): yongs su bzung ba yin/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos yongasu bzung ba yin/ dri za'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos yongasu bzung ba yin/ nam mkha' lding gi
265a3(phal chen): dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ mi'am ci'i dbang pos yongasu bzung ba yin/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ mi'i dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ tshangs pa'i
265a4(phal chen): dbang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/ lha'i dbang pos bkur dpa yin/ klu'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ gnod sbyi ngan gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ dri za'i dbang pos bkur ba
265a5(phal chen): yin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang pos bkur ba yin/ mi'amaci'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ lto 'phye chen pos dbang pos
265a6(phal chen): bkur ba yin/ mi'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos bkur ba yin/ sems can thams cad kyi gnasu gyur pa yin/ skyabasu gyur pa yin/ dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin/ 
265a7(phal chen): sugon du gyur bu yin/ sgron mar gyur pa yin/ snang bar gyur pa yin/ 'od du gyur pa yin/ 'dren par gyur pa yin/ rnam par 'dren par gyur pa yin/ yongs su 'dren par gyur pa
265a8(phal chen): tshun pos kyi kyi tshig yin/  dzin/  man/  du ma yin/ dam na/ dus na/ sa
265b1(phal chen): pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyam pa med pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ byang chub sems
265b2(phal chen): dpa' ye shes dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod de ltar skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi
265b3(phal chen): rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / bde bar rnam par gzung spyod pa'i phyir zhugs shing / de ltar khyod rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gnas dag yongasu dri bar sems pa ni/ kye rgyal ba'i
265b4(phal chen): sras leg so leg so// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sem das dpa' dag gi sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor rab gang dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yon
265b5(phal chen): tan gyi khyad par 'di dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
265b6(phal chen): 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi lam du 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems kyang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / chos
265b7(phal chen): thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par lta ba yang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ 
265b8(phal chen): ba dang / kun tu bzang zhing kun tu mdzes pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing srog chags thams cad la ston pa gnyis par
266a1(phal chen): 'gyur ba'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba yod de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi lus yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang
266a2(phal chen): dang ldan pas/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba de dag gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di
266a3(phal chen): la byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad rang bzhin shes pa dang ldan pas/ khyim gyi thibs pos zil gyis mi non par gyur cig ces sems
266a4(phal chen): bskyed de// pha ma dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sem das dpas sems can thams cad/ skye bo thams cad yongasu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas dang 'grogs pa
266a5(phal chen): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bu dang bu mo dang 'gro/ gas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad srod pa dang shin tu bral bas/ dga' ba dang mi
266a6(phal chen): dga' ba dang / rnam par bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'dod pa'i yon tan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol tu
266a7(phal chen): byin pas 'dod pa'i gsal shing rnam par sel bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// glu dang gar dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dang sa
266a8(phal chen): sems can thams cad gar mkhan gyi tshon lta bur mthong ba dang ldan zhing chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i brjod pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chung ma'i 'khor
266b1(phal chen): gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i gsal shing dang bral zhing / 'phags pa'i sar chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyanA/ 
266b2(phal chen): kyis brgyan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad srid par 'byung ba 'jig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas khur bor bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khang tog tu phyin pa'i
266b3(phal chen): tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par khong du chud cing / chos kyi khang stengs su phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe
266b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bdag gir bya/ rab med de/ yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems med cing / bad ga gi thams cad yongs su gtong bar gyur cig ces sems
266b5(phal chen): bskyed do// ma bral zhing 'grogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thams cadamakhyen pa nyid mthar phyin te/ 'du ba dang shin tu bral bar
266b6(phal chen): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// btson ra la kha na ma tho bar mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas med pa la spyod cing gang du dga' bar 'dod par gyur cig
266b7(phal chen): ces sems bskyed do// khyim nas khyim med par 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sems bcings pa dang grol ba med cing / chags pa med de mi
266b8(phal chen): dgos pa dang bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dge 'dun gyi ra ba'i mtshams 'da' ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gal ba med pa'i chos dang ldan
267a1(phal chen): zhing / 'thun par 'gro ba mang po dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mkhan po drang slob dpon gyi drung du 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
267a2(phal chen): sems can thams cad chos la rtsom zhing cho ga la mkhas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bar chad
267a3(phal chen): med cing / phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gos dkar po 'dor ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sdig pa la brtson pa spangs te dge
267a4(phal chen): ba'i rtsa ba shin tu sbyangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// skra dang kha spu 'dreg pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam par gzhag cing
267a5(phal chen): nyon mongs pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gos ngur smrig gon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad drang srong chen po'i sems dang ldan
267a6(phal chen): zhing rnyog pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rab tu 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skye bo thams cad yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs
267a7(phal chen): pa'i rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig skems bskyed do// sangs rgyas la skyabasu 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dge ba la mos pa mngon par skyed pas/ sangs rgyas
267a8(phal chen): kyi gdung mi 'chad pa'i don du brtson par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chos la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos kyi gter rab tu thob
267b1(phal chen): par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad chags pa'i gnas dang bral zhing dge 'dun yongs su sdud par gyur
267b2(phal chen): cig ces sems bskyed do// bslab pa'i tshig yang dag par len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad tshul bzang po la yang dag par spyod cing / bslab pa thams cad
267b3(phal chen): la shin tu bslab par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad log pa ma yin pa'i las la spyod cing tshul dang spyod
267b4(phal chen): yul phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskya dad do// mkhan pos bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems drapas sems can thams cad gnas med pa la yang dag por
267b5(phal chen): gzhol zhing mi skye ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur/ cig ces sems bskyed do// bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
267b6(phal chen): thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol tu phyin te/ thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gtsug lag khang du 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub
267b7(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'phrogs pa'i chos can du gyur te/ bla na med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// stan 'ding ba'i tshe// byang chub
267b8(phal chen): sems dpa' sems can thams cad chos ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing legs par bkod pa'i chos can du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'dug pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
268a1(phal chen): can thams cad mi gnas pa'i sems kyis snying po byang chub la 'dug par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// skyil mo dkrung 'cha' ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems
268a2(phal chen): dpas sems can thams cad mi g.yo ba'i sa la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bstan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// zhi gnas yongs su sbyong ba byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
268a3(phal chen): sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa la brtson zhing zhi ba dang / dul ba la rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskrad do// lhag mthong yongs su sbyong ba byed pa'i tshe/ byang
268a4(phal chen): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos can du gyur te/ chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 
268a5(phal chen): skyil mo krung 'jig pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam par bzhag/ cing 'du byed thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa rnam par
268a6(phal chen): mthong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rkang mthil gzhog pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sems rnam par grol ba mi 'khrugs pa la rab tu gnas par
268a7(phal chen): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rkang mthil 'degs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan pa thob ste/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor
268a8(phal chen): bying ba las 'thon par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// smad g.yogs gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang
268b1(phal chen): ldan zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ska rags 'ching ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du gyur
268b2(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu 'brel par gyur cig ces sems bskyod do// bla gos gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha
268b3(phal chen): rol tu phyin pa thob ste/ gong nas gong du dge ba'i rtsa ba thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sbyar ma gyon pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'khrugs
268b4(phal chen): ba'i chos can du gyur te/ thabs dam pas mngon par bkab par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// so shing len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
268b5(phal chen): cad yongs su dag pa'i dngos po thob pa'i phyir dam pa'ichos rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces sems/ bskyed do// se shing za ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
268b6(phal chen): sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa shin tu bcom te/ sems dul zhing sems dag par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dben par 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
268b7(phal chen): can thams cad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug spangs te/ sdig pa'i chos thams cad spangs par gyu cig ces sems bskyed do// chu ngogs su 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub
268b8(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la shin tu byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gtsang sbra'i las byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub
269a1(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu dag pa'i dngos pos/ gtsang zhing nges pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lag pa 'khru ba'i tshe/ byang chub
269a2(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gzung zhing bcang ba'i phyir/ bkra shis kyi lag pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ngo 'khru
269a3(phal chen): ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu nyon mongs pa dang bral zhing / chos thams cad kyi sgo rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 
269a4(phal chen): khar ba len pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mchod sbyin byas shing / lam ston par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lhung bzed len
269a5(phal chen): ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis mchod par 'os shing snodadu gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// spyod yul du mngon
269a6(phal chen): par zhugs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas med pa la yang dag par gzhol zhing / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la mngon du phyogs par gyur cig ces
269a7(phal chen): sems bskyed do// lam du zhugs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad phyin ma lus par 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs par gyur cig ces sems
269a8(phal chen): bskyed do// 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos bsgribs pa med pa grub par gyur pas/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung
269b1(phal chen): med pa khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam mtho ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu zhum pa med de/ khams gsum las
269b2(phal chen): gyen du 'phags par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam dma' ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas shin tu brtan cing / sangs
269b3(phal chen): rgyas thams cad la shin tu 'dud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lamanyam nga ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lta ba yo zhing mi drang ba dang bral te nyam
269b4(phal chen): nga ba yongs su spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// / lam drang po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dadapas sems can thams cad g.yo med cing sgyu med de/ sems
269b5(phal chen): drang po dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// lam rdul chen po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu rdul med pa'i chos yang
269b6(phal chen): dag par thob ste/ 'dod chags por gyur pa'i chos las rnam par 'grel par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rdul med pa'i lam mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
269b7(phal chen): sems can thams cad snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa dang ldan zhing sems 'jam par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// g.yangs mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
269b8(phal chen): sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa rtogs par khong du chud cing sdig pa'i chos thams cad bsal te/ dge ba'i chos la rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 
270a1(phal chen): 'khor mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dus gsum du gtogs pa'i chos zab mo bstan pa dang 'thun par gyur cig ces sems
270a2(phal chen): bskyed do// ka ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad khro zhing khon du 'dzin pa dang bral te/ khengs pa dang / 'khrug pa dang rnam par bral bar gyur cig ces
270a3(phal chen): sems bskyed do// nags tshal mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pas phyag bya ba'i gnas su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 
270a4(phal chen): ri mthong ba'i che/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thob par dka' ba dang / thibs po med par/ tu thob cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis mngon par
270a5(phal chen): 'phags par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// shing tsher ma can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems drabs sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti
270a6(phal chen): mug med cing / tsher ma dang bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// shing lo ma can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa
270a7(phal chen): dang ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis rab tu g.yog par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// me tog mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
270a8(phal chen): cad chos thams cad la mngon par shes pa'i me tog rgyas pas/ me tog lta bur gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// me tog gi shing mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
270b1(phal chen): can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi me tog shin tu rgyas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// shing tog mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
270b2(phal chen): thams cad snying po byang chub du gzhol zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba thams cad 'bras bu yod de/ 'bras bu'i dam pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chu klung
270b3(phal chen): mthong ba'i tsha/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nyams su myong ste/ chos kyi rgyun la mnyam par gzhag par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 
270b4(phal chen): lu ma mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ro gcig/  pa'i phyir/ se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis khong du chud par
270b5(phal chen): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rdzing bu mthong ba'i tshebyang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi tshig shin tu bstan pa la mkhas shing chos
270b6(phal chen): thams cad kyis rgyas pa'i tshig gi las dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khron pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad 'byor pa
270b7(phal chen): dang ldan zhing spongs pa mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mtsho mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gong nas gong du dmigs pa la rab tu brtson
270b8(phal chen): zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// zam pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skye bo thams cad yongs su bsgral ba la
271a1(phal chen): zam par red par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// yur ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi sems dang bsam
271a2(phal chen): pa la mkhas shing / bgra la nyal ba dang / kun nas 'khor ba med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rab mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can gzugs dang
271a3(phal chen): sgra dang dri dang ro dang rag bya la sred pa rab tu byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mya ngan med pa'i nogs tshal mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad srad pa shin
271a4(phal chen): med cing mya ngan med pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sem ngas bskyed do// bza' shing gi ra ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chubasems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang
271a5(phal chen): chub yongs su mi gtang ba la shin tu brtson par gyur cig/ ces sems bskyed do// sems can rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
271a6(phal chen): thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyan med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
271a7(phal chen): thams cad sbyangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas rgyan med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dga' ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
271a8(phal chen): cad chos la dga' zhing mos pa dang / spobs dga' ba mang bar gyur cig ces semos bskyed do// mi dge ba mang ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
271b1(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'dus byas kyi dngos po thams cad la mi dga' ba mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sems can bde ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems
271b2(phal chen): can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad rab tu thob pas shin tu bde bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub
271b3(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rtsa ba rab tu thob ste/ sdug bsngal zhi bar byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// nad med pa ma yin pa'i sems can mthong ba'i
271b4(phal chen): tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mya ngan med pa'i chos can du gyur te tha dad pa med pa khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sems
271b5(phal chen): can sdug gu mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpasasems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mos pa mang bar gyur cig
271b6(phal chen): ces sems bskyed do// mi sdug pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bya ba la mos pa chung bar gyur cig ces
271b7(phal chen): sems bskyed do// drin bzo ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mdzad pa shes
271b8(phal chen): par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// drin bzo ba med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lta ba la drin du bzo ba med par gyur
272a1(phal chen): cig ces sems bskyed do// dge sbyong mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la brtson
272a2(phal chen): zhing / zhi ba dang dul ba la gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// bram ze mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems da dmas pa'i dam par gyur te/ sdig pa spangs par
272a3(phal chen): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dka' thub can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par bya ba la brtson zhing dka' thub la shin tu
272a4(phal chen): gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// brtul nu/ dgras la zhugs pa mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa/ das sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongasu mi
272a5(phal chen): gtong ba'i phyir/ brtul zhugs dam por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// go gyon pa'i sems can mtho'i ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dang / 
272a6(phal chen): byung gi chos yongasu btsal ba la go cha bzang po shin tu bgos par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// go ma gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can
272a7(phal chen): thams cad mi dge ba'i las bya ba thams cad la ge gyon pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgol ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
272a8(phal chen): cad phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 'tsho ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
272b1(phal chen): spyod lam bcos pa med cing 'tshe ba dag par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyal po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dngas sems can thams cad thogs pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor
272b2(phal chen): lo bskor ba'i chos kyi rgyal por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyal po'i bu mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sras chos las skyes pa
272b3(phal chen): chos kyi sprul par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khyim bdag mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems drapas sems can thams cad rnam par gdon mi za ba'i blo can du gyur te/ grong gi
272b4(phal chen): chos spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// blon po mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la bzang po
272b5(phal chen): yid la byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// grong khyer mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems cad gdul dka' ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/ mthu bo
272b6(phal chen): che'i lus dang 'dra bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// rgyal po'i gnas mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yon tan gyi rjes su 'brang bar 'thun pa la mos pa'i
272b7(phal chen): sems dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// nags tshal gyi mdab mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi/ bsngags
272b8(phal chen): par 'os par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// slong du 'gro ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul gyis/ chos kyi dbyings chud par gyur
273a1(phal chen): cig ces sems bskyed do// sgor phyin pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sgor phyin par gyur cig/

273a3(phal chen): bskyed do// mi sbyin no zhes ma byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing spang ba med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 
273a4(phal chen): mi sbyin no zhes byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas so/ mas can thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang byol so// dgi skye gnas dang / gshen rje'i 'jig rten las phyir spangs

273a8(phal chen): ma byas pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i chos mchod pa thams cad la rag ma lus par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khrel yod pa'i sems can

273b2(phal chen): mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad byams pa la gnas shing ngo tsha med pa yongs su spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kha zas bsod pa thob pa'i
273b3(phal chen): tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing smon lam thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kha zas
273b4(phal chen): mi bsod pa thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin nyams su bde dpa thams cad thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// 
273b5(phal chen): kha zas snum bag thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldan zhing sems 'jam
273b6(phal chen): par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// snum bag med pa'i kha zas thob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi sred pa dang bral te snum bag med pa'i
273b7(phal chen): sems su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kha zas za ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' bas yongs su rgyas shing / 
273b8(phal chen): bsam gtan gyi zas za bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// ro myang ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bdud rtsi'i ros ngoms par gyur cing skyes bu chen po'i
274a1(phal chen): mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// zan zos pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos
274a2(phal chen): kyi pha rol tu phyin cing / bya ba byas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chos ston pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang
274a3(phal chen): dag par gzhol zhing / spobs pa mi zad pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// phyir 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
274a4(phal chen): nyams su myong ste/ khams gsum thams cad nas byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chu 'bog pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dus
274a5(phal chen): gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'bog par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// khrus byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
274a6(phal chen): cad 'od mtha' yas pa dang ldan zhing / lus dang sems dri ma med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// dri ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mu med par
274a7(phal chen): byin te/ yongs su gdung bsel bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed de// bsil ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu bsil bar gyur te/ bla na
274a8(phal chen): med pa'i bsil ba'i dngos po khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// chos thob par byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gtam
274b1(phal chen): gyi rjes su 'gro zhing / chos kyi dbyings dang 'dris par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas
274b2(phal chen): thams cad dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob ste/ bsgribs pa med pa'i mig dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mig mi 'gebs par blta ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
274b3(phal chen): sems can thams cad kun tu mdzes pas kun tu bzang por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mchod rten mthong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi
274b4(phal chen): mchod par 'os shing mchod rten lta bur gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// blta ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis
274b5(phal chen): blta bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// spyi 'os 'jugapa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis spyi gtsug ltar mi snang
274b6(phal chen): bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byed pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du don dang 'thun par gyur cig ces
274b7(phal chen): sems bskyed do// lan gsum du bskor ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mos pa'i rab dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed// sangs
274b8(phal chen): rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yon tan mi zad par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// mtshan rnams brjod pa'i me/ 
275a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la gzhol zhing yan lag dam pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems
275a2(phal chen): bskyed// rkang pa 'khru ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dri ma med pa'i mthar phyin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskye// lus
275a3(phal chen): slong ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsam pa la rnyog pa med cing lus kyi 'du byed shin tu bde bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// gnyid sad pa'i tshe/ byang chub
275a4(phal chen): sems dpas sems can thams cad phyogs bcu thams ca rang du mthu chen po thob par gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyasu
275a5(phal chen): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi las yid/ la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas yon tan gyi khyad par
275a6(phal chen): 'di dag dang gzhan thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur zhing / lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa dang / bdud du bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / skye dgur bcas pa
275a7(phal chen): dang / lha dang / dri za dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyasu bcas pa thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems
275a8(phal chen): kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba rnam so// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// 
275b1(phal chen): bam po bcu dgu pa// yon tan yangs pa'i spyod yul yongs dag pa// de skad smras nas sems can dri med pa// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byang chub yon tan rnams// sems can dam pa bzang po'i
275b2(phal chen): dpal la dris// spyod yul yongs dag rgyal bas spyad pa'i rnams// bdag gis rgyal sras rnams la 'dir bshad do// yon tan spyod pa ji snyed gang yod pa// rgyal sras rnams la da ni khyod kyis
275b3(phal chen): shod// bzang po'i dpal gyis smras pa rgyal sras nyon// yon tan mtha' yas de dag yon tan las// mtsho las thigs pa ji bzhin nyung shas shig/ mgo smos tsam du chung zad brjod par bya// byang
275b4(phal chen): chub don du rang byung 'gyur bya zhes/ thog mar byang chub sems/ skyes gyur pa yi// yon tan brjod pa'ang mtha' yas dpag/ tu med// dpe zla med pas brjod kyang zad ma gyur// pha rol
275b5(phal chen): phyin dang sa'i yon tan la// bskal pa mang por spyad pa ci zhig/ smos// de dag yon tan chu bo thams cad ni// phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bstan kyang zad mi 'gyur// yon tan mtha'
275b6(phal chen): yas rnams kyi yon tan las// dpe tsam cha shas chung tsam brjod par bya// mkha' las mdab chags lam ltar shin tu chung // sa chen lhun las rdul phran gcig kyang 'dra// byang chub yon
275b7(phal chen): tan bsam pa'i sems skye ba// rgyu med ma yin gyi na 'byung ba yin/ rgyal ba rnams dang bde gshegs chos rnams dang // dge 'dun rnams la dad pa bskyed pas skye// de yang 'dod pa skyid pa
275b8(phal chen): rgyal srid dang // bdag pode'i don dang grags dang snyan phyir min// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus gzhil ba'i phyir// 'jig rten phan skyed sems ni yongs su skyo// de ni sems can rtag tu bde
276a1(phal chen): don dang / zhing sbyangs sangs rgyas mang po mchod pa'i rgyur// yongs su chos 'dzin byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing // ye shes rnam par sbyong ba'i sems skye'o// rgyal ba
276a2(phal chen): kun dang chos dang dge 'dun dang // de bzhin bla mar gyur pa thams cad la// dad dang mos pa dga' ba bskyed byas te// sri zhur mchod byas byang chub sems kyang skye// rgyal ba bde gshegs chos
276a3(phal chen): la yid ches nas// rgyal sras spyod pa rnams la yid ches te// byang chub bla na med la yid ches shing // skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi sems skye'o// dad pa sngon 'gro ma ltar skyed pa ste// yon
276a4(phal chen): tan thams cad yongs su skyong zhing 'dren// nem nur rnam dasel nas las rab tu sgrol// dad pa badra po'i grong du phyin par nga byed// ded pa sems gsal rnyog pa mad po ste// nga rgyal
276a5(phal chen): rnam spangs sri zhu'i rtsa ba yin// dad pa spyod mchog nor dang gter yin te// lag pa lta bur dge sdang rtsa ba yin// yongs su gtang la dad pa dga' bar byed// rgyal ba'i chos
276a6(phal chen): la dad pa spro ba skyed// yon tan ya shas khyad par dad pa byed// sangs rgyas lam la ston pa'ang rnyed par byed// dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal ba dang // gzhan gyis mi thub dngos la dad pa
276a7(phal chen): stobs// nyon mongs thub pa med la gnas yin te// dad pa rang byung yon tan tshol ba yin// dad pa chags pa'i sgo dang mi 'grogs te// mi khom spong zhing 'du 'dzi med par byed// dad pa
276a8(phal chen): bdud kyi lam las zlo ba ste// thar lam dam pa yongasu ston pa yin// yon tan rgyu yin sa bon ma rul bzhin// dad pa byang chub shing rab rnam par skyed// ye shes khyad par sgo rnams
276b1(phal chen): 'phel bar byed// dad pa rgyal ba rnams kyi ston pa yin// de bas dang mos khyad par dga' ba la// spyod pa rim gyis rnam par brjod par byed// chos tshul 'di 'dra 'jig rten rnams
276b2(phal chen): na dkon// rin chen seng ge'i rgyal po ji bzhin no// dad pas sangs rgyas sri zhu gang byed pa// de dag tshul khrims slob pa mi gtong // tshul khrims slob pa gang rnams mi gtong ba// de dag
276b3(phal chen): yon tan gnas pas yon tan ldan// tshul khrims byang chub shes rab ston pa ste// bslab pas sa'i yon tan legs la brtson// tshul khrims bslab pa yongasu ma btang na// rgyal ba
276b4(phal chen): rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags par 'os// dad pas sa rangs rgyas sri zhu gang byed pa// de dag rgyal ba'i mchod pa yangs pa byed// rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa su byed pa// de dag
276b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas mos pa bsam mi khyab// dad pas chos la phud dud gang byed pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos kyis mi ngoms nyan// rgyal ba'i chos kyis mi ngom su nyan pa// de dag bsam
276b6(phal chen): gyis mi khyab chos la mos// dad pas dge 'dun phu dud su byed pa// de dag mi ldog dge 'dun rnams la mos// mi ldog dge 'dun rnams la su mos pa// de dag dad pa'i stobs kyis phyir mi ldog
276b7(phal chen): dad pa'i stobs kyis gang rnams mi ldog pa/ de dag dbang po rab tu gsal zhing rno// gang rnams dbang po rab tu gsal rno ba// des ni sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs// gang gis sdig pa'i
276b8(phal chen): grogs po rnams spangs pa// de dag chos kyi bshas gnyen yongasu 'dzin// chos kyi bshes gnyen gang gis yongs bzung ba// de dag dge ba rgya chen yongasu stsogs// dge ba rgya chen yongs
277a1(phal chen): gang sogs pa// bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyu mthu ldan// bdag nyid che ba rgya mthu gang ldan pa// de dag mos pa'i khyad par yangs pa 'thog mos pa yangs pa'i
277a2(phal chen): khyad par sus thob pa// de dag rtag tu rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs// rgyal ba'i byin gyis gang rnams bslabs gyur pa// de dag byang chub don du sems kyang skye// byang chub don tu gang gis
277a3(phal chen): sems skyes pa// de dag drang srong chen po'i yon tan brtson// drang srong chen po'i yon tan su brtson pa// de dag sangs rgyas rig su rigs ldan skyes// sangs rgyas rigs rigs ldan gang
277a4(phal chen): skyes pa// de dag 'du dang 'bral ba rnam par spangs// 'dud da'abral ba gang gis rnam spangs pa// de dag bsam pa dang zhing rnam par dag/ gang gi bsam pa dang zhing rnam dag pa
277a5(phal chen): de dag lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa'i mchog/ lhag pas ma dam pa mchog dang su ldan pa// de dag rtag tu pha rol phyin la spyod// pha rol byin la rtag tu su spyod pa// de dag theg pa
277a6(phal chen): chen po 'di la spyod// theg pa chen po 'di la su spyod pa// de dag nan tan dam pas sangs rgyas mchod// nan tan dam pas sangs rgya su mchod pa// de dag sangs rgyas rjes dran byed pa med// 
277a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas rjes dran gang la mi byed pa// de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas mthong // rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas sus mthong ba// de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas mi 'gregs min// rtag tu sangs/ 
277a8(phal chen): rgyas mi 'gro gsum yin// de la chos nub 'gyur ba nam yang med// gang la chos nub 'gyur ba med 'gyur ba// de dag spobs pa sgrib pa med dang ldan// spobs pa bsgrib pa med dang su ldan pa// 
277b1(phal chen): de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yang yas// gang gis chos rab stan pa mtha' yas pa// de dag 'gro la byams pas phan pa tshol// 'gro la byams pas phan pa su tshol ba// de dag snying
277b2(phal chen): rje chen po'i rtsa ba brten// snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba sus brten pa// de dag chos kyi dga' bas dbang po dga'// chos kyi dga' bas dbang po gang dga' ba// de dag 'du byed nyes la
277b3(phal chen): btang snyom so// 'du byed nyes pa gang gis btang snyoms pa// de dag nga rgyal rlom sems bag med spangs// nga rgyal rloms sems bag med sus spangs pa// de dag rtag tu bdag dang gzhan
277b4(phal chen): don brtson// bdag dang gzhan don rtag tu su brtson pa// de dag 'khor bas yongasu skyo ba med// gang la 'khor bas yongs su skyo med pa// de dag brtson 'grus dam pa mchog
277b5(phal chen): dang ldan// brtson 'grus dam pa mchog dang su ldan pa/ de dag mngon shes rnam dag mngon par skyes// gang gis mngon shes rnam dag mngon skyes pa// de dag spyod pa mchog
277b6(phal chen): gi dra bar zhugs// spyod mchog dra bar gang rnams zhugs gyur pa// de dag 'gro ba yongs su smin par mkhas// 'gro ba yongasu smin par gang mkhas pa// de dag 'gro sdud ye shes tshul la
277b7(phal chen): mkhas// 'gro sdud ye shes tshul la su mkhas pa// de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson// bsdu dngos bzhi la gang rnams brtson gyur pa// de dag 'gro ba'i don mang mtha' yas byed// 'gro
277b8(phal chen): ba'i don mang mtha' ya su byed pa// de dag shes rab thabs kyi stobs mchog ldan// shes rab thabs kyi stobs mchog su ldan pa// dpa' bo de dag bla med lam la gnas// bla med lam
278a1(phal chen): la dpa' bo gang gnas pa// de dag bdud kyi dpung gis thub pa min// gang rnams bdud kyi dpung gis thub min pa// de dag bdud lam bzhi las yongasu 'das// 
278a2(phal chen): bdud lam bzhi las yongasu su 'das pa// de dag phyir mi ldog gi sar yang phyin// mi ldog sar ni gang gis phyin gyur pa// de dag mi skye'i bzod pa thob pa yin// ma skye'i bzod pa gang gis
278a3(phal chen): thob gyur pa// 'jig rten sgron de rgyal bas lung yang bstan// 'jig rten sgron ma rgyal bas lung bstan pa// de dag rgyal ba kun dang mngon du gnas// rgyal ba kun dang mngon tu su gnas pa// 
278a4(phal chen): de dag rgyal ba'i 'phrul pa gsang la mkhas// rgyal ba'i 'phrul pa gsang la su mkhas pa// de dag rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs pa yin// gang rnams rgyal ba kun gyis
278a5(phal chen): dgongs gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yongs kyis brgyan// sangs rgyas yon tan yongs kyi sa su brgyan pa// de dag bsod nams dam pas lus kyang spyas
278a6(phal chen): bsod nams dam pas gang gi lus sbyangs pa// de dag gsar gyi ri bo 'dra bar 'bar// gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar su 'bar ba// de dag mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan// mtshan rab sum cu gnyis
278a7(phal chen): da su ldan pa// de dag dpe byad bzang pos lus kyang bris// dpe byad bzang pos gang gis lus bris pa// de dag lus 'od kun tu mtha' yas so// gang gi lus 'od kun tu mtha' yas pa// de dag 'od gzar
278a8(phal chen): rgyan kyang bsam mi khyab// gang la 'od gzer bas ma yas rgyan yod pa// de dag 'od las pad+mo mang po 'byung // gang gi 'od las pad+mo mang 'byung ba// de dag rgyal ba pad+mo'i gdan bzhugs
278b1(phal chen): pa/ ston cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun tu yang // don yod rnam par spyod cing sems can 'dul// gang rnams rgyal ba bde'i gdan bzhugs pa// ston cing de dag phyogs bcu kun tu yang / 
278b2(phal chen): don yod rnams spyod sems can 'dul byed pa// de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas// gang gi mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa// de dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston
278b3(phal chen): cing // sems can bsam gyis mi khyab dgar byed pas// bsam gyis mi khyab zhing na rnam par spyod// gang rnams bsam gyis mi khyab zhing ston cing // bsam yas sems can dga'
278b4(phal chen): bar su byed pa// de dgra bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rta na na// tha dad yang dgra shes mthus sems can 'dul// tha drang yang dag shes pa'i ye shes mthus// bsam pa ji bzhin
278b5(phal chen): sems can sa rul ba// de dag lus dang ngag yid rtag/ dus su// ye shes sngon du 'gro bar shin tu 'byung // gang gi lus dang ngag yid rtag dus// ye shes sngon du 'gro
278b6(phal chen): par rab 'byung ba// de dag smon lam stobs kyis ci dga' bar// sems can rgyud du gzugs mang yongasu ston// smon lam stobs kyis gang rnams ci dga' bar// sems can rgyud dru gas
278b7(phal chen): mang ston byed pa// de dag tshigs tu brjod cing smra ba yang // sgra la dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam mi khyab// tshig tu brjod cing ci dang ci smra yang // gang gi sgra dbyangs yan lag bsam yis pa/ 
278b8(phal chen): de dag 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi/ bsam pa'i sems rnams yud kyis rnam par shes// gang gis ma lus 'gro ba thams cad kyi// bsam pa'i sems rnams yud kyis rnam shes ga/ 
279a1(phal chen): / skye dang shi 'pho nam yang med// nyon mongs rgyu ba'ang de bzhin skye ba med// skye dang shi pho gang la med gyur cing // nyon mongs rgyud kyang de bzhin skye med pa// de dag yon tan
279a2(phal chen): chos nyid ye shes lus// chos kyis smos par 'jig rten kun tu spyod// yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus ldan zhing // chos kyis smos par 'jig rten su spyod pa// de dag sa bcu rnams dang
279a3(phal chen): dbang bcu yi// pha rol phyin mchog rnam par thar la spyod// gang rnams sa bcu dbang rnams bcu po yi// pha rol phyin mchog rnam par thar spyod pa// de dag mngon shes rgyan gyis rnam par/ 
279a4(phal chen): 'phrul/ ting 'dzin dam pas rnam par spyod pa thog/ mngon dpar shes pa'i rgyan gyis rnam 'phrul zhing // ting 'dzi ngan mchog gis rnam spyod sus thob pa// de dag phyogs
279a5(phal chen): bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las// dbang bskur rgyan rnam sa thams cad yongs su nod// gang rnams phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las// dbang bskur rgyan rnams
279a6(phal chen): thams cad nod byed pa// de dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// phyag mthil bdud rtsis mngon par dbang yang bskur// gang gi spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// phyag
279a7(phal chen): mthil bdud rtsis mngon par dbang bskur ba// de dag ma lus na mkha' rgyas byas shing // phyogs rnams kun tu mthu brtan gnas byed// gang rnams na mkha' ma lus rgyas bkang
279a8(phal chen): zhing // phyogs rnams kun tu mthu brtan gnas byed pa// dpe med de dag spyod yul shes par ni// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas mi nus so// dpe med gang gi spyod yul shes bya
279b1(phal chen): bar// 'jig rten lnga dang bcas pas mi nus pas// de dag brtson 'grus thams cad don kyang yod// mthong dang ming thos spobs da'ang don yod do// gang rnams brtson 'grus
279b2(phal chen): thams cad don yod cing // mthong dang mi thos spongs pa don yod pa// skyes chen de dag spyan bdag gtong ba yi// sbyin pa'i gnas te thams cad don kyang yod// skyes bu dam pa deng / 
279b3(phal chen): byin mthu yis// dam chos tshul ni mi 'jig rten par gnas// dge ba'i las lam dam pa mchog rnams kyang // rin chen 'dra mthus kun na rgyu zhing gnas// rdo rje stug po'i rin chen
279b4(phal chen): tshogs yod pas// de yi mthu yis rgya mtsho rin chen rnams// / mi zad 'phel zhing 'gribs pa gang yang med// de bzhi na yon tan mtha' yas yon tan mtshe// sangs rgyas
279b5(phal chen): mi bzhugs zhing rnams gang yod pa// de dag kun tu byang chub sangs rgyas ston// phyogs rnams gang na dam chos med gyur pa// de dag kun tu'ang chos kyi gter
279b6(phal chen): ston to// de dag mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste// lhun gyis grub par phyogs rnams thams cad du// zla ba lta bur gzugs brnyan ston byed cing // thabs mang stong gis sems can
279b7(phal chen): 'dul ba byed// de dag skad cig re rer byang chub tu// rnam par sangs rgyas phyogs bcu kun tu ston// 'khor lo skor dang mya ngan 'das zhi dang // sku dadung rgya chen de bzhin dpa' bo ston/ 
279b8(phal chen): mkhas pa de dag nyan thos rang rgyalas// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgyan rnams mtha' yas pa// yongs su ston cing bskal pa bsam yas su// theg pa gsum gyi sgo nas sems
280a1(phal chen): can 'dul// khye'u dang bu mo de bzhin bud med lus// skyes pa lha dang lha min klu rnams dang // gnod sbyin grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs/ 
280a2(phal chen): mos pa thams cad tshul mkhas yongasu ston// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i rgya yi sgo dag nas// 'gro ba'i gzugs mang rgyud ni ji snyed dang // cha byad smon pa sgra dbyangs tshul gyi rnams// thams
280a3(phal chen): cad ma lus dpa' bo ston pa byed// de dag zhing rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ste// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad mchod pa byed// de dag 'od gzor mang po bsam mi khyab/ 
280a4(phal chen): sems can 'gral ba'i ye shes mtha' yang yas// tshig gi rnam 'phrul ye shes rnam 'phrul dang // lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ste// sbyin pa tshul khrims
280a5(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa dang // bzod pa brtson 'grus rnam 'phrul/ bsam mi khyab// de dag bsam gtan shes rnam/ 'phrul dang // thabs dang mngon shes rnam 'phrul bsam
280a6(phal chen): mi khyab// sangs rgyas tshogs kyi ting 'dzin sgro dag nas// yon tan kun gyi rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas// de dag rdul phran kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing // rdul phran rtse gcig bsam
280a7(phal chen): yas zhing gi rnams// ston pa byed kyang rdul la 'phel ba med// rdul gcig rtse la'ang sangs rgyas bzhugs zhing dang // sangs rgyas mi bzhugs zhing yang de bzhin ston// kun nas nyon
280a8(phal chen): mongs rnam dag dog pa dang // yangs shing phra dang che ba'i zhing yang ston// zhing rnams la la 'jig cing 'du ba dang // la la spri'u tshugs rim gyis gnas par ston// la la snrel zhi smig rgyu lta
280b1(phal chen): bu ste// de bzhin gzhan rnams mig 'phrul lta bur ston// de dag rdul gcig rtser ston ji bzhin du// ma lus rdul rnams kun la de bzhin te/ drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// mang
280b2(phal chen): yas grags pa'i rnam thar de 'dra'o// rgyal ba mchod pa'i rnam 'phrul ting nge 'dzin// rgyal ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed kyang // lag pa'i mthil gyis stong gsum rgyas bkang zhing // skyes
280b3(phal chen): buchen po rnams la mchod pa byed// phyogs bcu kun na me tog phreng ba dang // spos dang byug pa rin chen rin che ba// de dag byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa yi// rgyal ba mchod phyir lag pa'i
280b4(phal chen): mthil nas 'gyed// na bza' phye ma rin chen ji snyed dang / rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs dam sna tshogs dang / gser gyi rgyan dang rin chen bla re dag/ lag 'thil de nas
280b5(phal chen): char du mngon par 'bebs// phyogs rnams mtha' yas kun gyi yo byad rnams// drang srong che la mchod par gang 'os pa// de dag lag mthil de nas char du 'bebs// 
280b6(phal chen): byang chub shing drung rgyal ba mchod pa byed// rol mo'i rnam pa phyogs na ji snyed pa// rnga chen rnga dang pri bang sgra snyan dang // rol mo brdung dkrol gling bu sgra rab rnams// de dag lag mthil de
280b7(phal chen): nas sgra yang sgrog/ phyogs bcu'i dpe med ji snyed bzhugs pa yi// bde gshegs yon tan legs pa sna tshogs dang // bstod pa'i tshigs bcad bsgrubs pa sna tshogs kyang // lag
280b8(phal chen): mthil de nas sgra rab snyan par 'byung // de dag 'od zer las dgas yongs bsags pa// lag pa g.yas nas yongasu 'gyed byed cing // rgyal ba'i zhing rnams spos chus ma lus par// kun tu
281a1(phal chen): btab cing 'jig rten sgron ma mchod// 'od gzer yid 'ong snang zhing rgyun ldan pa// lag pa'i mthil bkye pad+mo bsam mi khyab// pad+mo rgyan 'phyang mtshan sdug du
281a2(phal chen): ma'i gzugs// mang po bkye zhing rgyal ba mchod byed// 'od gzer me tog rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // me tog rgyan dang me tog bla re dang // me tog sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // 
281a3(phal chen): bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od gzer spos kyi rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // spos kyi rgyan dang spos kyi bla re dang // sna tshogs spos kyis kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid
281a4(phal chen): che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer phye ma'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // phye ma'i rgyan dang phye ma'i bla re dang // phye ma sna tshegs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal
281a5(phal chen): ba mchod// 'od gzer na bza'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // na bza'i rgyan dang na bza' bla ra dang // na bza' sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag
281a6(phal chen): rgyal ba mchod// 'od gzer rin chen rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // rin chen rgyan dang rin chen bla ra dang // rin chen sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba/ 
281a7(phal chen): mchod// 'od gzer pad+mo'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // pad+mo'i rgyan dang pad+mo'i bla re dang // pad+mo sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od gzer
281a8(phal chen): phreng ba'i rgyan rnams rab bkye zhing // brang ba'i rgyan dang phreng ba'i bla ra dang // drang ba sna tshogs kun tu yongs bkang zhing // bdag nyid che ba de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'od zer rgyal mtshan mchog
281b1(phal chen): rgyan rab bkye zhing // de dag rgyal mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang // sngo dang sna tshogs rnam mang rgyan mang rgyan can gyis// rgyal ba'i zhing rnams kun nas brgyan pa byed// de dag de/ 
281b2(phal chen): gshegs dbu la gdugs kyi mchog rin chen dra ba sna tshogs rgyan ldan pa// dar gyi lda ldi ba dan yongs dbyangs shing // dril 'phreng rgyal ba'i gsung sgrog 'dzin pa byed// lag pa'i
281b3(phal chen): mthil nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// mchod pa rgyal ba gcig la byed pa ltar// ma lus rgyal ba rnams la'ang de bzhin te// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag 'gro ba yongs
281b4(phal chen): sdud ye shes kyis// rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting 'dzin mngon bsgrubs shing // bya ba'i tshul dang yon tan thams cad du// thabs mang stong gis sems can 'dul
281b5(phal chen): ba byed// la la de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sgo dang / sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong ba'i sgo/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun gyi tshul khrims sgo// bzod pa mi
281b6(phal chen): da lku sgo dag dang // la la brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson 'grus sgo// bsam gtan rab tu zhi gnas sgo dag dang // don rnams rnam par 'byed pa'i shes rab sgo// tshul rnams kun
281b7(phal chen): ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang // tshangs pa'i spyod pa dag dang mngon shes sgo// bsdu ba'i dngos pos phan tshol sgo dag dang // bsod nams yongs su bsags dang ye shes sgo// bden
281b8(phal chen): brten pa'i rnam thar sgo dag dang // la la stobs dang dbang po lam gyi sgo// nyan thos theg pa rnam grol sgo dag dang / rang rgyal theg pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo// theg pa dam pa
282a1(phal chen): rnam 'phrul ske dag dang // lal mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal spro// la la bdag med srog med sgo ga dang // mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags bral ba'i/ 
282a2(phal chen): sgo// la la zhi 'gog ting 'dzin sgo dag tu// 'gro ba'i spyod sgo ji snyed yod rgyu ba// de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs te// de dag kun gyi sgo'i sgo dag nas// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig
282a3(phal chen): rten sems can 'dul// gang rnams kun gyi sgo'i sgo dag nas// bsam pa ji bzhin sems can 'dul byed pa// de dag mtshan ma bzung bar mi nus te// ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul
282a4(phal chen): tshul ni de 'dra'o// de dag dga' ba'i rgyan gyi ting 'dzin mchog/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs sprin byed 'thun pa/ dga' bde spro ba rab dga' kun ldan pas// bsam
282a5(phal chen): gyis mi khyab yongs ston sems can 'dul// gang tshe lo nyes thams cad dkon gyur pa// de tshe 'jig rten bde ba'i yo byad rnams// thams cad bsam pa rdzogs par
282a6(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir// sbyin pa yongasu gtong zhing 'gro don byed// de dag zas mchog skom dang ro mchog dang // gos dang dgab pa rin chen sna tshogs dang // rgyal srid nor dang bdag sdug
282a7(phal chen): yongs btang bas// sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba byed// de dag mtshan rab kun gyis lus brgyan cing // gos dang rgyan mchog yongs su bgos btags te// phreng bas
282a8(phal chen): rnam brgyan spos kyis sku byas pa'i// gzugs rnams yongs su bstan pas sems can 'dul// mthong bas dga' bde rab tu mos pa la// de dag gzugs mchog gzugs
282b1(phal chen): bzang cha byad mdzes// gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston byed cing // gzugs la mos pa'i sems can 'dul ba byed// de dag ka la bing ka'i sgra snyan dang // ko ki la kun la dang
282b2(phal chen): pa'i sgra dbyangs dang // rnga dang tshangs pa mi'am ci'i sgras// mos pa thams cad tshul bzhin chos kyang ston// de dag stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po// gang gis rgyal ba 'gro ba'i don
282b3(phal chen): mdzad pa'o// chos kyi bye phrag sgo mo dag gis// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed/ 
282b4(phal chen): don dang don med grogs kyang de bzhin te// sems can dgos la grogs su 'gyur byas shing // grogs kyi sgo nas sems can rnam par 'dul// sdug bsngal
282b5(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'dus byas skyon gyi rnams// grogs kyi don du de dgabazod par byed// 'gro ba kun la phan don bde don du/ de dag grogs don mi bde nyams su len// gang na 'byung
282b6(phal chen): ba med cing chos med de// dgon pa'i yon tan thar pa mi dmigs pa// de dag kun tu rgyal srid cha spangs shing // zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon par 'byung // de dag khyim gyi
282b7(phal chen): btson ra sred gnas pa'i// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i rgyur// 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par// mngon par byung zhing thar pa yongs su brjod// de dag spyod
282b8(phal chen): pa bcu rnams brjod byed cing // skyes chen rnams kyi chos la de dag spyod// drang srong spyod pa thams cad ma lus par// yongasu sgom zhing 'gro ba'i don kyang byed// gang na sems can
283a1(phal chen): tshad med tshe ldan pa// bde ba phun ldan nyon mongs chung yod pa// de dag kun tu nad gzer nad bu can// bdag la dbang med tsam gyi dbang sgyur ston// 'dod
283a2(phal chen): chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang 'bar gyur te// gti mug rgyu las 'jig rten mer 'bar zhing // rga shi nad kyis rab tu 'bar gyur pa'i// 'jig rten bstan cing sems can 'dul ba byed// de dag
283a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas stobs bcu mi 'jigs bzhi// chos kyi khyad par bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang // sangs rgyas bdag nyid che brjod byed cing // sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyis 'gro don
283a4(phal chen): byed// de dag yongs ston rdzu 'phrul rjes ston gyis// gzugs rnams byin rlob mthu yis mthu che ba// de bzhin dgashegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing // rdzu 'phrul rnam
283a5(phal chen): par 'phrul pas sems can 'dul// de dag thabs kyi tshul mang sna tshogs kyi// 'gro ba'i don du 'jig rten rim gror byed// 'jig rten mi chags chu la pad+mo bzhin/ 
283a6(phal chen): dga' ba mos pa skye bar rnam par spyod// de dag rjod byed brjod pa'i rgyal po byed// gar mkhan rnga mkhan gyad dang rol mo mkhan// mdzes shing sdug par bzhad gang byed pa dang // sgyu
283a7(phal chen): mkhan gzugs mang kun tu ston po byed// grong pa grong dpon kha lo sgyur ba dang // ded dpon tshong dpon khyim bdag de bzhin te// rgyal po blon po mnga' rab pho nya dang // sman pa mi
283a8(phal chen): 'jigs gtsug lag mkhas pa byed// de dag nags tshal sdong po chen po bcug/ sman dang rin chen mi zad gter dag dang // yid bzhin nor bu 'dod pa 'byin shing dang // lam gol
283b1(phal chen): 'khyams la de bzhin lam ston 'gyur// 'jig rten byung nas mi ring shes gyur cing // sems can las kyi tshul la mi shes pa// de dag kun la rmos thabs tshong thabs dang / 
283b2(phal chen): sna tshogs bzo rnams kun kyang brjod pa byed// 'tshe med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba rnams// sems can bde skyed mkhas pas rab bsngags pa// rig mthu sman dang gtsug lag sna
283b3(phal chen): tshegs rnams// kun kyang drang srong de dag rnam par brjod// drang srong rnams kyi spyod pa dam pa'i mchog/ gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten dang 'gyur dang // brtul zhugs
283b4(phal chen): dka' spyod dka' thub mchog gi rnams// kun kyang mkhas pa de dag ston pa byed// de dag rgyu dang kun rgyu mu stegs can// dka' thub spyod yul mi smrar spyod pa
283b5(phal chen): dang // sgren mo gos med ri'i dge sbyong la// mu stegs can gyi mkhan po mkhas pa byed// de dag yongs 'tshe chos la spyod pa dang // bla na yod dang bla na med pa'i rnams// ral
283b6(phal chen): pa ring dang byis pa'i brtul zhugs can// de dag tu yang de dag mkhan por 'gyur// nyi ma'i rjes 'brang dka' thub lnga ldan dang // khyi dang ba lang brtul zhugs ri dgas spyod// gle'u can
283b7(phal chen): mu stegs bcu gsum spyod pa'i rnams// de dag kun tu'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur// lha rnams ye shes tshul la dga' ba dang // mu stegs khrus byed yul du rgyu ba dang // rtsa ba
283b8(phal chen): 'bras bu chu la spyod pa'i rnams// chos sems nang na de dag dam par 'gyur// gnas btegs gnas dang gcig tu spyod pa dang // tshar ma rtsa dang thal ba'i mal can dang / 
284a1(phal chen): dbyig pa'i mal can gcig pu spyod pa'i rnams// de dag kun tu'ang de dag slob dpon 'gyur// phyi rol mu stegs can rnams ji snyed pa// de dag
284a2(phal chen): bsam pa mos pa rtogs byas shing // bsgrub dka' mi zad drag shul dka' thub kyi// mu stegs can gyi sdug bsngal spang bas 'dul// 'jig rten lta bas 'khrugs pa shes byas nas/ 
284a3(phal chen): lta ba ngan la gnas pa'i mu stegs can// kun la phra ba'i tshig dang thabs tshul gyis// bden pa ston pa de dag kun tu byed// la lar dra byi la'i sngags tshig tu// shin tu gsang ba'i
284a4(phal chen): tshig gis bden pa ston// la la dag la gsal zhing drung tshig gis// la la dag la lha'i gsang tshig gis/ 8/ la la dag la yi ge dbye tshig dang // don nges rtogs pardo
284a5(phal chen): rje'i tshig rnams dang // rgol ba 'dul ba'i ye shes tshig rnams dang // bstan pa thub med thar pa'i tshig rnams kyis// la la dag la mi skad tshig rnams dang // kun la
284a6(phal chen): 'jug pa'i tshig nges tshig rnams dang // la la dag la lha yi tshig rnams dang // klu'i tshig nges gnod sbyin tshigs rnams kyi/ la la dag la srin po 'byung po dang // dri za grul bum lto 'phye chen
284a7(phal chen): po'i tshig/ mi ci lha min na mkha' lding tshig gis// bden pa bstan cing thar par 'dren par byed// de dag bden pa'i nges tshig tshul shes bzhin// de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams
284a8(phal chen): ma lus pa'i// chos nyid bsam yas tshig lam shes pas ston// de dag ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag 'gro bde mchog gi ting nge 'dzin// 'gro ba kun la mngon
284b1(phal chen): par bsgrub byed cing // 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste/ 'od zer bkye nas sems can de dag 'dul// 'od zer mthong na legs pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji
284b2(phal chen): snyed 'od zer de shes pa// de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te// bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu// sangs rgyas bstan te chos rnams yongs bstan nas// dge 'dun bstan
284b3(phal chen): nas mi rnams lam bstan te// rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten bstan pas na// des ni mthong ni legs pa'i 'od zer grub// lha'i 'od zer zil gyis gnon pa yi// 'od zer 'ong
284b4(phal chen): byed rab tu bkye byas shing // mun pa kun dang rdul rnams kun bsal te// 'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de rab tu sna // 'od des sems can ji snyed yongs bskul ba// de dag
284b5(phal chen): rgyal ba mchod phyir me mar 'dzin// rgyal ba mchod phyir ma mar gzung byas pas// 'jig rten sgrol mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur// 'bru mar me mar mur gyi me mar dang // 
284b6(phal chen): shing dang rtsa dang smig ma spa'i sgron// spos dang ro mchog rin chen sgron ma dag/ rgyal ba rnams gsol 'od byed de thob bo// 'od zer sgrol zhes bya ba rab bkye zhing // sems can ji skad
284b7(phal chen): 'od zer des bskul ba// de dag sred pa rnams yangs srid pa'i mchor// sems can bsgral don go cha brtan pa gyon// gang rnams srid pa rnam yangs srid pa'i mchod// sems can
284b8(phal chen): bsgral phyir go cha brtan gyon pa// de dag chu bo bzhi las sgrol ba byed// mya ngan med pa bde ba'i grong yang ston// stegs dang zam pa gcig min byas pa dang // chu klung lam la sgrol
285a1(phal chen): ba'i gru byin te// 'dus byas sun phyung zhi ba bsngags pas na// des ni sgrol ba'i 'od zer de grub bo// 'od zer skom pa sel ba rab bkye zhing / 
285a2(phal chen): sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan sgom pa rab spangs shing // chos kyi rnam grol rol don du gnyer// 'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs te// chos kyis
285a3(phal chen): grol ba'i ro la don gnyer bas// sangs rgyas bdud rtsi char pa 'bebs par 'gyur// 'jig rten sred pa'i sgom pa rnam par sel// rdzing dang chu klung khron pa lo ma dang // mtshe rnams byang/ 
285a4(phal chen): chub don tu byed btsud de// 'dod pa rnam smad bsam gta nu bsngags pas na// skom pa rnam sel de ni des sgrub po// 'od zer dga' bar byed pa rab bkye zhing // sems can
285a5(phal chen): ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// dga' bas rgyas shing / byang chub mchog don du// rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes/ sems bskyed do// thugs rje mnga' ba rnams kyi sku
285a6(phal chen): gzugs mtshan brgyan pa// pad+mo'i gdan la bzhugs pa byas bsgrubs shing // rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan brjod pas na// dga' ba byed pa'i 'od ni des sgrub po// 'od zer mos
285a7(phal chen): par byed pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// de dag thams cad sangs rgyas mos pas dga'// chos la mos dga' dge 'dun mos pas dga'// de dag
285a8(phal chen): rtag tu sangs rgyas mos dga' ste// chos la mos dga' dge 'dun mos dga' bas// sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin dge 'dun dang // rtag tu 'grogs 'thob bzod pa bla med
285b1(phal chen): 'thob// sangs rgyas rjes dran chos dang tshogs mchog la// sems can mang po bskul cing dran byas te// byang chub sems kyi yon tan bstan pas na// des ni 'od zer mos
285b2(phal chen): par byed pa grub// 'od zer bsod nams bsags pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// bla na med pa'i byang chub don gnyer cing // sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma yongs
285b3(phal chen): su gtong // de dag mchod sbyin lhug pa byed pa'i tshe// slong mo ba'i bsam pa rdzogs byas te// bsam pa kun tshul sbyin pa byin pas na// des na 'od zer bsod nams bsags grub bo// 
285b4(phal chen): 'od zer ye shes ldan pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// chos gcig sgo nas chos gcig min pa yi// chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyis
285b5(phal chen): rjes su shes// chos kyi bye brag sems can 'dzin btsud de// nges rtogs den gyi ye shes rnam bya zhing // chos kyi tshig don brjod pa byas pas na// des
285b6(phal chen): ni ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer grub// 'od zer shes rab sgron ma rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung ba'i// rang bzhin
285b7(phal chen): med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug/ bdag po med chos stong pa byed med pa// sprin dang smig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba'i dngos// rmi lam lta bu gzugs brnyan rang bzhin rnams// bstan pas
285b8(phal chen): shes rab sgron ma de grub po// 'od zer chos kyis rnam 'phrul rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// mi zad gzungs kyi mdzod rnams rab thob cing // de bzhin
286a1(phal chen): gshegs pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzin// chos 'chang rnams la yongasu phan btags te// drang srong rnams la chos kyis bsrungs byas shing // 'gro
286a2(phal chen): ba kun la chos bzhin phan btags pas// 'od zer chos kyis rnam 'phrul de grub po// 'od zer gtong dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing // sems can 'jungs pa ji snyed des bskul ba/ 
286a3(phal chen): skyid pa mi brtan mi rtag shes gyur nas// de dag rtag tu sbyin mos dga' bar 'gyur// 'jungs pa 'dul dga'i sems can ma dul dang // nor rnams rmi lam sprin tshul shes gyur
286a4(phal chen): nas// dga' ba'i yid kyis sbyin pa rnam spel bas// gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od zer des grub bo// 'od zer de yongs su gdung med rab bkye zhing // tshul ngan sems/ 
286a5(phal chen): can ji snyed des bskul ba// tshul khrims rnams dag rab tu gnas gyur te// rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems skyed do// dge ba'i las lam yongasu
286a6(phal chen): dag pa dang // tshul khrims bzang la sems can mang bskul cing // byang chub sems la yang dag bskul byas pas// yongs su gdung med 'od zer de grub bo// bzod pas rnam
286a7(phal chen): brgyan 'od zer rab bkye zhing // mi bzod sems can ji snyed des bskul ba// khro ba'i thab nga rgyal yongs spangs shing // de dag bzed mos rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// sdig sems
286a8(phal chen): ldan la nyes pa bzod byas te// byang chub don tu 'khrug pa ma byas shing // bzod pa'i yon tan rtag tu brjod byas pas// des ni bzod pas rnam brgyan de grub bo// 'od
286b1(phal chen): zer brtson dang ldan pa rabakye zhing // le lo'i sems can ji snyed des bskul ba// rigs par brtson zhing dkon mchog gsum rnams la/ sbyor ba sgo med mchod pa byed par 'gyur// 
286b2(phal chen): rigs par brtson pas dkon mchog gsum rnams la// sbyor ba skyo bo med pas mchod byas nas// de dag bdud bzhi'i lam las yongs 'das te// myur du byang chub bla med rab tu
286b3(phal chen): thog/ sems can mang po brtson 'grus bskul byas te// dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa 'bru byas nas// tha ma'i dus su dam chos yongs bzung bas// des ni brtson ldan 'od
286b4(phal chen): zer de grub bo// 'od zer zhi bar byed pa rab bkyi zhing / rnam 'khrugs sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/ de dag 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// nyams su
286b5(phal chen): mi gnod mnyam bzhag sems su 'gyur// sdig to'i grogs po nyes ldan spyod can dang // 'du 'ji yongs su rnam par spang byas te// bsam gtan ni
286b6(phal chen): ba'i dgon pa rab bsngags pas// des ni zhi byed 'od zer de grub bo// 'od zer shes rab rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing // shes rab 'chal pa ji snyed des bskul ba// bden dang rten dang
286b7(phal chen): rnam thar tshul rnams dang // dbang po'i rgyus la rtogs par shes par 'gyur// bden dang brten dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang // dbang pos rgyas la rtogs par shes gyur
286b8(phal chen): cing // nyi ma sgron ma'i ting 'dzin thob gyur nas// shes rab 'od gsal mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ rgyal srid nor dang bdag pangs yongs btang ste// byang chub
287a1(phal chen): don tu chos rnams gang btsal ba// de dag rim gror rab tu brjod byas pas// shes rab rnam brgyan 'od zer de grub po// 'od zer sangs rgyas
