287a2(phal chen): ldan pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab shin tu mang ba'i rnams// pad+mo mchog la bzhugs par rab tu mthong // sangs rgyas
287a3(phal chen): bdag nyid che dang rnam thar dang // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas yongs bstan te// sangs rgyas stobs dang rdzu 'phrul brjod byas pas// sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od zer des grub bo// 
287a4(phal chen): 'od zer mi 'jigs sbyin pa rab bkye zhing // 'jigs dmanar sems can ji snyed des phog pa// 'byung ba gza' drang gsad cing brdeg pa dang // nad kyi 'jigs pa
287a5(phal chen): kun las rab tu 'grol// mi 'jigs sbyin pas sems can bskyab pa dang // srog gcod las las sems rgyud phyir bzlog cing // 'jigs pas skyabs
287a6(phal chen): tshol rnams la bsgrub byas pas// 'od zer mi 'jigs sbyin pa des grub po// 'od zer thams cad bde ba rab bkye zhing // nad pa na ba ji snyed des reg pa// thams cad nad kyi ldog
287a7(phal chen): bsngal rnam par 'grol// bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba rnams kyang thob// nad gsos 'bras bu sman dang rtsa ba dang // rin chen ro mchog spos dang byug pa dang // bu ram sbrang rtsi'o
287a8(phal chen): ma mar dag dang // 'bru mar zas skom byin pas de grub bo// 'od zer sangs rgyas ston pa rab bkye zhing // tshe zad mthar ni ji snyed des bskul ba// sangs rgyas rjes dran
287b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// de dag shi 'phos sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'gro/ 'chi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas dran byas te// dgar 'gyur rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bstan byas
287b2(phal chen): shing // 'chi kar sangs rgyas skyabs su gtang byas pas// sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer des thob bo// 'od zer chos rab brjod pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer
287b3(phal chen): des bskul ba// chos nyan rjod cing de bzhin 'dri ba byed// chos la mos pas rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// chos kyi mu ge'i dus su chos brjod de// chos tshol rnams kyi bsam pa
287b4(phal chen): rdzogs byas shing // mos pa bskyed de chos la brtson gyis shes// brjod pas chos rab rjod pa de thob po// da/ sangs rgyas sras rnams yongs su bskul ba'i phyir/ 
287b5(phal chen): 'od zer dbyangs dang ldan pa rab bkye zhing // khams gsum sgra rgyud ji snyed yod pa dag/ kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung du thos// gsal ba'i dbyangs
287b6(phal chen): sgrasbyar drang srong che bstod de// rol mo sgra chen dril gyi sbyin po rnams// 'gro ba kun la rgyal ba'i gsung don du// yongs su btang bas 'od zer dbyangs ldan thob// 'od zer 'chi med
287b7(phal chen): sbyin pa rab bkye zhing // sems can ji skad 'od zer des bskul ba// bag med spyod pa thams cad rnam spangs te// yon tan kun la rnal 'byor nyams su len// 'dus byas rtag tu bde
287b8(phal chen): ba med pa ste// sdug bsngal 'tshe ba mang pos yongasu gang // 'gog pa rtag tu bde zhing zhi dga' zhes// brjod pas 'chi med sbyin pa de thob bo// 'od zer khyad par ldan pa rab bkye
288a1(phal chen): zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// tshul khrims khyad par ting 'dzin khyad par dang // shes rab khyad par rgyal ba rnams la nyan/ 
288a2(phal chen): tshul khrims 'phags pa ting 'dzin 'bags pa ste// shes rab 'phags pa thub pa'i rgyal chen zhes// byang chub don du bsngags shing stod byas pas// des ni 'od zer khyad par
288a3(phal chen): ldan pa thob// 'od zer rin chen rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing // sems can ji snyed 'od zer des bskul ba// rin chen gter mang mi zung thob gyur te// drang srong che la rin chen dam pas
288a4(phal chen): mchod// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ da rin chen phul zhing 'gro ba nyon mongs la// rin chen bstud de rin chen sbyin btang bas// rin chen rnam par
288a5(phal chen): brgyan pa'i 'od zer grub// 'od zer spos mchog snang ba rab bkye zhing // sems can ji skad 'od zer des bskul ba// mi la med pa'i spos dri tshor gyur nas// sangs
288a6(phal chen): rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par 'gyur// mi dang lha yi spos dang byug pa yis// mi yi gtse la mchod pa rab byas te// spos kyis rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten dag/ byas pas
288a7(phal chen): 'od zer spos mchog snang ba grub// 'od zer sna tshogs rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs mchog/ rol mo sgra snyan spos dang bdug spos kyis// pho brang
288a8(phal chen): dam pa yongs brgyan me tog 'gengs// sngan chad rgyal ba rol mos bsu byas te// me tog byug pa bdug spos phye ma dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan mchog dag gis// mchod
288b1(phal chen): pa byas pas sna tshogs rgyan 'grub bo// 'od zer shin tu dang byed rab bkye zhing // sa rnams lag mthil bzhin du gnas par byed// mchod rten drang srong gnas rnams sbyang byas pas// des
288b2(phal chen): ni 'od zer shin tu dang byed grub// 'od zer chen po'i sprin ldan rab bkye zhing // spos kyi char 'bebs sprin rnams kun nas gnas// mchod rten gam yo spos chus yongs btab pas/ 
288b3(phal chen): 'od zer sprin dang ldan pa rab tu thob// 'od zer lhab lhub rnam brgyan rab bkye zhing // gos med gos yod rgyan dang ldan par 'gyur// gos dang bgo ba phreng ba sna tshogs dag/ yongs su/ 
288b4(phal chen): btang ba lha lhub rnam brgyan grub// 'od zer bro mchog ldan pa rab bkye zhing // bkres pa kha zas bro mchog thob par 'gyur// zas dang skom dang blo mchog sna tshogs rnams// byin pas
288b5(phal chen): bro mchog ldan pa'i 'od kyang thob// 'od zer nor ston rab tu/ dgyes byas shing // phongs pa rin chen gter rnams/ thob par 'gyur// gnas dang gter rnams mi zad dkon
288b6(phal chen): mchog gsum// gsol bas nor ston 'od zer de thob bo// 'od zer mig spyod rab tu gyes byas shing // long ba de tshe sna tshogs gzugs mthong 'gyur// rgyal ba dag dang rgyal
288b7(phal chen): ba'i mchod rten la// mar me gsol bas mig sbyong 'od zer grub// rna ba rnam skyeng 'od zer rab bkye zhing // rna ba nyams pa sgra mang thos par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i
288b8(phal chen): mchod rten la// sil snyan phul bas rna ba rnam skyeng thob// 'od zer sna sbyong rab tu dgyes byas shing // sngan chad ma tsher dri zhim tsher bar 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ 
289a1(phal chen): spos ni ma gsol bas snga spyong 'od zer grug/ 'od zer lde sprong rab tu dgyes byas shing // sgra snyan yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas bstod// mi stan brlangs
289a2(phal chen): smra ba rnams spangs te// 'jam par smra bas lce spyong 'od zer grub// 'od zer lus spyong rab tu dgyes byas shing // dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams dang
289a3(phal chen): rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// lus kyis rab btud lus sbyong 'od zer thob// 'od zer sems sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing // smos pa thams cad rang bzhin sems su 'gyur// ting
289a4(phal chen): 'dzin rjes su sems 'gro rab byas pas// des ni sems sbyong 'od zer de grub bo// 'od zer gzugs sbyong rab tu/ dgye byas shing // bsam yas sku mnga' mi'i dbang po
289a5(phal chen): mthong / sku gzugs re mo sna tshogs mang po dang // mchod rten rgyan byas gzugs sbyong thob par 'gyur// 'od zer sgra sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing // sgra ni sgra min stong par
289a6(phal chen): rab tu shes// rkyen las byung bas sgra brnyan 'dra'o zhes// sgra rnams bstan pas 'od zer de grub po// 'od zer dri spyong rab tu dgye byas shing // dri nga thams cad dri zhim mchog tu 'gyur/ 
289a7(phal chen): spos mchog rab chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag/ khrus byas byang chub shing gi 'od de yin// 'od zer bro skyong rab tu dgye byas shing // dug can dug med re'i mchog tu 'gyur/ 
289a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la// bro mchog thams cad phul ba'i don de yin// 'od zer reg sbyong rab tu dgye byas shing // reg na mi bde thams cad 'jam bder 'gyur/ 
289b1(phal chen): tri shul mdung dang ral gri mda'i char// phreng ba yid 'ong ut+pal pad+mor 'gyur// gos mang 'jam pa reg na bde ba'i rnams// rgyal ba gshegs pa'i lam du bting bkram ste// me tog
289b2(phal chen): byug pa na bza' 'jam pa dang // phreng ba bla ra gsol ba'i 'od de yin// 'od zer chos sbyang rab tu dgye byas shing // ba spu kun nas 'jig rten phan mdzad pa'i// bsam yas
289b3(phal chen): chos mang 'byung ba thos par 'gyur// mos pa'i lam tshul bzhin du dga' bar byed// rkyen las byung bas ma skyes rang bzhin yin// rgyal ba'i sgra ni chos kyi sku yin te// chos
289b4(phal chen): nyid na mkha' bzhin du rtag nas shes// brjod pas chos sbyong 'od zer de thob bo// 'od zer sgo mo de dag la sogs pa// drang srong rnams kyi ba spu sgo gcig
289b5(phal chen): nas/ 'ga' 'ga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'od zer 'byung // kun kyang tha dad las kyi tshul can no// ji ltar kha spu gcig gi sgro gcig nas/ 'od zer 'ga'
289b6(phal chen): 'ga'i bye snyed yongs 'byung ba// de bzhin ma lus spu rnams thams cad nas// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// yon tan gang gis 'od zer grub gyur pa'i yon tan de
289b7(phal chen): la bstang grogs sus byas pa// de dag 'od zer de dag nyid kyang 'byung // drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag bsod nams btang grogs byas pa la// rje su yi rang gsol
289b8(phal chen): ba sus btab dang // gang gis mthong ste dge ba bsags gyur pa// de dag kun kyang 'od zer de dag shes// gang gis bsod nams byas shing dge bsags te// sangs rgyas yang dang / 
290a1(phal chen): yang du mchod byas shing // sangs rgyas yon tan 'dod cing don gnyer ba// de dag kun la 'od zer de dag skul// dmus long rnams kyis nyi ma mi mthong yang // 
290a2(phal chen): de med ma yin 'jig rten kun tu 'char// mig dang ldan pas shar bar shes gyur nas// kun kyang rang rang so so'i las la 'jug/ de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag kyang // med pa ma
290a3(phal chen): yin kun tu 'phro ba ste// de dag mos med log pas mnar ba yin// bal gyis mi mthong blo gros yangs la mod// rgyan dang nor bu bzhon pa gzhol med khang // rin chen ro mchog spos dang
290a4(phal chen): byug pa'i rnams// de dag cher bar gyur la yod mod kyi// nyon mongs phongs pa rnams la yod pa min// gang dgis 'od zer bye brag 'di thos te// dad la yid ches mos
290a5(phal chen): pa skyes gyur na// bdag ni yon tan chen po'i rgyal mtshan du// mi 'gyur snyam du nem nur des mi bskyed// de dag 'gro/ ra gyi rgyan du rnam 'phrul bar// ting 'dzin dam pa mngon
290a6(phal chen): par sgrub byed cing // phyogs bcu kun tu dpe zla med pa yi// rgyal sras 'khor rnams yongs su ston pa byed// de dag pad+mo mdzes pa stong gsum tsam// 'od kyis rnam brgyan byin gyis
290a7(phal chen): brlab byas shing // lus gcig skyil mo krung gis pad+mo de// yongs su rgyas ston ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul// de dag zhing bcu'i rdul snyed pad mo gzhan// 'khor dang bcas la byin
290a8(phal chen): gyis brlab byas shing // rgyal sras kun gyis kun nas yongs bskor bar// de dag ting 'dzin ting 'dzin med par spyod// drang srong des ni yongasu smin byas te// rgyal ba'i legs
290b1(phal chen): la yongs su gang bsgrubs pa// de dag pad+mo chen po'i 'khor byed cing // kun kyang thal mo sbyar te ngor yang lta// skyes bu chen po'i chos nyid de 'dra ste// gang rnams
290b2(phal chen): ting 'dzin rnams spyod zhugs gyur pa// kun kyang rang rang slob mas bskor 'gyur te// zla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba bzhin// de dag ji ltar phyogs gcig 'jug byed cing / 
290b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas sras kyi 'khor rnams ston byed pa// de bzhin ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du// ston te ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag ting 'dzin rab rnams mngon sgrub
290b4(phal chen): cing / phyogs kyi dra bar sbrel zhing spyod pa byed// la la mnyam bzhag la la rnam langs par// rang rang lus kyang phyogs rnams kun tu ston// de dag shar gyi phyogasu mnyam
290b5(phal chen): bzhag cing // dpa' bo de dag nub kyi phyogs nas ldang // nub kyi phyogasu de bzhin mnyam bzhag cing / shar gyi phyogs nas bdag nyid che ba ldang // de bzhin
290b6(phal chen): phyogs bcu kun tu 'jug byed de// phyogs rnams gzhan du mnyam par gzhag byas shing // ye shes yon tan mang po gzhan las ldang // drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// sha
290b7(phal chen): phyogs zhing 'grangs ji snyed yod pa'i rnams// ma lus de dag kun gyi rang byung gi/ spyan snga zhabs kyi drung na ting 'dzin la// zhi bar rnam par spyod par de dag snang // der ni mnyam bzhag
290b8(phal chen): sems can bstan byas nas// nub kyi zhing rnams kun nas dpa' bo'i rnams// langs shing rgyal ba kun gyi spyan snga na// mchod pa rnam mong du ma byed par snang // nub kyi zhing 'grangs
291a1(phal chen): ji snyed yod pa'i rnams// ma lus de dag kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi// spyan snga zhabs kyi drung na ting 'dzin la// zhi bar rnam par spyod par de dag snang // der
291a2(phal chen): ni mnyam bzhag sems can bstan byas nas// shar gyi zhing rnams kun nas dpa' bo'i rnams// langs shing rgyal ba kun gyi spyan snga na// mchod pa rnam mang du ma byed par snang / 
291a3(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i zhing du 'jug pa de 'dra ste// phyogs rnams kun tu ma lus dpa' bo'i rnams// la la mnyam bzhag la la rnam par langs// 'jig rten sgron ma kun la mchod byed snang
291a4(phal chen): de dag mig gi lam la mnyam bzhag cing // bdag de nyid che ba gzugs kyi lam las ldang // 'jig rten da ltar bcas myos par 'gyur ba yi// bsam gyis mi
291a5(phal chen): khyab gzugs kyang kun tu ston// gzugs kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran dang ldan pa mig gi lam las ldang // mig ni ma skyes ma byung rang
291a6(phal chen): bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed// de dag rna ba'i lam la mnyam bzhag cing // bdag nyid che ba sgra'i lam las ldang // sgra dbyangs thams cad sgra brnyan bzhin du
291a7(phal chen): shes// 'jig rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur// sgra'i lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran dang ldan pa rna ba'i lam las ldang // rna ba ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin
291a8(phal chen): te// stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed// de dag sna'i lam la mnyam bzhag cing // bdag nyid che 'dri'i lam las ldang // dri rab mchog le 'jug par rab tu zhugs// 'jig
291b1(phal chen): rten lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur// dri'i lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran dang ldan pa sna'i lam las ldang // sna ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa
291b2(phal chen): med par ston pa byed// de dag lce'i lam la mnyam bzhag cing // bro mchog kun gyi lam las ldang ba byed// bdag nyid che ba de dag bro mchog shes// 'jig rten lhar bcas de
291b3(phal chen): la mos par 'gyur// bro ba'i mchog la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran drang ldan pa lce'i lam las ldang // lce ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med pa ston pa
291b4(phal chen): byed// de dag lus kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing / bdag nyid che ba reg gi lam las ldang // 'jig rten bde ba bskyed pa'i reg la zhugs// 'jig rten ltar/ 
291b5(phal chen): bcas de la mos par 'gyur// reg gi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas cing // dran dang ldan pa lus kyi lam las ldang // lus ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ 
291b6(phal chen): stong pa byed pa med par ston pa byed// de dag sems kyi lam la mnyam bzhag cing // bdag nyid che ba chos kyi lam las ldang // chos sgrub 'jug par bya la rab tu zhugs// 'jig rten
291b7(phal chen): lhar bcas de la mos par 'gyur// chos kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // dran dang ldan pa sems kyi lam las ldang // sems ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa
291b8(phal chen): byed pa med par ston pa byed// khyim pa'i lus su de dag mnyam panag cing // gzhon nu dngal bab pa'i lus ldang // gnon nu dang la bab par mnyam pa na ga cing // rgan no
292a1(phal chen): 'khogs pa'i lus su rnam par ldang // rgan zhing 'khogs pa'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing // dge bsnyen dang ma'i lus su rnam par ldang // dge bsnyen dang
292a2(phal chen): ma'i lus su mnyam bzhag cing // dge bsnyen dad pa'i lus su rnam par ldang // dge bsnyen dad pa'i lusu mnyam bzhag cing // dge slong ma'i lusu rnam par ldang // dge slong ma'i lus su
292a3(phal chen): mnyam bzhag cing // dge slong mang du thos pa'i lusu ldang // dge slong mang thos lusu mnyam bzhag cing // slob dang mi slob lus su rnam par ldang // slob dang mi slob lus su mnyam
292a4(phal chen): bzhag cing // rang rgyal lus las de dag rnam par ldang // rang rgyal lus la de dag mnyam bzhag cing // sangs rgya su sku mchog phul du rnam par ldang // sangs rgyas sku mchog phul
292a5(phal chen): la mnyam bzhag cing // lha'i lus su de dag rnam par/ ldang // lha'i lus de dag mnyam bzhag cing // 'phrul/ chen klu'i lusu rnam par ldang // 'phrul chen klu'i lusu mnyam
292a6(phal chen): bzhag cing // 'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus su rnam par ldang // 'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus su mnyam bzhag cing // 'byung po kun gyi lus su rnam par ldang // 'byung po kun gyi lus su
292a7(phal chen): mnyam bzhag cing // smra rtse gcig gi sgo nas rnam par ldang // spu rtse gcig gi sgo la mnyam bzhag cing // smra rtse kun gyi sgo nas rnam par ldang // spu rtse kun gyi sgo nas mnyam
292a8(phal chen): bzhag cing // skra rtse gcig gi sgo nas rnam par ldang // sgra rtse gcig gi sgor mnyam bzhag cing // skra rtse kun gyi sgo nas rnam par ldang // skra rtse kun gyi sgor ni mnyam bzhag cing / 
292b1(phal chen): rdul phran gcig las de dag rnam par ldang // rdul phran gcig la de dag mnyam bzhag cing // rdul phran ma lus kun las rnam par ldang // rdul phran kun la de dag mnyam
292b2(phal chen): bzhag cing // rgya mtsho'i rdo rje gzhi las rnam par ldang // rgya mtsho rdo rje gzhi la mnyam bzhag cing // rin chen shing gi 'bras las rnam par ldang // rin chen shing gi 'bras la
292b3(phal chen): mnyam bzhag cing // rgyal ba'i 'od zer rnams las rnam par ldang // rgyal ba'i 'od zer sgor ni mnyam bzhag cing // rgya mtsho'i chu dang chu klung kun nas ldang // rgya mtsho chu klung kun la/ 
292b4(phal chen): mnyam bzhag cing // bdag nyid che ba me'i lam las ldang // me'i lam la de dag mnyam bzhag cing // dran da da ldan pa rlung gi lam las ldang // rlung gi lam la de dag
292b5(phal chen): mnyam bzhag cing // bdag nyid che ba sa'i gzhi las ldeng // sa'i gzhi la mnyam par bzhag byas shing // lha'i gzhal med khang nas rnam par ldang // lha'i gzhal
292b6(phal chen): med khang du mnyam bzhag cing // dran dang ldan pa klu'i gnas nas ldang // yon tan mtha' yas bsags pa de dag gi/ ting 'dzin rnam thar de dag bsam mi khyab// rgyal ba kun
292b7(phal chen): gyis bskal pa bsam yas su// bstan pa mdzad kyang zad par mi rung ngo // rgyal ba kun gyis de skad ma gsungs min// 'gro ba'i las kyi rnam smin bsam mi khyab// klu yi rnam
292b8(phal chen): 'phrul sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul dang // bsam gtan pa'i rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de dag la yang dpe bstan brjod par bya// de la 'dra ba'i dpe lta yod min te// mkhas
293a1(phal chen): shing gsal nga'i skye bo dpe rnams kyis// bstan na myung du rnam par don shes 'gyur// sems kyi lam la rnam thar brgyad gnas pa'i// nyan rjes
293a2(phal chen): gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur// mang por gyur cing de bzhin gcig gyur te// rnam pa' 'di la bsam gtan 'ara' gling 'bar// 'og nas 'bar yang steng nas chu mi rgyun// steng nas me
293a3(phal chen): 'bar 'og nas chu yi rgyun// 'gro 'dug nyal zhing 'greng ba de bzhin te// skad cig gcig la lus 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de ni snying rje chen po ldan ma yin// byang chub mi tshel 'jig
293a4(phal chen): rten yal bar gzhog/ 'on kyang lus 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ston// 'jig rten pan tshol ci phyir de/ mi ston// nyi zla mkha' las rnam par rgyu 'dong zhing / 
293a5(phal chen): phyogs rnams kun gyi mtshe dang lu ma dang // lteng ka khron pa rin chen rgya mtsho snod// chu klung kun tu gzugs brnyan ston pa byed// de bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs
293a6(phal chen): kun kyang // skyes bu dpa' bo de dag phyogs bcur ston// ting 'dzin rnam thar kun gyi tshul la mkhas// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung dpal// mchogasal dang bar yan lag bzhi'i
293a7(phal chen): dpung // so sor rang rang gzugs brnyan tshul bzhin mthong // ral gri shang lang sogs ka mde'u thung mda'// gzhon pa theg pa go cha bcas par mthong // gang gi gang gzugs
293a8(phal chen): cha byad ci 'dra ba// chu gsal de la de bzhin ma nor mthong // chu la zhe sdang byams pa rtog pa med// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// rgya mtsho'i lha mo sgra dang ldan yod pa// sems
293b1(phal chen): can rgya mtshor ji snyed skyes pa'i rnams// de dag sgra'i yan lag dbyangs tshul shes// sgra skad kun tu rang rang skad du brjod// dbyangs ldan de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang can// 'on kyang sgra
293b2(phal chen): kun dbyangs kyi tshul la mkhas// gzugs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang thob rnams// 'jig rten lhar bcas ci phyir mgur mi byed// dga' byeng chung ma sgra snyan ldan pa mo// tshangs
293b3(phal chen): pa'i bu mo sems las byung ba ste// dam tshigs bden sgrub mi 'tshe dga' ba yi// sems yid ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa byed// sgra snyan ldan pa 'dod chags zhe sdang can// brtul
293b4(phal chen): zhugs grub la dbyangs kyi rje su 'brang // 'jig rten da yid 'ong sgras kyang tshim par byed// ye shes yon tan mang ba tsar mi ston// sngags kyi tshul mkhas sgyu ma'i mkhan
293b5(phal chen): po yang // sna tshogs mtha' yas gzugs mang ston pa byed// nyin mtshan yud dang zla ba lo brgya dang / khyim bzang rgyas pa shin tu mdzes pa ston// 'dod chags sdang
293b6(phal chen): ldan sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang // sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyis 'jig rten dga' bar byed// bsam gtan mngon shes rnam 'phrul rab byang rnams// spyod pa'i tshul mkhas ci phyir dga' mi byed// lha dang / 
293b7(phal chen): lha min dbang po 'thab pa'i tshe// lha min lha yang rung ste gang 'pham pa// de dag bzhon pa theg pa gdugs bcas par// go cha gyon bzhin 'jigs pas kun tu byer// lha dbang de dag 'dod
293b8(phal chen): chags sdang ldan yang // lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ston// dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul dang gnas dbang po rnams// lus kyi rnam 'phrul ci phyir ston mi byed// rdo rje 'dzin
294a1(phal chen): pa'i glang po shugs ldan pa// 'phrul chen glang chen dbang po'i 'khor gyur pas// mgo mang sum cu rtsa gnyis sprul pa byed// mgo rnams kun la'ang mche ba drug/ 
294a2(phal chen): ste// so rnams re re kun la'ang rdzing gi rnams// bdun bdun chus rgyas yongs su sprul pa byed// rdzing rnams re re kun tu pad mo rnams// bdun bdun rgyan gyis rnam brgyan sprul pa byed/ draH/ 
294a3(phal chen): pad+mo ra re yang lha'i bu mo dag/ sgyu rtsal kun mkhas bdun bdun sprul pa byed// de dag rtsed mo glu gar tshul la mkhas// sum cu rtsa gsum dbang po de dang rtse// glang po de yang klu'i lus btang
294a4(phal chen): zhing // lha rnams kun dang mnyam zhing 'dra bar rdzu// spyod pa'i tshul dang longs spyod kun dang 'thun// glang po mtsho gra gi rnam 'phrul ci 'dra ba ltos// de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang
294a5(phal chen): gti mug can// 'on kyang de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed na// / shes rab thabs kyi stobs la byang 'gyur rnams// ting 'dzin brgyas kyang ci rab 'phrul mi byed// sgra can ci
294a6(phal chen): dga'i tshul du lus rdzu na// rdo rje'i gzhi la rkang pa'i 'thil bor zhing // rgya mtsho'i zabs ring lte bar phyin tsam byed// ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi mgo yang snyom// de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti
294a7(phal chen): mug can// 'on kyang de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed na// 'jig rten sgron ma bdud rnams yongs 'dul ba// rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas ci rab ston mi byed// bsam yas brgya byin 'phrul yang
294a8(phal chen): ltos shig dang // lha dang lha dbang 'thab par gyur pa'i tshe// lha min bye ba 'phyes pa ji snyed pa// de snyed brgya byin rang gi lus 'phrul byed// lha min dbang po lha min phal kun gyis// 
294b1(phal chen): brgya byin rang rang mdun na 'dug par shes// de ni rdo rje 'chang bas bzung gyur shes// lha min dbang po kun kyang mgo myos so// 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyi mig stong rab bstan te/ 
294b2(phal chen): rdo rje me lce 'bar bar rab gzas shing // lus la go bgos gzi brjid thub dka' ba'i// brgya byin mthong nas lha min dbang po 'byar// de ni bsod nams phal gyi stobs dang mthus// 
294b3(phal chen): lha rgyal don tu rnam par 'phrul byed na// 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi mgon gyur pa'i// bsod nams mi zad rnams go cir mi 'phrul// lha rnams bskul ba'i lha rdzas lnga yod pa// lha'i
294b4(phal chen): las rnams rnam par smin pas byung // lha rnams bag med da spyod par shes gyur nas// mkha' las rnga yi dbyangs kyang rab tu sgrog/ 'dod pa thams cad mi rtag
294b5(phal chen): mi brtan te// 'jig cing mi gnas dbu ba'i rang bzhin 'dra// sgyu ma smig rgyu chu'i zla ba bzhin// srid pa kun kyang rmi lam sprin gyi dngos// bag med thams cad
294b6(phal chen): gcugs can mya ngan ldan// tsham gyi lam yin 'chi med lam ma yin// ji snyed bag med rnam par spyod pa'i rnams// bdud kyi chu srin chen pos zos pa yin// yongs su 'dzin
294b7(phal chen): pa thams cad sdug bsngal rtsa// skye ba thams cad 'phags pa kun gyis smad// 'dod pa'i yon tan mthar zad rang bzhin gyis// chos la mos pas rtag tu dga' bar gyis// 
294b8(phal chen): brgya byin lhar bcas rnga yis bskul byas nas// kun kyang chos bzang 'dun sar dong phyin te// lha mang kun la chos gtam zhi ba'i rnams// 'dod chags bral dang rje su 'thun pa
295a1(phal chen): brjod// rnga rab de ni gzugs med mi mthong yang // don chen rnga'i sgra ni sgrogs byed na// bsam pa'i tshul bzhin gzugs mang ston byed pa// 'gro/ 
295a2(phal chen): ba kun gyi don chen cir mi byed// lha dang lha min 'thab par gyur pa'i tshe// lha'i bsod nams khyad par mthu stobs kyis// lha rnams bskul ba'i lha rdzas rnga'i mchog/ lha rnams 'jigs
295a3(phal chen): sa re zhes sgra yang sgrog/ rdzas bskal lha rnams yongasu dga' ba skyed// 'jigs med stobs dang shin tu ldan par 'gyur// lha min dbang po 'jigs shing dngangs gyur nas// de ma thag
295a4(phal chen): tu 'jigs shing kun tu 'byer// de bzhin rnga 'dra 'chi med stobs pa'i rnams// 'gro ba kun gyi mgon dang / dpung 'gyur te// bdud dang nyon mongs bcom pa'i snying rje
295a5(phal chen): can/ zhi ba'i sgra sgrog nyon mongs rab tu sel// dbang po'i lha mo dgu bcu rtsa gnyis te// dbang po sprul pas kun kyang dga' bar 'gyur// gcig kyang bdag dang brgya
295a6(phal chen): byin brtse bar shes// gcig ltar lha mo kun kyang dga' bar gnas snang yang // chos bzang 'dun sa kun na'ang de bzhin 'dug/ lha rnams kun la chos rab ston par yang // brgya byin
295a7(phal chen): skad cig gcig gis rnam par 'phrul// brgya byin 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnams dga' byed na// 'gro don mi skyo spyod pa ci'i phyir// rdzu 'phrul/ 
295a8(phal chen): stobs kyis 'jig rten dgar mi byed// bdud kyi dkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang sgyur ba// de yi dbang du sems can 'di kun 'dong // las dang nyon mongs kun tu 'khri zhags kyis/ 
295b1(phal chen): so so'i skye bo bdud 'khrug des kyang bcings// de ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug can// 'gro ba mang po bdud kyi dbang byed na// dbang bcu'i dbang thob gyur pa ci rob ste// 'gro ba
295b2(phal chen): thams cod rang gi phyogs mi gzhog/ stong gsum bdag po tshangs pa chen po yang // stong gsum kun gyi tshangs pa'i gaunas rnams na// ma lus kun tu 'dug par rab tu snang // 
295b3(phal chen): tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong rnams kyang sgrog/ de ni 'jig rten pa'i tshangs lam gyi// bsam gtan mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul// 'jig rten yongs 'das
295b4(phal chen): bla na med pa yi// bsam gtan rnam thar gnas pa cir mi 'phrul// dbang phyug chen po'i ye shes rnam 'phrul ltos// rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis char rnams rab
295b5(phal chen): bkye ba// skad cig gcig gis thams cad 'grang ba byed// thigs 'ga'i zer kyang ma lus des shes na// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab tshul bslabs
295b6(phal chen): te// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med thob rnams// ci rob 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kyi// skad cig gcig la sems bsam shes mi 'gyur// sems can las smin
295b7(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pas// rlung las 'jig rten thams cad yongs su byung // rgya mtsho ri dang lha'i gzhal med dang // sa bon rnam mang kun kyang de las byung // rlung las
295b8(phal chen): sprin 'byung char pa kun tu 'bab// sprin mang zhi bar 'gyur ba'ang rlung gis 'gyur// le rtog rnam par 'phel ba'ang rlung gis te// 'jig rten kun la rlung ni bde ba skyed// de ni
296a1(phal chen): pha rol phyin la ma bslabs te// sangs rgyas yon tan rlung gis bslabs min na'ang // 'jig rten rnam grub bsam yas ston byed na// rang
296a2(phal chen): nyam thob pa ci rob ston mi byed// rgya mtsho'i 'brug sgra sprin gyi chu tshogs ni// bya skad rnams dang ji snyed ri dgas skad// khye'u dang bu mo bud med skyes pa'i skad// thams cad smra bzhin/ 
296a3(phal chen): 'gro ba rnam par sgrog/ de bzhin sgra brnyan rang bzhin sgras shes nas// sgribs pa med pa'i spobs pa rab ldan pas// 'gro ba kun tu sgra brnyan brjod byas shing // 'jig rten thams cad
296a4(phal chen): yid 'ong sgras tshi ma byed// rgya mtsho 'di la ngo mtshar smad kyi dachos// 'gro ba thams cad rgya dang mnyam snang zhing // / chu dang 'byung po rin chen yongs mi zad// chu rnams bzung
296a5(phal chen): pas yongs su ngom pa med// de bzhin de dag 'gro kun rgyar gsal te// bsod nams bsam gtan rnam thar zad mi shes// shes rab ye shes yon tan de
296a6(phal chen): bzhin kun// bsod nams yon tan tshogs kyis ngoms pa med// rgya mtsho'i klu ni rnam par brtse byed na// sa'i gzhi nas dbang sgyur gnas kyi bar// gling bzhi bcas par sprin
296a7(phal chen): chen rgyas par 'gengs// de dag kun kyang rgyan mang sna tshogs ldan// de ni dbang sgyur gnas su 'dzam bu chu klung gi/ gser gyi mdog tu sprin mang rnam par sgrub// 'phrul dgar
296a8(phal chen): mu tig dmar po'i mdog lta bu// dga' ldan gnas su kha bab mo'i mdog/ mtshar mar mthon ting bai DUr+ya'i mdog/ sum cu gsum du a sma gar ba 'dra// rgyal chen gnas su
296b1(phal chen): shel gyi mdog lta bu// rdo rje mi phyed sra mdog rgya mtshor ro// mi ci gnas su spos mchog 'dres par te// klu'i gnas su pad+mo'i mdog lta bu// gnod sbyin gnas su ngang ba chu sgyur
296b2(phal chen): mdog/ ri yi mdog tu lha min gnas su'o// byang du gser gyi kha dog 'od ston te// gling rnams gzhan du'ang sna tshogs rgyan tu ston// 'dzam bu'i gling du rig nag 'dra bar te/ 
296b3(phal chen): sprin rnams gang rnams ji ltar grub pa bzhin// dbang sgyur gnas su gser gyi sprin bstan nas// nyi ma'i mdog/ 'dra klog kyang rab tu 'gyed// dbang sgyur gnas su zla 'od
296b4(phal chen): bzang 'dra dang // dga' ldan gnas su 'dzam bu'i gser mdog ston// khabab mo'i mdog tu 'tshe mar te// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su gser
296b5(phal chen): mdog tu// rgyal chen gnas su dpal gyi snying po'i mdog/ mu tig dmar po'i mdog tu rgya mtshor ro// mi gnas su mthon thing bai DUr+ya// klu'i gnas su dpal gyi
296b6(phal chen): snying po'i mdog/ gnod sbyin gnas su shel gyi kha dog ste// a sma'i mdog tu lha min gnas su'o// byang du ngang gis snang ba'i rin chen mdog/ gling rnams gzhan du'ang rnam
296b7(phal chen): bye gzhan dang gzhan// 'dzam bu'i gling du 'od 'phro an 'da' rnyil// sprin gyi mtshan nyid tshul 'thun glog kyang 'gyed// de ni tshangs pa'i dbang sgyur gnas su tshangs dbyangs
296b8(phal chen): su// 'brug sgra sgrog byed 'phrul dga' rnga'i dbyangs// rol me'i sgrar yang dga' ldan gnas su ste// lha mo'i dbyangs su mtshe ma dag tu'o// sum cu gsum du mi 'am ci'i
297a1(phal chen): skad du ste// rgyal chen gnas su dri za'i skad du'o// ri mtha' dbyangasu rgya mtsho kun tu ste// mi 'am ci'i gnas su gling bu'i sgra// klu'i gnas su thal/ 
297a2(phal chen): mo brdabs pa'i sgra// gnod sbyin gnas su klu'i bu mo'i sgra// lha min gnas su lha rdzas rnga'i sgra// rgya mtsho shugs sgrar mi'i gnas su'o// dbang sgyur gnas su lha rdzas bsung zhim
297a3(phal chen): pa'i// me tog sna tshogs rgyan mang char yang 'bebs// zla ba bzang po'i 'od 'dra 'phrul dgar te// me tog man da rA ba'i phreng ba'i char 'bebs so// dga' ldan gnas su rin chen
297a4(phal chen): po'i char// rgyan kyi dam pa rin chen sna tshogs dang // gzug gi rin chen zla ba 'dra ba dang // gser 'od bza nga nge'i char pa rab tu 'bebs// rgyal mtshan gdugs dang
297a5(phal chen): ba dan bzang po dang // phreng ba byug pa rgyan gyi dam pa dang // / mu tig dmar po la ltar btags mdog tu// rol/ mo yid 'ong char pa mtshe mar 'bebs// sum cu gsum
297a6(phal chen): du rin chen sna tshogs te// tsan dan dam pa'i spos dang a ga ru// gur kum ge sar lha rdzas ta ma la// spos chu'i rgyun dang me tog 'dres par 'bab// nyam du 'gyur ba'i kha zas
297a7(phal chen): skom gyi rnams// kha dog dri zhim ro dang ldan pa dang // de min rin chen char 'bab bsam yas kyang // rgyal chen bzhi'i gnas su klu dbang 'bebs// de ni rgya mtsho chen por rgyun tu
297a8(phal chen): yang // char rgyud rgyun mi 'chad pa gnya' shing rtsam// mi zad rin chen shin tu rnam rgyal ba'i// rin chen char ni mtha' yas rgyun tu 'bab// mi ci gnas su phreng ba sna tshogs
297b1(phal chen): dang // pad+mo u ba la dngos dang rin chen dang // me tog par shi ma li phye ma spos// bi bang rnga dang gling bu snyan par ro// klu'i gnas su mu tig dmar po ste// gnod sbyin gnas su
297b2(phal chen): rin chen dang snang ba// lha min gnas su ral gri mde'u thung mdung // dgra 'dul gzhu dang ste'u ka'i char 'bebs so// byang du de ni phreng ba rin chen dang // me tog bar shi ma li tsam pa/ 
297b3(phal chen): ka'i// phreng ba bzang po ku ran mug ta ka/ gling rnams gzhan du'ang char pa sna tshogs so// 'dzam bu'i gling du chu 'dang rab gsal gyi// char rnams chos bzhin shin tu phra bar
297b4(phal chen): 'bebs// me tog 'bras bu sman dang spos dang shing // lo zas de bzhini 'jig rten bde 'angal byed// de lta dang sprin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang // glog dang
297b5(phal chen): 'brug dang char pa rnam phyed kyang // khyim nas migs rnam par rtog pa med// klu'i 'phrul yang de ltar/ bsam mi khyab// de ltar chu'i rgya mtsho gnas pa
297b6(phal chen): yang / klu'i rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na// chos kyi rgya mtshor zhugs pa'i yon tan bdag/ mtha' yas rnam 'phrul mang po cir mi ston// dpar bya de dag kun gyis
297b7(phal chen): mgo smos tsam// skyes bu de dag yon tan brjod byas te// dpa' bo de dag dpe dang rnam par bral// de dag de 'dra'i rnam thar dbang bsgyur ro// mtha' yas blo gros yangs pa'i
297b8(phal chen): blo gros can// mnor blo gros mtha' yas blo gros can// ye shes mchog dang khyad par blo ldan pa'i// rnam thar dam pa de 'dra'i tshul du bshad// gang gis rnam thar 'di dag
298a1(phal chen): bos gyur nas// yid ches 'dzin cing 'jig rten sgrog pa ni// ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos dang de ldan te// mi yul kun na de ni dga' ba byed/ 
298a2(phal chen): 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dang byed pa// so so skye bo'i tshigs na'ang shin tu dkon// dge bsags bsod nams byas pa de dag ni// rgyu'i stobs kyis 'di la yid ches 'gyur// 
298a3(phal chen): gang rnams nyan thos theg la'ang yid ches pa'i// mi rnams 'jig rten kun na dkon pa ste// de bas rang rgyal theg pa dad pa dkon// theg chen dang byed de bas shin tu dkon// 
298a4(phal chen): theg chen 'di la zhugs pa dkon pa ste// 'di 'dra'i chos la dad pa shin tu dkon// 'dzin cing spel byed smos kyang ci dgos te// yang dag ma
298a5(phal chen): nor 'jug pa smos ci dgos// la la stong gsum ri dang mtsher bcas pa// bskal par 'dzin gyi mgro la khyor byed na'ang // 'di 'dra'i chos la dad par
298a6(phal chen): byed pa las// de 'dra de ni dka' bar brtsi ba ma yin no// la las stong gsum rdul snyed sems can rnams// bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur na'ang / 
298a7(phal chen): 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dang byed pa'i// bsod nams ci 'dra 'dra de las min// la la zhing bcu ri dang mtshor bcas pa// lag pa'i mthil gyis na mkha'i dbyings
298a8(phal chen): 'dzin kyang // 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dang byed pa'i// dka' ba de 'dra de la yod pa min// la la zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sems can rnams// bde ba kun gyis
298b1(phal chen): bskal par bsnyen bkur kyang // 'di 'dra'i chos la yid ches dang byed pa'i// bsod nams ci 'dra de 'dra de la min// la las zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ 
298b2(phal chen): bskal par bde ba kun gyis bsnyen bkar te// la las le'u 'di yongs su bzung byas nas// bsod nams 'di ni de las khyad par 'phags// rnam thar de dag yongs su
298b3(phal chen): bstan pa'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad g.yos par gyur// lha dang bdud kyi gnas rnams zil gyis mnan// 'od mang bkye bas ngan song rab tu zhi/ 
298b4(phal chen): phyogs bcu kun gyi mi yi seng ge rnams// thams ca dra kun gyis mngon par zhal bstan te// phyagabarkyang mtha' yas yon tan mang bdog pa// bzang po'i
298b5(phal chen): dpal gyi mgo la bzhag par gyur// phyag gi mthil gyis mgo la byug mdzad de// sangs rgyas de dag kun gyis gsung brjod pa// rnam thar 'di dag
298b6(phal chen): khyod kyis legs bshad kyis// legs par bstan la rjes su nged dgyes so// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las// bzang po'i
298b7(phal chen): dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bdun pa'o// // bam po nyi shu pa// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten
298b8(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams dang / shar lde'i phyogs 'tshams
299a1(phal chen): dang / lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams dang / nub byung gi phyogs 'tshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ 
299a2(phal chen): thams cad du/ gling bzhi pa 'di la sogs pa gling ba zhi pa re re na yang // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag de bzhin du bzhugs par snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang / de bzhin/ 
299a3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi ston cing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'khod par yang so so nas shes te// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad
299a4(phal chen): pade ma brtul bar// byang chub kyi shing drung nas/ rirab kyi rtse mo'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang ba rnam par rgyal ba gang na ba der gshegs par snang ngo // ji ltar
299a5(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor gshe/ gas par snang ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag gi ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs
299a6(phal chen): bar snang ste/ byin gyi rlabs snga ma dag kyang ma nyams par snang ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa logasu mngon
299a7(phal chen): bar gshegs pargyang ring po nas mthong nas/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i nang du rings pa'i gzugs su rdzu 'phrul gyi rang bzhin/ seng ge'i gdan phyogs rnam par snang ba'i
299a8(phal chen): snying po can/ 'og re stong phrag bcus brgyan pa/ gser gyi dra ba stong phrag bcu kun tu bres pa/ gnas yol stong phrag bcus bla rer bres pa/ gdugs stong shin tu bzung ba
299b1(phal chen): dar gyi lda ldi stong phrag bcu rab tu sbyangs pa/ mu tig gi se me do stong phrag bcus dga' dga' ltar byas pa/ gos stong phrag bcus mngon par bkab pa/ lha'i bu stong phrag bcus
299b2(phal chen): mdun du byas pa/ tshangs pa stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba// 'od zer stong phrag bcus shin tu snang bar gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan du bsham so// ji ltar gling
299b3(phal chen): bzhi pa 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnam par rgyal bar/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bshams pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten
299b4(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad kyi ri rab kyi rtse mo dag du yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan dag tshul de 'dra ba dang / rgyan de 'dra bar bshams
299b5(phal chen): par gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bco/ ma ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bcas nas/ rjes dang rim gro chen pos bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
299b6(phal chen): der thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gshegasu gsol// bde bar gshegs pa gshegs su gsol/ 
299b7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs sam zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis spyan drangs/ 
299b8(phal chen): nas rnam par rgyal ba'i khang par gshegs so// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha'i khang pa dag tu'ang gshegs par
300a1(phal chen): snang ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khang pa thams cad du/ klu dang rol mo dang // sil snyan/ 
300a2(phal chen): brgya phrag mang po dag btang ste/ zhi bar byas nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snga ma rnams la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa de dag rjesu dran nas/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag
300a3(phal chen): smras so// bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// thugs rje chen po mnga' ba 'od srung rigs skyes pa// rnam par rgyal por gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur
300a4(phal chen): cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// gser thub dbasgribs pa med par rab tu gzigs pa de// rin chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis
300a5(phal chen): legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// bsod skyabs gser gyi ri bo 'bar ba 'dra ba de// rtse mo mchog tu gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs
300a6(phal chen): gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// thams cad mnga' ba dgro bcom dri ma gsum sel ba/ mdzod spu'i rtse mor gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis
300a7(phal chen): dam pa gang zhig gis// sangs rgyas gtsug tor dgongs pa zil gyis ma non pa// rin chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// rnam par gzigs
300a8(phal chen): ba skyes bu'i zla ba mi yi mgon// rin chen rgyan du gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// shin tu rgyas pa don dam mkhas
300b1(phal chen): shing bstan pa de// ma la ya'i rtser gshegs pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// sangs rgyas ston mchog thogs pa mi mnga' ba// dri med/ 
300b2(phal chen): zla bar gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// grags pa dri ma med pa mgon po pade'i bla// dri ma med par gshegs gyur pa/ 
300b3(phal chen): des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig/ bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis// mgon po mar me mdzad pa 'od snang mnga' ba de// 'od zer dri bar gshegs gyur pa// des ni 'dir yang
300b4(phal chen): bkra shis legs gyur cig/ ji ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis// sangs rgyas kyi mthus// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa// glur/ 
300b5(phal chen): blangs te tshigs su bcad pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i dbang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gzhan
300b6(phal chen): dang gzhan gyis// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu'i rgyal ba gshegs pa dag/ glur lan cing tshigs su bcad par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba'i khang
300b7(phal chen): par gshegs nas skyil mo krung bcas te/ bzhug so// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag gdan de dag la
300b8(phal chen): bzhugs par snang ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ltar bzhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa de yang / sum cu rtsa gsum thams cad kyi khang pa dang / lha'i
301a1(phal chen): ris tsam du che bar snang bar gyur te/ 'di na ji lta ba ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na de bzhin no// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes
301a2(phal chen): bya ba las de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs pa'i le'u ste/ bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu
301a3(phal chen): bcu 'ongs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas 'jig rten gyi khams/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas 'ongs pa sha stag ste/ byang chub
301a4(phal chen): sems dpa' re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgya das kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu phyin par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang
301a5(phal chen): ming 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar chos kyi blo gros dang / thams cad blo gros dang / dpal gyi blo gros dang / yon tan blo gros dang / brtson 'grus blo gros dang / dge ba'i blo
301a6(phal chen): gros dang / ye shes blo gros dang / bden pa'i blo gros dang / mchog gi blo gros dang / dam pa'i blo gros dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ming
301a7(phal chen): 'di zhes bya ba dag ste/ 'di ltar dbang po'i me tog dang / pad+mo'i me tog dang / rin po che'i me tog dang / ud pa la'i me tog dang / rdo rje'i me tog dang / spos kyi me tog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i
301a8(phal chen): me tog dang / 'od zer gyi me tog dang / ldum bu'i me tog dang / na mkha'i me tog go// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba dag gi
301b1(phal chen): zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ltar zla ba gzhan ma yin pa dang / zla ba ma nyams pa dang / zla ba mi g.yo ba dang / zla ba mi sgul ba dang / zla ba chu'i lha dang / zla ba thogs pa med
301b2(phal chen): pa dang zla ba 'od zer dang / zla ba rdul med pa dang / zla ba rnam par grub pa dag go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas
301b3(phal chen): kyi mthus phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang nas/ gang nas 'ongs pa'i phyogasu bstan te/ seng ge'i khri rnam par snang ba'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te
301b4(phal chen): 'khod do// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i ri rab kyi rtse mo la byang chub sems dpa' rnams lhags pa de nga bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi
301b5(phal chen): pa thams cad dang / lha'i dbang po'i khang pa kun na yang / de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ming de skad ces/ bya ba sha stag go// 'jig rten gyi khams kyang de skad ces
301b6(phal chen): bya ba nas 'ongs pa sha stag go// de bzhin gshegs pa yang mtshan de skad ces bya ba'i zham ring na tshangs par spyod pa sha stag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs kyi mthe bo gnyis
301b7(phal chen): nas/ 'od zer bye ba phrag stong bkye ste/ phyogs bcu thams cad snang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thad kyang bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang / 
301b8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang / ri rab kyi rtse mo thams cad na/ de bzhin gshegs 'i ma 'phrul pa yod pa thams cad kyang mthong
302a1(phal chen): par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di skad
302a2(phal chen): smraso// snang ba dri ma med la bltos// ri rab rtse mo thams cad la// mgon po dag ni rab tu snang // rnam par rgyal ba kun na bzhugs// lha'i rgyal po thams cad kyis// spyan drangs shing ni gshegs
302a3(phal chen): par gyur// kun kyang sangs rgyas bcu dag gis// rab tu gshegs pas mngon par bstod// kun gyi 'khor kyang gcig pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' mang po lhags// phyogs bcu dag nas/ 
302a4(phal chen): 'ongs gyur cing // yid du 'ong ba'i stan la 'khod// kun dgyi ming yang 'di nyid de// ji ltar nged la btags pa bzhi/ na// 'jig rten khams kyi ming dag kyang // de skad dag nas
302a5(phal chen): kun kyang 'ongs// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na// drang srong chen po'i mtshan kyang de// de na tshangs spyod bla med la// the tsom med par de dag spyod// kye ma rgyal sras khyod
302a6(phal chen): bltos shig/ drang srong chen po'i byin gyi rlabs// 'dzam bu'i gling rnams thams cad na// rgyal ba 'di ni bzhugs snyam byed// bdag cag rnams ni 'di snyam du// ri rab rtse la bad gshegs snyam// 
302a7(phal chen): 'jigs rten khams rnams kun na yang // sangs rgyas ngo mtshar smad re cha// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad na// byang chub mchog tu sems btang zhing // de dag smon lam 'di
302a8(phal chen): btab ste/ byang chub spyod pa rab tu spyod// kha dog mdog ni tshad med pas// gang zag mchog ni spyod byed kyang // chos kyi dbyings la mi chags te// de dag sus kyang mi sheso// gang gis 'jig
302b1(phal chen): rten mun bskul cing // thams cad du su rnam snang ba/ de la 'dra ba gang yang med// de ni shes par ji ltar rung // de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blo gros kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par
302b2(phal chen): bltas te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras so// 'dren pa rnams ni mthong nas kyang // bskal pa mang po 'das gyur te// 'jig rten mgon skyob de dag gi/ chos nyid de ni shis pa min// mtshan
302b3(phal chen): ma dag la spyod pa'i rnams// gti mug dra ba 'bral bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas gang gis ma mthong ba// 'khor ba'i btson rar mdongs pa yin// chos rnams 'di dag brtag byas na// rang
302b4(phal chen): bzhin shes par mi rung ste// skye dang shi 'bor gyur pa'i rna mas// ming tsam du ni bstan pa yin// chos rnams gang yang 'phro ba med// gang yang de bzhin skye ba med// chos nyid 'di
302b5(phal chen): ni shes gyur na// sangs rgyas kun na rab tu snang // gzung du/ med cing bltar med de// chos kyi rnams ni rang bzhin med/ dngos med pa'i mtha' shes na// sangs rgyas rnams
302b6(phal chen): la tshad kyang med// tshad med pa'i chos rnams kyi// rang bzhin gang gis yongs shes pa// des ni ci zhig yod ces par// mthong bar 'gyur ba gang yang med// gang rnams
302b7(phal chen): mtshan ma'i rjes 'brang ba// de dag byis pa'i chos nyid de// de phyir mtshan nyid kun med pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi mthong ngo // dus gsum byung ba'i thub pa rnams// mtshan
302b8(phal chen): rab kun dang ldan pa ste// mi gnas tshul du bzhugs pa yin// chos kyi dbyings la g.yo ba med// la la dag gi chos nyid shes// la la dag la chos kyang brjod// gang la the tsom
303a1(phal chen): mi mnga' ba'i// yang dag sangs rgyas de ring mthong // sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos nyid 'di// chos kyi blo gros 'dis brjod de// de thos nas kyang / 
303a2(phal chen): bdag gis ni// sangs rgyas byang chub bsam yas shes// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas/ 
303a3(phal chen): te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// kye ma sangs rgyas drang la mnga' ba'i// ye gas shes rab shin tu che// de la 'jig rten shin tu rmongs// sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab/ 
303a4(phal chen): tshul bzhin ma yin 'du shes kyis// byis pa rnams ni sems byed pas// de phyir 'du shes kun sbyangs pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams ni mi mthong ngo // shes rab chung ba thams
303a5(phal chen): cad ni/ phung po'i 'du shes rnams la gnas// phung po rnam par ma bsgoms pas// de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ngo // dngos med dngosu bshad pa ni// bdag gi dngos shes
303a6(phal chen): bya ba yin// chegs thams cad shes bgyis shing // rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad bltos// sngan chad phung po'i tshul bzhin du// ma 'ongs rnams kyang sus mthong ba// ma 'ongs pa'i tshul shes
303a7(phal chen): pas// sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab bltos// ji ltar snang ba med pa yi// mun pa'i nang na gzugs mi snang // de bzhin chos rnams ma bshad pa// mkhas kyang shes par mi
303a8(phal chen): rung ngo // ji ltar dri ma ldan mig gis// gsal ba'i gzugs kyang mi mthong ba// de bzhin sems ni ma sbyangs pas// sangs rgyas chos ni mi mthong ngo // ji ltar nyi ma bsgribs med pa/ 
303b1(phal chen): rab rib can gyis mi mthong ba// de bzhin drug na gnas sems kyis// sangs rgyas dag ni mi mthong ngo // de bas mig ni rnam par spongs// gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par bsgoms// chos rnams
303b2(phal chen): mthong ba med pa yis// 'od mdzad rab tu mthong ba yin// ji ltar kun blos sngon bshad cing // bdag gis ji ltar thos pa bzhin// sangs rgyas byang chub mi brnyengs pa// rnam par snang mdzad
303b3(phal chen): rab tu mthong // de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyis mthus phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso// gnas med pa'i
303b4(phal chen): chos rnams la// gnas ni yongs su brtags pas na/ dad phyir srid pa'i btson ra na// byis pa rnams ni rab tu 'kho 8// brjod pas brjod du mi rung chos// blo zhan rnams kyis
303b5(phal chen): rnam par brtags// des ni yongasu bsgribs byas pas/ bdag gi sems kyang rab rmongs byed// shes rab chungaba'i lam nor cing // bdag gi sems la mi mkhas pa// phyin
303b6(phal chen): ci log gi blo dag gis// mi bzad lus ni 'phel bar byed// gang gis stong pa ma mthong ba// de dag 'khor zhing nyam yang nga // chos mig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// mig kyang de la yod pa min
303b7(phal chen): de bas mig ni sbyang par gyis// bsam pa rnams kyang rnam par soms// gang phyir bdag cag sngan chad du// bde gshegs ma mthong chud kyang zos// yang dag sangs rgyas mthong ba na'ang/ 
303b8(phal chen): gi sems la chags med pa// des ni sangs rgyas cis byung ba'i// chos rnams de dag rab tu mthong // gang gis shes rab che mnga' ba// cho su bde gshegs mthong ba'i rnams/ de dag
304a1(phal chen): 'jig rten mig can te// gang gis mthong ba mamong zhes bya// lhag mthong med par mthong ba ni// chos rnams ngan par mthong ba ste// lhag mthong gis ni mthong gyur na// 
304a2(phal chen): thams cad mthong ba med pa yin// kye ma chos kyi chos nyid ni// yang dag sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad// de ni rang bzhin thams cad du// shi ba med cing 'tshe ba med// sangs rgyas byang chub
304a3(phal chen): ji 'dra ba// dpal gyi blos ni sngon bstan te// de las bdag gis thos nas kyang // sangs rgyas chos nyid shes ma gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus blo gros kyis// phyogs
304a4(phal chen): bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smra so// rnam par rtog la spyod pa yi// mig ni shri ngan tu 'khrul pa yin// 'khrul par mthong ba log pa ste// sangs
304a5(phal chen): rgyas la ni log mi mnga'// gang gis log pa shes gyu ra te// yang dag ji bzhin ma nor la// yang dag ma yin pade na shes na// sangs rgyas dri med mthong ba yin// mthong ba dag
304a6(phal chen): gis dri mar gyur// rnam par mthong na de med de// sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong dang bral// de bas rnam par gzigs shes bya// de ni 'jig rten spyod pa ste// 'jig rten de yang rnam par brtags// 
304a7(phal chen): 'jig rten 'jig pa shes gyur na// snang ba dag ni skye bar 'gyur// 'jig rten rnams kyi snang ba ni// 'jig rten mtshan nyid snang ba ste// yang dag ji bzhin mnyam byas shing // de ltar mthong na
304a8(phal chen): mthong ba'o// de ltar mthong na nyon mongs med// dbang du gyur cig zag pa med// gang gis tha dad med mthong ba// dngos por brtags pa ma yin// rtog dang rnam par rtog pa ni// sangs rgyas chos rnams
304b1(phal chen): brjod pa ste// de dag yod pa ma yin pas// rang bzhin de phyir sbyangs pa yin// de dag rang bzhin rnam par dag/ namakha' bzhin du mtshan nyid med// de dag ni ston pa med// mkhas pa rnas
304b2(phal chen): kyis da ltar bltos// chos rnams la ni mos med de// chos kyi 'du shes rnams bsgoms shing // shes pa de yang ma bsgoms pa// des ni thub chen mthong ba yin// ji ltar yon
304b3(phal chen): tan blos brjod pa// da ltar yang dag sangs rgyas mthong // de mthong bas na 'du byed kun// rang bzhin gyis kyang rnam par zhi// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i blo gros kyis// 
304b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smraso// kye ma sangs rgyas dpa' chen rnams// de bzhin gshegs pa tshad
304b5(phal chen): med do// rnam grol thugs ni sdig minga'// 'jig rten// mthar phyin rgal ba'o// yang dag ji bzhin ma nor bar// bskal pa rnams ni tshad med pas// ji ltar mkhas pas mthong
304b6(phal chen): ba bzhin// 'jig rten sgron mas rab tu gzigs// 'du byed thams cad skad cig ma// so so'i skye bo de dag 'gengs// nam mkha'i khams ni gzung byas shing // de dag de phyir khom pa med// khom
304b7(phal chen): pa med ces bya ba ni// ci'ang brjod du med pa ste// khom pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// khom po bsam gyis mi khyab thob// gang la dngos po med pa yi// mi zad khom pa med par bshad// / 
304b8(phal chen): yod pa'i rang bzhin shes gyur na// des ni grags chen mthong ba yin// mthong ba med pa mthong shes bya// yod pa med pa'ang yod ces bya// mthong ba dag gam yod pa ni// ma bsgoms pa ni rnam par
305a1(phal chen): bsgoms// ji ltar blta ba sus mthong ba// de dag gis ni lta bab shig/ gang la sangs rgyas spros pa yi// de dag chos rnams zhig pa med// ji ltar thub pas
305a2(phal chen): bstan pa bzhin// sangs rgyas yongasu sus mthong ba// de ni 'jig rten snang bar byed// rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad bzhin// chos rnams kyi ni snang ba gcig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu
305a3(phal chen): bstan// des ni brtson blo brtan pa de// chos mang bye ba rab tu ston// yod dang med pa shes byas te// gang gi 'du shes rnam bsgoms pa// des ni sangs rgyas mthong ba ste// yang dag mtha' la
305a4(phal chen): rab tu gnas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes blo/ gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur rnam pa/ der bltas te// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smra so// rgyal
305a5(phal chen): ba'i bstan pa 'di thos pas// snang ba bdag cag shes par gyur// phyogs bcu kun tu snang ba yi// yang dag sangs rgya se ngas kyang mthong // sems can rang bzhin yod gyur pa/ 
305a6(phal chen): de ni sems can g.yang sa ste// 'di la ji'ang yod pa min// tshig gi lam rnams bsdus pa'o// byis pa 'dzin dang bcas pa'i rnams// bdag lus yang dag 'dzin pa la// sangs rgyas snang bar
305a7(phal chen): mi 'gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa gzung ba med// yang dag sangs rgyas ma mthong zhing // gang rnams mig yod ma yin pa// de skad bskal pa grangs med du// srid pa'i gangs chen
305a8(phal chen): mtshon 'khor// nyon mongs can ni 'khor bar bshad// nyon mongs med pa mya ngan 'das// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yang // rang bzhin rnyed par mi rung ngo // 'khor zhes bya ba brda yin te/ 
305b1(phal chen): mya ngan 'das pa brjod pa yin// 'phags pa'i chos rnams ma skyes pa// bla ma dag ni mi sheso// 'di ni sangs rgyas rgyal ba 'di// 'di yin 'di 'dra'i 'du shes can// de dag sangs rgyas
305b2(phal chen): mi mthong ste// tshul bzhin ma yin phyin ci log/ zhi ba'i rang bzhin ji lta bar// gang gis zhi ba shes gyur pa// des ni tshig gi lam 'das pa'i// yang dag sangs rgyas rab tu mthong // chos
305b3(phal chen): rnams kun gyi spyod pa ni// rab tu brjod kyang bstan pa med// 'on kyang mnyam pa nyid du blta// rgyal ba chos rnams kun dang mnyam// yang dag sangs rgyas mtha' dpung med// thog ma dag dang / 
305b4(phal chen): tha mar yang // 'gal med rtsa ba med pas na// da ni sangs ngargyas de phyir brjod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis// phyogs
305b5(phal chen): bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smra so// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyan pa'i phyir// bskal/ ba bsam gyis mi khyab par// sems can dmyal bar gnas
305b6(phal chen): kyang bla// de ni bde ba bsam mi khyab// ci phyir zhe na bskal pa'i rnams// grangs med sdug bsngal sngan chad byung // 'on kyang bod gshegs ma thos pas// bdag cag 'khor las ma grol lo// 
305b7(phal chen): de bzhin ma nor chos kyi rnams// yang dag nyid du rtogs gyur te// gang la 'grogs pa med pa'i rnams// de dag byang chub bla na med// sangs rgyas rnams dang mngon sum pa// sngan chad ma byung
305b8(phal chen): 'byung mi 'gyur// gang phyir sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos// de dag mtshan nyid med pa'o// chos rnams blta dka' ji bzhin du// gang zhig de ltar rtog pa ni// de dag sangs rgyas kun
306a1(phal chen): gzigs pa// yang dag lta bas shin tu mthong // yang dag la ni yang dag gzigs// yang dag min par yang dag min// 'di yi mtha' ni ston pas na// / 
306a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas sangs rgyas shes kyang bya// khong du ma chud chos bstan te// sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu brjod// 'di ni sangs rgyas bsgom pa ste// gcig tu dmigs pa ma yin no// de ltar
306a3(phal chen): mang dang gcig gnas pa// mang po dag tu rnam par shes// gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis// bsags pa dag kyang rab tu byas// byas pa med cing byed pa med// las kyi 'du shes rnams
306a4(phal chen): bsgoms shing // las 'di ji bzhin shes byas nas/ rnam pa dag kyang mi dmig so// gang la sangs rgyas bzhug/ das pa yi// nges pa'i gnas ni dmigs med pas// gnas pa
306a5(phal chen): med pa'i chos rnams kyis// sangs rgyas g.yo ba gang yang med// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis// phyogs
306a6(phal chen): bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smra so// sems can chen po bla na med// sems can 'du shes rnam par bsgoms// 'jug par bya ba gang yang med// de bas bla na med
306a7(phal chen): ces bya// gang la phra ba yod min pa// de la sgom pa'ang yod pa min// de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis brnyes// rnam par mi rtog 'dus ma byas// gang zhig sangs rgyas spyod yul ba// de la phra
306a8(phal chen): ba yod pa min// yang dag sangs rgyas bgrang dang bral// da ni sangs rgyas chos nyid do// mun pa rnams ni rnam bstsal cing // de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang // de la snang ba gang yang
306b1(phal chen): med// mi snang ba'ang ci yang med// thams cad chos la kun nas dga'// skyes pa med cing gnas pa med// 'dod chags med cing brten pa med// chos nyid de'ang sbed pa med// gang
306b2(phal chen): la gnyis su bgrang med cing // gcig kyang yod pa ma yin pas// ji bzhin rab tu gnas pa yi// shes rab chen po legs par mthong // mi gnyis pa la gnyis pa med// gnyis pa
306b3(phal chen): med pa stong pa ste// stong pa de yang khams gsum kun// de ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o// byis pas byang chub mi shes kyang // de dag de la rab tu gnas// gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams
306b4(phal chen): kyis// rang gi lus ni rjesu blta// lus med pa ni lus su bshad// 'byung ba med cing bstan du med// 'jigatshogs mang po bltar med pa// sangs rgyas sku ni bla na med// 
306b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos kyis rang bzhin nyid// de skad bden pa'i blo smras te// de thos pas ni mig kyang sbyangs// shin tu 'od kyang dang zhing snang // de nas byang chub sems dpa' dam
306b6(phal chen): pa'i blo gros kyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis// phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigasu bcad de smras pa// drin gzo med pa'i sems can phyir// skyes bu drang srong
306b7(phal chen): mchog gi rnams// dpa' chen sems can gtso bo dag/ 'od mdzad pa ni rab tu byung // thugs rje chen po bskyed mdzad de// sems can khams la rnams gzigs / srid pa'i bcings
306b8(phal chen): pas sdug bsngal ba'i// sems can rnams ni de nas gzigs// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa na// yang dag sangs rgyas dpal mnga' ba// sems can gtso bo ma gtogs par// skyob pa
307a1(phal chen): gzhan ni gang yang med// gal te sangs rgyas ma skyes la// byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra dag/ med na 'jig rten khams kun na// sems can bde ba gci
307a2(phal chen): mi 'byung // sems can gtso bo 'dren mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa skyes pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra dag/ 'byung ba 'jig rten bde ba'i rgyu// gang gis de bzhin
307a3(phal chen): gshegs mthong ba// de dag 'thob pa legs par thob// gang gis thos shing dad 'gyur ba// de yang 'jig rten mchod rten no// gang gis sangs rgyas mthong gyur pa// bdag cag
307a4(phal chen): rnams kyis 'thob legs thob// 'di dang 'dra ba'i tshul/ thos pas// kun kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur/ 'das pa'i dus na'ang dpal 'di yod// byang chub sems
307a5(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi// shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs pas// spyod yul 'di dag mthong bar 'gyur// rnam par sna/ mdzad thub mthong nas// da rung phyir zhing dad pa skye// de yi ye
307a6(phal chen): shas mtha' yas pas// da rung brjod du yod pa min// gang gis mchog gi blo smras dang // rgyal sras gzhan gyis bshad pa'i rnams// de dag da rung bdag gis kyang // bskal pa bsam
307a7(phal chen): yas bshad par bya// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ ri rab kyi rtse mor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
307a8(phal chen): kyi tshig su bcad pa'i le'u ste/ bcu dgu pa'o// / shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// 
307b1(phal chen): bam po nyi shu gcig pa// de nas byang chub sems dngapa 'a chos kyi blo gros de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag
307b2(phal chen): go/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de'i mod la phyogs
307b3(phal chen): bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba
307b4(phal chen): snyested kun kyang chos kyi blo gros zhes bya bar 'thun pa sha stagagis/ zhal mngon par bstan pa mthong bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis// 'di skad ces
307b5(phal chen): kyang bka' stsal te/ chos kyi blo gros khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin sbyor ba mtha' yas pa la mnya ma par gzhog pa leg so leg so// de bas na rigs kyi bu
307b6(phal chen): khyod la phyogs bcu nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kun kyang mtshan 'thun pa sha stag gis// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
307b7(phal chen): par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang khyod bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar bstan pas/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bstan par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par 'phel ba
307b8(phal chen): bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyingasu chud par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams rnam par bsgom pa dang / chags pa med pa nyid du chud par bya ba dang / bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod sul thob par bya ba dang / 
308a1(phal chen): kun nas sbyor ba thob par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu gzung bar bya ba dang / chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba dang / dbang po thams cad
308a2(phal chen): yongs su shes par bya ba dang / chos bstan pa thams cad yongasu gzung ba dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dgod pa bcu la rtsom par bya ba'i phyir/ byin gyis brlabs
308a3(phal chen): pa mdzad kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ chos bstan pa 'di la spobs pa skyed cig/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
308a4(phal chen): de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la/ chags pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// thogs pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// chod pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa/ 
308a5(phal chen): mdzad do// rmongs pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// tha dad pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// kha na ma tho ba/ med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// dpag tu med pa nye bar
308a6(phal chen): bsgrub pa mdzad do// zhum pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// 'phrog pa med pa nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyiraro// de nas sangs
308a7(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi spyi bo la phyag g.yas pas byug pa mdzad de/ de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi phyag gis reg
308a8(phal chen): ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i rigs shes bya ba
308b1(phal chen): 'di ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas la/ namakha'i mthas gtugs pas shin tu yangs pa ste/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan/ 
308b2(phal chen): 'das rnams kyi rigasu skye ba yin// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigasu skye ba yin/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigasu skye ba yin/ 
308b3(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson par byed pa gang la bsams te/ de skad du smras pa de dag gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems
308b4(phal chen): dpa' rnam par dgod pa ste/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur
308b5(phal chen): bdag go/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
308b6(phal chen): dgod pa dang / rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub
308b7(phal chen): sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / bsam pa phun tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i' rnam par dgod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / gzhon
308b8(phal chen): nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal
309a1(phal chen): ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
309a2(phal chen): kyis gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di
309a3(phal chen): la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas/ mdzes pa dang bzang ba dang / mig du 'ong ba dang / kha dog rgyas pa dang / thub par dka' ba dang / mthu che bar
309a4(phal chen): mthong ba'am// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / yodasu bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rjesu bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba 'am/ sems can sdug
309a5(phal chen): bsngal mthong ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin ga/ shegs pa'i chos rgya chen po thos par gyur nas/ thams cad
309a6(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing / snga phyi med par byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sems bskyed pa dang po des ni thub par dka' ba'i gnas bcu yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar
309a7(phal chen): gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa shes pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa dang / dbang po dang / brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad
309a8(phal chen): pa yong su rdzogs pa mchog dang tha ma shes pa dang / mos pa tha dad pa dang / mos pa du ma shes pa dang / khams tha dad pa dang / khams du ma shes pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa
309b1(phal chen): drang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa dang / rjesu dran pa bsgribs pa
309b2(phal chen): med pa shes pa dang / chags pa med pa'i lha'i mig shes pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du zag pa med pa shes pa'o// thub par dka' bo'i gnas bcu po de dag yongasu zin par 'gyur te/ 
309b3(phal chen): de ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa de ni/ sangs rgyas mchod pa la sbyar bar bya ba ste/ byang
309b4(phal chen): chub sems dpa' bsten par bde ba yang / de la brjod pa ra bya'o// 'jig rten gyi nang na gtso bor gyur pa yang de la brjod par bya'o// phul du phyin pa yang de la brjod par bya'o// 
309b5(phal chen): zil gyis mi non pa'i gnas kyang de la brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba yang de la bstan par bya'o// sangs rgyas tshad med pa dang 'phrad par 'gyur ba yang de la bstan
309b6(phal chen): par bya'o// rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba yang de la brjod par bya'o// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las ldog par 'gyur ba yang de la brjod par bya'o// sems can sdug bsngal ba yongasu bskyab
309b7(phal chen): pa yang de la brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la/ de bas kyang shas cher sems skye bar bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang
309b8(phal chen): bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
310a1(phal chen): dag/ de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid du sems
310a2(phal chen): can thams cad la rnam pa bcur sems nye bar gzhog ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog go// snying brtse ba'i sems dang / bde ba'i sems dang / gnas pa'i
310a3(phal chen): sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang / yongasu bsrung ba'i sems dang / mnyam pa'i sems dang / slob dpon gyi sems dang / ston pa'i sems nye bar gzhan
310a4(phal chen): go/ rnam pa bcu po de dag gis/ sems can thams cad dal sems nye bar gzhog ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ da'adi ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal
310a5(phal chen): ba'i sras dag/ de la byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de ni thog ma nyid du kha ton la yongasu bskul bar bya'o// mang du thos nas dben par gnas pa la yongs su
310a6(phal chen): bskul bar bya'o// rab tu dben par gyur nas dge ba'i bshesu 'gyur bar yongasu bskal bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshesu gyur nas/ nga lo bde ba la yongasu bskul bar bya'o// nga lo bde bar
310a7(phal chen): gyur nas dus shes pa la yongasu bskul bar bya'o// dus shes nas mi 'jigs pa le yongasu bskul bar bya'o// mi 'jigs par gyur nas don shes pa la yongasu bskul bar bya'o// don
310a8(phal chen): shes nas chos kyi rje su 'brang ba la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// chos kyi rjesu 'gro bar gyur nas rmongs pa med pa la yongasu bskul bar bya'o// rmongs pa med par gyur nas rnam par dgod
310b1(phal chen): pa la bskul bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad de la de bas kyang shas cher/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po mngon du gzhog par bya ba dang / gnas gang
310b2(phal chen): thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam
310b3(phal chen): par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmigs
310b4(phal chen): ba'i rnam pa bcus chos thams cad la brtson par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mi rtag pa dang / chos thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / chos thams cad stong
310b5(phal chen): pa nyid dang / chos thams cad bdag med pa dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa dang / chos tham sa cad myong ba med pa dang / chos thams cad brda' med pa
310b6(phal chen): dang / chos thams cad gnas pa med pa dang / chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / chos thams cad la ched du byed pa med pa ste/ dmigs pa'i rnam pa bcu po de dag gis
310b7(phal chen): chos kyi rje su 'brang ba'i tshul du brtson par byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i
310b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ sems can gyi khams brtag pa la yongasu bskul bar bya'o// chos kyi khams brtag pa la yongasu bskul bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams brtag pa la
311a1(phal chen): yongs su bskul bar bya'o// sa'i khams brtag pa la yongasu bskul bar bya'o// chu'i khams brtag pa la yongasu bskul bar bya'o// me'i khams brtag pa
311a2(phal chen): la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// rlung gi khams brtag pa la yongasu bskul bar bya'o// 'dod pa'i khams brtag pa la yongasu bskul bar bya'o// gzugs kyi khams brtag pa la yongasu
311a3(phal chen): bskul bar bya'o// gzugs med pa'i khams brtag pa la yongasasu bskul bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de de bas kyang chos la snang ba 'byung ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid
311a4(phal chen): sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa/ ra mi 'gyur ba gyis kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// 
311a5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i gsung rab la yongs
311a6(phal chen): smin pa bcus skyes pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa dang / sangs rgyas la shes pas/ mos pa'i mthar phyin pa dang / chos nges par rtogs pa dang / sems can rnam
311a7(phal chen): par bsgoms pa dang / zhing rnam par bsgoms pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgoms pa dang / las rnam par bsgoms pa dang / rnam par smin pa rnam par bsgoms pa dang / 'kho
311a8(phal chen): ba rnam par bsgoms pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa rnam par bsgoms pa ste/ yongs smin pa bcu po 'di dag gis/ 'phags pa'i gsung rab la skyes pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
311b1(phal chen): dag 'di na/ cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// de ltar cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos rnam par bsgom pa la yongasu bskul bar byas
311b2(phal chen): ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par bsgom pa la yongasu bskul bar bya'o// 'das pa'i sangs
311b3(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrubs pa rnam par bsgom pa la yongasu bskul bar bya'o// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrubs par bya ba rnam par bsgom pa la yongasu bskul
311b4(phal chen): bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag pa dar bsgrub po rnam par bsgom po la yongasu bskul bar bya'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu grub pa rnam par bsgom
311b5(phal chen): pal/ yongasu bskul bar bya'o// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu bsgrub par bya ba rnam par bsgom pa la yongasu bskul bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
311b6(phal chen): yongasu bsgrub pa rnam par bsgom pa la yongasu bskul bar bya'o// sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa la yongs su bskul bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
311b7(phal chen): la de bas kyang sems 'jug par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring la 'jog par mi bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni/ cher
311b8(phal chen): skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems
312a1(phal chen): dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji tsam yang rung ste/ de thams cad sems can thams cad yongasu bskyab pa'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad la phan pa
312a2(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir rtse mo// sems can thams cad yongasu dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir rtso mo// sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad yongasu smin par
312a3(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir rtso mo// sems can thams cad yongasu dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir rtsom mo// sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par bya ba'i phyir rtse mo// sems can thams cad dang ba'i phyir/ 
312a4(phal chen): rtsomo// sems can thams cad dang bar bya ba'i phyir rtse mo mo// sems can thams cad gdul ba'i phyir rtse da mo// sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las zla ba'i phyir
312a5(phal chen): rtsom mo// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste/ sbyor ba phun sum tshegs tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la
312a6(phal chen): ni sems can mtha' yas pa/ brjod par bya'o// sems can tshad med pa brjod par bya'o// sems can grangs med pa rjod par bya'o// sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod par
312a7(phal chen): bya'o// sems can gzugs med pa brjod par bya'o// sems can dpag tu med pa brjod par bya'o// sems can stong pa brjod par bya'o// sems can byed pa med pa brjod par
312a8(phal chen): bya'o// sems can dngos po med pa brjod par bya'o// sems can rang bzhin med pa brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i sems de bas kyang shas cher mngon par zhen pa
312b1(phal chen): la mi gnas par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni/ sbyor ba phun
312b2(phal chen): sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal
312b3(phal chen): ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu nyan na bsam pa rab tu 'thob pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas la snyan pa'am/ mi snyan par brjod kyang sangs
312b4(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos la snya/ na ba dang / mi snyan par brjod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la snyan pa 'am/ 
312b5(phal chen): mi snyan par brjod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la snyan pa 'am mi snyan par brjod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa
312b6(phal chen): yin/ sems can gyi khams chung ba dang / sems can gyi khams che ba brjod kyang / sangs rgya ste chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / sems can gyi
312b7(phal chen): khams kun nas nyon mongs pa med par brjod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams skyo bar sla ba dang / sems can gyi khams skyo bar dka' ba brjod
312b8(phal chen): kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings chung ba 'am/ chos kyi dbyings che bar brjod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin
313a1(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings 'grub pa'am/ chos kyi dbyings 'jig par brjod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings yod pa/ 
313a2(phal chen): 'am/ chos kyi dbyings med par brjod kyang // sangs rgyas kyi chos la bsam pa nges pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ste// de ltar
