313a3(phal chen): bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la/ chos la 'jug pa bcu brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / chos thams
313a4(phal chen): cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / chos thams cad dngos po me dad pa dang / chos thams cad yod pa ma yin pa dang / chos thams cad brdzun pa dang / chos thams cad
313a5(phal chen): dben pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / chos thams cad rtog pa med pa
313a6(phal chen): brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i bsam pa de bas kyang shas cher mi 'phrogs pa la rnam par bsgrub par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par
313a7(phal chen): mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la phyir mi ldog
313a8(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa bcu nyan pa'i tshe/ brtan pa bcu rab tu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na
313b1(phal chen): 'di ltar sangs rgyas yod ce'am/ sangs rgyas med ce na'ang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go/ chos yod ce'am/ chos med ce na'ang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las
313b2(phal chen): phyir mi ldog go// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yod ce'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa med ce na yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go/ byang chub
313b3(phal chen): sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'byung zhe 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mi 'byung zhe na yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi
313b4(phal chen): ldog go// de bzhin gshegs pa 'das shes 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'das she na yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// de bzhin gshegs
313b5(phal chen): ba byon ce'am de bzhin gshegs pa ma byon pa yin zhe na yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir/ mi trog ngas rgyab daltar byung zhe 'am/ sangs rgyas da ltar byung ba ma yin zhe na
313b6(phal chen): yang sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad mi sheso zhe 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad sheso zhe na yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir
313b7(phal chen): mi ldog go/ dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig ce'am/ dus gsum mtshan nyid tha dad ce na yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni
313b8(phal chen): phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste/ de ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni/ chos 'byam klas pa bcu brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gci
314a1(phal chen): las rnam pa tha dad par 'gyur ba brjod par bya'o// mang po las tha mi dad par brjod par bya'o// don dang 'thun pa'i yi ge brjod par bya'o// yi ge dang
314a2(phal chen): 'thun pa'i don brjod par bya'o// dngos po med pa yod pa dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o// dngos po yod pa med pa dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o// mtshan ma med pa mtshan
314a3(phal chen): ma dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o// mtshan dang mtshan ma med pa dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o// mtshan nyid med pa mtshan nyid dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o// mtshan
314a4(phal chen): nyid mtshan nyid med pa dang mnyam pa nyid du brjod par bya'o// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ci nas kyang de bas kyang shas cher mkhas pa thams cad la yongasasu byang bar 'byung bar bya ba dang
314a5(phal chen): gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni phyir mi
314a6(phal chen): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems
314a7(phal chen): dpa' las bcu la rab tu gnas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lus kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ ngag gi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/ yid kyi spyod pa kha
314a8(phal chen): na ma tho ba med pa yin/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba sgrub pa yin/ sems can gzhan gyi bsam pa shes pa yin/ gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa rtogs pa yin/ sems can/ 
314b1(phal chen): gyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ las kyi byin gyis brlabs tha dad pa rab tu rtogs pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'grub pa dang / 'jig pa yongasu 'jal ba yin
314b2(phal chen): gar dga' bar 'gro ba la myur ba yin/ kye rgyal po'i sras dag/ 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ltar gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang
314b3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' de la ni chos mngon par bsgrub pa bcu brjod par bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu shes pa brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
314b4(phal chen): rab tu brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi byin gyi brlabs brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam par rgyu ba brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
314b5(phal chen): gnam pa brjod par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par 'gro ba brjod par bya'o// chos grangs med pa yongasu dri ba brjod par bya'o// yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus
314b6(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa brjod par bya'o// dbyangs kyi sbyor ba rab tu dgye ba brjod par bya'o// sems bskyed pa gcig la sangs rgyas grangs med pa bsnyen bkur bar bya ba brjod par bya'o// 
314b7(phal chen): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de de bas kyang shas cher chos thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i mkhas pa 'byung bar bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang de la bdag nyid sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan
314b8(phal chen): gyi dring 'jog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la rgyal tshab
315a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ bcug
315a2(phal chen): zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can gyi skye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rgyud rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ bag chags kyi mtshams 'brel pa rtogs par bya ba la
315a3(phal chen): mkhas pa yin/ spyod yul rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ chos sna tshogs rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ spyad pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi
315a4(phal chen): khams rnam par phye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' shes par rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten
315a5(phal chen): gyi kun rdzob kyi bden pa brtag pa rtogs par bya ba la mkha sa pa yin/ don dam pa'i bden pa rtag pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rgyal
315a6(phal chen): tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba de la ni gnas bcu brjod par bya'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i gnas la mkhas pa brjod par
315a7(phal chen): bya'o// rgyal po'i gnas kyi tshul brjod par bya'o// rgyal po'i gnas su gnas pa brjod par bya'o// rgyal po'i gnasu 'gro ba brjod par bya'o// rgyal po'i gnas su spyad pa brjod par
315a8(phal chen): bya'o// chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba brjod par bya'o// chos kyi rgyal po'i byin brjod par bya'o// chos kyi rgyal po'i mthu brjod par bya'o// chos kyi rgyal srid la gnas pa brjod par bya'o// 
315b1(phal chen): chos kyi rgyal po'i bsngags pa brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ ci nas kyang de'i sems bsgribs pa med pa mngon par bsgrubs pa la de bas kyang shas cher gnas par bya ba dang / gan
315b2(phal chen): gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring 'jog par mi bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras drag 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod
315b3(phal chen): nga'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes la rnam par spyod pa bcu dang ldan pa
315b4(phal chen): yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su bskyed pa'i sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa snang
315b5(phal chen): bar bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa byin gyis brlab pa'i sems mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'da' bar bya ba'i sems
315b6(phal chen): mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su sbyang ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems
315b7(phal chen): can grangs med pa rnam par brtag pa'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i dbang po rtogs par bya ba'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa yongasu gzung
315b8(phal chen): pa'i sems mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa gdul ba'i sems mang ba yin te/ de'i lus ni byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba la gnas pa'i bar gyis kyang shes par
316a1(phal chen): mi nus te/ lus kyi las shes par mi nus so// rdzu 'phrul shes par mi nus so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa shes par mi nuso// 'das pa/ 
316a2(phal chen): dalta ba 'am shes par mi nus so// ma 'ongs pa blta ba'am shes par mi nus so// da ltar byung ba blta ba 'am shes par mi nus// zhing mngon par 'du byed pa shes par mi nus// 
316a3(phal chen): sems kyi yul shes par mi nus so// ye shes kyi spyod yul yang byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab la gnas pa'i bar gyis shes par mi nus te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di
316a4(phal chen): ni dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskul ba de la da ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes
316a5(phal chen): la 'jug pa bcu bka' stsal te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar dus gsum gyi ye shes brjod pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi sa kyi ye she brjod pa mdzad do// chos kyi dbyings
316a6(phal chen): chags pa med pa brjod pa mdzad do// chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med pa brjod pa mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par dgang ba brjod pa mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi
316a7(phal chen): khams thams cad snang bar bya ba brjod pa mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa brjod do// sems can thams cad yongs su shes pa'i ye shes brjod
316a8(phal chen): pa mdzad do// chos thams cad yongs su shes pa'i ye shes brjod pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa brjod pa mdzado// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci nas kyang de'i sems rnam pa
316b1(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du de bas shas cher gnas par bya ba dang / gnas gang thos kyang bdag nyid de la sbyor bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi
316b2(phal chen): 'jog par bya ba'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'o// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcur 'jig
316b3(phal chen): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul to// rab tu 'gu
316b4(phal chen): to// kun tu 'gul to// ldeg go// rab tu ldeg go// kun tu ldog go// che mchem/ rab tu che mche ma/ kun tu chematsham mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu'ur 'ur// kun
316b5(phal chen): tu'ur 'ur ro// shig shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun tu shig shig/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid thob pas lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par
316b6(phal chen): bab bo// lha rdzas kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas
316b7(phal chen): kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo// lha rdzas kyi rol me
316b8(phal chen): sgra mngon par byung bar gyur to// lha rdzas kyi snang ba rab tu byung bar gyur to// lha rdzas kyi nga ro shin tu grag par gyur to// gling bzhi pa 'di ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang par ji lta
317a1(phal chen): de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang phyogs bcu rgyas par byung ste/ chos bstan pa 'di yang thams cad du byung ngo // sangs rgyas
317a2(phal chen): kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' mang po lhags te/ phyogs bcu rgyas par
317a3(phal chen): bkang nas 'di skad ces 'dzir to// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos nyid de lta bu ston pa legaso leg so// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kun
317a4(phal chen): kyang ming chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba sha stag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba sha stag gi zham ring 'jig rten gyi khams
317a5(phal chen): chos kyi sprin ces bya ba sha stag nas 'dir phyin ste/ thams cad na yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ chos bstan pa 'di nyid 'khor gyi rnam pa 'di lta
317a6(phal chen): bu dag tu tshig 'di dag dang / yi ge 'di dag dang / khong du chud par bya ba 'di dag gis don 'di nyid mngon par smos shing / lhag chad med par ston te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar
317a7(phal chen): bdag cag dbang du gyur pa sha stag/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'dir phyin to// ji ltar bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i
317a8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa dag gi/ ri rab kyi rtse mo'i lha'i dbang po'i khang pa dag tu yang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
317b1(phal chen): kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mang po byin par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ chos kyi dbyings la
317b2(phal chen): rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rang 'byung sangs rgyas thugs mchog rab mnga' ba// sku gzugs
317b3(phal chen): sku mdog shin tu mdzes ldan zhing // mtshan bzang thub pa med pa mthong gyur nas// byang chub don du brtan pa sems sbyar ro// dpe zla med pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs chen dang // yongasu
317b4(phal chen): bstan dang rjes su bstan mthong ste// srid lam kun tu sdug bsngal gyur mthong zhing // byang chub don du brtan pa sems sbyar ro// de bzhin gshegs pa
317b5(phal chen): yon tan kun mnga' ba// kun tu bzang po'i yon tan thos gyur cing // nam mkha'i dbyings mnyam rtog pa med pa yi// brtan pa byang chub don du sems
317b6(phal chen): skyed do// khams gsum kun na gnas ni 'di dag yin// gnas min rang bzhin dag kyang 'di yin zhes// ma nor dngos po khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems
317b7(phal chen): bskyed do// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung ba dang // dkar gnag las rnams ji snyed yod pa dag/ de kun mnyam nyid rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub den du sems
317b8(phal chen): bskyed do// bsam gtan ting 'dzin rnam par thar pa dang // mnyam bzhag de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs dang // rnam byang rnam par ldang ba khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan
318a1(phal chen): pa byang chub don du sems bskyed do// sems can kun gyi dbang po ci 'dra dang // brtson 'grus stobs kyang de bzhin ci 'dra ba// rnam pa sna tshogs
318a2(phal chen): de dag rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems sbyar ro// sems can kun gyi mos pa ji 'dra dang // 'jig rten kun gyi bsam pa sna tshogs rnams// rnam pa kun tu thams
318a3(phal chen): cad rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems sbyar ro// 'gro ba rnams kyi sna tshogs khams rnams dang // 'jig rten kun gyi khams mang du ma dag/ khams kyi rang bzhin
318a4(phal chen): rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// kun tu 'gro ba'i chos rnams ci 'dra dang // lam rnams ci 'dra 'dus byas 'di dag gi/ ma nor rang
318a5(phal chen): bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa/ sems sbyar ro// zhing rnams thams cad mthong bar bya ba dang // sems can 'di dag ji ltar 'khor gyur ces// 
318a6(phal chen): chags med mig ni rnam par dag bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// 'das pa'i dus su gang rnams ji byung yang // mtshan nyid gang yin ji 'dra ji dngos pa// sngon gyi
318a7(phal chen): gnas rnams rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub den du sems sbyaro// 'jig rten kun na kun sbyor ji snyed dang // don gyi mtshams 'brel bag chags de bzhin te// nyon mongs
318a8(phal chen): zad bya mthar thugs shes bya'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems sbyar ro// 'gro ba rnams kyi tha snyad gdags pa dang // tshig lam skad du rjod pa ji snyed pa// brda'i bden pa rjes/ 
318b1(phal chen): rtogs pa'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// chos rnams ji ltar brjod du med pa dang // stong pa byed med rang bzhin dben pa'i rnams// de dag dngos nyid khong du chung byar/ 
318b2(phal chen): phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// zhing rnams thams cad rab tu bskyod pa dang // rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su bskum bya bar// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul
318b3(phal chen): rtogs bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub den du sems sbyar ro// spu rtse re re'i sgo nas 'od zer rnams// phyogs bcu kun tu ji ltar dgye bya ba// de 'dra'i rang bzhin khong du chud bya'o phyir/ 
318b4(phal chen): brtan pa byang chub don du sems bsgyur ro// zhing rnams brjod med bsam gyis mi khyab pa// bdag gi lag dpa'i mthil du bzhag bya bar// sgyu ma'i rnam pa thams cad
318b5(phal chen): rtogs bya'i phyir// brtan dbyang chub don du sems bsgyur/ ji ltar ning gi sems can yangs pa kun// gnod pa med par sna rtser gzhog byed par// srog med chos rnams
318b6(phal chen): khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// rgya mtsho thams cad chu chen gang rgyas pa// skra rtses blangs shing kun tu dor bya bar// mthar thugs ma lus khong du
318b7(phal chen): chung bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// ji ltar bsam gyis mi khyab zhing gi rnams// rdul glags ma lus bgrang bya bar// rdul phran grangs rnams khong du chud bya'i
318b8(phal chen): phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// 'das pa'i bskal pa de bzhin ma 'ongs dang // 'jig rten tshig cing 'grub pa de bzhin te// bskal pa zad cing gnas pa
319a1(phal chen): shes bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// dus gsum byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang // rgyal sras rang rgyal nyan
319a2(phal chen): thos thams cad kyi// chos kyi rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams// skra'i nyag mas
319a3(phal chen): bcings shing tshad gdab par// dngos po'i rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// brjod med khor yug shin tu yangs pa dag/ ba spu'i
319a4(phal chen): khung du ji ltar gzung bya bar// phra dang yangs pa khong du chung bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyararo// phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad
319a5(phal chen): du// ji ltar dbyangs gcig kun tu grags 'gyur bar// dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam dag shes bya'i phyir// / brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// sems can
319a6(phal chen): kun gyi sgra skad ji snyed pa// dbyangs gcig brjed pas ji ltar brjod bya bar// sgra'i rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// 'jig rten
319a7(phal chen): thams cad ma lus shes byed cing // ji ltar 'gro kun zhi zhes stod 'gyur bar// lce yangs khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// zhing
319a8(phal chen): rnams thams cad rab tu 'tshog pa dang // kun nas gnas pa ma lus mthong 'gyur bar// rnam rtogs chos ni khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyararo// 
319b1(phal chen): zhing rnams thams cad sangs rgyas gcig bzhin du// de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar rgyas bya bar// rang 'byung chos ni rjes su rtogs bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don/ 
319b2(phal chen): du sems sbyar ro// zhing rnams thams cad rdul mchog phrar glags pa// de snyed lus su ji ltar sprul bya bar// thams cad yid kyi dngosu she bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang
319b3(phal chen): chub don du sems sbyar ro// kun gzigs 'das pa ji snyed byung ba dang // ma byon sangs rgyas de bzhin bzhugs pa'i rnams// skad cig sems kyis thams cad rtogs bya'i
319b4(phal chen): phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// tshig cig pa rnams te brjod cing bshad byas kyang / dbaskal pa brjod med thams cad zad 'gyur bar// chos
319b5(phal chen): kyi rnam grangs khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten ma lus rnams// 'byung zhing ji ltar rjes su
319b6(phal chen): 'brang ba dag/ sems kyi rang bzhin khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang // phyogs kun spyod cha chags
319b7(phal chen): par mi 'gyur bar// dus gsum stong pa khong du chud bya'i phyir// brtan pa byang chub don du sems sbyar ro// de ltar byang chub don du sems bskyed pa// phyogs bcu'i
319b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas brjod du med pa kun// mchod par bya la yongasu bskul bar bya// 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go// 'khor ba dag na byang chub don spyod tshe// byang chub sems
320a1(phal chen): dpa'i bde ba ji snyed pa de dag de las yongs su brjod par bya// 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go// 'jig rten gtso bo 'jig rten ji snyed pa// phyogs bcu'i tha
320a2(phal chen): da tshad med yod pa'i rnams// de dag byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod// 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go// mchog gi chos dang ji snyed dam pa'i chos// 'phrul gyi chos dang bla na
320a3(phal chen): med pa'i chos// de dag byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan// 'di ni skyon med rnams kyi gdams ngag go/ gzhan gyis mi thub ji snyed gnas yod pa// 'jig rten kun gyis zil gyis
320a4(phal chen): mi non rnams// de la gnas par rgyal sras de brjod de/ 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan kun ldan pa// 'jig rten mgon
320a5(phal chen): po'i bdag nyid che ba kun// de la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhag ste// 'di ni skyes bu khyu mchog gdams dgo/ sangs rgyas grangs med brjod du med pa dang // ji ltar 'grog
320a6(phal chen): par 'gyur ba thams cad kyang // byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod par bya// 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go/ ting 'dzin zhi ba ji snyed gang yod pa// de dag gdams ngag ji snyed ma lus
320a7(phal chen): par/ byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan par bya// 'di ni phyir mi ldog gi gdams ngag go/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ldog par 'gyur ba dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba dang
320a8(phal chen): 'jig rten kun gyi chags par mi 'gyur ba// byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan par bya// sems can sdug bsngal gzir ba ji snyed dang // ji snyed ngan song gtses par gyur pa yi// skyabs dang
320b1(phal chen): mgon dang rten du 'gyur ba yang // byang chub sems dpa' de la brjod par bya// rnam pa 'di 'das rgyal sras dang po de// byang chub don du sems rab skyer 'gyur te// de ltar gdams ngas/ 
320b2(phal chen): rje su bstan par bya// 'di ni rgyal ba rnams kyi rnam bkod pa'o// de nas gnyis pa las kyi dang po pa// thog ma nyid du sems can thams cad la// sems bcu nye bar gzhog cing smon byed pa/ 
320b3(phal chen): 'di ni skyon dang bral ba'i gdams ngag go// phan pa'i sems dang de bzhin bde ba'i sems// snying rje'i sems dang de bzhin byams pa'i sems// bsrung ba'i sems dang de bzhin mnyam
320b4(phal chen): pa'i sems// slob dpon sems dang de bzhin ston pa'i sems// de 'dra'i sems rnams nye bar gzhag pa dang // / kha ton lung la yongasu bskul bar bya// mang du thos pa dgon
320b5(phal chen): par gnas par bskul// dben par gyur pas dgebashes bsnyen bskur bya// dge ba shes gyur nas dang bder 'gyur bar bya// ngang tshul bde bas dus
320b6(phal chen): tshul shes par bya// dus rnams shes nas mi 'jigs 'gyur bar bya// mi 'dzegs gyur nas don la brtson par bya// don shes gyur nas chos rjes shes par bya// chos shes
320b7(phal chen): gyur nas rmongs pa med par bya// rmongs med gyur nas legs par bshod chos la// rgyal sras des ni rnam par gnas par bya// de tsam gyis na las kyi dang po pa// byang
320b8(phal chen): chub don zhugs byang chub sems dpa'o// gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa'ang de bzhin te// sangs rgyas sras po da ltar slob par byed// gang yang byang chub sems dpa'
321a1(phal chen): gsum brjod pa// chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung la shin tu brtson// mi rtag sdug bsngal de bzhin stong pa nyid// bdag med de bzhin byed pa
321a2(phal chen): med pa dang // chos rnams thams cad de bzhin ro med dang // 'du byed ma yin de bzhin gnas med dang // ched du spyod med de bzhin rtog med par// kun la byang chub sems dpa'
321a3(phal chen): dpyod pa byed// de ni 'gro khams yongs su brtag pa dang // de bzhin chos dbyings brtag par bskul bar bya// 'jig rten khams yangs ma lus mthar thug pa// brtag
321a4(phal chen): par bya la yongs su bskul bar bya// sa dang me dang de debazhin chu rnams dang // de bzhin rlung dang phyogs bcu'i na mkha' dang // 'dod pa'i gzugs dang de bzhin
321a5(phal chen): gzugs med pa// brtog par bya la yongs su bskul bar bya// khams rnams yangs pa de bzhin kun rtogacing // khams kyi rang bzhin ma lus mthar phyin pas// 
321a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rab tu brtson byed pa// des ni der 'gyur gdams ngag de yin no// cher skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// 'phags pa'i gsung rab 'di la skyes pa ste/ 
321a7(phal chen): dngos po rang bzhin med rtogs dran pa can// chos kyi rjes byung rigs ldan legs par skyes// de'i gnas las phyir ldog mi 'gyur te// sangs rgyas rnams la shin tu mos pa yin/ 
321a8(phal chen): chos rnams de bzhin nges par rtogs pa ste// sems can rang bzhin med par rnam par sgom// chos dang 'jig rten de bzhin zhing rnams dang // rnam smin 'khor ba de bzhin mya ngan 'das// 
321b1(phal chen): rnam sgom rgyal sras de ltar cher skyes pa// thugs las byung ba'i sangs rgyas sras shes bya// 'das dang ma byon da ltar byung ba yi// sangs rgyas chos rnams rnam par bsgom pa'i phyir
321b2(phal chen): yongs su bsdu ba ci 'dra mthar thug dang // de ltar de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba dang // sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs shing // dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes song / 
321b3(phal chen): bas// mnyam pa nyid la sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // dus gsum kun la tha dad med par 'jug/ de tsam gyis ni rgyal sras bzhi pa ste// de'i bsngags pa rnam pa de
321b4(phal chen): 'dra'o// de ltar 'di la nan tan bsgrub byas shing // byad chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog tu 'byung // de dalas gzhan yang rgyal sras lnga pa ni// sbyor ba phun
321b5(phal chen): sum tshogs shes brjod pa ste// thobs mkhas tshul la rjes su zhugs gyur cing // bsod nams las rnams brtsams pa'i mthar phyin byed// 'jog rten dag
321b6(phal chen): na bsod nams gang byed kyang // sems can kun gyi skyabasu 'gyur ba dang // phan tshel de bzhin bde ba skyed pa dang // snying brtse skye dgu 'grol bar 'gyur ba dang // 'jig rten rnams
321b7(phal chen): kyi gtse ba bsal ba dang // drang zhing de bzhin dang bar bya ba dang // sems can mang po thams cad gdul mos shing // mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyi mthu yang cha// sems can thams
321b8(phal chen): cad kun tu mtha' yas dang // de bzhin tshad med grangs las 'das pa dang // bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal med dpag med pa// de 'dra'i chos rnams de la brjod par bya// de tsam gyis
322a1(phal chen): na rgyal sras lnga pa ste// sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa snying rje can// de'i gdams ngag tshul ni de 'dra ste// yon tan thams cad mnga' bas bstan pa
322a2(phal chen): yin// gang yang bsam pa phun sum tshogs bya'i phyir// chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis rmongs med cing // rnam rtog rtog bral dran dang ldan pa de// lhar bcas 'jig rten kun gyis
322a3(phal chen): bslu mi nus// sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin rgyal sras dang // spyod pas bsngags sam rnam par smad kyang rung // sems can nyung zhe'am 'on tam mang ngo zhes// thos par gyur kyang
322a4(phal chen): bsam pa zhum mi 'gyur// sems can nyon mongs nyon mongs med ce'am// gdul sla 'on tam shin tu gang dal dka' dang // chos kyi dbyings de chung ngam rgya che dang / 
322a5(phal chen): kun nas 'grub 'gyur rnam par 'jig ce 'am// chos dpying / sa de ni yod dam med ces kyang // byang chub sems dpa' thos gyur dus gsum tshul// nges par rtogs
322a6(phal chen): byed thams cad rnam rtog cing // sangs rgyas chos la bsam pa shin tu nges// mtshan ma med dang mtshan nyid med pa dang // dngos med yod min brdzun pa bden pa dang // sgyu ma rmi lam
322a7(phal chen): mi rtog rang bzhin med// 'di 'dra'i chos tshol de dag nyan pa byed// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin rgyal sras dang // spyod pa yod med
322a8(phal chen): rtag tu rnam par bsgom// 'byung ngam mi 'byung zhes na'ang phyir mi ldog/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das shes 'am ma 'das dang // ma byon to zhe 'am ma byon ma yin dang // skyes so/ 
322b1(phal chen): ma skyes zad 'gyur zad mi 'gyur// de bzhin mtshan gcig tha dad mtshan de bzhin// gcig pa rnam pa tha dad mang po dang // don dang de bzhin yi ge'i dngos rnams dang // thams cad pan
322b2(phal chen): tshun yongs su 'dzud byed pa// mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' bstan par bya// mtshan ma med la mtshan gyis dmigs pa dang // rnam phye phan tshun yongs su sbyar ba'i rnams// thos nas
322b3(phal chen): 'di la mthar thug 'jug pa byed// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzhon gyur pa// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kun gyis// kha na ma thor 'gyur ba nam yang med// ci 'dod tshul
322b4(phal chen): bzhin de ni skye bar byed// gzhan gyi bsam pa ji bzhin rab tu shes// de dag mos pa yongasu rtogs par byed// phyog/ sa rnams gang du yid kyis smon byed pa// kun tu mngon
322b5(phal chen): shes myur ba yid bzhin 'thob// bde bar gshegs pas bsngags pa'i chos thos shing // de la zhum pa skyed pa gang yang med// zhing rnams yongasu bskyed pa shes
322b6(phal chen): ba dang // de bzhin byin rlab rnam par rgyu ba dang // sangs rgyas zhing rnams yongs su gnan pa dang // grangs med kun tu 'gro ba brjod par bya// grangs med chos rnams yongasu dri ba dang / 
322b7(phal chen): ci nas yid kyi rang bzhin lus 'gyur zhing // dbyangs kyi rnam pa shin tu yangs 'gyur dang // sems cig sangs rgyas grangs med bsnyen bkur brjod// byang chub sems dpa'
322b8(phal chen): rgyal tshab brjod pa ni// sems can rnams kyi skye ba rab tu shes// nyon mongs rgyud dang rnam par rgyu ba shes// de 'dra'i spyod yul de 'dra'i sbyor ba can// chos kyi
323a1(phal chen): rgyud mang rnam pa tha dad dang / sngon mtha' phyi mtha' 'jig rten rnam bye dang // brda'i bden pa don dam bden pa dag/ ma lus rtogs
323a2(phal chen): par bya la mkhas pa yin// de ni rgyal po'i gnas la mkhas par bskul// dar yang ji ltar yongs su spyad bya dang // 'gro bar bya dang gnas par bya ba dang // rgyal po'i gnas
323a3(phal chen): su ji ltar rnam spyad brjod// de la chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur dang // byin gyis brlabs dang de bzhin mthu tshon dang // chos su gnas dang 'gro bar bya ba dag/ brjod par bya ste
323a4(phal chen): rgyal tshab de 'dra yin// de tsam gyis na de'i mthar thug ste// / gdams ngag des kyang rlom sems byed pa med// khyong du chud byed dran ldan rgyal tshab de// rgyal ba kun gyi drung na
323a5(phal chen): slob pa byed// bde gshegs sras po gtso boradabang bskur ba// thu bo mchog dang dam par gyur/ pa ni// 'jig rten khams mang grangs med bskyed pa
323a6(phal chen): dang // yongs su snang bar bya ba'i sems kyang mang // byin gyis brlab dang yongs su 'da' bya dang // yongs su sbyang pa'i sems kyang rab tu mang // grangs med 'jig
323a7(phal chen): rten shes par bya ba dang // dbang po phun ldan rnam par dpyad la mkhas// de dag gzud cing rnam par gdul ba dang // thams cad mkhyen gyi sems kyang shin tu
323a8(phal chen): mang // zhing mang brjod du med par 'gro byas shing // dam chos khams rnams ma lus rnam par dpyod// de'i lus dang lus kyi las rnams dang // rdzu 'phrul
323b1(phal chen): bstan pa'ang shes par mi nus te// dus gsum shin tu rgyu ba'i sems dag kyang // rgyal tshab gyur pa'i bar gyis shes mi nus// de la thams cad gzigs pas dus
323b2(phal chen): gsum dang // sangs rgyas chos shes chags med de bzhin brjod// chos dbyings mtha' yas mtha' dang dpung med pa// rgyas par 'gengs par bde gshegs
323b3(phal chen): brjod pa mdzad// ji nas 'jig rten khams kun ma lus par// yongs su snang byed byin gyis rlob pa dang // sems can chos rnams de bzhin ma lus dang // sangs
323b4(phal chen): rgyas mtha' yas de bzhin brjod pa mdzad// rgyal da sras brtan pa rnam pa bcur bgrangs pa// rnam dpar dgod la gnas pa de dag kun// rang rang spyod
323b5(phal chen): yul rab tu brtson byed pa// 'jig rten lhar bcas kun gyis shes par dka'// 'on kyang dang por sems bskyed mtha' yas pa// phyogs bcu ma lus
323b6(phal chen): thams cad rgyas par bya// dus gsum kun du gang tshe sems gtong ba// de tshe thams cad mkhyen pa kun gzigs 'gyur// zhing rnams kun la mu mtha' yod pa min// sems can chos dang
323b7(phal chen): 'jig rten kun de bzhin// las dang nyon mongs gnas kyang mtha' yas te// byang chub sems rab de la gnas pa yin// skad cig sems la byang chub gzhol ba'i sems// gang / 
323b8(phal chen): skyes 'jig rten kun gyis shes mi nus// rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos kun gyis min// de nas gong du spyod pa ji skad brjod// gang zhig phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams
